Abathur.name: Abathur
Abathur.description: A unique Hero that can manipulate the battle from anywhere on the map.

basic.name: Symbiote
basic.shortTooltip: Assist an ally and gain new abilities
basic.fullTooltip: Spawn and attach a Symbiote to a target ally or Structure. While active, Abathur controls the Symbiote, gaining access to new Abilities. The Symbiote is able to gain XP from nearby enemy deaths.

basic.name: Toxic Nest
basic.shortTooltip: Spawn a mine
basic.fullTooltip: Spawn a mine that becomes active after a short time. Deals 153 (+4% per level) damage and reveals the enemy for 4 seconds. Lasts 90 seconds.  Stores up to 3 charges.

heroic.name: Ultimate Evolution
heroic.shortTooltip: Clone target allied Hero and control it
heroic.fullTooltip: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

heroic.name: Evolve Monstrosity
heroic.shortTooltip: Minion or Locust becomes a powerful Monstrosity
heroic.fullTooltip: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from non-Heroic enemies.  Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.

trait.name: Locust Strain
trait.shortTooltip: Spawn locusts that attack down the nearest lane
trait.fullTooltip: Spawns a Locust to attack down the nearest lane every 15 seconds. Locusts last for 25 seconds, have 316 (+4% per level) health and deal 34 (+4% per level) damage with each Basic Attack.

mount.name: Deep Tunnel
mount.fullTooltip: Quickly tunnel to a visible location

level1.name: Pressurized Glands
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Spike Burst range and decreases cooldown
level1.fullTooltip: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.

level1.name: Survival Instincts
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Locust Health and duration
level1.fullTooltip: Increases Locust's Health by 40% and duration by 40%.

level1.name: Regenerative Microbes
level1.shortTooltip: Carapace heals target
level1.fullTooltip: Symbiote's Carapace heals the target for 68 (+4% per level) Health per second over 4 seconds.

level1.name: Envenomed Nest
level1.shortTooltip: Toxic Nests deal more damage
level1.fullTooltip: Toxic Nests deal 75% more damage over 3 seconds.

level4.name: Prolific Dispersal
level4.fullTooltip: Reduces the cooldown of Toxic Nest by 2 seconds and adds 2 additional charges.

level4.name: Ballistospores
level4.shortTooltip: Toxic Nests have global range and last longer
level4.fullTooltip: Increases Toxic Nest's range to global and increases duration by 25%.

level4.name: Sustained Carapace
level4.shortTooltip: Increases Carapace shield and persists after Symbiote
level4.fullTooltip: Increases the Shield amount of Symbiote's Carapace by 40% and allows it to persist after Symbiote ends.

level4.name: Adrenal Overload
level4.fullTooltip: Heroic Symbiote hosts gain 25% increased Attack Speed.

level7.name: Needlespine
level7.fullTooltip: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.

level7.name: Vile Nest
level7.fullTooltip: Toxic Nests slow enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

level7.name: Networked Carapace
level7.fullTooltip: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.

level7.name: Calldown: MULE
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 100 Health every 1 second.

level10.name: Ultimate Evolution
level10.shortTooltip: Clone target allied Hero and control it
level10.fullTooltip: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

level10.name: Evolve Monstrosity
level10.shortTooltip: Minion or Locust becomes a powerful Monstrosity
level10.fullTooltip: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from non-Heroic enemies.  Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.

level13.name: Assault Strain
level13.fullTooltip: Locust Basic Attacks cleave for 50% damage, and explode on death for 102 (+4% per level) damage.

level13.name: Bombard Strain
level13.fullTooltip: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack that deal 70% more damage.

level13.name: Spatial Efficiency
level13.fullTooltip: Symbiote's Stab gains 1 additional charge and its Cooldown is reduced by .5 seconds.

level13.name: Soma Transference
level13.shortTooltip: Spike Burst heals for each Hero hit
level13.fullTooltip: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 64 (+4% per level) Health per enemy Hero hit.

level16.name: Envenomed Spikes
level16.shortTooltip: Spike Burst slows Move Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Abathur's Symbiote's Spike Burst also slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.

level16.name: Adrenaline Boost
level16.shortTooltip: Carapace increases Move Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by 40% for 3.5 seconds.

level16.name: Locust Brood
level16.shortTooltip: Spawn a group of Locusts
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to spawn 3 Locusts at a nearby location.

level16.name: Volatile Mutation
level16.shortTooltip: Heroic summons radiate damage
level16.fullTooltip: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 137 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds and when they die.

level20.name: Evolutionary Link
level20.shortTooltip: Ultimate Evolution target gets a Shield
level20.fullTooltip: As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health.  Refreshes every 5 seconds.

level20.name: Evolution Complete
level20.fullTooltip: Monstrosity gains the ability to Deep Tunnel to any visible location once every 25 seconds.

level20.name: Hivemind
level20.fullTooltip: Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero.  This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first, but does half damage and shielding.

level20.name: Locust Nest
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.

basic.name: Stab
basic.shortTooltip: Shoots a spike that deals damage to the first enemy it contacts.
basic.fullTooltip: Shoots a spike towards target area that deals 119 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy it contacts.

basic.name: Spike Burst
basic.shortTooltip: Damage nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Deals 120 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

basic.name: Carapace
basic.fullTooltip: Shields the assisted ally for 157 (+4% per level). Lasts for 8 seconds.

Alarak.name: Alarak
Alarak.description: A combo Assassin that can move enemies around and punish mistakes.

basic.name: Discord Strike
basic.shortTooltip: Damage and silence enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: After a 0.5 second delay, enemies in front of Alarak take 175 (+4% per level) damage and are silenced for 1.5 seconds.

basic.name: Telekinesis
basic.shortTooltip: Push enemies towards a location
basic.fullTooltip: Vector Targeting Create a force, pushing Alarak and all enemies hit from the targeted point towards the targeted direction. Deals 48 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.

basic.name: Lightning Surge
basic.shortTooltip: Damage enemies in a line
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 62 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and an additional 100% damage to enemies between Alarak and the target. Restore 70 (+4% per level) health for each Hero hit.

heroic.name: Deadly Charge
heroic.shortTooltip: Channel to charge a long distance
heroic.fullTooltip: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

heroic.name: Counter-Strike
heroic.shortTooltip: Prevents damage to deal damage in a large area
heroic.fullTooltip: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.

trait.name: Sadism
trait.shortTooltip: Alarak deals increased damage and has increased self-healing against enemy Heroes
trait.fullTooltip: Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing are increased by 100% against enemy Heroes.  Repeatable Quest: Takedowns increase Sadism by 3%, up to 30%. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.

level1.name: Sustaining Power
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Lightning Surge healing
level1.fullTooltip: Increase the healing received from damaging Heroes with Lightning Surge by 40%.

level1.name: Extended Lightning
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Reduce Sadism, empower Lightning Surge
level1.fullTooltip: Reduce Sadism by 10%.  Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge.  Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with the center of a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.

level1.name: Ruthless Momentum
level1.shortTooltip: Reduce cooldowns at high Health
level1.fullTooltip: Basic Abilities recharge 20% faster while above 80% Health.

level4.name: Chaos Reigns
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes to increase Discord Strike damage
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes with Discord Strike.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase Discord Strike's damage by 50.  Reward: After hitting 2 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 50.  Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 80 and instantly gain all other Rewards.

level4.name: Negatively Charged
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Increase Lightning Surge center damage
level4.fullTooltip: Increase the Lightning Surge damage bonus to enemies between Alarak and his victim to 150%.  Repeatable Quest: Each Hero hit by the center of Lightning Surge permanently increases the damage bonus by 5%.

level4.name: Show of Force
level4.fullTooltip: Heroes hit with 3 of Alarak's Abilities within 2 seconds take an additional 77 (+4% per level) damage.

level7.name: Dissonance
level7.fullTooltip: Increase Discord Strike's Silence duration by 0.75 seconds.

level7.name: Hindered Motion
level7.fullTooltip: Telekinesis Slows enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.

level7.name: Applied Force
level7.shortTooltip: Reduce Sadism, increase Telekinesis distance, range
level7.fullTooltip: Reduce Sadism by 10%, but Telekinesis pushes 20% further and has 20% increased range.

level10.name: Deadly Charge
level10.shortTooltip: Channel to charge a long distance
level10.fullTooltip: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

level10.name: Counter-Strike
level10.shortTooltip: Prevents damage to deal damage in a large area
level10.fullTooltip: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.

level13.name: Blade of the Highlord
level13.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Sadism by 7% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 35%. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

level13.name: Pure Malice
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Sadism by 10% any time an allied Hero dies, up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Pure Malice is lost on death.

level13.name: Rite of Rak'Shir
level13.shortTooltip: Mark and damage Hero to increase Sadism
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to mark an enemy Hero for 300 seconds.  Hitting the marked Hero with Discord Strike increases Sadism by 3%. Killing the marked Hero increases Sadism by 5% and lowers the cooldown of Rite of Rak'Shir to 10 seconds.  Sadism gained from Rite of Rak'Shir is lost on death.

level16.name: Lethal Onslaught
level16.shortTooltip: Discord Strike grants Sadism bonus to Basic Attacks
level16.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 50% of Sadism's damage bonus to Alarak's Basic Attacks for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

level16.name: Lightning Barrage
level16.shortTooltip: Center hits grant free Lightning Surge cast
level16.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with the center of Lightning Surge allows it to be cast again for free on a different primary target within the next 2 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Lightning Barrage.

level16.name: Mocking Strikes
level16.shortTooltip: Reduce cooldowns against disabled Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Silenced, Slowed, or Rooted Heroes reduce the cooldown of Alarak's Basic Abilities by 2.5 seconds.

level20.name: Counter-Strike
level20.shortTooltip: Prevents damage to deal damage in a large area
level20.fullTooltip: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.  This ability will take over Alarak's Trait button.

level20.name: Deadly Charge
level20.shortTooltip: Channel to charge a long distance
level20.fullTooltip: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

level20.name: Last Laugh
level20.shortTooltip: Cleanse and teleport, but reduce Health
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to teleport to the chosen location and remove all Roots, Slows, and damage over time effects. If Alarak fails to hit enemy Heroes 3 times with Basic Abilities within 4 seconds of using Last Laugh, his Health is reduced to 1.

level20.name: Hasty Bargain
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to reduce Sadism bonus and reset Basic Ability cooldowns
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to permanently reduce Alarak's Sadism by 4% and reset the cooldowns of his Basic Abilities.

Alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza
Alexstrasza.description: A Healer who shares her Health with allies and can transform into a Dragon to empower her Abilities.

basic.name: Gift of Life
basic.shortTooltip: Give a portion of Health to an allied Hero
basic.fullTooltip: Sacrifice 15% of Alexstrasza's current Health, healing an allied Hero for 150% of that amount.  Dragonqueen: Breath of Life Cooldown greatly reduced and does not cost Health.

basic.name: Abundance
basic.shortTooltip: Heal allied Heroes in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Plant a seed of healing that blooms after 3 seconds, healing nearby allied Heroes for 20% of their maximum Health.  Dragonqueen: Preservation Heal area and amount greatly increased.

basic.name: Flame Buffet
basic.shortTooltip: Launch a fireball that ignites enemies and can Slow them
basic.fullTooltip: Launch a fireball, Burning enemies hit for 75 (+4% per level) damage over 5.5 seconds.  Hitting enemies that are already Burning deals 125 (+4% per level) bonus damage upon impact, Slows them by 40% decaying over 2 seconds, and refunds the Mana cost.  Dragonqueen: Wing Buffet Damage and Knockback enemies in an arc.

heroic.name: Life-Binder
heroic.shortTooltip: Link Alexstrasza's Health with an ally
heroic.fullTooltip: Bind Alexstrasza's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for 480 (+4% per level) Health over 2 seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is healed to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

heroic.name: Cleansing Flame
heroic.shortTooltip: Rain healing and damaging fire from the sky
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 6 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 135 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 (+4% per level) Health.  2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

trait.name: Dragonqueen
trait.shortTooltip: Transform into a dragon aspect with empowered Abilities
trait.fullTooltip: After 1.25 seconds, transform into a dragon and gain 500 (+4% per level) Health.  While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Abilities are empowered, and her Basic Attacks deal 143 (+4% per level) damage and heal allied Heroes for 43 (+4% per level) in an arc in front of her. Additionally, the duration of incoming Stuns, Roots, Slows, and Blinds is reduced by 50%.  Lasts 15 seconds.

level1.name: Live and Let Live
level1.shortTooltip: High Health reduces Gift of Life cooldown
level1.fullTooltip: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster.

level1.name: Circle of Life
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Regen Globes empower Abundance
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Collect Regeneration Globes.  Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Abundance heals for an additional 5% maximum Health.  Reward: After collecting 25 Regeneration Globes, Abundance's healing burst creates a Regeneration Globe.

level1.name: Flames of Fury
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Flame Buffet reduces Dragonqueen cooldown
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit 20 Burning Heroes with Flame Buffet.  Reward: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet reduces Dragonqueen's cooldown by 5 seconds.

level4.name: Surge of Vitality
level4.fullTooltip: Abundance's healing burst grants allied Heroes 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

level4.name: Heat Exhaustion
level4.fullTooltip: Increase Flame Buffet's initial Slow from 40% to 60%.

level4.name: Exuberance
level4.fullTooltip: While above 75% Health, gain 15% Movement Speed.

level7.name: Lifeblossom
level7.shortTooltip: Gift of Life creates a Lifeblossom at high Health
level7.fullTooltip: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life creates a Lifeblossom at the target's location. Alexstrasza can collect the Lifeblossom to make her next Gift of Life cost no Health.

level7.name: Verdant Flourish
level7.shortTooltip: Regen Globe and Abundance healing increased
level7.fullTooltip: Alexstrasza receives 30% more healing from Abundance and 100% more healing from Regeneration Globes.

level7.name: Fire Within
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet heals Alexstrasza for 10% of her maximum Health.

level10.name: Life-Binder
level10.shortTooltip: Link Alexstrasza's Health with an ally
level10.fullTooltip: Bind Alexstrasza's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for 480 (+4% per level) Health over 2 seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is healed to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

level10.name: Cleansing Flame
level10.shortTooltip: Rain healing and damaging fire from the sky
level10.fullTooltip: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 6 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 135 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 (+4% per level) Health.  2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

level13.name: Dragon Scales
level13.fullTooltip: Gain 30 Armor while Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced, and for 2 seconds after. Can only trigger once every 10 seconds.

level13.name: Pacify
level13.shortTooltip: Slow an enemy Hero and reduce their damage
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to Slow and reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Pacify's cooldown by 30 seconds.

level13.name: Life Unbound
level13.shortTooltip: Heal an ally and damage enemies
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 15% of their maximum Health and deal 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Life Unbound's cooldown by 30 seconds.  Cannot be used on Alexstrasza.

level16.name: Tough Love
level16.shortTooltip: Gift of Life grants Armor at high Health
level16.fullTooltip: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life grants its target 20 Armor for 2 seconds.

level16.name: Overprotective
level16.shortTooltip: Abundance grants Shields
level16.fullTooltip: Heroes healed by Abundance gain a Shield for 3 seconds equal to 60% of the amount healed.

level16.name: Draconic Discipline
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Dragonqueen duration
level16.fullTooltip: Increase Dragonqueen's duration by 7 seconds.

level20.name: Ritual of Life
level20.fullTooltip: Life-Binder activates 3 times over 6 seconds.

level20.name: On Ruby Wings
level20.fullTooltip: Healing or damaging Heroes 8 or more times with Cleansing Flame activates Dragonqueen for 15 seconds upon landing.

level20.name: Ancient Flame
level20.fullTooltip: While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Basic Attacks apply Flame Buffet, but her Attack Speed is reduced by 25%.

level20.name: Blessing of the Red
level20.shortTooltip: Grant bonus Health to an ally
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to grant an allied Hero 500 bonus maximum Health until they die.  Cannot be used on Alexstrasza, or on a Hero who already has Blessing of the Red.

basic.name: Breath of Life
basic.shortTooltip: Heal an allied Hero
basic.fullTooltip: Heal an allied Hero for 20% of Alexstrasza's current Health.

basic.name: Preservation
basic.shortTooltip: Heal allied Heroes in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Plant a seed of healing that blooms after 3 seconds, healing nearby allied Heroes for 30% of their maximum Health.

basic.name: Wing Buffet
basic.shortTooltip: Damage, Knockback, and Slow enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area, knocking them back and Slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

heroic.name: Cleansing Flame
heroic.shortTooltip: Rain healing and damaging fire from the sky
heroic.fullTooltip: Take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 6 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 135 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 (+4% per level) Health.  2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

Ana.name: Ana
Ana.description: A burst Healer who uses precise skillshots to heal allies and can deny enemy healing.

basic.name: Healing Dart
basic.shortTooltip: Shoot a dart that heals an Ally
basic.fullTooltip: Fire a dart which heals the first allied Hero hit for 215 (+4% per level) Health. Does not affect full Health Heroes.

basic.name: Biotic Grenade
basic.shortTooltip: Toss a grenade that heals allies, prevents enemy healing
basic.fullTooltip: Toss a Grenade at the target area. Allied Heroes hit are healed for 166 (+4% per level) Health and receive 25% increased healing from Ana for 4 seconds. Enemies hit take 60 (+4% per level) damage and receive 100% less healing for 2 seconds.

basic.name: Sleep Dart
basic.shortTooltip: Fire a dart that puts enemies to Sleep
basic.fullTooltip: Fire a dart that puts the first enemy Hero hit to Sleep, Stunning them for 3 seconds. Sleep's effects end instantly if the target takes damage after the first 0.5 seconds.  Cannot be used on Vehicles.

heroic.name: Nano Boost
heroic.shortTooltip: Grant ally Spell Power, reduced cooldowns
heroic.fullTooltip: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 200 Mana. For the next 8 seconds, they gain 30% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150% faster.  Cannot be used on Ana.

heroic.name: Eye of Horus
heroic.shortTooltip: Fire unlimited range healing and damaging rounds
heroic.fullTooltip: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 6 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds hit the first allied or enemy Hero or enemy Structure in their path. Allies are healed for 285 (+4% per level) and enemies are damaged for 166 (+4% per level). Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

trait.name: Shrike
trait.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal additional damage over time and heal
trait.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks apply a Dose to enemies, dealing an additional 40 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds, and stacking up to 5 times.  Every 0.5 seconds, Ana is healed for 50% of the damage dealt by Shrike.

level1.name: Grenade Calibration
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Empower Biotic Grenade
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes with Biotic Grenade.  Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes, Biotic Grenade does 75% more damage per allied and enemy Hero hit.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Biotic Grenade's duration on allies is increased from 4 seconds to 12 seconds, its healing radius is increased by 100%, and its healing amplification applies to all sources.

level1.name: Piercing Darts
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Empower Sleep Dart, Healing Dart
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes with Sleep Dart.  Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes, Sleep Dart now hits 2 Heroes and its range is increased by 25%.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Healing Dart now hits 2 Heroes and its range is increased by 25%.

level1.name: Detachable Box Magazine
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Empower Doses
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Stack 5 Doses on an enemy Hero.  Reward: After reaching maximum Dosage 12 times, unlock the Active Reload Ability, which can be activated to instantly gain 3 charges of Healing Dart.

level4.name: Overdose
level4.fullTooltip: Hitting enemy Heroes with Sleep Dart applies 3 Doses.

level4.name: Aim Down Sights
level4.shortTooltip: Activate Shrike to increase vision, range
level4.fullTooltip: Shrike can be activated to increase vision radius by 100% and Basic Attack range by 2 but reduce Movement Speed by 20%. Lasts until canceled.

level4.name: Air Strike
level4.shortTooltip: Activate to throw Biotic Grenade farther
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to use Biotic Grenade with a 275% increased range, but Grenades thrown this way take 3 seconds to land.  Passive: Reduce Biotic Grenade cooldown by 4 seconds.

level7.name: Temporary Blindness
level7.fullTooltip: After Sleep Dart's effects wear off, targets are Blinded for 2 seconds.

level7.name: Mind-Numbing Agent
level7.fullTooltip: Every Dose a Hero has reduces their Spell Power by 10%.

level7.name: Debilitating Dart
level7.shortTooltip: Fire a dart that reduces damage and Slows
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to fire a dart which Slows the Movement Speed and reduces the damage dealt by the first enemy Hero it hits by 50% for 3 seconds.

level10.name: Nano Boost
level10.shortTooltip: Grant ally Spell Power, reduced cooldowns
level10.fullTooltip: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 200 Mana. For the next 8 seconds, they gain 30% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150% faster.  Cannot be used on Ana.

level10.name: Eye of Horus
level10.shortTooltip: Fire unlimited range healing and damaging rounds
level10.fullTooltip: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 6 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds hit the first allied or enemy Hero or enemy Structure in their path. Allies are healed for 285 (+4% per level) and enemies are damaged for 166 (+4% per level). Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

level13.name: Speed Serum
level13.fullTooltip: Healing Dart grants 25% Movement Speed to affected Heroes for 2 seconds.

level13.name: Purifying Darts
level13.fullTooltip: Healing Dart removes Roots and Slows from the target, and heals for 20% more when doing so.

level13.name: Smelling Salts
level13.fullTooltip: Healing Dart removes Stuns from the target, and grants them 50 Armor for 2 seconds when doing so.

level16.name: Sharpshooter
level16.shortTooltip: Empower consecutive Healing Darts
level16.fullTooltip: Healing Dart's healing is increased by 5% if it heals a Hero, up to 50%. This bonus is reset if Healing Dart fails to hit a Hero.

level16.name: Concentrated Doses
level16.shortTooltip: Doses empower Healing Dart
level16.fullTooltip: Increase Healing Dart's healing by 10% for each Dose active on enemy Heroes.

level16.name: Contact Healing
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Biotic Grenade healing on multiple Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Biotic Grenade heals for 30% more per allied and enemy Hero hit.

level20.name: Nano Infusion
level20.shortTooltip: Nano Boost heals for damage dealt
level20.fullTooltip: Allies affected by Nano Boost heal for 50% of Spell Damage dealt.

level20.name: Ballistic Advantage
level20.fullTooltip: Eye of Horus rounds explode upon impacting a Hero, healing nearby allies for 300 (+4% per level) and dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemy Heroes.

level20.name: Somnolent Doses
level20.shortTooltip: Max Dosage puts enemies to Sleep
level20.fullTooltip: Upon stacking 5 Doses, Heroes are put to Sleep for 2 seconds.

level20.name: Dynamic Shooting
level20.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks increase Attack Speed by 10% for 4 seconds, up to 100%.

level20.name: Custom Optics
level20.shortTooltip: Increase Aim Down Sights range bonus
level20.fullTooltip: Increase the Aim Down Sights Basic Attack range bonus from 2 to 4.

Anubarak.name: Anub'arak
Anubarak.description: A Tank who specializes against Mages.

basic.name: Impale
basic.shortTooltip: Shoot line of spikes that damages and stuns enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage. Stuns for 1 second.

basic.name: Harden Carapace
basic.shortTooltip: Gain a shield
basic.fullTooltip: Gain a Shield that grants 40 Spell Armor and absorbs 315 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds.

basic.name: Burrow Charge
basic.shortTooltip: Burrow underground and charge in a direction
basic.fullTooltip: Burrow to the target location, dealing 96 (+4% per level) damage and briefly stunning enemies in a small area upon surfacing, slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds.  Burrow Charge can be reactivated to surface early.

heroic.name: Locust Swarm
heroic.shortTooltip: Damages enemies while healing
heroic.fullTooltip: Deal 62 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Each enemy damaged restores 21 (+4% per level) Health. Lasts 6 seconds.

heroic.name: Cocoon
heroic.shortTooltip: Wraps enemy in a cocoon
heroic.fullTooltip: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 8 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

trait.name: Scarab Host
trait.shortTooltip: Spawn a Beetle whenever an Ability is cast
trait.fullTooltip: Using an Ability spawns a Beetle which lasts for 8 seconds, attacking nearby enemies for 20 (+4% per level) damage.

level1.name: Resilient Scarabs
level1.shortTooltip: Beetles gain Spell Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Beetles have 50 Spell Armor.

level1.name: Nerubian Armor
level1.shortTooltip: Periodically gain Spell Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Every 12 seconds, gain 30 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 30%.

level1.name: Regeneration Master
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Regen Globes increase Health Regen
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30.   Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

level4.name: Bed of Barbs
level4.shortTooltip: Impale slows and damages over time
level4.fullTooltip: Create a bed of spikes along Impale's path that slows enemies by 25% and deals 21 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Spikes persist for 3.5 seconds.

level4.name: Shed Exoskeleton
level4.fullTooltip: Harden Carapace grants 30% increased Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

level4.name: Underking
level4.shortTooltip: Increases Burrow Charge range and damage
level4.fullTooltip: Increases Burrow Charge range by 20% and damage by 100%.

level4.name: Legion of Beetles
level4.fullTooltip: Automatically spawn a Beetle every 8 seconds.  Can be toggled on and off.

level7.name: Chitinous Plating
level7.fullTooltip: While Harden Carapace is active, taking damage from enemy Abilities reduces its cooldown by 1 second, up to 3 seconds.

level7.name: Subterranean Shield
level7.fullTooltip: Burrow Charge also grants a 345 (+4% per level) point Shield for 5 seconds.

level7.name: Leeching Scarabs
level7.fullTooltip: Beetles gain 20% bonus attack damage and they heal Anub'arak for 50% of their damage with each attack if he is nearby.

level10.name: Locust Swarm
level10.shortTooltip: Damages enemies while healing
level10.fullTooltip: Deal 62 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Each enemy damaged restores 21 (+4% per level) Health. Lasts 6 seconds.

level10.name: Cocoon
level10.shortTooltip: Wraps enemy in a cocoon
level10.fullTooltip: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 8 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

level13.name: Burning Rage
level13.fullTooltip: Deal 23 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

level13.name: Urticating Spines
level13.fullTooltip: Casting Harden Carapace will also deal 80 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Deals double damage against Heroes.

level13.name: Acid Drenched Mandibles
level13.fullTooltip: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases Anub'arak's Basic Attack damage by 70% for 3 seconds.

level16.name: Epicenter
level16.shortTooltip: Increases Burrow Charge area and reduces cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Increases Burrow Charge impact area by 60% and lowers the cooldown by 1.25 seconds for each Hero hit.

level16.name: Debilitation
level16.shortTooltip: Burrow Charge decreases enemy Spell Power
level16.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Burrow Charge have their Spell Power reduced by 50% for 4 seconds.

level16.name: Beetle, Juiced
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks to Heroes spawn Beetles
level16.fullTooltip: Every 3rd Basic Attack against enemy Heroes spawns a Beetle.

level20.name: Hive Master
level20.fullTooltip: Gain a permanent Vampire Locust that attacks a nearby enemy every 3 seconds. The Vampire Locust deals 153 (+4% per level) damage and returns to heal Anub'arak for 37 (+4% per level) health.

level20.name: Cryptweave
level20.fullTooltip: Staying near the Cocoon allows Anub'arak to extend the duration by up to 4 seconds per Cocoon.

level20.name: Hardened Shield
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 75% less damage.

level20.name: Rewind
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

Artanis.name: Artanis
Artanis.description: A tough Bruiser that deals high damage if the enemy team is unable to shut him down.

basic.name: Blade Dash
basic.shortTooltip: Dash forward then back again, damaging enemies along the way
basic.fullTooltip: Dash forward and deal 57 (+4% per level) damage to enemies, then return and deal 171 (+4% per level) damage. Every enemy hit reduces the cooldown on Shield Overload by 1 second, and Heroes by 2 seconds.

basic.name: Twin Blades
basic.shortTooltip: Charge and Basic Attack twice
basic.fullTooltip: Artanis's next Basic Attack immediately causes him to charge a short distance and strike the enemy 2 times.

basic.name: Phase Prism
basic.shortTooltip: Swap positions with an enemy Hero
basic.fullTooltip: Fire a Phase Prism that deals 66 (+4% per level) damage to the first Hero hit and swaps Artanis's position with theirs. Can be used during Blade Dash.

heroic.name: Suppression Pulse
heroic.shortTooltip: Damage and Blind enemies in a large area
heroic.fullTooltip: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

heroic.name: Purifier Beam
heroic.shortTooltip: Chase an enemy with an orbital beam
heroic.fullTooltip: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 (+4% per level) damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.

trait.name: Shield Overload
trait.shortTooltip: Gain a Shield when attacked at low Health
trait.fullTooltip: After taking damage while below 75% Health, Artanis gains a 375 (+4% per level) Shield for 5 seconds. Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Shield Overload by 4 seconds.

level1.name: Reactive Parry
level1.shortTooltip: Twin Blades gives Physical Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Using Twin Blades grants 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

level1.name: Amateur Opponent
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Twin Blades damage to non-Heroes
level1.fullTooltip: Twin Blades attacks deal 150% bonus damage to non-Heroes.

level1.name: Seasoned Marksman
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Kill enemies to empower Basic Attacks
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage.  Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

level4.name: Psionic Synergy
level4.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 20 Armor for 3 seconds.

level4.name: Shield Battery
level4.shortTooltip: Shield Overload recharges faster while active
level4.fullTooltip: Shield Overload's cooldown recharges 100% faster while its Shield is active, and the Shield duration is increased by 1 second.

level4.name: Shield Surge
level4.shortTooltip: Increase Shield Overload shield at low Health
level4.fullTooltip: Increases Shield Overload's Shields by 75% while below 25% Health.

level7.name: Solarite Reaper
level7.fullTooltip: Increases the damage of the first dash of Blade Dash by 150%.

level7.name: Warp Sickness
level7.fullTooltip: Phase Prism also Slows the enemy's Movement Speed by 35% for 4 seconds.

level7.name: Chrono Surge
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 75% bonus Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

level7.name: Follow Through
level7.fullTooltip: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

level10.name: Suppression Pulse
level10.shortTooltip: Damage and Blind enemies in a large area
level10.fullTooltip: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

level10.name: Purifier Beam
level10.shortTooltip: Chase an enemy with an orbital beam
level10.fullTooltip: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 (+4% per level) damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.

level13.name: Templar's Zeal
level13.shortTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Blade Dash
level13.fullTooltip: Reduce the Mana cost of Blade Dash from 50 to 25. Each time that Shield Overload activates, reduce the cooldown of Blade Dash by 5 seconds.

level13.name: Triple Strike
level13.fullTooltip: Increases Twin Blades's number of Basic Attacks to 3, but increase its cooldown by 1 second.

level13.name: Graviton Vortex
level13.fullTooltip: Reduce the Mana cost of Phase Prism from 60 to 30. Hitting an enemy Hero with Basic Attacks or Blade Dash reduces the cooldown of Phase Prism by 1.25 seconds.

level13.name: Phase Bulwark
level13.fullTooltip: Shield Overload grants 50 Spell Armor while active and for 2 seconds after it expires.

level16.name: Titan Killer
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal percent damage
level16.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 0.5% of the target's maximum Health in damage, increased to 1.5% when empowered by Twin Blades.

level16.name: Force of Will
level16.shortTooltip: Abilities reduce Shield Overload cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Casting Basic Abilities reduces the cooldown of Shield Overload by 5 seconds.

level16.name: Blades of a Templar
level16.shortTooltip: Gain Attack Speed, Slow enemies
level16.fullTooltip: Increase Attack Speed by 30%. Basic Attacks Slow by 20% for 1.25 seconds.

level20.name: Orbital Bombardment
level20.shortTooltip: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge
level20.fullTooltip: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge.  There is a 10 second cooldown between uses.

level20.name: Target Purified
level20.shortTooltip: Purifier Beam is faster, recasts if target dies
level20.fullTooltip: Increase the speed of Purifier Beam by 15%. If the target of Purifier Beam dies, it automatically recasts on the nearest visible enemy Hero.

level20.name: Zealot Charge
level20.fullTooltip: Increase Twin Blades' charge distance by 100%.

level20.name: Plasma Burn
level20.fullTooltip: While Shield Overload is active, deal 70 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

Arthas.name: Arthas
Arthas.description: A Tank who is proficient against melee Physical Attackers, slowing them.

basic.name: Death Coil
basic.shortTooltip: Deals damage to a target or heal Arthas
basic.fullTooltip: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage to target enemy.  Can be self-cast to heal for 262 (+4% per level) Health.

basic.name: Howling Blast
basic.shortTooltip: Root and damage enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Root enemies within the target area for 1.25 seconds and deals 68 (+4% per level) damage.

basic.name: Frozen Tempest
basic.shortTooltip: Damage and slow nearby enemies. Drains Mana while active
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 40 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies and Slow their Movement Speed by 10% per second, stacking up to 40%. Heroes hit also have their Attack Speed Slowed by 10% per second, stacking up to 40%. Frozen Tempest's effects last for 1.5 seconds.

heroic.name: Army of the Dead
heroic.shortTooltip: Raise ghouls that fight enemies, heal Arthas
heroic.fullTooltip: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 (+4% per level) Health.

heroic.name: Summon Sindragosa
heroic.shortTooltip: Disables enemies and Structures
heroic.fullTooltip: Deals 230 (+4% per level) damage and Slows enemies by 60% for 4 seconds.  Also disables non-Heroic enemies and Structures for 20 seconds.

trait.name: Frostmourne Hungers
trait.shortTooltip: Activate to empower the next attack and restore Mana on hit
trait.fullTooltip: Activate to make Arthas's next Basic Attack strike immediately, do 99 (+4% per level) increased damage, and restore 30 Mana.

level1.name: Eternal Hunger
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Empower Frostmourne Hungers
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Use Frostmourne Hungers on an enemy Hero.  Reward: Increases the Mana it restores by 4, to a maximum of 40, and its damage by 4.

level1.name: Frost Presence
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Root Heroes to empower Howling Blast
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Root enemy Heroes with Howling Blast.  Reward: After Rooting 5 Heroes, Howling Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.  Reward: After Rooting 10 Heroes, Howling Blast's range is increased by 30%.  Reward: After Rooting 20 Heroes, Howling Blast also Roots enemies in its path.

level1.name: Rime
level1.shortTooltip: Periodically gain Physical Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.

level4.name: Frozen Wastes
level4.fullTooltip: Frozen Tempest Mana cost reduced by 4 per second.  Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Frozen Tempest.  Reward: After damaging enemy Heroes 150 times with Frozen Tempest, the Movement and Attack Speed Slows of Frozen Tempest last an extra 1.5 seconds against enemy Heroes.

level4.name: Icy Talons
level4.fullTooltip: Gain 3% Attack Speed for 1.5 seconds every time a Hero is damaged by Frozen Tempest, to a maximum of 60%.

level4.name: Deathlord
level4.shortTooltip: Reduces Death Coil cooldown and increases range
level4.fullTooltip: Reduces Death Coil's cooldown by 3 seconds and increase its range by 30%.

level7.name: Rune Tap
level7.fullTooltip: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals Arthas for 4% of his max Health.

level7.name: Immortal Coil
level7.fullTooltip: Gain the healing effect of Death Coil even when used on enemies. If Death Coil is used on Arthas, it heals for an additional 50% bonus healing.

level7.name: Icebound Fortitude
level7.shortTooltip: Activate to gain Armor, reduce disabling effects
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%, and reduce the duration of Stuns, Slows, and Roots against Arthas by 75% for 3 seconds.

level10.name: Army of the Dead
level10.shortTooltip: Raise ghouls that fight enemies, heal Arthas
level10.fullTooltip: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 (+4% per level) Health.

level10.name: Summon Sindragosa
level10.shortTooltip: Disables enemies and Structures
level10.fullTooltip: Deals 230 (+4% per level) damage and Slows enemies by 60% for 4 seconds.  Also disables non-Heroic enemies and Structures for 20 seconds.

level13.name: Shattered Armor
level13.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Howling Blast have their Armor reduced by 15 for 4 seconds.

level13.name: Frost Strike
level13.shortTooltip: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers cooldown and adds Slow
level13.fullTooltip: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers' cooldown by 2 seconds. Frostmourne Hungers also Slows the enemy by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

level13.name: Biting Cold
level13.fullTooltip: Each second an enemy is damaged by Frozen Tempest, it deals 12.5% bonus damage, up to a 50% bonus.

level16.name: Remorseless Winter
level16.shortTooltip: Frozen Tempest can Root enemy Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes that remain within Frozen Tempest for 3 seconds are Rooted for 1.25 seconds. This effect can only happen once every 10 seconds.

level16.name: Frostmourne Feeds
level16.shortTooltip: Increases number of Frostmourne Hungers attacks
level16.fullTooltip: Increases the amount of Basic Attacks empowered by Frostmourne Hungers to 2.

level16.name: Embrace Death
level16.shortTooltip: Death Coil deals more damage when missing Health
level16.fullTooltip: Death Coil deals more damage and heals more the lower Arthas's current Health is, to a maximum of 100% bonus damage and healing.

level20.name: Legion of Northrend
level20.shortTooltip: Ghouls last longer and more are created
level20.fullTooltip: 3 additional Ghouls are created.  Ghouls heal for an additional 50% and last 5 seconds longer.

level20.name: Absolute Zero
level20.shortTooltip: Increases Sindragosa range and disable duration
level20.fullTooltip: Sindragosa flies twice as far.  Enemy Heroes are Rooted for 2 seconds, and then Slowed by 60% for 3.5 seconds.

level20.name: Death's Advance
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.  Passive: Increases Movement Speed by 10%.

level20.name: Anti-Magic Shell
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to become immune to Spell Damage
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to make Arthas immune to Spell Damage for 3 seconds and heal Arthas for 25% of the damage prevented.

Auriel.name: Auriel
Auriel.description: A Healer that excels when paired with a high-octane damage dealer.

basic.name: Sacred Sweep
basic.shortTooltip: Damages enemies in an a wide arc, bonus damage to enemies in the center
basic.fullTooltip: Sweep the area with sacred power, dealing 45 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and an additional 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies caught in the center.

basic.name: Ray of Heaven
basic.shortTooltip: Spend all energy to heal allied Heroes in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Consume Auriel's stored energy and heal allied Heroes in the area for the amount of energy consumed.

basic.name: Detainment Strike
basic.shortTooltip: Knock an enemy Hero back, stunning them if they collide with terrain
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 55 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and knock them back. If they collide with terrain, they are also stunned for 1.25 seconds and take an additional 165 (+4% per level) damage.

heroic.name: Crystal Aegis
heroic.shortTooltip: Put an allied Hero into a Stasis crystal that explodes
heroic.fullTooltip: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 255 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

heroic.name: Resurrect
heroic.shortTooltip: Bring an allied Hero back to life
heroic.fullTooltip: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 0.5 seconds. After a 5 second delay, they are brought back to life with 50% of their maximum Health at the location where they died.

trait.name: Bestow Hope
trait.shortTooltip: Bestowed ally's damage grants energy
trait.fullTooltip: Passive: 40% of the damage Auriel deals to Heroes and 10% dealt to non-Heroes is stored as energy.  Bestow an allied Hero with Hope.  While they remain near Auriel, damage they deal causes her to gain energy. Auriel can only have Bestow Hope on 1 ally at a time.  Auriel can store up to 475 (+4% per level) energy.

level1.name: Swift Sweep
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Sacred Sweep cast speed
level1.fullTooltip: Increases the cast speed of Sacred Sweep by 50%.

level1.name: Increasing Clarity
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Increases center damage by hitting Heroes
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Every time Sacred Sweep hits a Hero in the center, increase the center damage by 2, up to 50.   Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, this center damage bonus is increased to 150.

level1.name: Righteous Assault
level1.shortTooltip: Reduce Sacred Sweep cooldown by hitting Heroes
level1.fullTooltip: Reduces the cooldown of Sacred Sweep by 3 seconds for each enemy Hero hit by its center.

level1.name: Searing Light
level1.shortTooltip: Ray of Heaven also damages enemies in the area
level1.fullTooltip: Ray of Heaven also deals damage to enemies in the area equal to 30% of the energy consumed.

level4.name: Majestic Span
level4.fullTooltip: Increases the radius of Sacred Sweep by 15%.

level4.name: Heavy Burden
level4.shortTooltip: Detainment Strike slows enemies after stun
level4.fullTooltip: When an enemy Hero is stunned by Detainment Strike, their Movement Speed is slowed by 40% for 3 seconds after the stun.

level4.name: Repeated Offense
level4.shortTooltip: Increases Detainment Strike range Quest: Increases damage when Heroes are stunned
level4.fullTooltip: Enemies hit by Detainment Strike are knocked back 25% farther.  Quest: Every time Detainment Strike stuns a Hero, increase the stun damage by 10, up to 60.  Reward: After stunning 6 Heroes, increase this damage bonus to 250.

level7.name: Glimmer of Hope
level7.shortTooltip: Regen Globes reduce Ray of Heaven energy cost
level7.fullTooltip: Collecting a Regeneration Globe reduces the cost of Auriel's next Ray of Heaven by 75%.

level7.name: Empathic Link
level7.fullTooltip: Auriel stores 25% of damage taken by allies with Bestow Hope.

level7.name: Energized Cord
level7.shortTooltip: Increases energy from Auriel Basic Attacks
level7.fullTooltip: Increases the energy stored from Auriel's Basic Attacks to 100% of the damage against Heroes and 45% of the damage against non-Heroes.  Does not affect Auriel's Bestow Hope ally.

level10.name: Resurrect
level10.shortTooltip: Bring an allied Hero back to life
level10.fullTooltip: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 0.5 seconds. After a 5 second delay, they are brought back to life with 50% of their maximum Health at the location where they died.

level10.name: Crystal Aegis
level10.shortTooltip: Put an allied Hero into a Stasis crystal that explodes
level10.fullTooltip: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 255 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

level13.name: Blinding Flash
level13.shortTooltip: Sacred Sweep blinds enemies in the center
level13.fullTooltip: Enemies hit by the center area of Sacred Sweep are blinded for 2 seconds.

level13.name: Converging Force
level13.shortTooltip: Sacred Sweep pushes enemies towards the center
level13.fullTooltip: Enemies hit by the outer area are pushed slightly toward the center.

level13.name: Piercing Lash
level13.shortTooltip: Detainment Strike hits all enemy Heroes in a line
level13.fullTooltip: Detainment Strike now pierces and hits all enemy Heroes in a line, reducing the cooldown by 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

level16.name: Reservoir of Hope
level16.shortTooltip: Quest: Increases maximum Ray of Heaven energy
level16.fullTooltip: Quest: Each maximum energy Ray of Heaven Auriel casts increases the maximum amount of energy that can be stored by 75.

level16.name: Will of Heaven
level16.shortTooltip: Bestow Hope ally gains Attack Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 20% Attack Speed.

level16.name: Wrath of Heaven
level16.shortTooltip: Bestow Hope ally gains Spell Power
level16.fullTooltip: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 10% Spell Power.

level20.name: Light Speed
level20.shortTooltip: Resurrected allies gain Move Speed, reduce cooldown
level20.fullTooltip: Resurrected allies gain 200% increased Movement Speed, decaying over 4 seconds.  While a resurrected ally remains alive, Resurrect's next cooldown recharges 100% faster.

level20.name: Diamond Resolve
level20.fullTooltip: When Crystal Aegis expires, it grants the target 75 Armor for 5 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.

level20.name: Angelic Flight
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to fly to a location
level20.fullTooltip: After 2 seconds, fly to a target location.

level20.name: Shield of Hope
level20.shortTooltip: Shield nearby allies based on their missing Health
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to grant all nearby allied Heroes a shield for 3 seconds equal to 50% of the amount of Health they are missing.

Azmodan.name: Azmodan
Azmodan.description: A Summoner that can also deal high damage from far away.

basic.name: Globe of Annihilation
basic.shortTooltip: Launch a long range orb of destruction dealing area damage
basic.fullTooltip: Shoot a globe of destruction, dealing 184 (+3% per level) damage on impact.  Quest: Hitting a Hero or killing a Minion within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Globe of Annihilation grants 2 Annihilation.  Reward: Each stack of Annihilation increases the damage of Globe of Annihilation by 1, up to 400.

basic.name: Summon Demon Warrior
basic.shortTooltip: Summon a Demon Warrior
basic.fullTooltip: Spawn a Demon Warrior that marches forward. Warriors deal 30 (+4% per level) damage per Attack and 16 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every second. Lasts for 10 seconds.  Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

basic.name: All Shall Burn
basic.shortTooltip: Channel a beam of death on an enemy
basic.fullTooltip: Channel a beam of death on an enemy, dealing 120 (+4% per level) damage per second for 2.5 seconds. If the Channel lasts its full duration, deal an extra 320 (+4% per level) damage to the target.  Azmodan's Movement Speed is reduced by 30% while Channeling.

heroic.name: Demonic Invasion
heroic.shortTooltip: Damage area and create an army of Grunts
heroic.fullTooltip: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 65 (+4% per level) damage per impact. Grunts deal 42 (+4% per level) damage, have 750 (+4% per level) Health and last up to 10 seconds. When Grunts die they explode, dealing 98 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

heroic.name: Tide of Sin
heroic.shortTooltip: Empower Globe of Annihilation
heroic.fullTooltip: Activate to make the next Globe of Annihilation cost no Mana and deal 50% more damage.

trait.name: Demon Lieutenant
trait.shortTooltip: Azmodan summons a Demon Lieutenant to assist Minions, Mercenaries, and Summons
trait.fullTooltip: Summon a Demon Lieutenant at any allied Mercenary, Minion, or Azmodan Demon. The Lieutenant will cast Demonic Smite every 7 seconds, instantly killing an enemy Minion. Lasts 20 seconds.  Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

level1.name: Greed
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Increase range and damage to Minions, Mercs
level1.fullTooltip: Increase the time Minions will grant Annihilation from 1.5 to 3 seconds.  Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, Globe of Annihilation's range is increased by 33% and it deals 20% more damage to non-Heroic targets.

level1.name: Gluttony
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Increase Annihilation from hitting Heroes
level1.fullTooltip: Increase the number of stacks of Annihilation gained by hitting Heroes with Globe of Annihilation from 2 to 3.  Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, each enemy hit by Globe of Annihilation reduces its cooldown by 0.25 seconds, doubled against Heroes.

level1.name: Wrath
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Basic Attacks grant Annihilation
level1.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes under 75% Health grant 1 Annihilation.   Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, hitting a Hero with Globe of Annihilation increases the damage of Azmodan's next Basic Attack against them within 3 seconds by 75% the amount of Annihilation he has.

level4.name: Army of Hell
level4.fullTooltip: Summon Demon Warrior spawns an additional Demon, but its cooldown is increased by 10 seconds.

level4.name: Hellforged Armor
level4.fullTooltip: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 25 Armor and last 4 seconds longer.

level4.name: Battleborn
level4.fullTooltip: Azmodan's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Summon Demon Warrior by 0.75 seconds and Demon Lieutenant by 1.5 seconds.

level7.name: Art of Chaos
level7.fullTooltip: If Globe of Annihilation hits 2 or more Heroes, restore 30 Mana and gain an extra 4 Annihilation.

level7.name: Bombardment
level7.fullTooltip: After casting Globe of Annihilation, Azmodan's Basic Attacks within the next 3 seconds have an additional 2 range and can hit 2 additional targets. Hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks empowered by Bombardment grant 1 Annihilation.

level7.name: Master of Destruction
level7.fullTooltip: All Shall Burn's final damage applies to all enemies in an area around the target and grants 3 Annihilation per Hero hit.

level10.name: Demonic Invasion
level10.shortTooltip: Damage area and create an army of Grunts
level10.fullTooltip: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 65 (+4% per level) damage per impact. Grunts deal 42 (+4% per level) damage, have 750 (+4% per level) Health and last up to 10 seconds. When Grunts die they explode, dealing 98 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

level10.name: Tide of Sin
level10.shortTooltip: Empower Globe of Annihilation
level10.fullTooltip: Activate to make the next Globe of Annihilation cost no Mana and deal 50% more damage.

level13.name: Brutish Vanguard
level13.shortTooltip: Demons have more Health, Warriors Slow
level13.fullTooltip: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 25% increased Health. Demon Warriors Slow nearby enemies by 20%.

level13.name: Cydaea's Kiss
level13.shortTooltip: Reduce All Shall Burn Channel, final damage heals
level13.fullTooltip: Reduces the Channel time of All Shall Burn by 0.5 seconds. If All Shall Burn's Channel lasts its full duration against a Hero, Azmodan is healed for 8% of his maximum Health.

level13.name: Chain of Command
level13.fullTooltip: The cooldown of Demon Lieutenants' Demonic Smite is reduced by 2 seconds and they grant 25% increased damage to nearby friendly Minions, Mercenaries, and Azmodan's summoned Demons.

level16.name: Total Annihilation
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Globe damage to Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Globe of Annihilation damages Heroes for an additional 4% of their maximum Health.

level16.name: Hell Rift
level16.shortTooltip: All Shall Burn summons and buffs Demon Warriors
level16.fullTooltip: If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration, a Demon Warrior is summoned at the target's location and all Demon Warriors deal 100% increased damage for 5 seconds.

level16.name: Sin's Grasp
level16.shortTooltip: Increase All Shall Burn range, reduce cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Increases the range of All Shall Burn by 20%. If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration, its cooldown is reduced by 50%.

level20.name: Siegebreaker
level20.fullTooltip: Azmodan's Demons deal 50% increased damage to Structures.

level20.name: Black Pool
level20.shortTooltip: Tide of Sin damages and reduces Armor over time
level20.fullTooltip: Globes of Annihilation empowered by Tide of Sin also leave a Black Pool at their impact location for 5 seconds. Enemies within the pool lose 8 Armor per second, up to 15, and take 56 (+4% per level) damage per second.

level20.name: Pride
level20.fullTooltip: After gaining 400 Annihilation, the area of Globe of Annihilation is increased by 15% and it deals 125 additional damage.

level20.name: Trample
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to charge a short distance, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies caught in the path by 60% for 1 second.

Blaze.name: Blaze
Blaze.description: A ranged Tank that specializes in initiating fights and dealing area damage by spreading his flames.

basic.name: Flame Stream
basic.shortTooltip: Fire two streams of flames
basic.fullTooltip: Fire two streams that deal 83 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit. Flame Stream Ignites Oil Spills it comes in contact with.

basic.name: Oil Spill
basic.shortTooltip: Splash oil that Slows and can be Ignited to damage enemies and heal Blaze
basic.fullTooltip: Vector Targeting Dispense a slick of oil that lasts for 5 seconds and Slows enemies that come in contact with it by 50%.  Oil Spills are Ignited for 2.5 seconds when hit by Flame Stream. Ignited Oil Spills no longer Slow enemies, but instead deal 16 (+4% per level) damage to them every 0.3 seconds. Additionally, Blaze is healed for 49 (+4% per level) Health every 0.3 seconds while standing in Ignited Oil Spills.  Stores up to 2 charges.

basic.name: Jet Propulsion
basic.shortTooltip: Charge forward, Stunning and damaging enemy Heroes
basic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, charge forward. Colliding with an enemy Hero deals 52 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemy Heroes and Stuns them for 1.25 seconds.

heroic.name: Bunker Drop
heroic.shortTooltip: Call down a Bunker
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with 1435 (+4% per level) Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing 170 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.   Exiting the Bunker grants 25 Armor for 2 seconds. Bunkers last 10 seconds, or until destroyed.

heroic.name: Combustion
heroic.shortTooltip: Channel to damage and Slow enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Channel for up to 2.6 seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by 60% and deal 55 (+4% per level) damage to them every 0.5 seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from 1 second up to 5 seconds.  Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by 40% while Channeling.

trait.name: Pyromania
trait.shortTooltip: Gain Armor and damage nearby enemies
trait.fullTooltip: Gain 35 Armor and deal 40 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds for 4 seconds.  Each Hero hit by Flame Stream reduces Pyromania's cooldown by 5 seconds.

level1.name: Adrenaline Stimpack
level1.shortTooltip: Activate to gain Attack Speed, Move Speed
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 100% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

level1.name: Endurance Stimpack
level1.shortTooltip: Activate to gain a Shield
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to gain a Shield that absorbs 480 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds.

level1.name: Neural Stimpack
level1.shortTooltip: Activate to increase cooldown recharge rate
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 30 Mana and cause Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 5 seconds.

level1.name: New Habits
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Pyromania grants Unstoppable
level1.fullTooltip: Collecting Regeneration Globes reduces the cooldown of Pyromania by 8 seconds.  Quest: Collect 15 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: Pyromania grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

level4.name: Feeding the Flame
level4.shortTooltip: Flame Stream can reduce Oil Spill cooldown
level4.fullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Flame Stream reduces the cooldown of Oil Spill by 2.5 seconds.

level4.name: Adhesive Petroleum
level4.fullTooltip: Enemies standing in Oil Spill when it is Ignited are Slowed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

level4.name: Oil Dispersal
level4.fullTooltip: Increase Oil Spill's area by 20% and Slow amount by 10%.

level4.name: Meltdown
level4.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Pyromania reduces their damage dealt by 5% for 2.5 seconds, up to 30%.

level7.name: Crossfire
level7.shortTooltip: Flame Stream can deal bonus damage
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy with both streams of Flame Stream deals 139 (+4% per level) bonus damage.

level7.name: Grill and Kill
level7.shortTooltip: Quest: Increase Ignited Oil Spill damage, duration
level7.fullTooltip: Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Ignited Oil Spills 60 times.  Reward: Increase Oil Spill's Ignite duration by 2 seconds, and damage by 20%.

level7.name: Incinerator Gauntlets
level7.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks Ignite Oil Spills, area increased
level7.fullTooltip: Increase Basic Attack area by 15%, and Basic Attack damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 70%. Additionally, Basic Attack splashes Ignite Oil Spills.

level10.name: Bunker Drop
level10.shortTooltip: Call down a Bunker
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with 1435 (+4% per level) Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing 170 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.   Exiting the Bunker grants 25 Armor for 2 seconds. Bunkers last 10 seconds, or until destroyed.

level10.name: Combustion
level10.shortTooltip: Channel to damage and Slow enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Channel for up to 2.6 seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by 60% and deal 55 (+4% per level) damage to them every 0.5 seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from 1 second up to 5 seconds.  Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by 40% while Channeling.

level13.name: Suppressive Fire
level13.fullTooltip: Each stream of Flame Stream reduces the Spell Power of Heroes hit by 20% for 4 seconds, up to 40%.

level13.name: Nanomachine Coating
level13.fullTooltip: Enemies standing in Oil Spills and Ignited Oil Spills have their Attack Speed reduced by 50% for 2.5 seconds.

level13.name: Fuel Leak
level13.shortTooltip: Jet Propulsion creates a trail of Oil Spills
level13.fullTooltip: Jet Propulsion creates Oil Spills along Blaze's path. If Jet Propulsion impacts an enemy Hero, an additional Oil Spill is created underneath them.

level16.name: Thermal Protection
level16.shortTooltip: Jet Propulsion hits grant Armor, reduce cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Each enemy hit by Jet Propulsion grants 10 Armor for 3 seconds and reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

level16.name: Heat Treatment
level16.shortTooltip: Pyromania heals for damage dealt
level16.fullTooltip: Heal for 75% of the damage dealt by Pyromania.

level16.name: Juggernaut Plating
level16.shortTooltip: Gain Spell Armor, then Shield for damage taken
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 50 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. Upon expiration, gain a Shield equal to 125% of the Spell Damage taken while Juggernaut Plating was active.

level20.name: Fortified Bunker
level20.shortTooltip: Allies can cast Oil Spill from Bunker Drop
level20.fullTooltip: Occupants can cast Oil Spill from Bunker Drop every 6 seconds. Additionally, Bunker Drop's Armor bonus upon exiting is increased by 25, and its duration by 1 second.

level20.name: Flash Fire
level20.shortTooltip: Combustion Slows, remove Move Speed penalty
level20.fullTooltip: While Channeling Combustion, Blaze's Movement Speed is no longer reduced, and nearby enemies are Slowed by 60%.

level20.name: Burn Notice
level20.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks Slow, damage over time
level20.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks Slow enemies by 5% and deal an additional 18 (+4% per level) damage over 2.5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.

Brightwing.name: Brightwing
Brightwing.description: A Healer who can teleport to allies, excelling on large battlegrounds.

basic.name: Arcane Flare
basic.shortTooltip: Fire a damaging flare
basic.fullTooltip: Shoot a flare dealing 75 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit, and an additional 105 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the center. If a Hero is hit by the center, Soothing Mist's passive healing instantly activates.

basic.name: Polymorph
basic.shortTooltip: Disable an enemy
basic.fullTooltip: Polymorph a target for 1.5 seconds, Slowing their Movement Speed by 25% and Silencing them. Targets are not able to attack while Polymorphed.

basic.name: Pixie Dust
basic.shortTooltip: Increase a Hero's Movement Speed and grant Spell Armor
basic.fullTooltip: Increase target Hero's Movement Speed by 20%, and grant them 25 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Spell damage taken by 25%.

heroic.name: Blink Heal
heroic.shortTooltip: Teleport to allies and heal them
heroic.fullTooltip: Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for 200 (+4% per level).  Stores up to 2 charges.

heroic.name: Emerald Wind
heroic.shortTooltip: Damages and pushes enemies in area
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away.

trait.name: Soothing Mist
trait.shortTooltip: Remove disabling effects from allies
trait.fullTooltip: Activate to remove all Stun, Root, Slow, and Silence effects from nearby allied Heroes.  Passive: Brightwing heals nearby allied Heroes for 105 (+4% per level) every 4 seconds

mount.name: Phase Shift
mount.shortTooltip: Teleport to an allied Hero and heal them
mount.fullTooltip: After 2 seconds, teleport to an allied Hero and heal them for 20% of their maximum Health.

level1.name: Greater Polymorph
level1.shortTooltip: Takedowns refresh Polymorph cooldown
level1.fullTooltip: Increase Polymorph's range by 30%. Hero Takedowns refresh the cooldown of Polymorph.

level1.name: Hyper Shift
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Phase Shift healing
level1.fullTooltip: Increase Phase Shift's healing by an additional 10% of the target's maximum Health. Nearby enemy Minion deaths reduce Phase Shift's cooldown by 2 seconds.

level1.name: Pixie Charm
level1.shortTooltip: Activate to instantly defeat a Mercenary
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to consume 20 stacks of Bribe to instantly defeat an uncaptured Mercenary.  Passive: Gain 1 stack of Bribe when a nearby enemy Minion dies, and 5 stacks when hitting an enemy Hero with Arcane Flare's center. Maximum 80 stacks.

level4.name: Dream Shot
level4.shortTooltip: Arcane Flare center hits reduce cooldown
level4.fullTooltip: Increase Arcane Flare's range by 50%. Hitting a Hero with Arcane Flare's center reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.

level4.name: Unstable Anomaly
level4.fullTooltip: Increase Polymorph's Slow by 15%. Upon expiration, Polymorph deals damage to nearby enemy Heroes equal to 2% of their maximum Health.

level4.name: Magic Spit
level4.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Soothing Mist cooldown
level4.fullTooltip: Increase Basic Attack range by 1.1. Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Soothing Mist by 5 seconds.

level7.name: Sticky Flare
level7.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Arcane Flare have their Movement Speed Slowed by 20% for 3 seconds. Increase the Slow to 40% if they are hit by the center portion.

level7.name: Peekaboo!
level7.shortTooltip: Phase Shift grants a Shield, reveals an area
level7.fullTooltip: Phase Shifting to an ally grants both Brightwing and her target a 335 (+4% per level) point Shield and reveals a large area around them for 5 seconds.

level7.name: Critical Mist
level7.fullTooltip: If Soothing Mist removes a disabling effect from an ally, heal them for 250 (+4% per level).

level10.name: Blink Heal
level10.shortTooltip: Teleport to allies and heal them
level10.fullTooltip: Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for 200 (+4% per level).  Stores up to 2 charges.

level10.name: Emerald Wind
level10.shortTooltip: Damages and pushes enemies in area
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away.

level13.name: Pixie Boost
level13.shortTooltip: Pixie Dust grants an additional burst of speed
level13.fullTooltip: Pixie Dust gives 40% bonus Movement Speed, decaying to 20% over 3 seconds.

level13.name: Safety Dust
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Pixie Dust's duration by 1 second. Brightwing heals allies with an active Pixie Dust for 25% more.

level13.name: Pixie Power
level13.shortTooltip: Reduce Pixie Dust cooldown, increase Spell Armor
level13.fullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Pixie Dust by 3 seconds and increase the Spell Armor granted by 25.

level16.name: Hush!
level16.shortTooltip: Arcane Flare center Silences, reduces damage
level16.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by the center of Arcane Flare are Silenced for 1 second and deal 25% less damage for 3 seconds.

level16.name: Critterize
level16.shortTooltip: Polymorph lowers enemy's Armor
level16.fullTooltip: While Polymorphed, the target's Armor is reduced by 25, increasing the damage they take by 25%.

level16.name: Phase Out
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to gain Stasis
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to place Brightwing in Stasis for 0.75 seconds.

level20.name: Invisible Friends
level20.fullTooltip: Blink Heal grants Stealth to Brightwing. If Blink Heal is cast on a Hero, they are also granted Stealth. While Stealthed by Invisible Friends, Heroes heal for 20 (+4% per level) Health per second and are Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds  Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

level20.name: Intensive Winds
level20.shortTooltip: Reduce Emerald Wind cooldown, increase cost
level20.fullTooltip: Permanently reduce Emerald Wind's cooldown to 5 seconds and increase its Mana cost to 200.

level20.name: Speedy Dragon
level20.fullTooltip: Permanently gain 20% Movement Speed.

level20.name: Faerie Protector
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to apply Pixie Dust to all nearby Heroes.

Cassia.name: Cassia
Cassia.description: An Assassin who specializes against Physical Attackers.

basic.name: Lightning Fury
basic.shortTooltip: Hurl a lightning javelin that splits upon impact
basic.fullTooltip: Hurl a lightning javelin that deals 175 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and splits into two lightning bolts that deal 175 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their path.

basic.name: Blinding Light
basic.shortTooltip: Blind enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, deal 50 (+4% per level) damage and Blind enemies in the target area for 2 seconds.  Passive: Cassia deals 20% increased damage to Blinded targets.

basic.name: Fend
basic.shortTooltip: Charge at a target and rapidly attack nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Charge at an enemy, and upon arriving channel for up to 1.5 seconds, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in front of Cassia every 0.25 seconds. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes.

heroic.name: Ball Lightning
heroic.shortTooltip: Throw a bouncing lightning ball
heroic.fullTooltip: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.

heroic.name: Valkyrie
heroic.shortTooltip: Summon a Valkyrie to impale enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

trait.name: Avoidance
trait.shortTooltip: Gain Physical Armor while moving
trait.fullTooltip: While moving unmounted, Cassia gains 40 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing the damage taken by 40%.

level1.name: Thunderstroke
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Empower Lightning Fury
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes with Lightning Fury.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Lightning Fury's damage by 100.  Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Lightning Fury gains a 2nd charge and its Mana cost is reduced from 30 to 15.

level1.name: Seraph's Hymn
level1.shortTooltip: Empower Blinding Light, Basic Attacks
level1.fullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Blinding Light by 33%. Basic Attacks against Blinded enemies deal 100% more damage.

level1.name: Charged Strikes
level1.shortTooltip: Activate to empower Basic Attacks
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 20% and cause Basic Attacks against non-Structures to bounce to nearby enemy Heroes for 8 seconds.

level4.name: Inner Light
level4.shortTooltip: Emit Blinding Light when Stunned or Rooted
level4.fullTooltip: Whenever Cassia is Stunned or Rooted, Blinding Light is cast at her location.  This effect has a 6 second cooldown.  Passive: Blinding Light's radius is increased by 25%.

level4.name: Ring of the Leech
level4.fullTooltip: Cassia heals for 25% of the damage she deals to Blinded enemies.

level4.name: Plate of the Whale
level4.fullTooltip: Regenerate 5 Health per second while Avoidance is active.  Quest: For every 5 Basic Attacks absorbed with Avoidance, it regenerates an additional 1 Health per second.  Reward: After absorbing 75 Basic Attacks, increase Cassia's maximum Health by 10%.

level7.name: Impale
level7.fullTooltip: Enemies below 60% Health take 50% increased damage from Fend.

level7.name: War Traveler
level7.fullTooltip: Cassia gains 4% Movement Speed every 0.5 seconds while Avoidance is active, up to 20%.  This bonus is reset when Cassia stops moving or uses an Ability.

level7.name: Surge of Light
level7.fullTooltip: After taking 500 (+4% per level) damage with Avoidance active, Cassia can activate Avoidance to deal 210 (+4% per level) damage to enemies around her.

level10.name: Ball Lightning
level10.shortTooltip: Throw a bouncing lightning ball
level10.fullTooltip: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.

level10.name: Valkyrie
level10.shortTooltip: Summon a Valkyrie to impale enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

level13.name: Grounding Bolt
level13.fullTooltip: Lightning Fury Slows enemies hit by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

level13.name: Thundergod's Vigor
level13.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by the primary missile of Lightning Fury reduce its cooldown by 1 second.

level13.name: Lunging Strike
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Fend's range and area by 20%, and its duration by 0.5 seconds.

level16.name: Pierce
