level16.shortTooltip: Lightning Fury pierces
level16.fullTooltip: The primary missile of Lightning Fury now pierces, but splits only when hitting Heroes.

level16.name: Penetrate
level16.shortTooltip: Consecutive Fend hits deal increased damage
level16.fullTooltip: Enemies take 3% increased damage from Fend each consecutive hit.

level16.name: Martial Law
level16.shortTooltip: Disabled Heroes take additional damage
level16.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

level20.name: Infinite Lightning
level20.fullTooltip: Ball Lightning can now bounce indefinitely, and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds every time an enemy Hero is hit.

level20.name: Imprisoning Light
level20.fullTooltip: Upon impaling a Hero, Cassia's Valkyrie creates a wave of light that deals 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Roots them for 3 seconds.

level20.name: Titan's Revenge
level20.fullTooltip: Cassia's Basic Attacks now ignore Armor, and her Basic Attack range is increased by 2.

Chen.name: Chen
Chen.description: A potent Bruiser that will dominate if the enemy team is lacking mobility.

basic.name: Flying Kick
basic.shortTooltip: Kick through target enemy
basic.fullTooltip: Kick through target enemy, dealing 112 (+4% per level) damage.

basic.name: Keg Smash
basic.shortTooltip: Drench enemies in a nearby area with Brew, slowing them
basic.fullTooltip: Smash Chen's keg, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage and drenching affected enemies in Brew, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds.

basic.name: Breath of Fire
basic.shortTooltip: Breathe fire in target direction, dealing damage and igniting Brew-soaked enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Breathe a cone of flames, dealing 96 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies soaked in Brew are Ignited, dealing 96 (+4% per level) additional damage over 3 seconds.

heroic.name: Wandering Keg
heroic.shortTooltip: Roll around in the barrel and knock away enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 60% increased Movement Speed, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

heroic.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
heroic.shortTooltip: Split into three elemental spirits
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 75% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant the spirits Movement Speed.  Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies.  Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed.

trait.name: Fortifying Brew
trait.shortTooltip: Drink Brew, gaining a Shield while drinking. Chen's Abilities cost Brew instead of Mana.
trait.fullTooltip: Chen drinks from his keg, instantly gaining 25 Brew. While drinking, Chen continues to gain 30 Brew and 212 (+4% per level) temporary Shields per second, up to a maximum of 636 (+4% per level) while drinking. Shields persist for 2 seconds after he stops drinking.

level1.name: Accumulating Flame
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Ignite Heroes to empower Breath of Fire
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Every time a Hero is Ignited with Breath of Fire, increase its damage over time by 2%, up to 60%.  Reward: After Igniting 30 Heroes, gain 15 Armor for every enemy Hero ignited with Breath Of Fire. This lasts for 3 seconds.

level1.name: Freshest Ingredients
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Regen Globes increase Health Regen
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Chen's Health Regeneration by 1 per second.  Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, 50% of the Shield from Fortifying Brew persists indefinitely after drinking.

level1.name: Elusive Brawler
level1.shortTooltip: Activate to evade Basic Attacks
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds. Chen's Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

level4.name: Deadly Strike
level4.shortTooltip: Increase Flying Kick damage and remove Brew cost
level4.fullTooltip: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by 100% while Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

level4.name: Keg Toss
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes to empower Keg Smash
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Every time Keg Smash hits a Hero, increase its damage by 4, up to 80.   Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase its range by 125% and gain an additional charge.

level4.name: Ring of Fire
level4.shortTooltip: Damage nearby enemies after using Breath of Fire
level4.fullTooltip: After using Breath of Fire, ignite in a fiery aura, dealing 52 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

level7.name: Brewmaster's Balance
level7.shortTooltip: Gain bonuses based on current level of Brew
level7.fullTooltip: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 18 (+4% per level) Health per second.

level7.name: Bolder Flavor
level7.shortTooltip: Fortifying Brew grants a large Shield immediately
level7.fullTooltip: Fortifying Brew instantly Shields Chen for 318 (+4% per level). Additionally, Shields persist for 1 extra second after he stops drinking.

level7.name: Purifying Brew
level7.fullTooltip: The next Stun or Silence used against Chen has its duration reduced by 75% and resets the cooldown of Fortifying Brew. Can only trigger once every 15 seconds. While channeling Fortifying Brew gain 30 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 30%.

level10.name: Wandering Keg
level10.shortTooltip: Roll around in the barrel and knock away enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 60% increased Movement Speed, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

level10.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
level10.shortTooltip: Split into three elemental spirits
level10.fullTooltip: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 75% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant the spirits Movement Speed.  Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies.  Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed.

level13.name: Pressure Point
level13.fullTooltip: Flying Kick slows the target enemy by 35% for 1 second, or by 70% if they're soaked in Brew.

level13.name: A Touch of Honey
level13.fullTooltip: Increase the slow from Keg Smash to 40%.

level13.name: Withering Flames
level13.shortTooltip: Setting Heroes on fire reduces their Spell Power
level13.fullTooltip: Setting an enemy Hero on fire reduces their Spell Power by 25% for 3 seconds.

level16.name: Flying Leap
level16.shortTooltip: Increased Range
level16.fullTooltip: Increases Flying Kick's range by 15%.

level16.name: Another Round
level16.shortTooltip: Keg Smash lowers cooldowns, has increased radius
level16.fullTooltip: Increases the radius of Keg Smash by 50%. After hitting an enemy Hero with Keg Smash, the cooldown of the next Basic Ability used will be reduced by 3 seconds.

level16.name: Enough to Share
level16.shortTooltip: Fortifying Brew Shields allied Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Fortifying Brew also Shields nearby allied Heroes for 54 (+4% per level) per second.

level20.name: Untapped Potential
level20.fullTooltip: Wandering Keg increases Movement Speed by 100% and grants 50 Armor, reducing damage taken by 50%.

level20.name: Elemental Conduit
level20.shortTooltip: Increase spirit Health and empower their abilities
level20.fullTooltip: Increases the spirits' Health to 100% of Chen's maximum Health and empowers their abilities.  Storm can grant the spirits Unstoppable.  Earth's leap cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.  Fire grants Attack Speed as long as it is alive.

level20.name: Stormstout Secret Recipe
level20.fullTooltip: Heal for 1.5% of Chen's maximum Health every time his Basic Abilities hit an enemy Hero.

basic.name: Fire
basic.shortTooltip: Increase Attack Speed
basic.fullTooltip: Increase the Attack Speed of the spirits by 100% for 5 seconds.

basic.name: Earth
basic.fullTooltip: Fire and Earth leap to the target location, slowing enemies in a large area by 70% for 1.5 seconds.

basic.name: Storm
basic.shortTooltip: Increase Movement Speed
basic.fullTooltip: Increase the Movement Speed of the spirits by 50% for 5 seconds.

Chogall.name: Cho
Chogall.description: Head 1 of a 2 Headed Hero, Cho controls the body of Cho'gall.

basic.name: Surging Fist
basic.shortTooltip: Dash a direction knocking aside enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Activate to begin charging Surging Fist. Activate again to dash forward, knocking aside enemies and dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage. The dash range increases by up to 250%, depending on how long it is charged.

basic.name: Consuming Blaze
basic.shortTooltip: Damage nearby enemies and heal Cho
basic.fullTooltip: Ignite nearby enemies, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds. Basic Attacking burning enemies re-Ignites them. Cho is healed for 40 (+4% per level) when an enemy is Ignited.

basic.name: Rune Bomb
basic.shortTooltip: Throw a Rune Bomb down a line. Gall can detonate it to do area damage
basic.fullTooltip: Roll a bomb dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in its path. Gall can use Runic Blast to detonate it to deal 233 (+4% per level) damage in an area.

heroic.name: Hammer of Twilight
heroic.shortTooltip: Activate to knockback and Stun enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

heroic.name: Upheaval
heroic.shortTooltip: Pull enemies in a large area
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.

trait.name: Ogre Hide
trait.shortTooltip: Activate to increase Armor
trait.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 25 Armor, but reduce Gall's damage by 25%.

level1.name: Consuming Fire
level1.shortTooltip: Increased healing against Heroes
level1.fullTooltip: Consuming Blaze heals for 150% more when a Hero is Ignited.

level1.name: Fuel for the Flame
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Kills empower Consuming Blaze
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Every Minion killed near Cho increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 0.3%.  Quest: Every Hero Takedown increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 3%.

level1.name: Calloused Hide
level1.shortTooltip: Ogre Hide increases healing received
level1.fullTooltip: Ogre Hide also increases healing received by 15%.

level4.name: Uppercut
level4.fullTooltip: Surging Fist deals additional damage to Heroes equal to 7% of their max Health.

level4.name: Rollback
level4.fullTooltip: Rune Bomb rolls back to Cho, damaging enemies in its path.

level4.name: Seared Flesh
level4.shortTooltip: Consecutive Basic Attacks deal bonus damage
level4.fullTooltip: Each consecutive Basic Attack to an enemy Hero deals 20% more damage, to a maximum of 60% damage. This bonus lasts 5 seconds or until a different enemy is attacked.

level7.name: Power Surge
level7.shortTooltip: Surging Fist cooldown lowers against Heroes
level7.fullTooltip: Each Hero hit by Surging Fist reduces its cooldown by 4 seconds.

level7.name: Firestarter
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against ignited Heroes decreases the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 1 second.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 3 seconds.

level7.name: Enraged Regeneration
level7.shortTooltip: Gall's Ogre Rage increases Health Regen
level7.fullTooltip: While Gall's Ogre Rage is active, Cho's Health Regeneration is increased by 200%.

level10.name: Hammer of Twilight
level10.shortTooltip: Activate to knockback and Stun enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

level10.name: Upheaval
level10.shortTooltip: Pull enemies in a large area
level10.fullTooltip: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.

level13.name: Frenzied Fists
level13.fullTooltip: Gain 75% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after using Surging Fist.

level13.name: Runic Feedback
level13.shortTooltip: Runic Blast reduces Rune Bomb cooldown
level13.fullTooltip: Gall's Runic Blast reduces Cho's Rune Bomb cooldown by 1 seconds per enemy hit, and 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

level13.name: Runed Gauntlet
level13.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Cho and Gall's Heroic Abilities by 0.75 seconds.

level16.name: Surging Dash
level16.shortTooltip: Heal while channeling Surging Fist
level16.fullTooltip: While channeling Surging Fist, Cho heals for 150 (+4% per level) Health per second.

level16.name: Twilight Veil
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to increase Ogre Hide Armor
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to increase the Armor bonus of Ogre Hide by 200% for 2 seconds. If cast while Ogre Rage is active, it instantly swaps to Ogre Hide.

level16.name: Molten Block
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to become Invulnerable
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to enter Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds, damaging nearby enemies for 92 (+4% per level) damage per second.

level20.name: C'Thun's Gift
level20.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks are now ranged, slow targets
level20.fullTooltip: Cho's Basic Attack becomes ranged and slows targets by 20% for 2 seconds.

level20.name: Favor of the Old Gods
level20.fullTooltip: Upheaval roots enemy Heroes for 1.5 seconds.

level20.name: The Will of Cho
level20.fullTooltip: Takedowns permanently increase the Armor granted by Ogre Hide by 2, to a max of 50 extra Armor.

level20.name: Hour of Twilight
level20.fullTooltip: Decreases Cho'gall's death timer by 50%.

Chromie.name: Chromie
Chromie.description: A long range, high burst damage Mage, who requires good timing and setup.

basic.name: Sand Blast
basic.shortTooltip: Fire a long range blast that damages an enemy
basic.fullTooltip: After 0.8 seconds, fire a missile that deals 315 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit.  Quest: Hit 50 Heroes with Sand Blast. Consecutive hits without missing count as hitting 2 Heroes.  Reward: After hitting 50 Heroes, casting Sand Blast leaves an Echo behind.  The next time Sand Blast is cast, the Echo also casts an untalented Sand Blast that deals 40% damage.

basic.name: Dragons Breath
basic.shortTooltip: Deal damage in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Fire a blast into the air that lands after 1.5 seconds, dealing 390 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area.

basic.name: Time Trap
basic.shortTooltip: Place a trap that Time Stops enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Place a Time Trap that arms and Stealths after 2 seconds. The first enemy Hero to touch it is placed in Time Stop for 2 seconds. Only 1 trap can exist at once.

heroic.name: Slowing Sands
heroic.shortTooltip: Create a Slowing area
heroic.fullTooltip: Place a sand vortex that greatly Slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it Slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.

heroic.name: Temporal Loop
heroic.shortTooltip: Return an enemy Hero to a previous position
heroic.fullTooltip: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.

trait.name: Timewalker
trait.shortTooltip: Gain Talents earlier than everyone else
trait.fullTooltip: Chromie has traveled to the future, and as such, will learn her Talents 2 levels earlier than her teammates!  Bronze Talons  Hitting an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability increases the damage of Chromie's next Basic Attack by 140%.

level1.name: Mounting Sand
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Sand Blast consecutive bonus
level1.fullTooltip: Increase the damage of Echo's Sand Blast by 50%. Hitting 3 or more consecutive Sand Blasts without missing counts as hitting 3 Heroes.

level1.name: Deep Breathing
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Hitting Heroes empowers Dragon's Breath
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 5, up to 60.  Reward: After hitting 12 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 140 and also increase Chromie's sight radius by 100%.

level1.name: Timewalker's Pursuit
level1.shortTooltip: Activate to reveal an area Quest: Regen Globes increase Mana Regen
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to reveal the targeted area for 2 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds.  Quest: Gather 15 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: After gathering 15 Globes, Chromie gains 5% Spell Power and her Mana Regeneration is increased by 1.

level4.name: Draconic Barrage
level4.fullTooltip: Increase the damage from Bronze Talons by an additional 100%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast applies Bronze Talons to Chromie's next 2 Basic Attacks.

level4.name: Enveloping Assault
level4.shortTooltip: Increase the radius of Dragons Breath
level4.fullTooltip: Increase Dragon's Breath's radius by 25%.

level4.name: Timely Surprise
level4.fullTooltip: Increase Time Trap's cast range by 33%. Additionally, the cooldowns of Sand Blast and Dragon's Breath are reset when Time Trap is triggered.

level7.name: Mobius Loop
level7.shortTooltip: Hitting Heroes reduces Dragon's Breath cooldown
level7.fullTooltip: If Dragon's Breath hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by 3 seconds and restore 100 Mana.

level7.name: Dragons Eye
level7.fullTooltip: Dragons Breath deals 25% more damage to enemies in the center.

level7.name: Chrono Sickness
level7.shortTooltip: Reduce Time Trap cooldown, Mana cost, adds Slow
level7.fullTooltip: Reduce Time Trap's cooldown and Mana cost by 50%. After the Time Stop ends, the enemy is also Slowed by 35% for 4 seconds.

level10.name: Slowing Sands
level10.shortTooltip: Create a Slowing area
level10.fullTooltip: Place a sand vortex that greatly Slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it Slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.

level10.name: Temporal Loop
level10.shortTooltip: Return an enemy Hero to a previous position
level10.fullTooltip: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.

level13.name: Bye Bye!
level13.fullTooltip: Reduce the cast time of Hearthstone by 75%, and it is not interrupted by taking damage.

level13.name: Here and There
level13.shortTooltip: Activate to swap positions with Sand Blast Echo
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to swap Chromie's position with her Sand Blast Echo.

level13.name: Time Out
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to place Chromie in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 5 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

level16.name: Shifting Sands
level16.shortTooltip: Sand Blast grants Spell Power
level16.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast grants 8% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 40%. The duration is refreshed whenever an enemy is damaged by Sand Blast.

level16.name: Fast Forward
level16.shortTooltip: Long range Sand Blasts reduce its cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: If Sand Blast travels at least 70% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.75 seconds.

level16.name: Quantum Overdrive
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to gain Spell Power
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to increase Spell Power by 25% for 10 seconds.

level20.name: Pocket of Time
level20.shortTooltip: Remove Slowing Sands Mana cost, increase Slow
level20.fullTooltip: Remove Slowing Sands Mana cost and increase the Slow from 60% to 80%.

level20.name: Stuck in a Loop
level20.fullTooltip: Temporal Loop teleports the target a second time after the first.

level20.name: Piercing Sands
level20.fullTooltip: Sand Blast will now hit all Heroes in its path. Additional hits do not grant Quest progress.

level20.name: Andorhal Anomaly
level20.fullTooltip: Time Trap gains 2 charges, and when the cooldown finishes, Chromie gains all charges at once. Maximum 3 active Time Traps.

Deckard.name: Deckard
Deckard.description: A burst Healer who excels at preparing the battlefield before a fight and can cripple enemies with crowd control.

basic.name: Healing Potion
basic.shortTooltip: Throw Potions that heal allies
basic.fullTooltip: Throw a Healing Potion on the ground that heals the first allied Hero that comes in contact with it for 219 (+4% per level).  Limit 5 active Potions.

basic.name: Horadric Cube
basic.shortTooltip: Damage and Slow enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Release the Horadric Cube. After 0.5 seconds it explodes, dealing 80 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in the area and Slowing them by 35% for 1.75 seconds.

basic.name: Scroll Of Sealing
basic.shortTooltip: Damage and Root enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Unfurl an enchanted scroll over 2.25 seconds, forming a triangle that deals 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies inside and Roots them for 1.5 seconds.

heroic.name: Stay Awhile and Listen
heroic.shortTooltip: Put enemies to Sleep with a fascinating story
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, Channel for 3 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2 seconds after.  Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.

heroic.name: Lorenado
heroic.shortTooltip: Conjure a lorenado that knocks enemies away
heroic.fullTooltip: Vector Targeting After 1 second, create a twirling tome tornado that travels towards the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it.

trait.name: Fortitude of the Faithful
trait.shortTooltip: Nearby allies grant Armor, cooldown reduction
trait.fullTooltip: When at least 1 other allied Hero is nearby, Deckard gains 10 Armor and his Basic Abilities recharge 50% faster.

level1.name: Scroll of Identify
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Scroll of Sealing reveals, reduces Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with Scroll of Sealing reveals them for 8 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Scroll of Sealing also reduces Armor of Heroes hit by 15 for 4 seconds and the reveal duration is doubled.

level1.name: Field Study
level1.shortTooltip: Scroll of Sealing can grant Spell Power
level1.fullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Scroll of Sealing grants 15% Spell Power for 14 seconds, up to 30%.

level1.name: Sapphire
level1.shortTooltip: Next Horadric Cube Slow increased
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to increase the Slow of the next Horadric Cube by 30%.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

level4.name: Potion of Shielding
level4.fullTooltip: Whenever an ally is healed by a Healing Potion, they gain a 122 (+4% per level) Shield for 6 seconds.

level4.name: Rejuvenation Potion
level4.shortTooltip: Healing Potions restore Mana, heal more
level4.fullTooltip: Healing Potions restore 10 Mana and heal for an additional 108 (+4% per level) over 4 seconds.

level4.name: Ruby
level4.shortTooltip: Next Horadric Cube creates Lesser Healing Potions
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to make the next Horadric Cube spawn 3 Lesser Healing Potions from each enemy Hero hit, healing allied Heroes for 205 (+4% per level) when picked up. Lesser Healing Potions last for 10 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

level7.name: Cube Mastery
level7.shortTooltip: Horadric Cube reduces Scroll of Sealing cooldown
level7.fullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Horadric Cube reduces the cooldown of Scroll of Sealing by 3 seconds.

level7.name: Kanai's Cube
level7.shortTooltip: Horadric Cube reduces Hero damage dealt
level7.fullTooltip: Horadric Cube reduces Hero damage dealt by 30% for 4 seconds.

level7.name: Emerald
level7.shortTooltip: Next Horadric Cube reduces enemy healing received
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to make the next Horadric Cube reduce the healing received of enemy Heroes by 75% for 4 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

level10.name: Stay Awhile and Listen
level10.shortTooltip: Put enemies to Sleep with a fascinating story
level10.fullTooltip: After 1 second, Channel for 3 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2 seconds after.  Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.

level10.name: Lorenado
level10.shortTooltip: Conjure a lorenado that knocks enemies away
level10.fullTooltip: Vector Targeting After 1 second, create a twirling tome tornado that travels towards the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it.

level13.name: Super Healing Potion
level13.shortTooltip: Healing Potions heal more after a duration
level13.fullTooltip: If a Healing Potion isn't picked up for at least 2 seconds, it heals for 80% more.

level13.name: Potion of Revival
level13.shortTooltip: Healing Potions heal in an area
level13.fullTooltip: When a Healing Potion is picked up, it also heals all nearby allied Heroes for 35% of the healing amount.

level13.name: Ancient Blessings
level13.shortTooltip: Activate Fortitude to empower ally Attacks
level13.fullTooltip: Activate Fortitude of the Faithful to empower nearby allied Hero Basic Attacks for 8 seconds, causing them to deal an additional 62 (+4% per level) damage in an area and heal for 90 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit. This effect can only occur once per second.

level16.name: Scroll of Stone Curse
level16.shortTooltip: Scroll of Sealing can deal more damage
level16.fullTooltip: Scroll of Sealing deals 200% more damage when hitting at least 2 Heroes.

level16.name: Safety in Numbers
level16.shortTooltip: Additional allies empower Fortitude of the Faithful
level16.fullTooltip: If at least 3 allied Heroes are nearby, Fortitude of the Faithful grants an additional 10 Armor and causes Deckard's Basic Abilities to recharge an additional 50% faster.

level16.name: Horadric Staff
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks periodically Stun Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Every 5 seconds, Deckard's next Basic Attack Stuns Heroes for 0.75 seconds.

level20.name: Respect the Elderly
level20.shortTooltip: Stay Awhile and Listen Silences, Blinds
level20.fullTooltip: Stay Awhile and Listen Silences and Blinds enemies for 2 seconds upon waking up from Sleep.

level20.name: Morenados!
level20.fullTooltip: Lorenado's cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds every time an enemy Hero is knocked back. This effect can only occur once per 0.5 seconds.

level20.name: Bottomless Flask
level20.fullTooltip: After use, Healing Potions recharge after 8 seconds.

level20.name: Perfect Gems
level20.fullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of all Gems by 25 seconds and the cooldown of Horadric Cube by 5 seconds.

Dehaka.name: Dehaka
Dehaka.description: A Bruiser with a strong, global presence that can effectively clear groups of minions.

basic.name: Drag
basic.shortTooltip: Deal light damage and drag an enemy
basic.fullTooltip: Dehaka lashes out his tongue, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit, Stunning and dragging them with him for 1.75 seconds.  If Dehaka is Stunned or Silenced while using Drag, the effect ends.

basic.name: Dark Swarm
basic.shortTooltip: Damage nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 47 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies for 3.5 seconds. While active, you are able to move through units. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.

basic.name: Burrow
basic.shortTooltip: Gain Stasis by burrowing into the ground
basic.fullTooltip: Burrow into the ground, entering Stasis and becoming Invulnerable for 2 seconds.

heroic.name: Isolation
heroic.shortTooltip: Silence, Slow, and reduce vision of an enemy
heroic.fullTooltip: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage, Silencing and Slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Additionally, their vision radius is greatly reduced for 6 seconds.

heroic.name: Adaptation
heroic.shortTooltip: Heal back damage taken
heroic.fullTooltip: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.

trait.name: Essence Collection
trait.shortTooltip: Collect and consume enemy Essence to heal
trait.fullTooltip: Gain 10 Essence from Takedowns and 2 Essence from nearby Minions dying.  Activate to consume all Essence and heal Dehaka for 29 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds for each Essence stored.  Maximum of 50 Essence.  Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.

mount.name: Brushstalker
mount.shortTooltip: Burrow to a bush on the Battleground.
mount.fullTooltip: Activate to burrow to a bush on the Battleground.  Passive: Gain 20% movement speed while in a bush and for 2 seconds after leaving.

level1.name: Enduring Swarm
level1.shortTooltip: Dark Swarm grants Spell Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Dark Swarm grants 50 Spell Armor while active.

level1.name: Tissue Regeneration
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Essence increases Health Regen, max Essence
level1.fullTooltip: Regeneration Globes grant 10 Essence.  Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases Health Regeneration by 4, up to 40, and maximum Essence by 1, up to 10.

level1.name: Enhanced Agility
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Essence increases Brushstalker Move Speed
level1.fullTooltip: Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus now lasts for 5 seconds after leaving a bush.  Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases the Movement Speed bonus of Brushstalker by 2%, up to 20%.

level4.name: Lurker Strain
level4.fullTooltip: Emerging from Burrow grants Dehaka Stealth for 3 seconds and also knocks nearby enemies back, Slowing them by 30% for 3 seconds.

level4.name: One-Who-Collects
level4.fullTooltip: Increases Essence collected from Minions by 50%.

level4.name: Hero Stalker
level4.fullTooltip: Increases Essence gained from Takedowns by 100%, and gain 1 Essence each time an enemy Hero is hit by Dark Swarm.

level7.name: Feeding Frenzy
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Drag's cooldown by 2 seconds.

level7.name: Constriction
level7.fullTooltip: Increases Drag duration by 0.5 seconds.

level7.name: Symbiosis
level7.shortTooltip: Reduces Dark Swarm cooldown against Heroes
level7.fullTooltip: Every time Dark Swarm damages an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 0.4 seconds.

level10.name: Isolation
level10.shortTooltip: Silence, Slow, and reduce vision of an enemy
level10.fullTooltip: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage, Silencing and Slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Additionally, their vision radius is greatly reduced for 6 seconds.

level10.name: Adaptation
level10.shortTooltip: Heal back damage taken
level10.fullTooltip: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.

level13.name: Primal Rage
level13.fullTooltip: Gain 1% increased Attack Damage per Essence stored.

level13.name: Ferocious Stalker
level13.fullTooltip: Dark Swarm deals 50% more damage while Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus is active.

level13.name: Primal Swarm
level13.fullTooltip: Dark Swarm causes enemies hit to lose 10 Armor for 0.75 seconds, causing them to take 10% extra damage.

level16.name: Paralyzing Enzymes
level16.shortTooltip: Drag Slows
level16.fullTooltip: Drag Slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds after it ends.

level16.name: Elongated Tongue
level16.shortTooltip: Increases Drag range
level16.fullTooltip: Increase Drag range by 20%.

level16.name: Tunneling Claws
level16.shortTooltip: Dehaka can move while Burrowed
level16.fullTooltip: Dehaka can move while Burrowed.

level20.name: Contagion
level20.fullTooltip: Isolation hits all Heroes near the first target.

level20.name: Change Is Survival
level20.fullTooltip: Increases Adaptation healing to 200% of the damage received and reduces the cooldown by 30 seconds.

level20.name: Apex Predator
level20.fullTooltip: Reduces Brushstalker's cooldown by 35 seconds and the cast time by 0.5 seconds.

level20.name: Essence Claws
level20.fullTooltip: Dehaka's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1 second. If the target is a Hero, Dehaka gains 5 Essence.

Diablo.name: Diablo
Diablo.description: A risky Tank who can devastate an enemy team with his "all-in" combo potential.

basic.name: Shadow Charge
basic.shortTooltip: Charge to a target enemy and push them back
basic.fullTooltip: Charge an enemy, knocking them back, dealing 40 (+4% per level) damage and gaining 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds. If the enemy hits terrain, they are Stunned for 1 second and take an additional 120 (+4% per level) damage.

basic.name: Fire Stomp
basic.shortTooltip: Unleash fire waves in a direction
basic.fullTooltip: Unleashes fire waves toward the targeted area that deal 12 (+4% per level) damage each. Once they reach maximum range they return, dealing an additional 36 (+4% per level) damage. Diablo heals for 130% of the damage dealt to Heroes.

basic.name: Overpower
basic.shortTooltip: Grab an enemy and slam them behind Diablo, stunning them and dealing damage
basic.fullTooltip: Grabs the target and slams it behind Diablo, dealing 73 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning for 0.25 seconds.

heroic.name: Apocalypse
heroic.shortTooltip: Stun all enemy Heroes
heroic.fullTooltip: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

heroic.name: Lightning Breath
heroic.shortTooltip: Damage and Slow enemies in front of Diablo
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%.   Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.

trait.name: Black Soulstone
trait.shortTooltip: Gather souls from enemies to gain Health and resurrect faster
trait.fullTooltip: Repeatable Quest: Gain 10 Souls per Hero killed and 1 Soul per Minion, up to 100. For each Soul, gain 0.4% maximum Health. If Diablo has 100 Souls upon dying, he will resurrect in 5 seconds but lose 100 Souls.

level1.name: Feast on Fear
level1.shortTooltip: Shadow Charge, Overpower heal
level1.fullTooltip: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower heals Diablo for 12% of his maximum Health over 3 seconds.

level1.name: Devil's Due
level1.shortTooltip: Souls empower Regen Globes, Healing Fountains
level1.fullTooltip: Black Soulstone increases the effects of Regen Globes and Healing Fountains by 2.25% per Soul.

level1.name: Soul Shield
level1.shortTooltip: Activate to gain Spell Armor per Soul
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 25 plus 50% of Diablo's current Souls as Spell Armor for 4 seconds.  Every time Diablo damages an enemy Hero, reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

level4.name: Sacrificial Soul
level4.shortTooltip: Shadow Charge grants Souls and Armor
level4.fullTooltip: Stunning a Hero with Shadow Charge grants 5 Souls and 20 Armor for 4 seconds. While at 100 Souls, increase this Armor to 40.

level4.name: Souls to the Flame
level4.shortTooltip: Fire Stomp grants Souls and heals more
level4.fullTooltip: Fire Stomp grants 1 Soul every 3 times it damages an enemy Hero, and heals for an additional 1.3% of its damage dealt per Soul.

level4.name: Life Leech
level4.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks grant Souls and heal
level4.fullTooltip: Diablo gains 1 Soul and heals for 1.5% of his maximum Health when Basic Attacking an enemy Hero. While at 100 Souls, increase this healing to 3% of his maximum Health.

level7.name: Eternal Flames
level7.shortTooltip: Shadow Charge, Overpower reset Fire Stomp
level7.fullTooltip: When Diablo Stuns an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower, reset the cooldown of Fire Stomp.

level7.name: Malevolence
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Abilities cause Diablo's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal an additional 100 (+4% per level) Spell Damage. Stores up to 2 charges.

level7.name: Diabolical Momentum
level7.fullTooltip: When Diablo's Basic Attacks damage enemies, reduce the cooldown of his Basic Abilities by 1 second.

level10.name: Apocalypse
level10.shortTooltip: Stun all enemy Heroes
level10.fullTooltip: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

level10.name: Lightning Breath
level10.shortTooltip: Damage and Slow enemies in front of Diablo
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%.   Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.

level13.name: Devastating Charge
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Shadow Charge's terrain collision damage by 80%.  Quest: Each time an enemy Hero takes terrain collision damage, increase this bonus by 20%, to a maximum of 120%.

level13.name: Cruelty
level13.shortTooltip: Shadow Charge, Overpower grant Attack Speed
level13.fullTooltip: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower increases Diablo's Attack Speed by 50% for 7 seconds, up to 100%.

level13.name: Hellfire
level13.fullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Fire Stomp grants 2% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to 30%.

level16.name: Domination
level16.shortTooltip: Overpower resets cooldown of Shadow Charge
level16.fullTooltip: Casting Overpower resets the cooldown of Shadow Charge.

level16.name: Debilitating Flames
level16.shortTooltip: Fire Stomp weakens enemy Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Fire Stomp are Slowed by 5% for 4 seconds, up to 50%. Heroes Slowed by 25% or more by Debilitating Flames deal 50% less damage.

level16.name: Overpowering Nightmare
level16.shortTooltip: Gain charges of Overpower
level16.fullTooltip: Gain 2 additional charges of Overpower, with a 2 second cooldown between uses.

level20.name: Dying Breath
level20.fullTooltip: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit (to a minimum of 5 seconds) and is cast for free when Diablo dies.

level20.name: Hellstorm
level20.fullTooltip: Lightning Breath lasts 200% longer.

level20.name: Lord of Terror
level20.shortTooltip: Steal Health, Souls from nearby enemy Heroes
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to steal 10% of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes and gain 5 Souls per Hero hit.

level20.name: Hellgate
level20.fullTooltip: Teleport and place a demonic rune at target location. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies for 1.75 seconds.

DVa.name: D.Va
DVa.description: A hard-to-kill Bruiser that can peel enemies away from her allies with high disruption.

basic.name: Boosters
basic.shortTooltip: Move fast and knockback enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Increase D.Va's Movement Speed by 125% for 2 seconds. Enemies that are hit take 135 (+4% per level) damage and are knocked away.   D.Va cannot be Slowed while Boosters are active, and each enemy can only be hit once per use.

basic.name: Defense Matrix
basic.shortTooltip: Reduce damage of enemy Heroes in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Channel a defensive field in the target direction for 3 seconds, reducing the damage dealt by enemy Heroes inside it by 75%. The Mech can move while channeling, but cannot turn.  Damage dealt to the Mech from enemies within Defense Matrix still grants the same amount of Self-Destruct Charge.

basic.name: Self-Destruct
basic.shortTooltip: Eject from the Mech, setting it to self-destruct for massive damage
basic.fullTooltip: Eject from the Mech, setting it to self-destruct after 4 seconds. Deals 400 (+4% per level) to 1200 (+4% per level) damage in a large area, depending on distance from center. Only deals 50% damage against Structures.  Gain 1% Charge for every 2 seconds spent Basic Attacking, and 30% Charge per 100% of Mech Health lost.

heroic.name: Bunny Hop
heroic.shortTooltip: Become Unstoppable and Slow nearby Heroes
heroic.fullTooltip: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds.  Requires Mech Mode.

heroic.name: Big Shot
heroic.shortTooltip: Damage enemies in a line as a Pilot
heroic.fullTooltip: Deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.  Requires Pilot Mode.

trait.name: Mech Mode
trait.shortTooltip: D.Va can eject from her Mech and continue to fight
trait.fullTooltip: When D.Va's Mech dies, she is ejected out after 0.75 seconds and can continue to fight. D.Va's Mech only awards 50% of a normal Hero's experience upon dying.

mount.name: Mechanized Walker
mount.shortTooltip: While in her Mech, D.Va can shoot while moving, but her Movement Speed is reduced.
mount.fullTooltip: While in her Mech, D.Va can shoot while moving, but her base Movement Speed is reduced by 15%.

level1.name: Rush-down
level1.shortTooltip: Reduced Boosters cooldown if used out of combat
level1.fullTooltip: If D.Va neither takes nor deals damage during Boosters, its cooldown is lowered by 7 seconds.

level1.name: Hit the Nitrous
level1.shortTooltip: Boosters give extra immediate speed
level1.fullTooltip: Initial speed bonus of Boosters is increased to 325%, then decays to normal boost speed over 0.5 seconds. During this time, Boosters deals 50% extra damage.

level1.name: Crash Course
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Reduce Boosters cooldown
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Boosters.  Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, each use of Boosters lowers its cooldown by 1 second per Hero hit.

level1.name: Pro Moves
level1.shortTooltip: Taking damage increases Move Speed
level1.fullTooltip: D.Va's Mech gains 2% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds every time it takes damage, up to 30%.

level4.name: Diverting Power
level4.shortTooltip: Increase Defense Matrix size, Move Speed reduced
level4.fullTooltip: The area of Defense Matrix is 100% wider and 25% longer, but D.Va's Movement Speed is reduced by 30% for the duration.

level4.name: Get Through This!
level4.fullTooltip: Increase the duration of Defense Matrix by 3 seconds.

level4.name: Fusion Generator
level4.fullTooltip: Every time an enemy Hero deals damage while inside Defense Matrix, D.Va's Self-Destruct Charge increases by 1%.  Max of 15% Charge gained per use.

level4.name: Bring It On
level4.fullTooltip: Self-Destruct's Charge amount gained from losing Mech Health is increased by 30%.

level7.name: Coming Through
level7.fullTooltip: Knockback distance of Boosters is increased by 100%.

level7.name: Dazer Zone
level7.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes affected by Defense Matrix are Slowed by 20%.

level7.name: Aggression Matrix
level7.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks lower Defense Matrix cooldown
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks in Mech Mode against Heroes lower the cooldown of Defense Matrix by 0.25 seconds.

level7.name: Nuclear Option
level7.fullTooltip: Increase Self Destruct's detonation timer by 3 seconds. Detonation damage increased by 70%.  A new Mech can still be called after 4 seconds.

level10.name: Bunny Hop
level10.shortTooltip: Become Unstoppable and Slow nearby Heroes
level10.fullTooltip: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds.  Requires Mech Mode.

level10.name: Big Shot
level10.shortTooltip: Damage enemies in a line as a Pilot
level10.fullTooltip: Deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.  Requires Pilot Mode.

level13.name: Expensive Plating
level13.shortTooltip: Increase Mech Health and Call Mech cooldown
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Mech Health by 20%, but also increase the cooldown of Call Mech by 15 seconds.  This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

level13.name: Emergency Shielding
level13.shortTooltip: Mech gains a Shield instead of dying
level13.fullTooltip: When D.Va's Mech would be destroyed, it instead gains a Shield that absorbs 210 (+4% per level) damage over 6 seconds.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

level13.name: Ablative Armor
level13.shortTooltip: Take less damage from weak attacks
level13.fullTooltip: Damage against D.Va's Mech that would deal 4% or less of its maximum Health is reduced by 50%.  This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

level16.name: Torpedo Dash
level16.shortTooltip: Dash as a Pilot
level16.fullTooltip: D.Va gains the Torpedo Dash ability, allowing her to dash forward and pass through enemies.  Requires Pilot Mode.

level16.name: GG, WP
level16.shortTooltip: Increased Pilot damage, Takedowns refresh Mech
level16.fullTooltip: Increase Pilot Mode Basic Attack damage by 50%. Participating in a Takedown while in Pilot Mode instantly refreshes the cooldown of Call Mech.

level16.name: Nanoweave Suit
level16.shortTooltip: Faster Call Mech, ejection grants Armor
level16.fullTooltip: For 4 seconds after ejecting from her Mech, D.Va gains 50 Armor and her Basic Attacks grant 50% more cooldown reduction towards Call Mech.

level16.name: Suppressing Fire
level16.shortTooltip: Pilot Basic Attacks Slow, range increased
level16.fullTooltip: Pilot Mode Basic Attacks have 20% increased range and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

level20.name: Stop and Pop
level20.shortTooltip: Bunny Hop damage increased if stationary
level20.fullTooltip: Bunny Hop deals 200% more damage if D.Va isn't moving at the moment of impact.

level20.name: Pew! Pew! Pew!
level20.fullTooltip: Instead of a single shot, Big Shot fires 3 shots over 0.5 seconds. Each shot deals 50% damage.

level20.name: Concussive Pulse
level20.fullTooltip: D.Va gains the Concussive Pulse ability, allowing her to deal 141 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back.  Requires Pilot Mode.

level20.name: MEKAfall
level20.shortTooltip: Call Mech is instant and targetable, damages enemies
level20.fullTooltip: Call Mech is instant and can target a location. Upon landing, the Mech deals 202 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the impact area.

basic.name: Call Mech
basic.fullTooltip: Call a new Mech and enter Mech Mode.  Basic Attacks lower this cooldown by 0.5 seconds each.

ETC.name: E.T.C.
ETC.description: A Tank who supplies his team with a good bit of utility.

basic.name: Powerslide
basic.shortTooltip: Dash to an area, stunning and damaging enemies hit
basic.fullTooltip: Slide to a location dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies hit for 1.25 second.

basic.name: Face Melt
basic.shortTooltip: Knock back and damage nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Deals 68 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back.

basic.name: Guitar Solo
basic.shortTooltip: Regenerate Health
basic.fullTooltip: Regenerate 66 (+4% per level) Health per second for 4 seconds.

heroic.name: Mosh Pit
heroic.shortTooltip: Nearby enemies must dance
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

heroic.name: Stage Dive
heroic.shortTooltip: Dive to a location and deal damage
heroic.fullTooltip: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

trait.name: Rockstar
trait.shortTooltip: After using an ability, E.T.C. gains Armor
trait.fullTooltip: After E.T.C. uses a Basic or Heroic ability, he gains 20 Armor for 2 seconds.  This effect does not stack with itself.

level1.name: Guitar Hero
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks heal during Guitar Solo
level1.fullTooltip: While Guitar Solo is active, E.T.C. heals for 50% of his damage dealt by Basic Attacks.

level1.name: Prog Rock
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Regen Globes empower Guitar Solo
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe permanently increases the healing per second of Guitar Solo by 5, to a maximum of 100  Reward: After gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, Guitar Solo also heals nearby allied Heroes for 50 (+4% per level) Health every second while it is active.

level1.name: Block Party
level1.shortTooltip: Rockstar grants allies Physical Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes a stack of Block, granting 50 Physical Armor against the next Hero Basic Attack for 8 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Maximum 2 stacks of Block.

level4.name: Crowd Surfer
level4.fullTooltip: Allows Powerslide to travel over walls and terrain.

level4.name: Loud Speakers
level4.shortTooltip: Increases range and knockback of Face Melt
level4.fullTooltip: Increases Face Melt range and knockback by 50%.

level4.name: Speed Metal
level4.shortTooltip: Move Speed is added to Rockstar
level4.fullTooltip: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

level7.name: Pinball Wizard
level7.shortTooltip: Increases Face Melt damage after Powerslide
level7.fullTooltip: Face Melt does 300% more damage to enemies recently affected by Powerslide.

level7.name: Echo Pedal
level7.fullTooltip: Using a Basic or Heroic Ability releases two pulses of 15 (+4% per level) damage.  This deals 250% bonus damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. The first occurs instantly, the second occurs 2 seconds later.

level7.name: Hammer-on
level7.fullTooltip: After using an Ability, E.T.C.'s next 2 Basic Attacks deal 35% more damage.

level10.name: Mosh Pit
level10.shortTooltip: Nearby enemies must dance
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

level10.name: Stage Dive
level10.shortTooltip: Dive to a location and deal damage
level10.fullTooltip: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

level13.name: Mic Check
level13.shortTooltip: Reduces Face Melt cooldown when hitting multiple enemies
level13.fullTooltip: Hitting at least 2 targets with Face Melt reduces its cooldown by 6 seconds.

level13.name: Encore
level13.shortTooltip: Face Melt will knock enemies away a second time
level13.fullTooltip: Face Melt leaves an Amp behind, which will knock enemies away again 2 seconds later.

level13.name: Face Smelt
level13.fullTooltip: Face Melt slows enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds.

level16.name: Show Stopper
level16.shortTooltip: Powerslide gives Armor
level16.fullTooltip: After using Powerslide, gain 15 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing all damage taken by 15%.

level16.name: Aggressive Shredding
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Guitar Solo cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: E.T.C.'s Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Guitar Solo by 0.75 seconds.

level16.name: Imposing Presence
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to slow enemy Basic Attacks and Move Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

level20.name: Tour Bus
level20.shortTooltip: Makes Powerslide usable during Mosh Pit
level20.fullTooltip: Mosh Pit refreshes the cooldown of Powerslide. E.T.C. can Powerslide during Mosh Pit, which also increases its duration by 2 seconds.

level20.name: Crowd Pleaser
level20.shortTooltip: Stage Dive impact area bigger, cooldown reduced
level20.fullTooltip: Stage Dive's impact area is 50% bigger, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

level20.name: Death Metal
level20.fullTooltip: Upon dying, a ghost uses Mosh Pit at E.T.C's location.

level20.name: Storm Shield
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to grant Shields to all nearby allies
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

level20.name: Bolt of the Storm
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to teleport a short distance
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

Falstad.name: Falstad
Falstad.description: An Assassin that can fly large distances, excelling on large battlegrounds.

basic.name: Hammerang
basic.shortTooltip: Throw out a Hammer that returns. Hammer slows and damages enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Throw out a Hammer that returns to Falstad, dealing 121 (+4% per level) damage and slowing enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.

basic.name: Lightning Rod
basic.shortTooltip: Deal damage to target enemy while staying close to them
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 107 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy, and an additional 75 (+4% per level) damage per second for 4 seconds while close to the target.

basic.name: Barrel Roll
basic.shortTooltip: Dash to a location and gain a temporary shield
basic.fullTooltip: Dashes forward and grants a 171 (+4% per level) point Shield for 3 seconds.

heroic.name: Hinterland Blast
heroic.shortTooltip: Long range damage beam
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, deal 475 (+4.75% per level) damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

heroic.name: Mighty Gust
heroic.shortTooltip: Push away enemies and slow them
heroic.fullTooltip: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

trait.name: Tailwind
trait.shortTooltip: After not taking damage for a brief period, gain increased Movement Speed
trait.fullTooltip: Gain 15% increased Movement Speed after not taking damage for 6 seconds.

mount.name: Flight
mount.shortTooltip: Instead of mounting, Falstad can fly a great distance over terrain
mount.fullTooltip: Instead of mounting, Falstad can fly a great distance over terrain.

level1.name: Gathering Storm
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Hitting Heroes empowers Hammerang
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Each time a Hero is hit by Hammerang, its damage is permanently increased by 1.5 and it refunds 10 Mana.

level1.name: Seasoned Marksman
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Kill enemies to empower Basic Attacks
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage.  Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

level1.name: Wingman
level1.shortTooltip: Kill Minions to bribe Mercenaries
level1.fullTooltip: Enemy Minions killed near Falstad grant a stack of Bribe. Falstad can use 20 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them and permanently increasing the damage of Lightning Rod by 5%.  Does not work on Bosses. Maximum of 80 stacks.  Passive: Reduce Lightning Rod's cooldown by 3 seconds.

level4.name: Static Shield
level4.shortTooltip: Gain Shields after every Lightning Rod strike
level4.fullTooltip: Gain a Shield equal to 4% of Falstad's maximum Health after every Lightning Rod strike. Lasts 4 seconds and stacks.

level4.name: Updraft
level4.fullTooltip: Increases Barrel Roll's range and Shield amount by 40%, and its Shield now lasts indefinitely.

level4.name: Hammer Gains
level4.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks heal for 20% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

level7.name: Secret Weapon
level7.shortTooltip: Increases Hammerang range, Basic Attack damage
level7.fullTooltip: Increases Hammerang's range by 30% and Basic Attacks deal 60% bonus damage while Hammerang is in flight.

level7.name: BOOMerang
level7.shortTooltip: Activate Hammerang second time for more damage
level7.fullTooltip: Reactivate Hammerang mid-flight to deal 165 (+4% per level) damage around the hammer.

level7.name: Charged Up
level7.shortTooltip: Increases Lightning Rod strikes and range
level7.fullTooltip: Increases the number of Lightning Rod strikes by 2 and its range by 25%.

level10.name: Hinterland Blast
level10.shortTooltip: Long range damage beam
level10.fullTooltip: After 1 second, deal 475 (+4.75% per level) damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

level10.name: Mighty Gust
level10.shortTooltip: Push away enemies and slow them
level10.fullTooltip: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

level13.name: Thunderstrikes
level13.fullTooltip: Lightning Rod deals 20% more damage each subsequent strike.

level13.name: Flow Rider
level13.fullTooltip: While Tailwind is active, Falstad's Basic Abilities recharge 100% faster.

level13.name: Giant Killer
level13.shortTooltip: Empowers your Basic Attacks against Heroes
level13.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

level16.name: Crippling Hammer
level16.shortTooltip: Increases Hammerang slow
level16.fullTooltip: Increases Hammerang's slow from 25% to 50%.

level16.name: Aerie Gusts
level16.shortTooltip: Reduce Tailwind delay, increase Move Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Reduces the activation time for Tailwind from 6 to 3 seconds, and increases the Movement Speed bonus from 15% to 25%.

level16.name: Afterburner
level16.shortTooltip: Barrel Roll increases Move Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Barrel Roll increases Movement Speed by 60%, decaying over 3 seconds.

level20.name: Call of the Wildhammer
level20.shortTooltip: Increases Hinterland Blast range and damage
level20.fullTooltip: Hinterland Blast has double the range and deals 25% more damage.

level20.name: Wind Tunnel
level20.fullTooltip: Mighty Gust creates a wind tunnel for 4 seconds. Enemies caught in the tunnel will periodically be pushed back.

level20.name: Nexus Frenzy
level20.fullTooltip: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 1.1.

level20.name: Epic Mount
level20.fullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Flight by 40 seconds, reduce the cast time before flying to 0.5 seconds, and increase the speed by 50%.

Fenix.name: Fenix
Fenix.description: A sustained damage Assassin with a regenerating Shield that enables him to efficiently duel his opponents.

basic.name: Plasma Cutter
basic.shortTooltip: Summon a laser that circles Fenix, damaging and Slowing enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Create a laser beam at the target point that circles around Fenix twice, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit and Slowing them by 25% for 4 seconds.

basic.name: Weapon Modes
basic.shortTooltip: Switch between Weapon Modes
basic.fullTooltip: Activate to change between Weapon Mode: Repeater Cannon and Weapon Mode: Phase Bomb.  Weapon Mode: Repeater Cannon: Basic Attack speed increased by 150%.  Weapon Mode: Phase Bomb: Basic Attacks have 1.25 increased range, deal 25% more damage, and splash to nearby enemies.

basic.name: Warp
basic.shortTooltip: Warp to a location
basic.fullTooltip: Warp to a targeted location, phasing out after 0.5 seconds, and arriving 0.75 seconds later.

heroic.name: Purification Salvo
heroic.shortTooltip: Fire a barrage of homing missiles
heroic.fullTooltip: Channel for 1.5 seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire 5 missiles at each locked Hero, dealing 86 (+4% per level) damage each. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

heroic.name: Planet Cracker
heroic.shortTooltip: Fire a laser across the battleground
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for 4 seconds, dealing 112 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.

trait.name: Shield Capacitor
trait.shortTooltip: Permanent Shield that regenerates out of combat
trait.fullTooltip: Fenix has a permanent 760 (+4% per level) Shield which regenerates at 76 (+4% per level) per second after not taking damage for 5 seconds.

level1.name: Advanced Targeting
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Plasma Cutter circles an additional time
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Plasma Cutter permanently increases Fenix's Basic Attack damage by 0.5, up to 60.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, Plasma Cutter circles an additional time.

level1.name: Arsenal Synergy
level1.shortTooltip: Repeater Cannon empowers Phase Bomb
level1.fullTooltip: After hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks 3 times while Repeater Cannon is active, the next Basic Attack with Phase Bomb deals 150% more damage and splashes in a 50% larger area.

level1.name: Mobile Offense
level1.shortTooltip: Movement empowers Basic Attacks
level1.fullTooltip: After moving, Fenix's next Basic Attack deals 35% more damage to Heroes.

level4.name: Target Acquired
level4.shortTooltip: Repeater Cannon can grant Move Speed
level4.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes with Repeater Cannon active grant 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds, up to 40%.

level4.name: Inhibiting Energy
level4.shortTooltip: Phase Bomb can Slow enemies hit
level4.fullTooltip: While Phase Bomb is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes Slowed by Plasma Cutter Slow all enemies in the area by 35% for 4 seconds.

level4.name: Warp Conduit
level4.fullTooltip: Hero Takedowns reset Warp's cooldown.

level4.name: Emergency Protocol
level4.shortTooltip: Gain Move Speed when Shield depletes
level4.fullTooltip: When Shield Capacitor's Shield becomes depleted, gain 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

level7.name: Combat Advantage
level7.shortTooltip: Plasma Cutter deals more damage to Slowed targets
level7.fullTooltip: Plasma Cutter deals 35% more damage to Slowed targets.

level7.name: Warp Warfare
level7.fullTooltip: After arriving with Warp, gain 175% Attack Speed for 4 seconds while in Repeater Cannon mode.

level7.name: Divert Power: Weapons
level7.shortTooltip: Activate to lose Shield, increase damage
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to instantly drain Shield Capacitor's Shield, but increase Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds proportionate to the amount of Shields drained, up to an 80% increase.

level10.name: Purification Salvo
level10.shortTooltip: Fire a barrage of homing missiles
level10.fullTooltip: Channel for 1.5 seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire 5 missiles at each locked Hero, dealing 86 (+4% per level) damage each. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

level10.name: Planet Cracker
level10.shortTooltip: Fire a laser across the battleground
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for 4 seconds, dealing 112 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.

level13.name: Adanium Shell
level13.fullTooltip: After arriving with Warp, gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds.

level13.name: Dampening Field
level13.fullTooltip: Fenix gains 20 Spell Armor while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

level13.name: Rapid Recharge
level13.fullTooltip: Whenever Fenix is healed, Shield Capacitor's Shield recharges for 60% of the healing received.

level13.name: Auxiliary Shields
level13.fullTooltip: Permanently reduce Fenix's maximum Health by 10% but increase Shield Capacitor's Shield by 20%. Basic Attacks regenerate Shields equal to 10% of the damage dealt.

level16.name: Offensive Cadence
level16.shortTooltip: Successive Repeater Cannon attacks empowered
level16.fullTooltip: Every 3rd Basic Attack against Heroes while Repeater Cannon is active deals an additional 6% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

level16.name: Photonic Weaponry
level16.shortTooltip: Shield Capacitor increases damage dealt
level16.fullTooltip: Fenix deals 15% more damage while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

level16.name: Arsenal Overcharge
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Ability cooldowns
level16.fullTooltip: Fenix's Basic Attacks reduce his Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

level20.name: Secondary Fire
level20.shortTooltip: Plasma Cutter can fire Purification Salvo missiles
level20.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plasma Cutter fires a Purification Salvo missile at them after 0.5 seconds, dealing 86 (+4% per level) damage. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

level20.name: Singularity Charge
level20.fullTooltip: Repeater Cannon grants 100% more Attack Speed, and Phase Bomb grants 1.25 more range.

level20.name: Unconquered Spirit
level20.fullTooltip: Upon taking fatal damage, Shield Capacitor regains 800 (+4% per level) Shields. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

Gall.name: Gall
Gall.description: Head 2 of a 2 Headed Hero, Gall is a powerful Mage stuck to Cho.

basic.name: Shadowflame
basic.shortTooltip: Blast enemies in a narrow line
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 135 (+5% per level) damage to enemies in the area.

basic.name: Dread Orb
basic.shortTooltip: Lob a ball of energy that bounces three times, damaging enemies it hits
basic.fullTooltip: Throw a bomb that will bounce three times, dealing 126 (+5% per level) damage to enemies.

basic.name: Runic Blast
basic.shortTooltip: Detonate Cho's Rune Bomb, dealing area damage
basic.fullTooltip: Detonate Cho's Rune Bomb, dealing 233 (+4% per level) damage around it.

heroic.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
heroic.shortTooltip: Launch a barrage of Shadow Bolts
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, unleash 20 Shadow Bolts over 4 seconds, each dealing 87 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

heroic.name: Twisting Nether
heroic.shortTooltip: Slow and damage nearby enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while Gall channels, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 353 (+5% per level) damage.

trait.name: Ogre Rage
trait.shortTooltip: Activate to increase Gall's Damage
trait.fullTooltip: Activate to increase Gall's damage by 25%, but reduce Cho's Armor by 25.  Passive: Gall is permanently immune to Stun and Silence effects.

mount.name: Shove
mount.fullTooltip: Nudge Cho a small distance and grant him 25% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

activable.name: Eye of Kilrogg
activable.shortTooltip: Place an eye that grants vision
activable.fullTooltip: Place an eye, granting vision of a large area around it for 45 seconds. The eye can be killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks. Stores up to 2 charges.

level1.name: Keep Moving!
level1.shortTooltip: Increased Shove Movespeed duration
level1.fullTooltip: Increases the duration of Shove's movement speed bonus by 1 second. Cho's Basic Attacks against Heroes increases the duration of an active Shove by 1 second.

level1.name: Taskmaster
level1.shortTooltip: Reduce Shove's cooldown
level1.fullTooltip: Reduces the cooldown of Shove by 10 seconds. Every time Cho is hit by a Hero Basic Attack, reduce the Cooldown of Shove by 1 second.

level1.name: We See You!
level1.shortTooltip: Lower Eye of Kilrogg cooldown
level1.fullTooltip: Eye of Kilrogg's cooldown is decreased by 15 seconds and its range is increased by 33%.

level4.name: Double Back
level4.shortTooltip: Re-activate Dread Orb to reverse third bounce
level4.fullTooltip: Activate Dread Orb before the second bounce ends to reverse the direction of the third bounce.  Passive: The third bounce of Dread Orb deals 200% more damage to Non-Heroic targets.

level4.name: Runic Persistence
level4.shortTooltip: Runic Blast deals additional damage over time
level4.fullTooltip: Runic Blast deals an additional 180 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds in an area around the detonation point.

level4.name: Bomb's Away
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Damaging a Hero with Runic Blast increases its damage by 5.  Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, the range and speed of Cho's Rune Bomb is increased by 20%.

level7.name: Edge of Madness
level7.fullTooltip: Every subsequent hit of Shadowflame against the same enemy Hero deals an additional 8% damage, to a maximum of 40%. These bonuses are lost if the Hero has not been hit for 4 seconds.

level7.name: Double Trouble
level7.fullTooltip: Quest: If Shadowflame hits an enemy Hero that is afflicted by Cho's Consuming Blaze, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Shadowflame's cooldown is instead permanently reduced by 1 second.

level7.name: Ogre Rampage
level7.fullTooltip: Gall's Basic Abilities cooldown 75% faster for 5 seconds after Cho activates Ogre Hide.

level10.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
level10.shortTooltip: Launch a barrage of Shadow Bolts
level10.fullTooltip: After 1 second, unleash 20 Shadow Bolts over 4 seconds, each dealing 87 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

level10.name: Twisting Nether
level10.shortTooltip: Slow and damage nearby enemies
level10.fullTooltip: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while Gall channels, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 353 (+5% per level) damage.

level13.name: Searing Shadows
level13.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Shadowflame take an additional 2% of their maximum Health as damage.

level13.name: Rising Dread
level13.shortTooltip: Increase Dread Orb area and damage
level13.fullTooltip: Each bounce of Dread Orb increases its radius by 25% and damage by 25%.

level13.name: Twilight Nova
level13.fullTooltip: After the first bounce of Dread Orb, 2 extra bombs bounce to the sides once.

level16.name: Shadowsnare
level16.shortTooltip: Shadowflame slows Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Shadowflame slows enemy Heroes by 10% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 3 times.

level16.name: Leaden Orb
level16.shortTooltip: Dread Orb stuns
level16.fullTooltip: Dread Orb stuns enemy Heroes for 0.5 seconds.

level16.name: Deafening Blast
level16.shortTooltip: Runic Blast silences
level16.fullTooltip: Runic Blast silences enemy Heroes for 1.25 seconds.

level20.name: Shadowfury
level20.fullTooltip: Shadow Bolt Volley hits all enemies in its path.

level20.name: Shifting Nether
level20.fullTooltip: Twisting Nether now teleports Cho to a targeted location before it begins channeling.

level20.name: The Will of Gall
level20.shortTooltip: Takedowns increase Ogre Rage's Damage Bonus
level20.fullTooltip: Takedowns permanently increase the bonus of Ogre Rage by 2%.

level20.name: Psychotic Break
level20.fullTooltip: Upon dying, Gall gains Ogre Rage and can use Abilities for 10 seconds.

Garrosh.name: Garrosh
Garrosh.description: A frontline Tank that enters the fray, trying to isolate a single opponent for elimination.

basic.name: Groundbreaker
basic.shortTooltip: Deal damage to enemies, can Stun them
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 81 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area. Heroes hit on the outer edge are Stunned for 0.5 seconds and then Slowed by 40% for 2 seconds.

basic.name: Bloodthirst
basic.shortTooltip: Deal damage and heal for a portion of missing Health
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 156 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and heal for 10% of Garrosh's missing Health. Healing is increased by 100% against Heroes.

basic.name: Wrecking Ball
basic.shortTooltip: Throw an enemy, damaging and Slowing them
basic.fullTooltip: Throw a nearby enemy Hero, Minion, or Mercenary to the target location, dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage to enemies near the impact and Slowing them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

heroic.name: Warlord's Challenge
heroic.shortTooltip: Force nearby Heroes to attack Garrosh
heroic.fullTooltip: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for 2 seconds.

heroic.name: Decimate
heroic.shortTooltip: Damage and Slow nearby enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Deal 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by 30% for 1.5 seconds. Deals 100% more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by 1 second.  Stores up to 3 charges.

trait.name: Armor Up
trait.shortTooltip: Gain Armor as Health gets lower
trait.fullTooltip: Garrosh gains 1 Armor for every 2% of maximum Health missing.

level1.name: Warbreaker
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Stun Heroes to empower Groundbreaker
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Stun Heroes with Groundbreaker.  Reward: After Stunning 5 Heroes, Groundbreaker's Stun deals an additional 165 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds to Heroes.  Reward: After Stunning 15 Heroes, permanently reduce Groundbreaker's cooldown by 2 seconds.

level1.name: Unrivaled Strength
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Wrecking Ball's throw range, damage
level1.fullTooltip: Increase Wrecking Ball's throw range by 25% and its damage by 75%.

level1.name: Body Check
level1.shortTooltip: Damage and Slow an enemy
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to deal 111 (+4% per level) damage to a target enemy and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds.  Damage is increased by 200% of Armor Up's current bonus, and the Slow amount is increased by 30% if Armor Up's bonus is above 25.

level4.name: In For the Kill
level4.shortTooltip: Bloodthirst kills reset cooldown, restore Mana
level4.fullTooltip: Increase Bloodthirst's damage against non-Heroes by 70%. Killing enemies with Bloodthirst resets its cooldown and refunds its Mana cost.

level4.name: Thirst for Battle
level4.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Bloodthirst by 2 seconds.

level4.name: Indomitable
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to become Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.

level7.name: Intimidation

level7.name: Oppressor
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the target's Spell Power by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

level7.name: Brute Force
level7.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Body Check receive 50% reduced healing for 4 seconds.

level7.name: Into the Fray
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to throw a nearby ally and grant them 25 Armor for 3 seconds. Deals 91 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies upon impact and Slows them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.  While in flight, allied Heroes are Unstoppable.

level10.name: Warlord's Challenge
level10.shortTooltip: Force nearby Heroes to attack Garrosh
level10.fullTooltip: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for 2 seconds.

level10.name: Decimate
level10.shortTooltip: Damage and Slow nearby enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Deal 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by 30% for 1.5 seconds. Deals 100% more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by 1 second.  Stores up to 3 charges.

level13.name: Defensive Measures
level13.fullTooltip: If Groundbreaker Stuns a Hero, Garrosh gains a 350 (+4% per level) Shield for 6 seconds.

level13.name: Bloodcraze
level13.fullTooltip: When hitting a Hero, Bloodthirst heals for an additional 10% of Garrosh's maximum Health over 3 seconds.

level13.name: Double Up
level13.shortTooltip: Activate Armor Up to increase bonus
level13.fullTooltip: Armor Up can be activated to increase its Armor bonus by 100% for 3 seconds.

level16.name: Rough Landing
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Groundbreaker Slow
level16.fullTooltip: Increase Groundbreaker's Slow amount by 10% and duration by 1 second.

level16.name: Mortal Combo
level16.shortTooltip: Reduce Wrecking Ball cooldown on Stunned targets
level16.fullTooltip: If Wrecking Ball is used on a Hero within 3 seconds of Stunning them with Groundbreaker, Wrecking Ball's cooldown is reduced by 9 seconds.

level16.name: Earthshaker
level16.shortTooltip: Wrecking Ball Stuns enemies near impact
level16.fullTooltip: Wrecking Ball Stuns enemies near the impact area for 0.5 seconds.

level20.name: Death Wish
level20.fullTooltip: If an enemy Hero is killed while Taunted by Warlord's Challenge, its cooldown is reduced by 45 seconds.

level20.name: Deadly Calm
level20.fullTooltip: Heroes hit by Decimate deal 20% less damage for 3 seconds.

level20.name: Titanic Might
level20.shortTooltip: Wrecking Ball throws an additional enemy
level20.fullTooltip: Wrecking Ball now throws the 2 closest enemies.

level20.name: Inner Rage
level20.shortTooltip: Body Check gains an additional charge
level20.fullTooltip: Body Check gains an additional charge, and its cooldown recharges 200% faster while Armor Up's bonus is at or above 25.

Gazlowe.name: Gazlowe
Gazlowe.description: A Summoner that specializes in controlling key areas of the battleground.

basic.name: Rock-It! Turret
basic.shortTooltip: Create a turret that shoots at nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Creates a turret that deals 62 (+4% per level) damage. Lasts for 30 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.

basic.name: Deth Lazor
basic.shortTooltip: Charge and shoot a laser. Damage and range increases the longer it is charged
basic.fullTooltip: Charged attack that deals 137 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line. Damage and range increase the longer the Ability is charged, up to 100% after 3 seconds.  Deth Lazor can be channeled indefinitely.

basic.name: Xplodium Charge
basic.shortTooltip: Throw a timed bomb which stuns and damages enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Places a bomb that deals 233 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within target area after 2.5 seconds, stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

heroic.name: Robo-Goblin
heroic.shortTooltip: Increase Attack Damage, Armor, Move Speed
heroic.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 30 Armor and 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.   Passive: Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage.

heroic.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
heroic.shortTooltip: Pulls and damages enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 251 (+4% per level) damage.

trait.name: Salvager
trait.shortTooltip: Turrets and enemy Structures drop Scrap that restore Mana and reduce cooldowns
trait.fullTooltip: Destroyed enemy Structures and Rock-it! Turrets drop Scrap. Collecting Scrap restores 30 Mana and causes Abilities to recharge three times as fast over 3 seconds.   Activate Salvager to dismantle a target Rock-it! Turret and turn it into Scrap.

activable.name: Focus Turrets!
activable.shortTooltip: Order turrets to attack a target.
activable.fullTooltip: Orders any nearby Rock-It! Turrets to focus the target.

level1.name: Extra TNT
level1.shortTooltip: Xplodium Charge deals more damage
level1.fullTooltip: Increases Xplodium Charge damage by 10% per target hit, up to 100%.

level1.name: Scrap-o-Matic Smelter
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Salvager Mana restoration
level1.fullTooltip: Increases the Mana restored from Scrap by 100%.

level1.name: Break it Down!
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Salvager cooldown reduction
level1.fullTooltip: Scrap causes Abilities to cooldown four times as fast for 3 seconds.

level1.name: Goblin Repairs
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Regen Globes increase Health Regen
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 25.  Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, gain an additional 15 Health Regeneration per second.

level4.name: Clockwerk Steam Fists
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Basic Attacks increase Rock-It! Turret duration
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Basic Attacks increase the duration of active Rock-It! Turrets by 1.5 seconds.  Reward: After increasing turret duration by 600 total seconds, reduce the charge cooldown of Rock-It! Turret by 3 seconds.

level4.name: ARK Reaktor
level4.shortTooltip: Reduces Xplodium Charge cooldown, can give turret charges
level4.fullTooltip: Reduces Xplodium Charge's cooldown by 2 seconds.  If Xplodium Charge hits an enemy Hero, gain 2 charges of Rock-It! Turret.

level4.name: Reduce, Reuse, Recycle
level4.fullTooltip: Enemy Minions that die nearby have a 15% chance to drop Scrap.

level4.name: Hired Goons

level4.fullTooltip: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near Gazlowe deal 50% more damage. Rock-it! Turrets gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing their damage taken by 50%.

level7.name: Rock-It! Turret XL
level7.fullTooltip: Rock-It! Turrets attack up to 2 additional enemies for 60% damage.

level7.name: Engine Gunk
level7.fullTooltip: Rock-It! Turret attacks Slow enemies by 20% for 2 seconds.

level7.name: Hyperfocus Coils
level7.fullTooltip: The mana cost of Deth Lazor is reduced by 30 and it charges twice as fast.

level10.name: Robo-Goblin
level10.shortTooltip: Increase Attack Damage, Armor, Move Speed
