level10.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 30 Armor and 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.   Passive: Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage.

level10.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
level10.shortTooltip: Pulls and damages enemies
level10.fullTooltip: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 251 (+4% per level) damage.

level13.name: EZ-PZ Dimensional Ripper
level13.fullTooltip: Deth Lazor Slows Heroes by 50% and Stuns non-Heroes for 3 seconds.

level13.name: Goblin Fusion
level13.fullTooltip: Deth Lazor can be charged for 1 additional second to increase its damage bonus by an additional 100%.

level13.name: X-Tra Large Bombs
level13.shortTooltip: Xplodium Charge casts when Stunned, Rooted
level13.fullTooltip: Increases Xplodium Charge radius by 30%. Being stunned or rooted causes an Xplodium Charge to drop at Gazlowe's feet.  This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

level16.name: Turret Storage
level16.shortTooltip: Increases Rock-it! Turret charges
level16.fullTooltip: Increases Rock-It! Turret maximum charges from 2 to 3.

level16.name: Superior Schematics
level16.shortTooltip: Increases Rock-it! Turret range
level16.fullTooltip: Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets have 25% increased range while he is within their attack range.

level16.name: Kwik Release Charge
level16.shortTooltip: Xplodium Charge gains second charge
level16.fullTooltip: Xplodium Charge gains a second charge.

level20.name: Mecha-Lord
level20.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal an additional 100% damage.  Passive: Gain 25 Armor.

level20.name: Miniature Black Hole
level20.fullTooltip: Increases Grav-O-Bomb radius by 25% and damage by 50%.

level20.name: Firin' Mah Lazorz
level20.fullTooltip: Firing Deth Lazor causes all of Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets to fire a Deth Lazor of their own that deals 137 (+4% per level) damage.

level20.name: It's Raining Scrap
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to create 5 Scrap around Gazlowe over 5 seconds.

Genji.name: Genji
Genji.description: An opportunistic, mobile Assassin who can tear apart a weak backline.

basic.name: Shuriken
basic.shortTooltip: Throw Shuriken in a spread pattern
basic.fullTooltip: Throw 3 Shuriken in a spread pattern, each dealing 65 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.  Stores up to 3 charges.  Shuriken's cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.

basic.name: Deflect
basic.shortTooltip: Become Protected and return fire from attacks
basic.fullTooltip: Channel for 1.25 seconds, becoming Protected and blocking damage. Any damage blocked while channeling causes Genji to throw a Kunai toward the nearest enemy, prioritizing Heroes and dealing 55 (+4% per level) damage.  Total Damage Deflected: 0

basic.name: Swift Strike
basic.shortTooltip: Dash forward damaging enemies passed through
basic.fullTooltip: Dash forward, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. Enemy Heroes that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit with Swift Strike cause the cooldown and mana cost to be refunded.

heroic.name: Dragonblade
heroic.shortTooltip: Unleash the Dragonblade
heroic.fullTooltip: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage.

heroic.name: X-Strike
heroic.shortTooltip: Deal heavy damage in a cross shape
heroic.fullTooltip: Perform two slashes dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 270 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their area.

trait.name: Cyber Agility
trait.shortTooltip: Jump over terrain
trait.fullTooltip: Activate to jump to the target area.

level1.name: Swift as the Wind
level1.shortTooltip: Swift Strike grants Move Speed
level1.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Swift Strike increases Genji's Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

level1.name: Agile Dismount
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Cyber Agility range while Mounted
level1.fullTooltip: While mounted, the range of Cyber Agility is increased by 70% and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

level1.name: Pathfinder
level1.shortTooltip: Jumping over terrain increases Move Speed
level1.fullTooltip: Jumping over terrain with Cyber Agility increases Genji's Movement Speed by 25% for 6 seconds.

level4.name: Shuriken Mastery
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Increase Shuriken damage and restore charges
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes with Shuriken.  Reward: After hitting 35 Heroes, Shuriken damage is increased by 25.  Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes, Cyber Agility now refunds 2 charges of Shuriken.

level4.name: Strike At The Heart
level4.shortTooltip: Extra Swift Strike damage at its end
level4.fullTooltip: Enemies hit by the end of Swift Strike take an additional 138 (+4% per level) damage over 2 seconds.

level4.name: Dragon Claw
level4.fullTooltip: After Genji blocks 330 (+4% per level) damage with Deflect, activate to release a Dragon Claw, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

level7.name: Augmented Guard
level7.shortTooltip: Gain a Shield after Deflect ends
level7.fullTooltip: When Deflect ends, Genji gains a Shield equal to 50% of the damage blocked for 4 seconds.

level7.name: Perfect Defense
level7.fullTooltip: Deflected damage reduces the cooldown of Deflect by 2 seconds, up to a maximum of 10 seconds.

level7.name: Cyber Shield
level7.fullTooltip: Using Cyber Agility grants 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds.

level7.name: Dodge
level7.fullTooltip: Genji dodges 1 Heroic Basic Attack every 8 seconds.

level10.name: Dragonblade
level10.shortTooltip: Unleash the Dragonblade
level10.fullTooltip: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage.

level10.name: X-Strike
level10.shortTooltip: Deal heavy damage in a cross shape
level10.fullTooltip: Perform two slashes dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 270 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their area.

level13.name: Shingan
level13.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy with all 3 Shuriken deals 115 (+4% per level) bonus damage.

level13.name: Flow Like Water
level13.shortTooltip: Hitting Heroes reduces Swift Strike cooldown
level13.fullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit with Swift Strike reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

level13.name: Double Jump
level13.shortTooltip: Cyber Agility gains a second charge
level13.fullTooltip: Cyber Agility stores 2 charges.

level16.name: Reflect
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Deflect damage
level16.fullTooltip: Deflect also deals an additional 33% of the damage blocked.

level16.name: Final Cut
level16.shortTooltip: Swift Strike deals extra damage after a delay
level16.fullTooltip: After 1 second, Swift Strike deals an additional 125 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in the area.

level16.name: Steady Blade
level16.shortTooltip: Swift Strike deals increased damage for each Hero hit
level16.fullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Swift Strike increases the damage of the next Swift Strike by 20%. This bonus stacks up to 3 times.

level20.name: The Dragon Becomes Me
level20.fullTooltip: Each time Dragonblade hits an enemy Hero, the duration of Dragonblade is increased by 0.5 seconds. If a Hero is killed within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Dragonblade, Swift Strike's cooldown is reset.

level20.name: Living Weapon
level20.fullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by X-Strike reduces its cooldown by 12 seconds.

level20.name: Sharpened Stars
level20.fullTooltip: Shuriken now pierce all enemies hit.

level20.name: Zanshin
level20.shortTooltip: Quest: Deflect hits all nearby Heroes
level20.fullTooltip: Quest: Block 6500 damage with Deflect, including damage blocked so far.  Reward: Deflect hits all nearby enemy Heroes.

Greymane.name: Greymane
Greymane.description: A high damage Assassin that wears down enemies from afar and dives in for the kill.  10 Armor (in Worgen Form)

basic.name: Gilnean Cocktail
basic.shortTooltip: Damage the first enemy hit and deal heavy damage behind them
basic.fullTooltip: Hurl a flask that deals 55 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and explodes for 220 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone behind them.  Worgen: Razor Swipe Swipe forward, damaging enemies hit.

basic.name: Inner Beast
basic.shortTooltip: Gain a massive Attack Speed boost
basic.fullTooltip: Gain 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration, and reduce the cooldown of Inner Beast by 0.5 seconds.

basic.name: Darkflight
basic.shortTooltip: Leap at an enemy and shapeshift into a Worgen
basic.fullTooltip: Shapeshift into a Worgen and leap at an enemy dealing 88 (+4% per level) damage.  Worgen: Disengage Roll away and shapeshift into a Human.

heroic.name: Go for the Throat
heroic.shortTooltip: Eviscerate a Hero, refresh cooldown if they die
heroic.fullTooltip: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 (+4% per level) damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

heroic.name: Cursed Bullet
heroic.shortTooltip: Remove a portion of enemy's current Health
heroic.fullTooltip: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage.  Does not affect Vehicles.

trait.name: Curse of the Worgen
trait.shortTooltip: Able to shapeshift between a Human and a Worgen
trait.fullTooltip: Greymane can use certain Abilities to shapeshift between a Human and a Worgen.  While Human, Greymane's Basic Attacks are ranged.  While Worgen, Greymane gains 10 Armor, and his Basic Attacks become melee but deal 40% more damage.

level1.name: Wolfheart
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks lower Inner Beast cooldown
level1.fullTooltip: Increase the cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks during Inner Beast from 0.5 to 1 second.

level1.name: Perfect Aim
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's range and refunds Mana against Heroes
level1.fullTooltip: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's range by 30% and refunds 45 Mana if it hits an enemy Hero.

level1.name: Viciousness
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Inner Beast duration, Abilities refresh
level1.fullTooltip: Increases Inner Beast's duration to 4 seconds, and causes Ability damage to also refresh its duration.

level4.name: Thick Skin
level4.fullTooltip: Using Darkflight grants 50 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks while in Worgen Form, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

level4.name: Eyes in the Dark
level4.fullTooltip: Disengage grants Stealth for 3 seconds.

level4.name: Insatiable
level4.shortTooltip: Inner Beast causes Basic Attacks to restore Mana
level4.fullTooltip: Inner Beast causes Basic Attacks to restore 10 Mana.

level7.name: Quicksilver Bullets
level7.fullTooltip: Increases Greymane's Human Basic Attack range by 1.1.

level7.name: Incendiary Elixir
level7.fullTooltip: Quest: Every time Greymane hits an enemy Hero with the explosion damage from Gilnean Cocktail, increase its explosion damage by 15, up to 225.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, the cooldown is also reduced by 4 seconds.

level7.name: Wizened Duelist
level7.shortTooltip: Quest: Basic Attack Heroes to gain damage
level7.fullTooltip: Quest: Every 6 Human Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Basic Attack damage by 1%, up to 30%. Worgen Basic Attacks grant credit for 3 Basic Attacks. Half of this bonus is lost upon death.

level10.name: Go for the Throat
level10.shortTooltip: Eviscerate a Hero, refresh cooldown if they die
level10.fullTooltip: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 (+4% per level) damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

level10.name: Cursed Bullet
level10.shortTooltip: Remove a portion of enemy's current Health
level10.fullTooltip: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage.  Does not affect Vehicles.

level13.name: Running Wild
level13.fullTooltip: Increases Darkflight and Disengage's range by 35%.

level13.name: Unfettered Assault
level13.shortTooltip: Increases Razor Swipe range, reduces cooldown
level13.fullTooltip: Increases Razor Swipe's lunge distance by 60%, and Worgen Basic Attacks reduce Razor Swipe's cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

level13.name: On the Prowl
level13.fullTooltip: Inner Beast increases Movement Speed by 30% once it has been active for 3 seconds.

level16.name: Eager Wolf
level16.shortTooltip: Increases Inner Beast Attack Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Inner Beast by an additional 40% after it has been active for 4 seconds.

level16.name: Executioner
level16.shortTooltip: Attacking disabled Heroes increases damage
level16.fullTooltip: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

level16.name: Alpha Killer
level16.shortTooltip: Increases Worgen Basic Attacks against Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Worgen Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

level20.name: Unleashed
level20.shortTooltip: Go for the Throat gets more powerful free casts
level20.fullTooltip: If the free cast of Go for the Throat kills its target, another free cast is provided that deals 35% more damage, up to 140%.

level20.name: Gilnean Roulette
level20.fullTooltip: Cursed Bullet now hits all enemy heroes in its path and has its cooldown reduced by 5 seconds per hit.

level20.name: Hunter's Blunderbuss
level20.fullTooltip: Human Basic Attacks splash for 100% damage behind the target.

level20.name: Tooth and Claw
level20.fullTooltip: Worgen Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage.

basic.name: Razor Swipe
basic.shortTooltip: Swipe forward and damage enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Swipe in the targeted direction, dealing 126 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.  Human: Gilnean Cocktail Damage the first enemy hit and deal heavy damage behind them.

basic.name: Disengage
basic.shortTooltip: Roll away and transform into a Human
basic.fullTooltip: Roll away and shapeshift into a Human.  Human: Darkflight Leap at an enemy and shapeshift into a Worgen.

Guldan.name: Gul'dan
Guldan.description: A sustained damage Mage who uses his health as fuel but can steal life from his enemies.

basic.name: Fel Flame
basic.shortTooltip: Release a wave of flame that damages enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Release a wave of flame, dealing 200 (+4.5% per level) damage to enemies.

basic.name: Drain Life
basic.shortTooltip: Drain Health from an enemy, dealing damage and healing Gul'dan
basic.fullTooltip: Drain the life from an enemy over 3 seconds, dealing 132 (+4% per level) damage per second and healing Gul'dan for 188 (+4% per level) Health per second.

basic.name: Corruption
basic.shortTooltip: Deals damage over time to enemies in the area
basic.fullTooltip: Call forth three bursts of shadow energy, dealing 204 (+4.5% per level) damage over 6 seconds. Corruption can stack up to 3 times on an enemy.

heroic.name: Horrify
heroic.shortTooltip: Deals damage and Fears Heroes
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, deal 120 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for 2 seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and are forced to run away from Horrify's center.

heroic.name: Rain of Destruction
heroic.shortTooltip: Summon a rain of meteors in an area
heroic.fullTooltip: Channel to summon a rain of meteors in an area over 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 (+4% per level) damage in a small area.

trait.name: Life Tap
trait.shortTooltip: Restore Mana at the cost of Health
trait.fullTooltip: Gul'dan does not regenerate Mana.  Activate to restore 25% mana.

level1.name: Pursuit of Flame
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Hit 40 Heroes to increase area
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame.  Reward: Fel Flame's radius is increased by 10%.

level1.name: Chaotic Energy
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Gather Regen Globes to reduce Mana costs
level1.fullTooltip: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25% and the healing provided by Regen Globes by 50%.  Quest: Gather 20 Regen Globes.  Reward: Basic Ability Mana costs are permanently reduced by 20.

level1.name: Echoed Corruption
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Hit 40 Heroes with Corruption to increase strikes
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Corruption.  Reward: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.

level4.name: Health Funnel
level4.fullTooltip: Drain Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster while it is channeling. If an enemy dies while under the effect of Drain Life, the cooldown is instantly refreshed.

level4.name: Improved Life Tap
level4.fullTooltip: Increase the Mana restored by Life Tap to 35%.

level4.name: Consume Soul
level4.shortTooltip: Instantly kill an enemy Minion to heal
level4.fullTooltip: Instantly kill an enemy Minion and heal for 365 (+4% per level) Health.  Stores up to 2 charges.

level7.name: Bound by Shadow
level7.shortTooltip: Fel Flame hits reduce the cooldown of Corruption
level7.fullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by 1 second.

level7.name: Curse of Exhaustion
level7.fullTooltip: Drain Life deals 50% more damage and Slows the target's Movement Speed by 25% if they are afflicted by Corruption.

level7.name: Hunger for Power
level7.shortTooltip: Gain Spell Power but reduce healing received
level7.fullTooltip: Increases Spell Power by 15% but reduces healing received from allies by 25%.

level10.name: Horrify
level10.shortTooltip: Deals damage and Fears Heroes
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, deal 120 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for 2 seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and are forced to run away from Horrify's center.

level10.name: Rain of Destruction
level10.shortTooltip: Summon a rain of meteors in an area
level10.fullTooltip: Channel to summon a rain of meteors in an area over 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 (+4% per level) damage in a small area.

level13.name: Fel Armor
level13.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants 40 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40%.

level13.name: Harvest Life
level13.fullTooltip: Drain Life heals for 50% more Health when used on Heroes.

level13.name: Dark Bargain
level13.fullTooltip: Gul'dan's maximum Health is permanently increased by 25% but his respawn time is increased by 15 seconds.

level13.name: Healthstone
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to heal for 25% of Gul'dan's maximum Health.

level16.name: Rampant Hellfire
level16.shortTooltip: Increases Fel Flame's damage
level16.fullTooltip: Fel Flame's damage is increased by 10% for 5 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero. This can stack up to 5 times.

level16.name: Ruinous Affliction
level16.shortTooltip: Corruption deals bonus damage
level16.fullTooltip: Corruption deals an additional 78 (+4% per level) damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals 233 (+4% per level) damage.

level16.name: Darkness Within
level16.shortTooltip: Life Tap to gain Damage
level16.fullTooltip: After using Life Tap, the damage and healing of Gul'dan's next Ability is increased by 25%.

level20.name: Haunt
level20.shortTooltip: Increases Horrify duration, lower enemies' Armor
level20.fullTooltip: Increases the duration of Horrify by 1 second, and while Feared, enemies lose 20 Armor, causing them to take 20% increased damage.

level20.name: Deep Impact
level20.shortTooltip: Rain of Destruction slows enemy Movement Speed
level20.fullTooltip: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.

level20.name: Demonic Circle
level20.shortTooltip: Summon a Demonic Circle that Gul'dan can teleport to
level20.fullTooltip: Summon a Demonic Circle at Gul'dan's location. Activate to teleport Gul'dan to the Demonic Circle.

Hanzo.name: Hanzo
Hanzo.description: A ranged Assassin who specializes in scouting and taking out enemies from a distance.

basic.name: Storm Bow
basic.shortTooltip: Charge up to fire a deadly arrow
basic.fullTooltip: Activate to charge an arrow that deals 291 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit. Storm Bow's range increases the longer it is Channeled.

basic.name: Scatter Arrow
basic.shortTooltip: Fire an arrow that ricochets and splits
basic.fullTooltip: Fire an arrow that deals 88 (+4% per level) to the first enemy Hero hit. Scatter Arrow can collide with terrain and Structures, splitting into 5 arrows that travel extra distance, ricochet up to 4 additional times, and deal 88 (+4% per level) damage each to the first enemy hit.

basic.name: Sonic Arrow
basic.shortTooltip: Reveal a large area
basic.fullTooltip: Fire an arrow that grants vision in a large area for 5 seconds. Enemies inside are revealed for 1 second. If Sonic Arrow lands directly on an enemy, it deals 165 (+4% per level) damage to them and follows them as they move.

heroic.name: Dragonstrike
heroic.shortTooltip: Summon a pair of Spirit Dragons to damage enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1.5 seconds, summon a pair of Spirit Dragons which travel forward, dealing 70 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemy Heroes in its area.  Enemies in the center take 50% increased damage.

heroic.name: Dragon's Arrow
heroic.shortTooltip: Fire a global arrow that Stuns, damages
heroic.fullTooltip: Fire a missile that travels across the battleground. Explodes upon hitting an enemy Hero, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to 260 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 1.25 seconds.  After traveling a long distance, the damage is increased to 390 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 2 seconds.

trait.name: Natural Agility
trait.shortTooltip: Jump over terrain
trait.fullTooltip: Jump over unpathable terrain or Structures, up to a maximum range.

level1.name: Target Practice
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Hit all enemy Heroes to empower Storm Bow
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit every enemy Hero with Storm Bow.  Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero once with Storm Bow, its range is increased by 30%.  Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero 3 times with Storm Bow, its damage is increased by 100.

level1.name: Simple Geometry
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Gain additional Scatter Arrows
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit a Hero with multiple arrows from the same Scatter Arrow cast 20 times. Each arrow hit after the second grants additional progress.  Reward: Upon hitting terrain for the first time, Scatter Arrow creates 2 additional arrows.

level1.name: Redemption
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes to gain Attack Speed
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Every 2 Basic Attacks against the same Hero within 10 seconds grants 1 Redemption, stacking up to 12. Dying decreases Redemption by 3, and Redemption can be lost even at maximum stacks.  Reward: At 12 Redemption, gain 50% Attack Speed.

level4.name: Explosive Arrows
level4.shortTooltip: Storm Bow arrows explode on Minions, Monsters
level4.fullTooltip: Upon hitting a Minion or Monster, Storm Bow deals 75% of its damage to enemies around its target.

level4.name: Serrated Arrows
level4.shortTooltip: Scatter Arrow deals more damage to non-Heroes
level4.fullTooltip: Scatter Arrow deals 100% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

level4.name: Ignore All Distractions
level4.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks instantly kill Minions, increase range
level4.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks instantly kill Minions and increase Hanzo's Basic Attack range by 2 for 3 seconds.

level7.name: The Dragon Hungers
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 5% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 20%.

level7.name: Never Outmatched
level7.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Scatter Arrow cooldown
level7.fullTooltip: Reduce Scatter Arrow's Mana cost from 40 to 20. Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Scatter Arrow by 2.5 seconds.

level7.name: Sharpened Arrowheads
level7.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks, Storm Bow reduce Armor
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow or Basic Attacks reduces their Armor by 2 for 3 seconds, up to a maximum reduction of 20 Armor.

level10.name: Dragonstrike
level10.shortTooltip: Summon a pair of Spirit Dragons to damage enemies
level10.fullTooltip: After 1.5 seconds, summon a pair of Spirit Dragons which travel forward, dealing 70 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemy Heroes in its area.  Enemies in the center take 50% increased damage.

level10.name: Dragon's Arrow
level10.shortTooltip: Fire a global arrow that Stuns, damages
level10.fullTooltip: Fire a missile that travels across the battleground. Explodes upon hitting an enemy Hero, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to 260 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 1.25 seconds.  After traveling a long distance, the damage is increased to 390 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 2 seconds.

level13.name: Fleet of Foot
level13.fullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 10% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 30%.

level13.name: Ninja Assassin
level13.shortTooltip: Storm Bow lowers Natural Agility cooldown
level13.fullTooltip: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow lowers Natural Agility's cooldown by 10 seconds. Additionally, Hero Takedowns reset Natural Agility's cooldown.

level13.name: Mounted Archery
level13.shortTooltip: Increase Mount Speed, Natural Agility mounts
level13.fullTooltip: Upon mounting, gain 20% additional Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Using Natural Agility instantly mounts.

level16.name: Flawless Technique
level16.shortTooltip: Storm Bow, Basic Attacks empower each other
level16.fullTooltip: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow increases the damage of Hanzo's next Basic Attack within 5 seconds by 25%. Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the damage of Hanzo's next Storm Bow within 5 seconds by 25%.

level16.name: Piercing Arrows
level16.shortTooltip: Storm Bow, Scatter Arrow pierce
level16.fullTooltip: Storm Bow and Scatter Arrow pierce, hitting an additional enemy. Additionally, Scatter Arrow can pierce through 1 enemy each time it ricochets.

level16.name: Giant Slayer
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks, Scatter Arrow deal bonus damage
level16.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Scatter Arrow and Basic Attacks take a bonus 1.5% of their maximum Health as damage.

level20.name: The Dragon Awakens
level20.shortTooltip: Abilities and Attacks reduce Dragonstrike cooldown
level20.fullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow, Scatter Arrow, or Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Dragonstrike by 5 seconds.

level20.name: Play of the Game
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to teleport to Dragon's Arrow
level20.fullTooltip: While in flight or for up to 2 seconds after impacting a target, Dragon's Arrow can be reactivated to teleport to its location and jump backwards. If used after impact, Hanzo shoots arrows that deal 132 (+4% per level) damage to each target hit by the impact.  Hanzo is Unstoppable during Play of the Game.

level20.name: Bullseye
level20.fullTooltip: Increase Sonic Arrow's speed and center radius by 100%. Additionally, Heroes hit by Sonic Arrow's center are Stunned for 1 second.

level20.name: Perfect Agility
level20.shortTooltip: Gain Natural Agility charge, cooldown reduced
level20.fullTooltip: Natural Agility gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

Illidan.name: Illidan
Illidan.description: A mobile, sustained damage Assassin who pairs well with Heroes that can enable him.

basic.name: Dive
basic.shortTooltip: Dive and flip over an enemy
basic.fullTooltip: Dive at the target, dealing 66 (+4% per level) damage and flipping to the other side of the target.

basic.name: Sweeping Strike
basic.shortTooltip: Dash and damage enemies while gaining Basic Attack damage
basic.fullTooltip: Dash towards target point, dealing 119 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. Hitting an enemy increases Illidan's Basic Attack damage by 35% for 3 seconds.

basic.name: Evasion
basic.shortTooltip: Evade enemy Basic Attacks
basic.fullTooltip: Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2.5 seconds.

heroic.name: Metamorphosis
heroic.shortTooltip: Damage area and increase max Health
heroic.fullTooltip: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 200 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for 18 seconds.

heroic.name: The Hunt
heroic.shortTooltip: Charge a target from a very long range
heroic.fullTooltip: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 (+4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

trait.name: Betrayer's Thirst
trait.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks heal for part of the damage dealt and reduce Ability cooldowns
trait.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks heal for 30% of damage dealt and reduce Ability cooldowns by 1 second.

level1.name: Immolation
level1.shortTooltip: Sweeping Strike deals area damage
level1.fullTooltip: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for 22 (+4% per level) damage a second for 4 seconds.

level1.name: Battered Assault
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Sweeping Strike damage bonus
level1.fullTooltip: Increase Sweeping Strike's Basic Attack damage bonus duration from 3 to 5 seconds. If Sweeping Strike hits 2 Heroes its damage bonus is increased from 35% to 125%.

level1.name: Unending Hatred
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Killing enemies grants Basic Attack damage
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Minion kills grant 0.2 Basic Attack Damage. Hero Takedowns grant 1 Basic Attack Damage.  Reward: After gaining 20 increased Basic Attack Damage, receive an additional 20 Basic Attack Damage.

level4.name: Rapid Chase
level4.fullTooltip: Dive grants 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

level4.name: Friend or Foe
level4.shortTooltip: Increases Dive range and can Dive to allies
level4.fullTooltip: Increases the range of Dive by 20% and allows it to be used to dive to allied Heroes.

level4.name: Unbound
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Sweeping Strike can go over terrain
level4.fullTooltip: Sweeping Strike can go over walls and terrain.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes with Sweeping Strike, gain a second charge.

level7.name: Reflexive Block
level7.fullTooltip: Using Dive grants 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

level7.name: Thirsting Blade
level7.fullTooltip: Betrayer's Thirst's healing from Basic Attacks is increased from 30% to 50% while Sweeping Strike's damage bonus is active.

level7.name: Hunter's Onslaught
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Abilities heal for 25% of the damage they deal. This bonus is doubled versus Heroes.

level10.name: Metamorphosis
level10.shortTooltip: Damage area and increase max Health
level10.fullTooltip: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 200 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for 18 seconds.

level10.name: The Hunt
level10.shortTooltip: Charge a target from a very long range
level10.fullTooltip: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 (+4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

level13.name: Nimble Defender
level13.fullTooltip: If Sweeping Strike hits an enemy Hero, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

level13.name: Elusive Strike
level13.fullTooltip: Sweeping Strike reduces the cooldown of Evasion by 3 seconds every time it damages an enemy Hero.

level13.name: Sixth Sense
level13.fullTooltip: While active, Evasion grants Illidan 75 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell Damage, reducing their damage by 75%.

level16.name: Marked for Death
level16.shortTooltip: Repeated Dives deal extra damage
level16.fullTooltip: Dive deals an extra 180 (+4% per level) damage if used consecutively on a target within 10 seconds.

level16.name: Fiery Brand
level16.shortTooltip: Consecutive Basic Attacks to Heroes are empowered
level16.fullTooltip: Every 4th attack against the same Hero deals an additional 6% of their maximum Health as damage.

level16.name: Blades of Azzinoth
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage
level16.fullTooltip: Hitting 5 Heroes with Sweeping Strike allows Blades of Azzinoth to be activated, increasing Basic Attack damage by 75% for 8 seconds.

level20.name: Demonic Form
level20.shortTooltip: Demon form lasts forever, grants Attack Speed
level20.fullTooltip: Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Metamorphosis also increases Attack Speed by 20% and reduces the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows by 50%. Illidan can now mount in Demonic Form.

level20.name: Nowhere to Hide
level20.shortTooltip: Increases The Hunt range and reveal low Health Heroes
level20.fullTooltip: The Hunt gains unlimited range. Illidan passively reveals enemy Heroes below 25% Health anywhere on the Battleground.

level20.name: Nexus Blades
level20.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow
level20.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

level20.name: Bolt of the Storm
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to teleport a short distance
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

Jaina.name: Jaina
Jaina.description: A frost Mage that can slow the entire enemy team.

basic.name: Frostbolt
basic.shortTooltip: Shoot a bolt that deals damage and Chills the target
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 190 (+4% per level) damage and Chill the target.

basic.name: Blizzard
basic.shortTooltip: Creates a storm of ice at target location, damaging and slowing enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Bombard an area with 3 waves of ice, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage each. Damaged enemies are Chilled.

basic.name: Cone of Cold
basic.shortTooltip: Deal damage in a cone and Chill targets
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 230 (+4% per level) damage and Chill targets.

heroic.name: Ring of Frost
heroic.shortTooltip: Create a ring that damages and Roots enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

heroic.name: Summon Water Elemental
heroic.shortTooltip: Summon a Water Elemental that Chills enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal 62 (+4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.

trait.name: Frostbite
trait.shortTooltip: Jaina's Abilities Chill targets, slowing them and causing them to take more damage
trait.fullTooltip: Jaina's Abilities Chill targets, Slowing them by 25% and amplifying damage taken from her Abilities by 50%. Lasts 4 seconds.  Quest: Deal 15,000 Ability damage to Chilled Heroes.  Reward: Unlock the Improved Ice Block Ability, allowing Jaina to become temporarily Invulnerable.

level1.name: Winter's Reach
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Frostbolt range
level1.fullTooltip: Increase the range of Frostbolt by 30%.

level1.name: Lingering Chill
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Chill duration
level1.fullTooltip: Increase the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.

level1.name: Fingers of Frost
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Regen Globes increase Mana Regeneration
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to increase Jaina's Mana regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2 per second.   Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, the damage bonus from Frostbite is increased by 10%.

level4.name: Frost Shards
level4.fullTooltip: Frostbolt will now pierce the first target to hit an additional target behind them.

level4.name: Arcane Intellect
level4.shortTooltip: Damage to Chilled targets returns Mana
level4.fullTooltip: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return 5 Mana and Abilities return 20.

level4.name: Frost Armor
level4.shortTooltip: Chill attackers and gain Physical Armor
level4.fullTooltip: Enemies that attack Jaina are Chilled. Additionally, every 10 seconds, Jaina gains 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

level7.name: Ice Lance
level7.shortTooltip: Reduce Frostbolt cooldown on Chilled targets
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting a Chilled target with Frostbolt reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds and restores 10 Mana.

level7.name: Ice Floes
level7.shortTooltip: Increase Cone of Cold area, reduce cooldown
level7.fullTooltip: Increase the width of Cone of Cold by 100% and cause each chilled Hero hit to reduce its cooldown by 2.5 seconds, up to a maximum of 5 seconds per use.

level7.name: Icefury Wand
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Chilled Heroes deal 75% more damage and lower the cooldown of Blizzard by 1 second.

level10.name: Ring of Frost
level10.shortTooltip: Create a ring that damages and Roots enemies
level10.fullTooltip: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

level10.name: Summon Water Elemental
level10.shortTooltip: Summon a Water Elemental that Chills enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal 62 (+4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.

level13.name: Storm Front
level13.fullTooltip: Increase cast range of Blizzard by 100%.

level13.name: Ice Barrier
level13.fullTooltip: Gain a Shield for 25% of Ability damage dealt to Chilled targets. The shield lasts 4 seconds.

level13.name: Icy Veins
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to make Jaina's Basic Abilities' cooldowns recharge 200% faster and reduce their Mana cost by 50% for 5 seconds.

level16.name: Snowstorm
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Blizzard radius
level16.fullTooltip: Increase the radius of Blizzard by 30%.

level16.name: Northern Exposure
level16.shortTooltip: Cone of Cold lowers Armor
level16.fullTooltip: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold have their Armor lowered by 25 for 2 seconds, increasing their damage taken by 25%.

level16.name: Numbing Blast
level16.shortTooltip: Cone of Cold Roots Chilled targets
level16.fullTooltip: Cone of Cold Roots Chilled targets for 1 second.

level20.name: Cold Snap
level20.shortTooltip: Ring of Frost center deals damage, Roots
level20.fullTooltip: The center area of Ring of Frost deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies after the outer ring expires. Each enemy Hero hit reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.

level20.name: Wintermute
level20.shortTooltip: Increase cast range and mimics Basic Abilities
level20.fullTooltip: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic Jaina's Basic Abilities for 50% damage.

level20.name: Ice Blink
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to teleport and Chill nearby enemies
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to teleport a short distance and Chill all nearby enemies.

level20.name: Deep Chill
level20.fullTooltip: Frostbite's Chill can now stack a second time, slowing targets up to 40%.

Johanna.name: Johanna
Johanna.description: A Tank who shines against Physical Attackers and can effectively clear groups of minions.

basic.name: Punish
basic.shortTooltip: Damage and slow enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Step forward dealing 113 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 60% decaying over 2 seconds.

basic.name: Condemn
basic.shortTooltip: Pulls and damages nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, Johanna pulls nearby enemies toward her, stunning them for 0.25 seconds and dealing 55 (+4% per level) damage. Deals 200% increased damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

basic.name: Shield Glare
basic.shortTooltip: Damages and blinds enemies in a cone
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and Blind them for 1.5 seconds.

heroic.name: Falling Sword
heroic.shortTooltip: Jump to area, damaging and Slowing enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Johanna leaps towards an area.  While in the air, she can steer the landing location by moving.   After 2 seconds Johanna lands, dealing 183 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, Stunning them for 0.2 seconds, and Slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

heroic.name: Blessed Shield
heroic.shortTooltip: Throw a bouncing shield that Stuns
heroic.fullTooltip: Deal 114 (+4% per level) damage and Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

trait.name: Iron Skin
trait.shortTooltip: Becomes Unstoppable and gains a Shield
trait.fullTooltip: Activate to grant Johanna a Shield that absorbs 674 (+4% per level) damage for 4 seconds. While this Shield is active, Johanna is Unstoppable.

level1.name: Reinforce
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Abilities grant Physical Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Using a Basic Ability grants 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

level1.name: Hold Your Ground
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Iron Skin Shield, reduced cooldown
level1.fullTooltip: Increases Iron Skin's Shield by 30% and its cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

level1.name: Laws of Hope
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Health Regen, activate to burst heal
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to heal 30% of Johanna's max Health over 4 seconds.  Passive: Regenerate 1.5 (+4% per level) Health per second.

level4.name: Eternal Retaliation
level4.fullTooltip: Lower the cooldown of Condemn by 0.5 seconds and refund 2.5 Mana for every enemy hit. Maximum of 10 targets.

level4.name: Conviction
level4.fullTooltip: Movement Speed is increased by 25% while Condemn is charging up.

level4.name: Sins Exposed
level4.shortTooltip: Shield Glare makes enemies take bonus damage
level4.fullTooltip: Shield Glare marks enemies for 4 seconds. The next time any ally damages them, they take 90 (+4% per level) extra damage and the mark is removed.

level7.name: Subdue
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting 2 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish increases the Slow to 80% and the Slow amount does not decay.  Quest: Hit 4 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish.  Reward: Punish always Slows by 80% and the Slow amount no longer decays.

level7.name: Zealous Glare
level7.fullTooltip: Increase the Blind duration of Shield Glare by 0.5 seconds. Johanna's Basic Attacks against Heroes with Shield Glare extend its duration by 1 second, up to a maximum of 3 seconds.

level7.name: Blessed Momentum
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Johanna's Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

level10.name: Falling Sword
level10.shortTooltip: Jump to area, damaging and Slowing enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Johanna leaps towards an area.  While in the air, she can steer the landing location by moving.   After 2 seconds Johanna lands, dealing 183 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, Stunning them for 0.2 seconds, and Slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

level10.name: Blessed Shield
level10.shortTooltip: Throw a bouncing shield that Stuns
level10.fullTooltip: Deal 114 (+4% per level) damage and Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

level13.name: Roar
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Punish's damage by 25%. This bonus is increased to 150% whenever Punish hits 2 or more Heroes.

level13.name: Holy Fury
level13.fullTooltip: Deal 12 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Each Hero hit by Condemn increases this damage by 40% for 5 seconds.

level13.name: Blessed Hammer
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to create 2 hammers that spiral outward from Johanna, dealing 84 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.  Hitting Heroes with Shield Glare reduces the cooldown of this Ability by 8 seconds.

level16.name: Holy Renewal
level16.shortTooltip: Shield Glare heals for each Hero hit
level16.fullTooltip: Every enemy Hero affected by Shield Glare restores 114 (+4% per level) health.

level16.name: Fanaticism
level16.shortTooltip: Damage taken during Iron Skin grants Move Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Increase the duration of Iron Skin by 2 seconds. While Iron Skin is active, Johanna gains 8% Movement Speed each time she takes damage, up to 40%.

level16.name: Imposing Presence
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to slow enemy Basic Attacks and Move Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

level20.name: Heaven's Fury
level20.shortTooltip: Falling Sword bombards enemies with holy bolts
level20.fullTooltip: While in the air, holy bolts rain down on enemies dealing 75 (+4% per level) damage and reducing the cooldown of Falling Sword by 3 seconds for each enemy hit.

level20.name: Radiating Faith
level20.shortTooltip: Increase Blessed Shield Stun duration, max targets
level20.fullTooltip: Increases Blessed Shield's Stun duration by 33% and maximum enemies hit by 2.

level20.name: Indestructible
level20.shortTooltip: Gain a Shield instead of dying
level20.fullTooltip: Upon taking fatal damage, Johanna gains a Shield equal to her maximum Health for 4 seconds. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

level20.name: Blinded By The Light
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to grant nearby allied Heroes a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.  Hitting Heroes with Shield Glare reduces the cooldown of this Ability by 8 seconds.

Junkrat.name: Junkrat
Junkrat.description: A mobile Assassin that bombards the enemy from afar, and sows chaos with traps and mines.

basic.name: Frag Launcher
basic.shortTooltip: Launch a bouncing grenade
basic.fullTooltip: Launch a grenade that explodes at the end of its path or upon hitting an enemy, dealing 128 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Grenades can ricochet off of terrain. Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Stores up to 4 charges. Frag Launcher's cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.

basic.name: Concussion Mine
basic.shortTooltip: Place a mine that can be detonated
basic.fullTooltip: Place a mine on the ground. Junkrat's Trait can be activated to detonate the mine, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and knocking them back. Junkrat can also be affected by Concussion Mine, but takes no damage.  Limit 1 active mine.

basic.name: Steel Trap
basic.shortTooltip: Place a trap that Roots enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Place a trap on the ground that arms after 2 seconds. Deals 130 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy that walks over it and Roots them for 2 seconds.  Limit 1 active trap.

heroic.name: RIP-Tire
heroic.shortTooltip: Create a motorized bomb that explodes
heroic.fullTooltip: Create a motorized bomb with 530 (+4% per level) Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.  RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 475 (+4% per level), 625 (+4% per level), or 775 (+4% per level) damage to enemies depending on how close they are to the center of the blast (with the highest amount near the center).

heroic.name: Rocket Ride
heroic.shortTooltip: Launch into the air, damaging enemies upon landing
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.  After 3.75 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 750 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Altar and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.

trait.name: Total Mayhem
trait.shortTooltip: Drop grenades upon death
trait.fullTooltip: Upon dying, drop 5 grenades that explode after 0.75 seconds, each dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Deals 75% less damage to Structures.  Detonate Mine  Detonate an active Concussion Mine.

level1.name: Put Some English On It
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Frag Launcher distance
level1.fullTooltip: Increase Frag Launcher's travel distance by 50%, but does not increase its speed.

level1.name: Extra-Wound Timers
level1.shortTooltip: Frag Launcher grenades last longer
level1.fullTooltip: Frag Launcher grenades last an additional 2 seconds before automatically detonating.

level1.name: Bouncy Bouncy
level1.shortTooltip: Frag Launcher grenades gain damage after ricochet
level1.fullTooltip: Upon colliding with terrain for the first time, Frag Launcher grenades deal 20% more damage.

level4.name: Taste For Explosions
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Hitting a Hero with Frag Launcher increases its damage by 0.5, up to 100.

level4.name: Bonzer Hits
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Increase Concussion Mine Knockback, damage
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes 12 times with Concussion Mine.  Reward: Concussion Mine deals 40% more damage and knocks enemies back 30% farther.

level4.name: Gotta Trap 'Em All!
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit 7 Heroes with Steel Trap.  Reward: Reduce Steel Trap's cooldown by 3 seconds and increase the maximum number of active traps to 3.

level7.name: Tricky Shuffles
level7.shortTooltip: Gain Move Speed while Frag Launcher replenishing
level7.fullTooltip: While Frag Launcher has no charges left, gain 15% Movement Speed.

level7.name: Big As
level7.fullTooltip: Increase Steel Trap's radius and damage by 50%.

level7.name: Sticky Wicket
level7.shortTooltip: Steel Trap Slows, no longer Roots
level7.fullTooltip: Steel Trap no longer Roots enemies, and instead Slows them by 90% for 3.5 seconds.

level10.name: RIP-Tire
level10.shortTooltip: Create a motorized bomb that explodes
level10.fullTooltip: Create a motorized bomb with 530 (+4% per level) Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.  RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 475 (+4% per level), 625 (+4% per level), or 775 (+4% per level) damage to enemies depending on how close they are to the center of the blast (with the highest amount near the center).

level10.name: Rocket Ride
level10.shortTooltip: Launch into the air, damaging enemies upon landing
level10.fullTooltip: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.  After 3.75 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 750 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Altar and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.

level13.name: Ripper Air
level13.fullTooltip: Junkrat is knocked back 50% farther by Concussion Mine. Additionally, Concussion Mine's cooldown is reduced by 12 seconds if only Junkrat is hit.

level13.name: Bogged Down
level13.fullTooltip: Enemies launched by Concussion Mine are Slowed by 60% for 2 seconds upon landing.

level13.name: Chattering Teeth
level13.fullTooltip: Steel Traps will slowly chase nearby enemy Heroes.

level16.name: Burst Fire
level16.shortTooltip: Frag Launcher burst fires
level16.fullTooltip: Frag Launcher fires all of its charges in a continuous burst, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, but it loses 1 maximum charge.

level16.name: Endless Nades
level16.shortTooltip: Hitting Heroes reduces Frag Launcher cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Frag Launcher reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

level16.name: Spread Volley
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to make Frag Launcher spread
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to make Frag Launcher fire 2 additional grenades in a spread. Works for up to 4 total charges, or until Frag Launcher runs out of charges.

level20.name: Extra Oomph
level20.fullTooltip: Increase RIP-Tire's knockback distance by 50%, and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.

level20.name: Puckish Scamp
level20.fullTooltip: Reduce Rocket Ride's cooldown by 70 seconds.

level20.name: Cannonball!
level20.shortTooltip: Bigger Basic Attack, Frag Launcher explosions
level20.fullTooltip: Increase the radius and explosion radius of grenades from Basic Attacks and Frag Launcher by 50%.

level20.name: BOOM POW
level20.shortTooltip: Hitting Heroes reduces Concussion Mine cooldown
level20.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.

Kaelthas.name: Kael'thas
Kaelthas.description: A fire Mage that punishes enemies that stay close together.

basic.name: Flamestrike
basic.shortTooltip: Deal damage in an area
basic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, deal 345 (+4% per level) damage in an area.   Verdant Spheres increases the radius by 50%.

basic.name: Living Bomb
basic.shortTooltip: Damage an enemy over time, eventually exploding in an area around them
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 126 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds to an enemy, then they explode dealing 215 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.  Other Heroes damaged by this explosion are also affected by Living Bomb, though the secondary explosions cannot spread.  Verdant Spheres makes this Ability cost no Mana and have no cooldown.

basic.name: Gravity Lapse
basic.shortTooltip: Stun an enemy
basic.fullTooltip: Stun the first enemy hit for 1 second.   Verdant Spheres causes Gravity Lapse to stun the first 3 enemies hit and increases the stun duration by 50%.

heroic.name: Phoenix
heroic.shortTooltip: Summon a Phoenix to burn enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 (+4% per level) damage and splashing for 39 (+4% per level) damage.

heroic.name: Pyroblast
heroic.shortTooltip: Blast an enemy with a big fireball
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+5% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+5% per level) damage to enemies nearby.

trait.name: Verdant Spheres
trait.shortTooltip: Make Kael'thas's next Basic Ability more powerful
trait.fullTooltip: Activate to make Kael'thas's next Basic Ability more powerful.

level1.name: Convection
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Flamestrike hits increase damage
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Damaging an enemy Hero with Flamestrike increase its damage by 5, up to 100. This bonus is lost on death.  Reward: After hitting 20 enemy Heroes, increase Flamestrike damage by an additional 100 and no longer lose any bonuses on death.

level1.name: Fel Infusion
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Spell Power, Verdant Spheres heals
level1.fullTooltip: Increases Kael'thas's Spell Power by 4%. Kael'thas heals for 94 (+4% per level) Health when activating Verdant Spheres.

level1.name: Mana Addict
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Regen Globes grant Arcane Barrier
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Kael'thas's maximum Mana by 15.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Kael'thas can activate Arcane Barrier to gain a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Mana for 4 seconds. 45 second cooldown.

level4.name: Nether Wind
level4.shortTooltip: Increases Gravity Lapse range and restores Mana
level4.fullTooltip: Increases Gravity Lapse's range by 30%. When Gravity Lapse hits an enemy Hero, refund 80 Mana.

level4.name: Energy Roil
level4.shortTooltip: Reduce Gravity Lapse cooldown on Heroes
level4.fullTooltip: Reduce the Mana cost of Gravity Lapse by 70.  If Gravity Lapse hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by 9 seconds.

level4.name: Mana Tap
level4.fullTooltip: Activating Verdant Spheres restores 4% of Kael'thas's maximum Mana.

level7.name: Burned Flesh
level7.fullTooltip: When Flamestrike damages 2 or more Heroes, they take additional damage equal to 8% of their maximum Health.

level7.name: Sun King's Fury
level7.shortTooltip: Living Bomb deals more damage after spreading
level7.fullTooltip: Living Bombs that spread to enemy Heroes deal 35% more damage.

level7.name: Sunfire Enchantment
level7.fullTooltip: Activating Verdant Spheres causes Kael'thas's next 2 Basic Attacks to instead deal 115 (+4% per level) Spell Damage.  If both of these Attacks hit enemy Heroes, gain 15% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

level10.name: Phoenix
level10.shortTooltip: Summon a Phoenix to burn enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 (+4% per level) damage and splashing for 39 (+4% per level) damage.

level10.name: Pyroblast
level10.shortTooltip: Blast an enemy with a big fireball
level10.fullTooltip: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+5% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+5% per level) damage to enemies nearby.

level13.name: Pyromaniac
level13.shortTooltip: Living Bomb reduces Basic Ability cooldowns
level13.fullTooltip: Each time Living Bomb deals periodic damage, Kael'thas's Basic Ability cooldowns are reduced by 0.5 seconds.

level13.name: Backdraft
level13.fullTooltip: Living Bomb's explosion slows enemy Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

level13.name: Fission Bomb
level13.fullTooltip: Increases Living Bomb's explosion radius by 20%.

level16.name: Fury of the Sunwell
level16.shortTooltip: Flamestrike explodes twice
level16.fullTooltip: Flamestrike will explode a second time 1.5 seconds later.

level16.name: Ignite
level16.shortTooltip: Flamestrike applies Living Bomb
level16.fullTooltip: Flamestrikes apply Living Bomb to the enemy Hero closest to its center who is not currently affected by Living Bomb.

level16.name: Twin Spheres
level16.shortTooltip: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge
level16.fullTooltip: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge.

level20.name: Rebirth
level20.shortTooltip: Increases Phoenix duration and may retarget
level20.fullTooltip: Increases Phoenix duration by 100%. While alive, the Phoenix may be ordered to move to a different location.

level20.name: Presence Of Mind
level20.fullTooltip: Increases Pyroblast's explosion radius by 50%. Heroes that are hit by Flamestrike or have Living Bomb spread to them reduce the cooldown of Pyroblast by 10 seconds.

level20.name: Master of Flames
level20.fullTooltip: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb.

level20.name: Flamethrower
level20.fullTooltip: Increases the cast range of Flamestrike by 40%. If Flamestrike hits 2 or more Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

KelThuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad
KelThuzad.description: A burst damage Mage that locks down enemies and devastates them with powerful combos.

basic.name: Death and Decay
basic.shortTooltip: Damage enemies and create a damaging pool
basic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, launch an orb that explodes upon hitting an enemy, dealing 150 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. The explosion leaves behind a pool of decay that lasts 2 seconds, dealing 82 (+2.5% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies.

basic.name: Frost Nova
basic.shortTooltip: Damage and disable enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Create a nova that explodes after 1 second, dealing 180 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies inside and Slowing them by 35% for 2.5 seconds. Enemies in the center are Rooted for 1 second.

basic.name: Chains of Kel'Thuzad
basic.shortTooltip: Pull enemy Heroes together
basic.fullTooltip: Launch a chain, dealing 97 (+2.5% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit. For 3 seconds after hitting an enemy, Chains can be reactivated to launch to an additional enemy, pulling both enemies together and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.

heroic.name: Frost Blast
heroic.shortTooltip: Root and damage enemies around a target
heroic.fullTooltip: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 115 (+2.5% per level) damage to its target and 275 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for 1.75 seconds.

heroic.name: Shadow Fissure
heroic.shortTooltip: Deal high damage in an area
heroic.fullTooltip: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 360 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in its area.

trait.name: Master of the Cold Dark
trait.shortTooltip: Kel'Thuzad becomes increasingly stronger as he disrupts enemies
trait.fullTooltip: Quest: Gain 1 Blight every time a Hero is Rooted by Frost Nova or hit by Chains of Kel'Thuzad.  Reward: After gaining 15 Blight, gain the Glacial Spike Ability.  Reward: After gaining 30 Blight, gain 75% Spell Power.  Blight: 0/30

level1.name: The Plaguelands
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Death and Decay duration, radius
level1.fullTooltip: Increase Death and Decay's duration by 1 second. After gaining 30 Blight, increase the radius of Death and Decay's pool by 30%.

level1.name: Blighted Frost
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Frost Nova center damage, duration
level1.fullTooltip: Frost Nova deals 75% more damage to enemies in the center. After gaining 30 Blight, increase Frost Nova's Root duration by 0.5 seconds.

level1.name: Barbed Chains
level1.shortTooltip: Chains deals more damage, reduces Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Increase Chains of Kel'Thuzad damage by 125%. After gaining 30 Blight, Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces the Armor of pulled Heroes by 10 for 4 seconds.

level4.name: Strip Shields
level4.fullTooltip: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad grants Kel'Thuzad a permanent 128 (+4% per level) Shield, stacking up to 2 times.  Additionally, Chains of Kel'Thuzad deals up to 270 (+2.5% per level) bonus damage to Heroes' Shields.

level4.name: Phylactery of Kel'Thuzad
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Collect Regen Globes for instant respawn
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Collect 12 Regeneration Globes to charge Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery.  Reward: Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery can be activated while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms, but must be charged again.  Passive: Kel'Thuzad heals for 10% of all Spell Damage dealt while the Phylactery is charged.

level4.name: Armor of the Archlich
level4.shortTooltip: Activate to gain Physical Armor, Slow enemies
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 50 Physical Armor for 4 seconds. Upon activation, nearby enemies take 45 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 35% for 4 seconds.

level7.name: Accelerated Decay
level7.fullTooltip: Each time a Hero is hit by Death and Decay's pool, they take 20% more periodic damage from Death and Decay for the next 4 seconds, stacking up to 6 times.

level7.name: Chilling Touch
level7.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks periodically deal area Spell damage
level7.fullTooltip: Every 8 seconds, Kel'Thuzad's next Basic Attack hits all enemies in the area for 100%  additional damage, deals Spell damage instead of Physical, and Slows by 30% for 2 seconds.

level7.name: Ice Cold
level7.fullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Glacial Spike by 5 seconds and increase its damage by 300%.

level10.name: Frost Blast
level10.shortTooltip: Root and damage enemies around a target
level10.fullTooltip: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 115 (+2.5% per level) damage to its target and 275 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for 1.75 seconds.

level10.name: Shadow Fissure
level10.shortTooltip: Deal high damage in an area
level10.fullTooltip: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 360 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in its area.

level13.name: Icy Grasp
level13.shortTooltip: Increase Frost Nova Slow amount, duration
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Frost Nova's Slow by 15%. Each time Kel'thuzad damages enemies Slowed by Frost Nova, its Slow duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.

level13.name: Chains of Ice
level13.fullTooltip: After Chains of Kel'Thuzad's Stun expires, the enemy is also Slowed by 60% for 1 second.

level13.name: Chain-Link
level13.fullTooltip: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds and refunds its Mana cost.

level16.name: Arcane Echoes
level16.shortTooltip: Reduce Death and Decay cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Whenever Kel'Thuzad hits an enemy Hero with Death and Decay's explosion, its cooldown is reduced by 1.5 seconds.

level16.name: Hungering Cold
level16.shortTooltip: Deal bonus damage to Rooted enemies
level16.fullTooltip: Enemies that are Rooted take an additional 55 (+2.5% per level) damage each time they are damaged by Kel'Thuzad.

level16.name: Power of Icecrown
level16.shortTooltip: Disabling enemies grants Spell Power
level16.fullTooltip: Stunning, Rooting, or Slowing a Hero grants 6% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

level20.name: Deathchill
level20.shortTooltip: Frost Blast Slows, Takedowns release blasts
level20.fullTooltip: When Frost Blast's Root expires, enemies are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds. Heroes killed while under the effects of Frost Blast instantly release another Frost Blast explosion.

level20.name: Might of the Scourge
level20.shortTooltip: Hitting Heroes resets Shadow Fissure cooldown
level20.fullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Shadow Fissure resets its cooldown.

level20.name: Shifting Malice
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to dash and deal damage
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to dash forward, dealing 150 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the path. Takedowns reset the cooldown of Shifting Malice.

level20.name: The Damned Return
level20.shortTooltip: Create Shades that mimic Death and Decay
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to create a Shade of Naxxramas that lasts 15 seconds and mimics Kel'Thuzad's casts of Death and Decay.

Kerrigan.name: Kerrigan
Kerrigan.description: A combo Assassin who goes all in, diving into the enemy team.

basic.name: Ravage
basic.shortTooltip: Leap to an enemy and deal damage
basic.fullTooltip: Leap to a target, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage. If the enemy dies within 1.5 seconds, restore 1 charge and refund 20 Mana.

basic.name: Impaling Blades
basic.shortTooltip: Stun and damage enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: After 1.25 seconds, deal 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area, stunning them for 1 second.

basic.name: Primal Grasp
basic.shortTooltip: Pull and damage enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Pulls enemies within the target area towards Kerrigan, dealing 25 (+4% per level) damage. After 2.5 seconds, an explosion occurs around Kerrigan, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

heroic.name: Maelstrom
heroic.shortTooltip: Persistently damage nearby enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Deals 74 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

heroic.name: Summon Ultralisk
heroic.shortTooltip: Summon a commandable Ultralisk
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, summon an Ultralisk that rushes forward upon spawning, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.

trait.name: Assimilation
trait.shortTooltip: Gain a temporary Shield by attacking enemies
trait.fullTooltip: Gain 10% of damage dealt from Basic Attacks and Abilities as Shields for 6 seconds. Shield amount gained doubled against Heroes.  Current maximum: 1004 (+4% per level)

level1.name: Siphoning Impact
level1.shortTooltip: Ravage grants Assimilation Shields
level1.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants 90 (+4% per level) points of Assimilation Shields.

level1.name: Assimilation Mastery
level1.shortTooltip: Globes grant Shields, Assimilation increases regen
level1.fullTooltip: Regeneration Globe healing grants 40 (+4% per level) points of Assimilation Shields per second while active. While Assimilation is active, Kerrigan's Health and Mana regeneration is increased by 100%.

level1.name: Fury of the Swarm
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks grant more Shields, can splash
level1.fullTooltip: Gain 10% more Assimilation Shields from Basic Attacks. After casting Ravage, Kerrigan's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds splashes for 100% damage around the target.

level4.name: Sharpened Blades
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Minions and Heroes that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Ravage increase its damage up to a maximum of 50.  Minions grant 0.5 increased damage and Heroes grant 5 increased damage.  Reward: After reaching a 50 damage increase, Ravage gains 50 additional damage.

level4.name: Kinetic Fulmination
level4.shortTooltip: Damage dealt increases Impaling Blades damage
level4.fullTooltip: Damaging an enemy increases the damage of Kerrigan's next Impaling Blades within 10 seconds by 10%, up to 100%.

level4.name: Psionic Pulse
level4.fullTooltip: Primal Grasp explodes a second time 2.5 seconds after its first explosion.

level7.name: Queen of Blades
level7.fullTooltip: Damaging a Hero with Primal Grasp reduces Ravage's cooldown by 6 seconds.

level7.name: Boundless Fury
level7.shortTooltip: Ravage can grant a charge of Ravage
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants a charge of Ravage. Can only occur once every 10 seconds per Hero.

level7.name: Bladed Momentum
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Kerrigan's Basic Abilities by 0.6 seconds.

level10.name: Maelstrom
level10.shortTooltip: Persistently damage nearby enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Deals 74 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

level10.name: Summon Ultralisk
level10.shortTooltip: Summon a commandable Ultralisk
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, summon an Ultralisk that rushes forward upon spawning, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.

level13.name: Psionic Barrier
level13.fullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Primal Grasp grants 15 Spell Armor for 4 seconds.

level13.name: Volatile Power
level13.fullTooltip: Increase the amount of Assimilation Shields granted from damage dealt by 10%, but reduce duration of Assimilation by 3 seconds.

level13.name: Chrysalis
level13.shortTooltip: Activate to enter Stasis and heal
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to place Kerrigan in a Chrysalis with 550 (+4% per level) Health for 5 seconds. While inside, Kerrigan regenerates 5% of her maximum Health per second.  Enemies can destroy the Chrysalis to end its effects early.

level16.name: Mounting Potency
level16.shortTooltip: Ravage grants Spell Power
level16.fullTooltip: Ravage grants 5% Spell Power for 4 seconds, up to 40%.

level16.name: Painful Spikes
level16.shortTooltip: Impaling Blades grants bonus damage
level16.fullTooltip: Enemies hit by Impaling Blades take an additional 70 (+4% per level) damage the next 6 times Kerrigan damages them within 5 seconds.

level16.name: Unbridled Energy
level16.shortTooltip: Heroic Ability damage grants Spell Power
level16.fullTooltip: Damaging a Hero with a Heroic Ability grants 30% Spell Power for 4 seconds.

level20.name: Omegastorm
level20.fullTooltip: Maelstrom's duration is increased by 0.1875 seconds every time it damages a Hero.

level20.name: Torrasque
level20.shortTooltip: Ultralisk spawns a new Ultralisk on death
level20.fullTooltip: The Ultralisk morphs into an egg when it dies. If the egg isn't killed within 4 seconds, a new Ultralisk is born.

level20.name: Assimilation Blades
level20.fullTooltip: Damaging an enemy increases Basic Attack damage by 2% for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

level20.name: Psionic Shift
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to teleport a short distance, deal damage
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to teleport to a nearby location, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Generates 300% increased Assimilation Shields from the damage dealt.

Kharazim.name: Kharazim
Kharazim.description: A flexible Healer that pairs well with Melee allies who like to dive into the enemy team.

basic.name: Radiant Dash
basic.shortTooltip: Jump to an ally or enemy
basic.fullTooltip: Jump to an allied or enemy unit. Enemies are immediately hit with a Basic Attack.  Stores up to 2 charges.

basic.name: Breath of Heaven
basic.shortTooltip: Heal nearby ally Heroes and grant Movement Speed
basic.fullTooltip: Heal nearby Heroes for 276 (+4% per level) and give them 15% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

basic.name: Deadly Reach
basic.shortTooltip: Increases Attack Speed and Attack Range
basic.fullTooltip: Kharazim's next Basic Attack increases his Attack Speed and Attack Range by 100% for 2 seconds.

heroic.name: Seven-Sided Strike
heroic.shortTooltip: Become Invulnerable and strike nearby Heroes
heroic.fullTooltip: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 2 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.

heroic.name: Divine Palm
heroic.shortTooltip: Prevent an ally from death
heroic.fullTooltip: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 1084 (+4% per level) if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

trait.name: Pick Your Trait
trait.shortTooltip: Choose a Trait
trait.fullTooltip: Choose between Transcendence, Iron Fists, and Insight from the Talents panel.

level1.name: Transcendence
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks heal
level1.fullTooltip: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals the lowest nearby allied Hero for 104 (+4% per level) and gives 25% increased Move Speed for 2 seconds.

level1.name: Iron Fists
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal more damage
level1.fullTooltip: Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 110% bonus damage and gives 25% increased Move Speed for 2 seconds.

level1.name: Insight
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Basic Attacks restore Mana, lower cooldowns
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Every 3rd Basic Attack restores 14 (+4% per level) Mana, grants a stack of Insight, and gives 25% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.  Reward: Upon getting 100 stacks of Insight, every 3rd attack also reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 1.75 seconds.

level4.name: Spirit Ally
level4.shortTooltip: Place a Spirit Ally that heals in an area
level4.fullTooltip: Place a Spirit Ally that heals allied Heroes in a large area around it for 2% of their maximum Health every second. Has 150 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Spirit Allies.

level4.name: Earth Ally
level4.shortTooltip: Place an Earth Ally that grants Physical Armor
level4.fullTooltip: Place an Earth Ally that grants nearby allied Heroes 50 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing damage taken by 50%. Has 400 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds.  Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Earth Allies.

level4.name: Air Ally
level4.shortTooltip: Place an Air Ally that reveals an area
level4.fullTooltip: Place an Air Ally that grants vision and reveals a large area around it. Has 75 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 40 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Air Allies.  Stores up to 2 charges.

level7.name: Blinding Speed
level7.fullTooltip: Decreases Radiant Dash's cooldown by 2 seconds and increases the maximum number of charges by 1.

level7.name: Heavenly Zeal
level7.shortTooltip: Breath of Heaven increases allies Move Speed
level7.fullTooltip: Increases Breath of Heaven's Movement Speed bonus to 30%.

level7.name: Blazing Fists
level7.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Deadly Reach cooldown
level7.fullTooltip: Every 3rd Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Deadly Reach by 0.75 seconds.

level10.name: Divine Palm
level10.shortTooltip: Prevent an ally from death
level10.fullTooltip: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 1084 (+4% per level) if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

level10.name: Seven-Sided Strike
level10.shortTooltip: Become Invulnerable and strike nearby Heroes
level10.fullTooltip: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 2 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.

level13.name: Quicksilver
level13.fullTooltip: Radiant Dashing to an ally gives Kharazim and the target 30% bonus Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

level13.name: Fists of Fury
level13.fullTooltip: Increases Deadly Reach's duration by 100%.

level13.name: Spell Shield
level13.fullTooltip: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

level13.name: Sixth Sense
level13.shortTooltip: Gain Physical Armor while Stunned, Rooted
level13.fullTooltip: While Stunned or Rooted, gain 75 Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks for 4 seconds, reducing their damage by 75%.

level16.name: Cleansing Touch
level16.shortTooltip: Radiant Dash makes ally Unstoppable
level16.fullTooltip: Radiant Dashing to an ally makes them Unstoppable for 1 second.

level16.name: Way of the Hundred Fists
level16.shortTooltip: Radiant Dash launches a volley of blows
level16.fullTooltip: Radiant Dashing to an enemy launches a rapid volley of 6 Basic Attacks dealing 45% damage each.

level16.name: Echo of Heaven
level16.shortTooltip: Breath of Heaven heals a second time
level16.fullTooltip: Breath of Heaven heals 75% of its normal amount, but heals a second time 3 seconds later.

level16.name: Dash of Light
level16.shortTooltip: Radiant Dash increases Breath of Heaven healing
level16.fullTooltip: Radiant Dashing to an ally increases the healing they receive from Breath of Heaven by 75% for 3 seconds.

level20.name: Peaceful Repose
level20.shortTooltip: Reduces Divine Palm cooldown if they do not die
level20.fullTooltip: Divine Palm's cooldown is set to 5 seconds if the Hero does not die.

level20.name: Transgression
level20.fullTooltip: Seven-Sided Strike hits 4 additional times.

level20.name: Storm Shield
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to grant Shields to all nearby allies
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

level20.name: Epiphany
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to restore Mana and Radiant Dash charges
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to restore 33% of Kharazim's maximum Mana and refill 2 charges of Radiant Dash.

Leoric.name: Leoric
Leoric.description: A Bruiser that deals high damage against teams with many high Health Heroes.

basic.name: Skeletal Swing
basic.shortTooltip: Damage and slow enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Leoric swings his mace, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds. If an enemy Hero is hit, refund 50% of the cooldown and Mana cost. Peasants!

basic.name: Drain Hope
basic.shortTooltip: Drain Health from an enemy Hero while close to them
basic.fullTooltip: Grab an enemy Hero's soul, dealing up to 20% of their maximum Health as damage and healing Leoric for up to 20% of his maximum Health while he is nearby, over 4 seconds. Leoric's Movement Speed is reduced by 20% while this is active.

basic.name: Wraith Walk
basic.shortTooltip: Leoric's ghost separates from his body to move unhindered
basic.fullTooltip: Leoric separates from his body, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed accelerating up to 50% over 2.5 seconds. When Wraith Walk ends or is canceled, his body jumps to his wraith.

heroic.name: Entomb
