heroic.shortTooltip: Wall in an area
heroic.fullTooltip: Create an unpassable tomb for 4 seconds.

heroic.name: March of the Black King
heroic.shortTooltip: March forward, healing Leoric, damaging enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Leoric becomes Unstoppable and walks forward, swinging his mace 3 times. Enemies hit take 250 (+4% per level) damage, and Heroes hit heal Leoric for 12% of his maximum Health.

trait.name: Undying
trait.shortTooltip: Leoric haunts his enemies as a ghost while dead
trait.fullTooltip: Leoric becomes a ghost when he dies, and resurrects upon reaching full Health. Leoric deals no damage while dead.  Wrath Of The Bone King  Leoric's first two Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage, and his third Basic Attack deals 200% damage to a single target.

basic.name: Ghastly Swing
basic.fullTooltip: Slow enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

basic.name: Drain Essence
basic.fullTooltip: Throw out a chain, attaching to the first enemy Hero hit, healing Leoric for up to 10% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds as long as the enemy remains close.

level1.name: Consume Vitality
level1.shortTooltip: Skeletal Swing heals
level1.fullTooltip: Skeletal Swing's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit heal Leoric for 4% of his maximum Health.

level1.name: Fealty Unto Death
level1.shortTooltip: Gain Health and Mana when Minions die
level1.fullTooltip: When a nearby friendly or enemy Minion dies, Leoric restores 1% of his maximum Health and 5 Mana.

level1.name: Ossein Renewal
level1.shortTooltip: Activate to heal
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to heal Leoric for 30% of his maximum Health over 5 seconds. Regeneration Globes lower the cooldown of this Ability by 20 seconds.

level4.name: Ghastly Reach
level4.fullTooltip: Increase the range of Skeletal Swing by 25%.

level4.name: Paralyzing Rage
level4.fullTooltip: Increase the Slow of Skeletal Swing by 20%.

level4.name: Kneel, Peasants!
level4.shortTooltip: Increase Skeletal Swing damage to non-Heroes
level4.fullTooltip: Skeletal Swing deals 100% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

level7.name: Willing Vessel
level7.fullTooltip: Increase the healing from Drain Hope to 25% of Leoric's maximum Health. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, Leoric instantly heals for an additional 5% of his maximum Health.

level7.name: Drain Momentum
level7.fullTooltip: Drain Hope no longer reduces Leoric's Movement Speed. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, gain 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

level7.name: Hopelessness
level7.fullTooltip: Increase the range of Drain Hope by 25%.

level10.name: Entomb
level10.shortTooltip: Wall in an area
level10.fullTooltip: Create an unpassable tomb for 4 seconds.

level10.name: March of the Black King
level10.shortTooltip: March forward, healing Leoric, damaging enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Leoric becomes Unstoppable and walks forward, swinging his mace 3 times. Enemies hit take 250 (+4% per level) damage, and Heroes hit heal Leoric for 12% of his maximum Health.

level13.name: Unyielding Despair
level13.fullTooltip: Drain Hope's cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds for every 1 second it is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, its cooldown is reduced by an additional 2 seconds.

level13.name: Hardened Bones
level13.fullTooltip: Gain 20 Armor while Drain Hope is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, retain the Armor bonus for 3 seconds.

level13.name: Ominous Wraith
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Wraith Walk's duration by 100%. Enemy Heroes that come in contact with the wraith deal 50% less damage for 4 seconds.

level16.name: Crushing Hope
level16.shortTooltip: Full duration Drain Hope deals bonus damage
level16.fullTooltip: If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, it instantly deals an additional 15% of the target's maximum Health as damage. This damage does not heal Leoric.

level16.name: Royal Focus
level16.shortTooltip: Empower Skeletal Swing and Wraith Walk
level16.fullTooltip: Wraith Walk increases the damage of the next Skeletal Swing within 5 seconds by 50%. Each enemy Hero hit by this Skeletal Swing reduces the cooldown of Wraith Walk by 7 seconds.

level16.name: Mithril Mace
level16.shortTooltip: Quest: Empower Wrath Of The Bone King
level16.fullTooltip: Increase Leoric's Attack Speed by 20%.  Repeatable Quest: Nearby enemy Minion deaths grant 0.3% permanent Attack Speed, and Takedowns grant 3% permanent Attack Speed, up to 30%.

level20.name: Buried Alive
level20.fullTooltip: The duration of Entomb is lowered by 1 second, but enemies trapped inside are Silenced and take 50 (+4% per level) damage every 1 second.

level20.name: Death March
level20.shortTooltip: March of the Black King applies Drain Hope
level20.fullTooltip: The final swing of March of the Black King also applies Drain Hope to nearby enemy Heroes.

level20.name: Spectral Leech
level20.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal extra damage and heal
level20.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.5% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal Leoric for twice that amount.

level20.name: Burning Despair
level20.fullTooltip: Deal 40 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. The damage and area is increased by 100% while Drain Hope is active.

level20.name: Shroud of the Dead King
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to become Protected for 3 seconds, preventing all damage.

LiLi.name: Li Li
LiLi.description: A sustained Healer who works well against Physical attackers by Blinding them.

basic.name: Healing Brew
basic.shortTooltip: Heal a nearby ally
basic.fullTooltip: Heal lowest Health ally (prioritizing Heroes) within 6 range for 181 (+4% per level) Health.

basic.name: Cloud Serpent
basic.shortTooltip: Summon a serpent to assist an ally
basic.fullTooltip: Summon a Cloud Serpent on an allied Hero that attacks nearby enemies every second. Each attack deals 26 (+4% per level) damage and heals the ally for 20 (+4% per level). Lasts for 8 seconds.

basic.name: Blinding Wind
basic.shortTooltip: Blind and damage nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Throw a cloud of wind at the 2 nearest enemies (prioritizing Heroes), dealing 133 (+4% per level) damage. Affected targets are Blinded for 1.5 seconds, causing their Basic Attacks to miss and deal no damage.

heroic.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
heroic.shortTooltip: Rapidly heal nearby allies
heroic.fullTooltip: Channel for up to 6 seconds. Every 0.25 seconds, heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for 66 (+4% per level) Health and increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by 2 seconds, up to 50.

heroic.name: Water Dragon
heroic.shortTooltip: Damages and heavily slows nearest enemy Hero
heroic.fullTooltip: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 300 (+4% per level) damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

trait.name: Fast Feet
trait.shortTooltip: When struck by enemies, gain Movement Speed
trait.fullTooltip: Upon taking damage, your Basic Ability cooldowns refresh 50% faster and you gain 10% Movement Speed for 1 second.

level1.name: Free Drinks
level1.shortTooltip: Healing Brew cost reduced on low Health targets
level1.fullTooltip: Healing Brew's cooldown is reduced by 1 second and its Mana cost is refunded if it heals a Hero under 50% Health.

level1.name: Wind Serpent
level1.shortTooltip: Cloud Serpent launches Blinding Wind on cast
level1.fullTooltip: Casting Cloud Serpent also launches a Blinding Wind at the nearest enemy to the target (prioritizing Heroes).

level1.name: Eager Adventurer
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Fast Feet duration
level1.fullTooltip: Increase Fast Feet's duration by 100% and increase Mana regeneration by 100% while Fast Feet is active.

level4.name: Serpent Sidekick
level4.shortTooltip: Hitting Heroes increases Cloud Serpent duration
level4.fullTooltip: Cloud Serpent's duration is increased by 0.6 seconds every time it attacks a Hero.

level4.name: Hindering Winds
level4.fullTooltip: Blinding Wind Slows enemy Hero Movement Speed by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

level4.name: Safety Sprint
level4.shortTooltip: Activate Fast Feet for a burst of speed
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to gain Fast Feet for 3 seconds and increase its Movement Speed bonus to 30% while active.  Passive: Increase the movement speed bonus of Fast Feet to 15%.

level7.name: The Good Stuff
level7.shortTooltip: Healing Brew also heals over time
level7.fullTooltip: Healing Brew heals for an additional 42 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds. While Fast Feet is active, this heal amount is increased by 100%.

level7.name: Lightning Serpent
level7.shortTooltip: Cloud Serpent's attacks bounce to Heroes
level7.fullTooltip: Cloud Serpent attacks bounce to hit 2 additional Heroes for 13 (+4% per level) damage and 10 (+4% per level) healing.

level7.name: Let's Go!
level7.shortTooltip: Activate to heal ally, make them Unstoppable
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 140 (+4% per level) and make them Unstoppable for 1 second. Let's Go's cooldown is affected by Fast Feet.  Cannot be used on Li Li.

level10.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
level10.shortTooltip: Rapidly heal nearby allies
level10.fullTooltip: Channel for up to 6 seconds. Every 0.25 seconds, heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for 66 (+4% per level) Health and increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by 2 seconds, up to 50.

level10.name: Water Dragon
level10.shortTooltip: Damages and heavily slows nearest enemy Hero
level10.fullTooltip: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 300 (+4% per level) damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

level13.name: Gale Force
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Blinding Wind's duration by 0.75 seconds. Li Li's Basic Attacks against Blinded Heroes deal 75% increased damage.

level13.name: Surging Winds
level13.shortTooltip: Gain Spell Power from Blinding Wind
level13.fullTooltip: If Blinding Wind hits 2 Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds and Li Li gains 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

level13.name: Mass Vortex
level13.fullTooltip: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blinding Wind from 2 to 3. Blinding Wind deals 75% additional damage if all 3 enemies hit are Heroes.

level16.name: Two For One
level16.shortTooltip: Healing Brew heals twice but longer cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Increases the number of allies healed by Healing Brew to 2, but increases the cooldown by 1 second.

level16.name: Pick Me Up
level16.shortTooltip: Healing Brew heals more on low Health targets
level16.fullTooltip: Healing Brew's healing for Heroes is increased by 33% if they are under 50% Health.

level16.name: Blessings Of Yulon
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Cloud Serpent healing
level16.fullTooltip: Cloud Serpent heals its bearer for 1.25% of their maximum Health each time it attacks.

level20.name: Jug of 1,000,000 Cups
level20.shortTooltip: Jug of 1,000 cups heals two allies at once
level20.fullTooltip: Jug of 1,000 Cups heals two allies at a time.

level20.name: Double Dragon
level20.fullTooltip: After hitting a target with Water Dragon, another Water Dragon is summoned at the point of impact.

level20.name: Mistweaver
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to heal nearby allied Heroes for 149 (+4% per level). Basic Attacks and Cloud Serpent attacks reduce the cooldown of Mistweaver by 1 second.

level20.name: Shake It Off
level20.fullTooltip: Gain 8 Armor per second while Fast Feet is active, up to 30 Armor.

LiMing.name: Li-Ming
LiMing.description: A high burst damage Mage who can reset her Abilities upon getting a takedown.

basic.name: Magic Missiles
basic.shortTooltip: Fire a volley of missiles
basic.fullTooltip: Fire three missiles toward an area, each dealing 147 (+3% per level) damage to the first enemy hit. These missiles do 50% damage to Structures.

basic.name: Arcane Orb
basic.shortTooltip: Launch an orb that deals increasing damage the further it travels
basic.fullTooltip: Fire an Orb that powers up as it travels, dealing 135 (+3% per level) damage to the first enemy hit. Damage is increased the further it travels, up to 270 (+3% per level) more damage.

basic.name: Teleport
basic.shortTooltip: Teleport a short distance
basic.fullTooltip: Teleport a short distance instantly.

heroic.name: Disintegrate
heroic.shortTooltip: Long range channeled beam
heroic.fullTooltip: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 440 (+5% per level) damage over 2.6 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

heroic.name: Wave of Force
heroic.shortTooltip: Damage and knock enemies back
heroic.fullTooltip: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160 (+5% per level) damage.

trait.name: Critical Mass
trait.shortTooltip: Takedowns refresh Li-Ming's Ability cooldowns
trait.fullTooltip: Getting a Takedown will refresh the cooldown on all of Li-Ming's Abilities.

level1.name: Astral Presence
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Mana regen while low Mana
level1.fullTooltip: Li-Ming's Mana regeneration is increased by 100% while below 25% Mana.

level1.name: Power Hungry
level1.shortTooltip: Regen Globes give Spell Power and more Mana
level1.fullTooltip: Regeneration Globes restore 100% more Mana and grant 10% Spell Power for 20 seconds.

level1.name: Force Armor
level1.shortTooltip: Magic Missiles grants Spell Armor
level1.fullTooltip: When Magic Missiles damages an enemy Hero, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Gain 1 charge per cast.  Stores up to 4 charges.

level1.name: Aether Walker
level1.shortTooltip: Teleport costs no Mana when out of combat
level1.fullTooltip: If Li-Ming hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds, Teleport costs no mana and its cooldown is decreased by 2 seconds.

level4.name: Charged Blast
level4.shortTooltip: Magic Missiles marks enemies for bonus damage
level4.fullTooltip: Basic Attacking a target recently hit by a Magic Missile does an extra 87 (+4% per level) damage.

level4.name: Triumvirate
level4.shortTooltip: Reduces Arcane Orb cooldown at max range
level4.fullTooltip: If Arcane Orb hits an enemy Hero after traveling at least 50% of its base range, the cooldown is reduced by 50%.

level4.name: Dominance
level4.fullTooltip: Takedowns restore 30% of Li-Ming's missing Health.

level7.name: Seeker
level7.fullTooltip: If three Magic Missiles hit the same target, the third one deals an additional 125 (+4% per level) damage.

level7.name: Zei's Vengeance
level7.shortTooltip: Arcane Orb does more damage from afar
level7.fullTooltip: Increase Arcane Orb's damage increase for distance traveled by 25%. Additionally, reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds.

level7.name: Calamity
level7.fullTooltip: Teleport does 300 (+3% per level) damage to enemy Heroes near the destination.

level10.name: Disintegrate
level10.shortTooltip: Long range channeled beam
level10.fullTooltip: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 440 (+5% per level) damage over 2.6 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

level10.name: Wave of Force
level10.shortTooltip: Damage and knock enemies back
level10.fullTooltip: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160 (+5% per level) damage.

level13.name: Cannoneer
level13.fullTooltip: When Li-Ming uses an Ability, her next Basic Attack's damage is increased by 75% and deals Spell damage instead of Physical.  Stacks up to 3 times.

level13.name: Glass Cannon
level13.shortTooltip: Gain Spell Power but lose max Health
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Li-Ming's Spell Power by 15%, but decrease her maximum Health by 15%.

level13.name: Illusionist
level13.shortTooltip: Increases Teleport range, damage refreshes cooldown
level13.fullTooltip: If Li-Ming loses more than 20% of her Health at once, its cooldown is instantly refreshed.   This effect has a 4 second cooldown.  Passive: Increases Teleport range by 50%

level16.name: Fireflies
level16.shortTooltip: Magic Missiles move faster, lower cooldown and Mana cost
level16.fullTooltip: Drastically increases Magic Missiles speed. Its cooldown is reduced by 1 second, and its Mana cost is reduced by 5.

level16.name: Mirrorball
level16.shortTooltip: Fires 2 extra Magic Missiles and increases Mana cost
level16.fullTooltip: Magic Missiles fires an additional 2 missiles, but its Mana cost is increased by 5.

level16.name: Arcane Orbit
level16.shortTooltip: Increases Arcane Orb range
level16.fullTooltip: Arcane Orb travels 25% farther, increasing it's maximum distance damage bonus from 270 (+3% per level) to 371 (+3% per level).

level16.name: Diamond Skin
level16.shortTooltip: Teleport grants a Shield
level16.fullTooltip: Teleport grants a Shield equal to 20% of Li-Ming's maximum Health for 4 seconds.

level20.name: Temporal Flux
level20.fullTooltip: Disintegrate gradually slows enemies caught in its beam, to a maximum of 60%.

level20.name: Repulsion
level20.shortTooltip: Increases cast range and knockback distance
level20.fullTooltip: Increases Wave of Force knockback distance by 150% and increases its cast range by 100%.

level20.name: Tal Rasha's Elements
level20.fullTooltip: Casting Abilities increases the damage of the next Ability by 5%, up to 20%.  This bonus is reset when the same Ability is used within a chain.

level20.name: Archon: Pure Power
level20.shortTooltip: Use Disintegrate repeatedly, but no other Abilities
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to enter Archon form, allowing Li-Ming to repeatedly use Disintegrate, but be unable to cast other Abilities.

LostVikings.name: The Lost Vikings
LostVikings.description: Three Heroes in one! Can gather experience from multiple locations.

basic.name: Jump!
basic.shortTooltip: Grants temporary Invulnerability
basic.fullTooltip: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.

basic.name: Nordic Attack Squad
basic.shortTooltip: Increases Viking Basic Attacks to Heroes
basic.fullTooltip: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

basic.name: Spin To Win!
basic.shortTooltip: Deals damage around each Viking
basic.fullTooltip: Activate to have each Viking deal 101 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

basic.name: Norse Force!
basic.shortTooltip: All Vikings gain a Shield
basic.fullTooltip: All Vikings gain a 110 (+4% per level) to 220 (+4% per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

basic.name: Viking Bribery
basic.shortTooltip: Kill Minions to bribe a Mercenary
basic.fullTooltip: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant stacks of Bribe. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum stacks available: 200. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.  Current number of Bribe stacks: 0

heroic.name: Longboat Raid!
heroic.shortTooltip: Load into a Longboat to attack enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 (+4% per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 205 (+4% per level) damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.  Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

heroic.name: Play Again!
heroic.shortTooltip: Revive and summon Vikings
heroic.fullTooltip: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds.   Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

trait.name: Viking Hoard
trait.shortTooltip: Gather Regen Globes to increase Health Regen
trait.fullTooltip: Gathering a Regeneration Globe with a Viking permanently increases all their Health Regeneration by 0.5 per second.

mount.name: Go Go Go!
mount.fullTooltip: The Vikings gain 30% increased Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

activable.name: Select Olaf
activable.shortTooltip: Olaf has lots of health, regenerates health quickly, and charges to slow enemies
activable.fullTooltip: Olaf can charge enemies and slow their Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds by right-clicking on them. 8 second cooldown.   Olaf gains increased Health Regeneration when out of combat for 4 seconds.

activable.name: Select Baleog
activable.shortTooltip: Baleog deals splash damage to enemies behind his attack target
activable.fullTooltip: Baleog's Basic Attacks deal 50% splash damage to enemies behind his attack target.

activable.name: Select Erik
activable.shortTooltip: Erik moves faster than the other Vikings and has a longer attack range
activable.fullTooltip: Erik moves faster than the other Vikings and has increased Basic Attack range.

basic.name: Mortar
basic.fullTooltip: Fires a mortar at the targeted location, dealing 205 (+4% per level) damage in a large area.

level1.name: Olaf the Stout
level1.shortTooltip: Olaf gains Physical Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Every 5 seconds, Olaf gains 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

level1.name: Spy Games
level1.shortTooltip: Erik gains Stealth and increases vision if stationary
level1.fullTooltip: After standing still for 3 seconds, Erik gains Stealth and his Sight Radius is increased by 75%. The Stealth persists for 3 seconds after moving.

level1.name: Explosive Attacks
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Baleog splash to non-Heroic enemies
level1.fullTooltip: Increases Baleog's splash damage against non-Heroes to 100%.

level1.name: Viking Bribery
level1.shortTooltip: Kill Minions to bribe a Mercenary
level1.fullTooltip: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant stacks of Bribe. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum stacks available: 200. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.  Current number of Bribe stacks: 0

level4.name: Pain Don't Hurt
level4.fullTooltip: Baleog's Basic Attacks and splash damage heal for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

level4.name: Erik the Swift
level4.shortTooltip: Increases Erik's Move Speed and heal while running
level4.fullTooltip: Permanently increases Erik's base Movement Speed by 10%, and as long as Erik is moving he heals 34 (+4% per level) Health per second.

level4.name: It's a Sabotage!
level4.fullTooltip: Erik's Basic Attacks against Structures light them on fire for 10 seconds, causing 175 (+4% per level) damage.

level4.name: Mercenary Lord
level4.fullTooltip: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near your Hero deal 50% more damage. Gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

level7.name: Baleog the Fierce
level7.shortTooltip: Baleog's attacks increase his Attack Speed
level7.fullTooltip: Baleog's Basic Attacks increase his Attack Speed by 8%, stacking up to 5 times. After 3 seconds of not attacking, these stacks will rapidly decay.

level7.name: Spin To Win!
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to have each Viking deal 101 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

level7.name: Norse Force!
level7.fullTooltip: All Vikings gain a 110 (+4% per level) to 220 (+4% per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

level10.name: Longboat Raid!
level10.shortTooltip: Load into a Longboat to attack enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 (+4% per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 205 (+4% per level) damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.  Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

level10.name: Play Again!
level10.shortTooltip: Revive and summon Vikings
level10.fullTooltip: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds.   Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

level13.name: Hunka' Burning Olaf
level13.shortTooltip: Olaf deals damage to nearby enemies
level13.fullTooltip: Olaf deals 34 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies.

level13.name: Jump!
level13.fullTooltip: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.

level13.name: Nordic Attack Squad
level13.shortTooltip: Increases Viking Basic Attacks to Heroes
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

level16.name: Large and In Charge
level16.shortTooltip: Charge stuns enemies
level16.fullTooltip: When Olaf charges enemies, they are stunned for 1 second.

level16.name: Impatience Is a Virtue
level16.shortTooltip: Vikings' attacks reduce cooldowns of all Vikings
level16.fullTooltip: Enemies damaged by a Viking's Basic Attack reduce the cooldown of all Viking Abilities by 0.25 seconds.

level16.name: 64 KB Marathon
level16.shortTooltip: Run faster and break slows and roots
level16.fullTooltip: Gain an additional 40% Movement Speed when activating Go Go Go! that decays over 4 seconds.  Additionally, the Vikings will break out of Roots and Slows.

level16.name: Executioner
level16.shortTooltip: Attacking disabled Heroes increases damage
level16.fullTooltip: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

level20.name: Ragnarok 'n' Roll!
level20.fullTooltip: The Longboat can attack two targets at once and the range of its Mortar is increased by 100%.

level20.name: Checkpoint Reached
level20.fullTooltip: 10 seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.

level20.name: The Sequel!
level20.shortTooltip: Reduces death timer for all Vikings
level20.fullTooltip: Reduces the Lost Vikings's death timer by 50%.

level20.name: Fury of the Storm
level20.fullTooltip: Every 5 seconds, the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 41 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 105 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries and Monsters.  Each Viking has their own cooldown.

LtMorales.name: Lt. Morales
LtMorales.description: A strong, sustained Healer who's unbeatable if left alone by her enemies.

basic.name: Healing Beam
basic.shortTooltip: Heals allies over time
basic.fullTooltip: Heal target allied Hero or Minion for 172 (+4% per level) Health per second as long as they are in range. After not channeling Healing Beam for 2 seconds, regenerate 6 Energy per second.  Reactivate to switch targets, or self-cast to cancel channeling.

basic.name: Safeguard
basic.shortTooltip: Grants Armor to the target
basic.fullTooltip: Grant target ally Hero 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

basic.name: Displacement Grenade
basic.shortTooltip: Damages and knocks enemies away
basic.fullTooltip: Fire a grenade that can be manually detonated, dealing 208 (+4% per level) to nearby enemies and knocking them away.

heroic.name: Stim Drone
heroic.shortTooltip: Grant massive Attack and Movement Speed
heroic.fullTooltip: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

heroic.name: Medivac Dropship
heroic.shortTooltip: Transport allies across long distances
heroic.fullTooltip: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

trait.name: Caduceus Reactor
trait.shortTooltip: Restore Health while channeling Healing Beam
trait.fullTooltip: While channeling Healing Beam, Lt. Morales regenerates 2% of her maximum Health per second.

level1.name: Caduceus Feedback
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks generate Energy
level1.fullTooltip: Increases Attack Range by 1.1 and Basic Attacks against Heroes generate 4 Energy.

level1.name: Life Support
level1.shortTooltip: Safeguard generates Energy
level1.fullTooltip: Generate 2 Energy each time Safeguard reduces damage, up to a maximum of 20 Energy per use.

level1.name: Clear!
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes to empower Displacement Grenade
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes with Displacement Grenade.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Displacement Grenade from 12 seconds to 9 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, increase the detonation area of Displacement Grenade by 25%.

level4.name: Cellular Reactor
level4.fullTooltip: Consume 30 Energy to heal Lt. Morales for 40% of her maximum Health over 4 seconds. Caduceus Reactor is disabled while this is active.

level4.name: Trauma Trigger
level4.fullTooltip: Taking damage while below 40% Health grants 30 Armor for 3 seconds.  This effect has a 30 second cooldown.

level4.name: Blast Shield
level4.fullTooltip: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade generate 2 Energy and grant Lt. Morales a Shield equal to 6% of her maximum Health, stacking up to 5 times.

level7.name: Physical Therapy
level7.fullTooltip: Safeguard removes all Slows from its target. When a Slow is removed this way, reduce the cooldown of Safeguard by 5 seconds.

level7.name: Vanadium Plating
level7.shortTooltip: Stuns, Roots increase Safeguard Armor, duration
level7.fullTooltip: While an ally affected by Safeguard is Stunned or Rooted, Safeguard grants an additional 25 Armor and its duration is paused.

level7.name: Prolonged Safeguard
level7.fullTooltip: Increase Safeguard's duration by 50%.

level10.name: Stim Drone
level10.shortTooltip: Grant massive Attack and Movement Speed
level10.fullTooltip: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

level10.name: Medivac Dropship
level10.shortTooltip: Transport allies across long distances
level10.fullTooltip: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

level13.name: EMP Grenade
level13.shortTooltip: Displacement Grenade deals more damage to Shields
level13.fullTooltip: Displacement Grenade deals an additional 96 (+4% per level) damage over 2 seconds, and up to 400 (+4% per level) bonus damage to Shields.

level13.name: System Shock
level13.fullTooltip: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade deal 30% less damage for 4 seconds.

level13.name: Second Opinion
level13.fullTooltip: Hitting 2 or more Heroes with Displacement Grenade reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.

level16.name: Extended Care
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Healing Beam range
level16.fullTooltip: Increase the range of Healing Beam by 30%.

level16.name: First Responder
level16.shortTooltip: Healing Beam empowered at high Energy
level16.fullTooltip: While above 70 Energy, Healing Beam's healing is increased by 25%.

level16.name: Shield Sequencer
level16.shortTooltip: Safeguard gains a second charge
level16.fullTooltip: Safeguard gains a second charge. These charges cannot stack on a single target.

level20.name: Hyperactivity
level20.fullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Stim Drone from 90 seconds to 45 seconds, and increase the Movement Speed bonus from 25% to 50%.

level20.name: Safe Zone
level20.fullTooltip: After exiting the Medivac, allies are Protected from all damage for 2 seconds.

level20.name: Reinforcements
level20.shortTooltip: Medivac appears at Altar, reduce cooldown
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to call down a Medivac Dropship at your Altar for your allies. After 10 seconds, or when the Ability is activated again, the Medivac will travel to the original cast location to unload its passengers. Cooldown is shared with Medivac Dropship.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Medivac Dropship from 60 to 30 seconds.  Does not require the Medivac Dropship Talent.

level20.name: Caduceus Reactor 2.0
level20.fullTooltip: Increase the healing provided by Caduceus Reactor from 2% to 6% of Lt. Morales's maximum Health per second.

Lucio.name: Lcio
Lucio.description: A sustained Healer who gives his team mobility and peels enemies off allies.

basic.name: Soundwave
basic.shortTooltip: Knockback nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 105 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area and knock them back.

basic.name: Crossfade
basic.shortTooltip: Play a Healing Boost or Speed Boost track
basic.fullTooltip: Play one of two music tracks for Lcio and his allies.  Healing Boost: Passively heal Lcio and nearby allied Heroes for 16 (+4% per level) health per second.  Speed Boost: Increase the Movement Speed of Lcio and nearby allied Heroes by 20%.

basic.name: Amp It Up
basic.shortTooltip: Boost the effect of Lcio's Crossfade track
basic.fullTooltip: Raise Lcio's Crossfade track volume for 3 seconds, amping Healing Boost to 114 (+4% per level) health per second and Speed Boost to 45% increased Movement Speed.

heroic.name: Sound Barrier
heroic.shortTooltip: Shield nearby allies
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, Lcio and nearby Allied Heroes gain a 1296 (+4% per level) point shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

heroic.name: Reverse Amp
heroic.shortTooltip: Cause Crossfade to damage, slow enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Blast Lcio's Crossfade track at enemy Heroes for 4 seconds, causing Healing Boost to inflict 104 (+4% per level) damage per second and Speed Boost to slow for 45%.  This ability is unaffected by Crossfade talents.  Passive: Increase Amp It Up's duration to 4 seconds.

trait.name: Wall Ride
trait.shortTooltip: Lcio gains Movement Speed near impassable terrain and can move through units
trait.fullTooltip: When moving alongside impassable battleground terrain and Structures, Lcio can walk through other units and his Movement Speed is increased by 20%.  This works together with other Movement Speed bonuses.

mount.name: Skate Mode
mount.shortTooltip: Lcio can shoot while moving. Lcio skates or dies!
mount.fullTooltip: Lcio can shoot while moving. Lcio skates or dies!

level1.name: Maximum Tempo
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Hero kills increase Amp It Up speed
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Kill 5 enemy Heroes while Crossfade's Speed Boost is active.  Reward: Permanently increase the Amp It Up bonus for Crossfade's Speed Boost to 60%.

level1.name: Accelerando
level1.shortTooltip: Wall Ride gradually increases Move Speed
level1.fullTooltip: Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus gradually increases to 40% over 4 seconds while Lcio maintains its effect.

level1.name: Slip
level1.shortTooltip: Nearby enemy Heroes increase Wall Ride speed
level1.fullTooltip: Passing through or near an enemy Hero during Wall Ride's effect increases its Movement Speed bonus to 70% for 1 second.

level4.name: Subwoofer
level4.fullTooltip: Enemies within the first half of Soundwave's range are knocked back 50% farther.

level4.name: Off the Wall
level4.shortTooltip: Soundwave's cooldown reduced during Wall Ride
level4.fullTooltip: If Soundwave is cast while having Wall Ride's speed bonus, the cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

level4.name: Chase the Bass
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit 20 enemy Heroes with Soundwave.  Reward: Increase Soundwave's arc by 50% and its range by 20%.

level7.name: Party Mix
level7.shortTooltip: Quest: Playing Crossfade for Allies increases range
level7.fullTooltip: Quest: Play Lcio's Crossfade tracks to nearby Allies for a total of 8 minutes. Multiple Allies provide additional time.  Reward: Permanently increase Crossfade's range by 20%.

level7.name: Sonic Amplifier
level7.shortTooltip: Amp It Up increases Crossfade radius
level7.fullTooltip: If at least 2 Allied Heroes are nearby when Amp It Up is cast, Crossfade's radius is increased by 50% for the duration.

level7.name: Boombox
level7.shortTooltip: Drop a boombox that plays Crossfade
level7.fullTooltip: Place a boombox that plays Lcio's active Crossfade track for 30 seconds. Its volume adjusts with Amp It Up.  Crossfade tracks do not stack.

level10.name: Sound Barrier
level10.shortTooltip: Shield nearby allies
level10.fullTooltip: After 1 second, Lcio and nearby Allied Heroes gain a 1296 (+4% per level) point shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

level10.name: Reverse Amp
level10.shortTooltip: Cause Crossfade to damage, slow enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Blast Lcio's Crossfade track at enemy Heroes for 4 seconds, causing Healing Boost to inflict 104 (+4% per level) damage per second and Speed Boost to slow for 45%.  This ability is unaffected by Crossfade talents.  Passive: Increase Amp It Up's duration to 4 seconds.

level13.name: Beat Mixing
level13.shortTooltip: Gain a Shield after switching Crossfade tracks
level13.fullTooltip: After switching Crossfade tracks, if the next song plays for at least 1.5 seconds, Lcio gains a 100 (+4% per level) point Shield that lasts indefinitely.  Switching tracks again removes the Shield.

level13.name: Can't Stop, Won't Stop
level13.shortTooltip: Immune to Slow and Root effects during Wall Ride
level13.fullTooltip: While Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus is active, Lcio is immune to all enemy Slow and Root effects.

level13.name: Hard Style
level13.fullTooltip: Gain 25 Armor while Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus is active, reducing damage taken by 25%.

level13.name: Back in the Mix
level13.shortTooltip: Heal self on Stun, Silence, or Time Stop
level13.fullTooltip: Heal for 245 (+4% per level) upon entering a Stun, Silence, or Time Stop effect. This cannot happen more than once every 10 seconds.

level16.name: Rejuvenescncia
level16.shortTooltip: Healing Boost also heals a percentage of life
level16.fullTooltip: While Amp It Up is active, Crossfade's Healing Boost heals for an additional 2.5% of the target's maximum health each second.

level16.name: Bring it Together
level16.shortTooltip: Healing Boost increased near allies
level16.fullTooltip: If at least 2 Allied Heroes are nearby when Amp It Up is cast, Crossfade's Healing Boost is increased by 45% for the duration.

level16.name: Up the Frequency
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks lower Amp It Up's cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Amp It Up's mana cost is reduced from 90 to 70 and dealing Basic Attack damage to enemy Heroes also reduces the cooldown of Amp It Up by 0.45 seconds.

level20.name: Bossa Nova
level20.fullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Sound Barrier to 30 seconds, but the shield now decays over 4 seconds.

level20.name: Nonstop Remix
level20.shortTooltip: Reverse Amp lasts forever near multiple enemies
level20.fullTooltip: While Reverse Amp is affecting at least 2 enemy Heroes, its duration lasts indefinitely.

level20.name: Bonus Track
level20.shortTooltip: Using Crossfade refreshes Amp It Up
level20.fullTooltip: Swapping Crossfade tracks while Amp It Up is active will set Amp It Up back to its max duration.  Can only happen once per cast.

level20.name: Synaesthesia Auditiva
level20.shortTooltip: Casting Amp It Up removes Stuns, Slows, and Roots
level20.fullTooltip: The initial cast of Amp It Up removes all Stun, Slow, and Root effects from Allies, and also removes Slow and Root effects on Lcio.

Lunara.name: Lunara
Lunara.description: A sustained Assassin who can wear down her enemies from afar with her poison.

basic.name: Noxious Blossom
basic.shortTooltip: Deals area damage
basic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, cause an area to explode with pollen dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage.

basic.name: Crippling Spores
basic.shortTooltip: Slow enemies afflicted by Nature's Toxin and extend duration
basic.fullTooltip: Enemies currently afflicted by Nature's Toxin have its duration increased by 3 seconds and are Slowed by 40% decaying over 3 seconds.

basic.name: Wisp
basic.shortTooltip: Spawns a Wisp to scout
basic.fullTooltip: Spawn a Wisp to scout an area. Can be redirected once active. When the Wisp is in a bush for more 2 seconds, its vision radius is increased by 75%.  Lasts 45 seconds.

heroic.name: Thornwood Vine
heroic.shortTooltip: Damages in a line
heroic.fullTooltip: Send forth vines that deal 164 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line.  Stores up to 3 charges.

heroic.name: Leaping Strike
heroic.shortTooltip: Leap over enemies, damaging and Slowing
heroic.fullTooltip: Leap over an enemy, Slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and dealing 271 (+4% per level) damage.  Stores up to 2 charges.

trait.name: Nature's Toxin
trait.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks and damaging Abilities deal damage over time
trait.fullTooltip: Lunara's Basic Attacks and damaging Abilities poison their target, dealing 30 (+5% per level) damage a second for 3 seconds. Every additional application increases the duration by 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 9 seconds.

mount.name: Dryad's Swiftness
mount.shortTooltip: Lunara moves about 20% faster by leaping short distances.
mount.fullTooltip: Lunara moves 20% faster by leaping short distances.

basic.name: Relocate Wisp
basic.shortTooltip: Move the Wisp to a new location
basic.fullTooltip: Moves the Wisp to a new location.

level1.name: Sentinel Wisp
level1.shortTooltip: Wisp's bonus vision radius is increased
level1.fullTooltip: After remaining in a bush for 5 seconds, Wisp's vision radius is increased by 200% and reveals the surrounding area.

level1.name: Natural Perspective
level1.shortTooltip: Nature's Toxin reveals enemies
level1.fullTooltip: Nature's Toxin reveals enemies for its duration.

level1.name: Hippity Hop
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Dryad's Swiftness bonus
level1.fullTooltip: After not Basic Attacking or taking damage for 5 seconds, increase the Move Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness by 10%.

level4.name: Blossom Swell
level4.shortTooltip: Increases Noxious Blossom range and radius
level4.fullTooltip: Increases Noxious Blossom's range by 25% and its radius by 20%.

level4.name: Siphoning Toxin
level4.fullTooltip: While at least one enemy is afflicted by Nature's Toxin, heal for 9 (+4% per level) per second.  When an enemy Hero has 3 stacks of Nature's Toxin, increase this healing by 19 (+4% per level) per second.

level4.name: Nature's Culling
level4.shortTooltip: Increases Nature's Toxin damage to non-Heroes
level4.fullTooltip: Increases Nature's Toxin's damage by 125% to non-Heroes.

level7.name: Splintered Spear
level7.shortTooltip: Noxious Blossom makes Basic Attack spread
level7.fullTooltip: Using Noxious Blossom causes Lunara's next Basic Attack to hit up to 4 enemies. These extra attacks can apply Nature's Toxin.

level7.name: Choking Pollen
level7.shortTooltip: Nature's Toxin increases Noxious Blossom damage
level7.fullTooltip: Noxious Blossom deals 85% more damage to enemies afflicted by Nature's Toxin, increased to 135% against enemies with 3 stacks.

level7.name: Wild Vigor
level7.shortTooltip: Crippling Spores increases Basic Attack damage
level7.fullTooltip: Using Crippling Spores increases the damage of Lunara's next 4 Basic Attacks by 50%.

level10.name: Thornwood Vine
level10.shortTooltip: Damages in a line
level10.fullTooltip: Send forth vines that deal 164 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line.  Stores up to 3 charges.

level10.name: Leaping Strike
level10.shortTooltip: Leap over enemies, damaging and Slowing
level10.fullTooltip: Leap over an enemy, Slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and dealing 271 (+4% per level) damage.  Stores up to 2 charges.

level13.name: Endless Spores
level13.shortTooltip: Nature's Toxin can reduce Crippling Spores cooldown
level13.fullTooltip: Casting Crippling Spores while at least 2 Heroes are afflicted by Nature's Toxin reduces the cooldown by 3 seconds.

level13.name: Let Them Wither
level13.fullTooltip: Increases Crippling Spores' Slow duration by 1 second and causes it to no longer decay.

level13.name: Greater Spell Shield
level13.fullTooltip: Every 30 seconds, gain 75 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

level13.name: Abolish Magic
level13.shortTooltip: Remove crowd control from a target and Lunara
level13.fullTooltip: Target an ally to remove all damage over time and disabling effects from them and Lunara. For 2 seconds after, the duration of disabling effects is reduced by 50%.

level16.name: Accelerated Contamination
level16.shortTooltip: Noxious Blossom recharges faster
level16.fullTooltip: While at least 2 enemy Heroes are afflicted with Nature's Toxin, Noxious Blossom's cooldown recharges 100% faster.

level16.name: Star Wood Spear
level16.shortTooltip: Crippling Spores increases Basic Attack range
level16.fullTooltip: Using Crippling Spores increases Lunara's Basic Attack range by 2.75 for 6 seconds.

level16.name: Invigorating Spores
level16.shortTooltip: Crippling Spores empowers Basic Attacks
level16.fullTooltip: Crippling Spores grants 30% Attack Speed for 6 seconds.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Nature's Toxin deal damage equal to 1.5% of their maximum Health.

level16.name: Unfair Advantage
level16.shortTooltip: Increases Nature's Toxin damage to disabled Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Nature's Toxin deals 60% more damage to Heroes that are Slowed, Rooted, or Stunned.

level20.name: Forest's Wrath
level20.fullTooltip: Thornwood Vine now applies 2 stacks of Nature's Toxin.  Increase Thornwood Vine's range by 30% and Lunara's vision radius by 35%.

level20.name: Boundless Stride
level20.fullTooltip: All Leaping Strike charges are returned every 15 seconds. Leaping Strike can be used on allies.

level20.name: Intensifying Toxin
level20.fullTooltip: At 3 stacks, Nature's Toxin deals 40% more damage.

level20.name: Galloping Gait
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to increase the Movement Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness to 80% for 6 seconds.

Maiev.name: Maiev
Maiev.description: A mobile Assassin that excels against clustered enemies and prevents their escape.

basic.name: Fan of Knives
basic.shortTooltip: Throw a volley of knives
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 152 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a crescent area.  Hitting at least 2 enemy Heroes with Fan of Knives reduces its cooldown to 0.5 seconds, and refunds its Mana cost.

basic.name: Umbral Bind
basic.shortTooltip: Tether enemy Heroes to Maiev, pulling those that stray too far
basic.fullTooltip: Maiev's next Basic Attack cleaves and applies a tether to enemy Heroes hit for 2.5 seconds. If a tethered Hero moves too far from Maiev, they are pulled toward her, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage and breaking the tether.

basic.name: Spirit of Vengeance
basic.shortTooltip: Project a shadow of Maiev that she can later Blink to
basic.fullTooltip: Send a shadow of Maiev outward that will return to its cast location, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along both paths. If an enemy Hero is hit, reduce the cooldown by 4 seconds.

heroic.name: Containment Disc
heroic.shortTooltip: Time Stop an enemy Hero and remove their vision
heroic.fullTooltip: Throw a glaive in the target direction. If an enemy Hero is hit, Containment Disc can be reactivated to remove their vision and Time Stop them for 4 seconds.  Containment Disc automatically activates 6 seconds after hitting a Hero.

heroic.name: Warden's Cage
heroic.shortTooltip: Trap enemies in a cage of Avatars
heroic.fullTooltip: Summon 8 Warden Avatars as a cage around Maiev. After 1.5 seconds, enemy Heroes that come in contact with an Avatar consume it and are knocked to the center of the cage. Warden Avatars last 5 seconds.

trait.name: Vault of the Wardens
trait.shortTooltip: Leap into the air, becoming temporarily immune
trait.fullTooltip: Leap into the air, becoming immune to all hostile effects for 0.75 seconds.

level1.name: Bonds of Justice
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Secondary tethers increase Umbral Bind damage
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Each tether applied to a secondary target of Umbral Bind permanently increases Umbral Bind's pull damage by 15.  Reward: After applying 5 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's pull damage by 75.  Reward: After applying 10 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's cleave damage by 30%.

level1.name: Pursuit of Vengeance
level1.shortTooltip: Umbral Bind tethers reduce Spirit of Vengeance cooldown
level1.fullTooltip: Each Hero tethered by Umbral Bind reduces the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance by 2.5 seconds.

level1.name: Naisha's Memento
level1.shortTooltip: Activate to make Basic Attacks bounce
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to make primary Basic Attacks bounce between nearby enemies up to 2 times. Lasts 8 seconds.  Recharge Naisha's Memento by hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives.

level4.name: Pin Down
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Hitting multiple Heroes empowers Fan of Knives
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives.  Reward: Increase Fan of Knives damage by 15%.  Reward: Each additional time 3 enemy Heroes are hit by a single Fan of Knives, gain an additional 5% damage, up to 30%.  Reward: Hit 4 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives to instantly gain all Rewards.

level4.name: Blade Dance
level4.shortTooltip: Fan of Knives deals Physical Damage around Maiev
level4.fullTooltip: Using Fan of Knives deals 50 (+4% per level) Physical Damage to enemies around Maiev.

level4.name: Sudden Vengeance
level4.fullTooltip: Using Blink within 0.35 seconds of Spirit of Vengeance hitting an enemy Hero causes the shadow to explode, damaging all nearby enemy Heroes for 5% of their maximum Health.

level7.name: Elune's Wrath
level7.shortTooltip: Fan of Knives deals more damage after hitting multiple Heroes
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives causes the next Fan of Knives to drop a star on targets that deals 77 (+4% per level) damage when it impacts.

level7.name: Bonds of Corruption
level7.shortTooltip: Umbral Bind pull reduces Physical Armor
level7.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes pulled by Umbral Bind have their Physical Armor reduced by 25 for 3 seconds.

level7.name: Ruthless Spirit
level7.shortTooltip: Spirit of Vengeance deals more damage per enemy hit
level7.fullTooltip: Spirit of Vengeance's damage is increased by 3% per Minion, Mercenary, or enemy Summon hit, and 24% per enemy Hero hit.

level10.name: Containment Disc
level10.shortTooltip: Time Stop an enemy Hero and remove their vision
level10.fullTooltip: Throw a glaive in the target direction. If an enemy Hero is hit, Containment Disc can be reactivated to remove their vision and Time Stop them for 4 seconds.  Containment Disc automatically activates 6 seconds after hitting a Hero.

level10.name: Warden's Cage
level10.shortTooltip: Trap enemies in a cage of Avatars
level10.fullTooltip: Summon 8 Warden Avatars as a cage around Maiev. After 1.5 seconds, enemy Heroes that come in contact with an Avatar consume it and are knocked to the center of the cage. Warden Avatars last 5 seconds.

level13.name: Bladed Armor
level13.fullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Fan of Knives grants 5 Armor for 5 seconds, up to 20 Armor.

level13.name: Chain Gang
level13.shortTooltip: Multiple Umbral Bind tethers grant Armor
level13.fullTooltip: Tethering at least 2 enemy Heroes with Umbral Bind grants 35 Armor for 4 seconds.

level13.name: Shadow Armor
level13.fullTooltip: Blink grants 20 Armor for 3 seconds. Maiev's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes refresh this duration.

level16.name: Cruel Chain
level16.shortTooltip: Damage Umbral Bind targets to increase pull damage
level16.fullTooltip: Umbral Bind grants 25% Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds. In addition, each time Maiev deals damage to tethered targets, Umbral Bind's pull damage to all targets is increased by 30%, up to 150%.

level16.name: Vengeful Knives
level16.shortTooltip: Spirit of Vengeance increases Fan of Knives damage
level16.fullTooltip: For each enemy Hero Spirit of Vengeance hits, Maiev's next Fan of Knives deals 1.5% maximum Health as bonus damage to enemy Heroes.

level16.name: Armored Assault
level16.shortTooltip: Armor increases Physical Damage dealt
level16.fullTooltip: While Maiev has positive Armor of any kind, all Physical Damage dealt is increased by 20%.

level20.name: Shadow Orb: Vengeance
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to reset Spirit of Vengeance cooldown
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to reset the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance.  Recharge Shadow Orb by damaging enemy Heroes with Spirit of Vengeance 5 times.

level20.name: Shadow Orb: Huntress
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to gain Move Speed, Attack Speed
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to increase Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 40% for 5 seconds.  Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Physical Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.

level20.name: Shadow Orb: Shadow Strike
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to deal 75 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy Hero, Slowing them by 30% and reducing their Armor by 20 for 4 seconds.  Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Spell Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.

Malfurion.name: Malfurion
Malfurion.description: A strong sustained Healer who can help lockdown enemies to secure takedowns.

basic.name: Regrowth
basic.shortTooltip: Heal an allied Hero over time
basic.fullTooltip: Heal an allied Hero for 380 (+4% per level) Health over 20 seconds.

basic.name: Moonfire
basic.shortTooltip: Damage enemies in an area, and heal allies with Regrowth
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 90 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area and reveal them for 2 seconds.  Allies with an active Regrowth are healed for 130 (+4% per level) Health for each enemy Hero hit by Moonfire.

basic.name: Entangling Roots
basic.shortTooltip: Root and damage Heroes in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Root enemy Heroes in an area for 1.25 seconds, and deal 117 (+4% per level) damage over the duration. Affected area grows over 3 seconds.

heroic.name: Tranquility
heroic.shortTooltip: Continually heal nearby allies
heroic.fullTooltip: Heal nearby allied Heroes for 80 (+4% per level) Health per second for 8 seconds. Allies affected by Regrowth within Tranquility's area gain 10 Armor.

heroic.name: Twilight Dream
heroic.shortTooltip: Silence and damage nearby enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, deal 310 (+4% per level) damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.

trait.name: Innervate
trait.shortTooltip: Grant Mana to an ally and reduce their cooldowns
trait.fullTooltip: Grant an allied Hero 20% of their maximum Mana over 5 seconds. While affected by Innervate, their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 50% faster.  Cannot be used on Heroes that do not use Mana.

level1.name: Rejuvenation
level1.shortTooltip: Regrowths grant Malfurion Health regen
level1.fullTooltip: Malfurion gains 100% base Health regeneration for every active Regrowth.

level1.name: Celestial Alignment
level1.shortTooltip: Moonfire reveals longer, empowers Attacks
level1.fullTooltip: Increase Moonfire's reveal duration by 3 seconds. Malfurion's Basic Attacks against Heroes revealed by Moonfire deal 75% more damage.

level1.name: Shan'do's Clarity
level1.shortTooltip: Regrowths increase Innvervate cooldown rate
level1.fullTooltip: Innervate's cooldown recharges 25% faster per ally affected by Regrowth.

level4.name: Strangling Vines
level4.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes Rooted by Entangling Roots receive 30% less healing from all sources for 3 seconds.

level4.name: Deep Roots
level4.shortTooltip: Increases Entangling Roots area and duration
level4.fullTooltip: Entangling Roots grows 25% larger, and persist on the ground 25% longer.

level4.name: Vengeful Roots
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Entangling Roots spawns a Treant
level4.fullTooltip: Entangling Roots spawns a Treant that deals 65 damage per second and lasts 10 seconds.  Repeatable Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Entangling Roots permanently increases the Treant's Basic Attack damage by 7.

level7.name: Wild Growth
level7.fullTooltip: Each Hero hit by Moonfire extends the duration of currently active Regrowths by 1 second.

level7.name: Tenacious Roots
level7.shortTooltip: Extend Entangling Roots, Stuns reset cooldown
level7.fullTooltip: Increase the Root duration of Entangling Roots by 25%. When Malfurion is Stunned, the cooldown of Entangling Roots is instantly reset. This can only occur every 10 seconds.

level7.name: Nature's Cure
level7.shortTooltip: Activate to remove disablers from allies
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to remove all Stuns, Roots, and Slows from allies affected by Regrowth.

level10.name: Tranquility
level10.shortTooltip: Continually heal nearby allies
level10.fullTooltip: Heal nearby allied Heroes for 80 (+4% per level) Health per second for 8 seconds. Allies affected by Regrowth within Tranquility's area gain 10 Armor.

level10.name: Twilight Dream
level10.shortTooltip: Silence and damage nearby enemies
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, deal 310 (+4% per level) damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.

level13.name: Nature's Swiftness
level13.fullTooltip: Malfurion gains 6% Movement Speed for every active Regrowth.

level13.name: Hindering Moonfire
level13.fullTooltip: Moonfire Slows Heroes hit by 25% for 2 seconds.

level13.name: Revitalize
level13.fullTooltip: Using Innervate also grants Malfurion 50 Mana and causes his Basic Ability cooldowns to refresh 50% faster for 5 seconds.

level16.name: Ysera's Gift
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Regrowth heal at high Health
level16.fullTooltip: While Malfurion is above 75% Health, Regrowth's healing-over-time is increased by 60%.

level16.name: Nature's Balance
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Moonfire area, Regrowth duration
level16.fullTooltip: Increase Moonfire's area by 25% and Regrowth's duration by 3 seconds.

level16.name: Moonlit Harmony
level16.shortTooltip: Moonfire heals more per ally affected by Regrowth
level16.fullTooltip: Increase Moonfire's heal by 15% per ally affected by Regrowth.

level20.name: Serenity
level20.fullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Moonfire reduces the cooldown of Tranquility by 3 seconds. Increase Tranquility's healing by 10% per ally affected by Regrowth.

level20.name: Astral Communion
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to teleport and cast Twilight Dream
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to Channel for 1 second, and then instantly teleport and cast Twilight Dream at the targeted location.  Cooldown is shared with Twilight Dream.  Passive: Increase Twilight Dream's Silence duration to 4 seconds.

level20.name: Lifebloom
level20.shortTooltip: Regrowth instantly heals for missing Health
level20.fullTooltip: Regrowth instantly heals its target for 10% of their missing Health.

level20.name: Lunar Shower
level20.fullTooltip: If Moonfire hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second and the next Moonfire within 6 seconds deals 20% more damage. This damage bonus stacks up to 60%.

MalGanis.name: Mal'Ganis
MalGanis.description: A self-sustaining Tank that peels for allies and disrupts enemies.

basic.name: Fel Claws
basic.shortTooltip: Swipe forward multiple times to deal damage
basic.fullTooltip: Violently slash in the chosen direction, dealing 69 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.  Reactivate to slash up to 2 more times. The third slash Stuns enemies for 0.75 seconds.

basic.name: Necrotic Embrace
basic.shortTooltip: Deal damage around Mal'Ganis and gain Armor
basic.fullTooltip: Desecrate the air, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and gaining 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

basic.name: Night Rush
basic.shortTooltip: Gain Move Speed and put enemies to Sleep
basic.fullTooltip: After 0.75 seconds, gain 50% Movement Speed for 2 seconds. While active, Mal'Ganis can move through enemy Heroes and put them to Sleep for 2.5 seconds.

heroic.name: Carrion Swarm
heroic.shortTooltip: Disperse and deal damage in an area
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for 3 seconds, dealing 132 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies.  Vampiric Touch heals for 75% of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.

heroic.name: Dark Conversion
heroic.shortTooltip: Channel to swap Health with an enemy Hero
heroic.fullTooltip: Channel on an enemy Hero for 0.75 seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over 3 seconds.

trait.name: Vampiric Touch
trait.shortTooltip: Mal'Ganis heals from damage dealt
trait.fullTooltip: Mal'Ganis heals for 45% of damage dealt to enemy Heroes and 10% of damage dealt to non-Heroes.

level1.name: Winged Guard
level1.shortTooltip: Necrotic Embrace grants extra Physical Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Each time Necrotic Embrace hits an enemy Hero, gain 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack.  If Winged Guard has no charges, Mal'Ganis will gain 1 charge after 6 seconds.

level1.name: Vampiric Aura
level1.shortTooltip: Improve Vampiric Touch and share it with allies
level1.fullTooltip: Mal'Ganis and nearby allied Heroes heal for 10% of Physical Damage dealt.

level1.name: Time to Feed
level1.shortTooltip: Heal when initially damaging enemy Heroes
level1.fullTooltip: Mal'Ganis heals for 48 (+4% per level) when damaging a nearby enemy Hero. This can occur once every 6 seconds against each enemy Hero.

level4.name: Fueled by Torment
level4.shortTooltip: Necrotic Embrace heals when damage is taken
level4.fullTooltip: While Necrotic Embrace is active, Mal'Ganis heals for 12 (+4% per level) when damage is taken and Vampiric Touch converts 15% more Hero damage into healing.

level4.name: Might of Sargeras
level4.shortTooltip: Raise Necrotic Embrace Armor, but lower duration
level4.fullTooltip: Necrotic Embrace's Armor is increased to 50, but the duration is reduced to 2 seconds.

level4.name: Echo of Doom
level4.fullTooltip: When Necrotic Embrace expires, it explodes again for 50 (+4% per level) damage. If an enemy Hero is hit, Mal'Ganis retains 25 Armor for 1 more second.  Does not wake Sleeping targets.

level7.name: Black Claws
level7.shortTooltip: Fel Claws increases Basic Attack damage
level7.fullTooltip: After Mal'Ganis hits an enemy Hero with Fel Claws, his next Basic Attack deals 45% more damage.

level7.name: Will of Tichondrius
level7.fullTooltip: The third slash of Fel Claws steals 4% of maximum Health from enemy Heroes.

level7.name: Spreading Plague
level7.shortTooltip: Periodically deal damage after Night Rush
level7.fullTooltip: After Night Rush expires, deal 30 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this.  Does not wake Sleeping targets.

level7.name: Nightmare Fuel
level7.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks can deal more damage
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal 30% more damage while in a bush and for 4 seconds after leaving. They also deal 150% more damage to Sleeping targets.

level10.name: Carrion Swarm
level10.shortTooltip: Disperse and deal damage in an area
level10.fullTooltip: After 1 second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for 3 seconds, dealing 132 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies.  Vampiric Touch heals for 75% of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.

level10.name: Dark Conversion
level10.shortTooltip: Channel to swap Health with an enemy Hero
level10.fullTooltip: Channel on an enemy Hero for 0.75 seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over 3 seconds.

level13.name: Deep Sleep
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Night Rush's Sleep duration by 0.75 seconds and its Movement Speed bonus by 10%.

level13.name: The Night Beckons
level13.fullTooltip: After Night Rush's Sleep ends, targets are Slowed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

level13.name: Blood Rush
level13.fullTooltip: When Mal'Ganis is healed by a Hero, he gains 1% Movement Speed for 8 seconds, up to 15%.

level16.name: Plague Bats
level16.shortTooltip: Necrotic Embrace unleashes a wave of bats
level16.fullTooltip: Necrotic Embrace unleashes a wave of bats in front of Mal'Ganis, dealing 81 (+4% per level) damage.

level16.name: Frenzied Assault
level16.shortTooltip: Gain Attack Speed against higher Health Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes with a higher Health percentage grant 40% Attack Speed and 15% increased Physical Damage for 3 seconds.

level16.name: Blind as a Bat
level16.shortTooltip: Remove Fel Claws cooldown, but lose all vision
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to erupt with blind rage, removing the cooldown and Mana cost of Fel Claws, but losing all vision. Lasts 6 seconds.

level20.name: Seeker Swarm
level20.shortTooltip: Carrion Swarm Sleeps Heroes after expiring
level20.fullTooltip: Upon expiring, Carrion Swarm's bats seek nearby enemy Heroes, dealing 132 (+4% per level) damage and Sleeping them for 2.5 seconds.

level20.name: Wrath of Nathreza
level20.shortTooltip: Dark Conversion damages Heroes near the target
level20.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes near the target suffer 75% of the transferred Health as damage over 3 seconds.  Does not benefit from Vampiric Touch.

level20.name: Vanquish the Weak
level20.shortTooltip: Fel Claws and Basic Attacks Slow
level20.fullTooltip: Damage from Fel Claws and Basic Attacks Slows enemies by 15% for 1.5 seconds, and Vampiric Touch converts 10% more damage into healing versus Slowed Heroes.

level20.name: Alone in the Dark
level20.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes put to Sleep by Night Rush have their vision greatly reduced during the Sleep and for 2 seconds after.

Malthael.name: Malthael
Malthael.description: An Assassin who marks his enemies, shredding away High Health enemies.

basic.name: Soul Rip
basic.shortTooltip: Damage Marked enemies and heal
basic.fullTooltip: Extract the souls of nearby enemies afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 100 (+4% per level) damage and healing Malthael for 25 (+4% per level) per target hit. Heroic targets heal Malthael for an additional 4% of the Hero's maximum Health.

basic.name: Wraith Strike
basic.shortTooltip: Teleport to a Marked target
basic.fullTooltip: Instantly teleport through an enemy afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage and refreshing Reaper's Mark.

basic.name: Death Shroud
basic.shortTooltip: Unleash a wave that applies Reaper's Mark
basic.fullTooltip: After 0.25 seconds, unleash a wave of dark mist that applies Reaper's Mark to enemies it hits.

heroic.name: Tormented Souls
heroic.shortTooltip: Apply Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

heroic.name: Last Rites
heroic.shortTooltip: Quest: Damage a Hero based on their missing Health
heroic.fullTooltip: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health.  Quest: Enemies killed between the application of Last Rites and within 1.5 seconds of it dealing damage permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 15 seconds.

trait.name: Reaper's Mark
trait.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks cleave, apply Reaper's Mark
trait.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks cleave in an area in front of Malthael and afflict non-Structure targets with Reaper's Mark for 4 seconds.  Marked enemies are revealed and take damage equal to 1.75% of their maximum Health every 1 second.

level1.name: Death's Reach
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Wraith Strike range
level1.fullTooltip: Increase Wraith Strike's range by 35%.

level1.name: On a Pale Horse
level1.shortTooltip: Increase mounted Movement Speed
level1.fullTooltip: Gain an additional 20% Movement Speed while mounted.

level1.name: Fear the Reaper
level1.shortTooltip: Activate to increase Movement Speed
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 25% and pass through other units for 4 seconds.

level4.name: Die Alone
level4.fullTooltip: Soul Rip deals 50% more damage to Heroes if it hits only one Hero.

level4.name: Throwing Shade
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit 15 Heroes with Death Shroud.  Reward: Permanently increase Death Shroud's range by 33%, reduce its cooldown by 3.75 seconds, and reduce its Mana cost from 50 to 25.

level4.name: Black Harvest
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Apply Reaper's Mark to Heroes for a total of 180 seconds.  Reward: Permanently increase Reaper's Mark's duration by 2 seconds.

level7.name: Cold Hand
level7.fullTooltip: Soul Rip Slows enemies by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

level7.name: Massacre
level7.fullTooltip: Wraith Strike now damages and applies Reaper's Mark to enemies around its target.

level7.name: Touch of Death
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to reduce healing received by Heroes afflicted by Reaper's Mark by 50% for 4 seconds.

level10.name: Tormented Souls
level10.shortTooltip: Apply Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

level10.name: Last Rites
level10.shortTooltip: Quest: Damage a Hero based on their missing Health
level10.fullTooltip: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health.  Quest: Enemies killed between the application of Last Rites and within 1.5 seconds of it dealing damage permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 15 seconds.

level13.name: Soul Siphon
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Soul Rip's bonus healing from Heroes to 4.75% of the Hero's maximum Health.

level13.name: Ethereal Existence
level13.fullTooltip: Gain 10 Physical Armor per enemy Hero afflicted by Reaper's Mark, up to a maximum of 30.

level13.name: Inevitable End
level13.shortTooltip: Activate to become Unstoppable, remove Marks
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds, but remove all active Reaper's Marks.

level13.name: Shroud of Wisdom
level13.fullTooltip: After 2 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor for 4 seconds.

level16.name: Soul Collector
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Soul Rip range, reduce cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Reduce Soul Rip's cooldown by 0.5 seconds and increase its range by 25%.

level16.name: Mortality
level16.shortTooltip: Wraith Strike deals bonus damage to Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: When damaging a Hero, Wraith Strike deals bonus damage equal to 6% of the Hero's maximum Health.

level16.name: Memento Mori
level16.shortTooltip: Reaper's Mark deals increased damage over time
level16.fullTooltip: Reaper's Mark deals 80% increased damage after afflicting an enemy for more than 4 seconds.

level20.name: Reaper of Souls
level20.shortTooltip: Hero Takedowns extend Tormented Souls duration
level20.fullTooltip: Increase Tormented Souls' duration by 2 seconds.  While Tormented Souls is active, Hero Takedowns refresh the duration.

level20.name: Angel of Death
level20.fullTooltip: Last Rites heals for 100% of the damage dealt, and its current and future cooldown reduction bonuses are doubled.

level20.name: Final Curtain
level20.fullTooltip: Death Shroud leaves a trail in its wake for 4 seconds, applying Reaper's Mark to enemies in its area.

level20.name: No One Can Stop Death
level20.fullTooltip: Activate while dead to immediately respawn at the Altar but increase Malthael's next respawn time by 25%.

Medivh.name: Medivh
Medivh.description: A Support who can negate burst damage and allow his allies to teleport.

basic.name: Arcane Rift
basic.shortTooltip: Launch an arcane bolt that damages enemies in a line
basic.fullTooltip: Launch a rift that deals 170 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in its path. If an enemy Hero is hit, reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds and refund 50 Mana.  Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Arcane Rift without dying.  Reward: Permanently increase the damage dealt by 75 and cooldown reduction for hitting a Hero by 1 second.

basic.name: Force of Will
basic.shortTooltip: Protect an allied Hero from damage
basic.fullTooltip: Protect an allied Hero from all damage for 1.5 seconds.  Upon expiration, Force of Will heals the target for 20% of the damage it absorbed.

basic.name: Portal
basic.shortTooltip: Create a portal that allies can pass through
basic.fullTooltip: Create a set of portals between Medivh and the target location, allowing allies to teleport between both. The portals last 6 seconds.

heroic.name: Poly Bomb
heroic.shortTooltip: Polymorph a Hero that spreads to other Heroes
heroic.fullTooltip: Polymorph an enemy Hero for 2 seconds, Silencing them and making them unable to attack. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

heroic.name: Ley Line Seal
heroic.shortTooltip: Unleash a wave that Time Stops enemy Heroes
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.

trait.name: Raven Form
trait.shortTooltip: Transform into a raven
trait.fullTooltip: Instead of mounting, Medivh can transform into a raven, increasing Movement Speed by 20%. While transformed, Medivh can see and fly over all terrain and is immune to all effects.

mount.name: Raven Form
mount.fullTooltip: Transform into a raven, increasing Movement Speed by 20%. While transformed, Medivh can see and fly over terrain and is immune to all effects.

level1.name: Winds of Celerity
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Raven Form Movement Speed
level1.fullTooltip: Increases Raven Form's Movement Speed bonus by 50%.

level1.name: Ravens Intellect
level1.shortTooltip: Raven Form increases Health and Mana Regen
level1.fullTooltip: Raven Form increases Medivh's Mana and Health Regeneration by 75%.

level1.name: Portal Mastery
level1.shortTooltip: Place both Portal locations
level1.fullTooltip: Medivh can manually place both Portal locations and it no longer breaks Raven Form.   Activate Medivh's Trait to cancel an unlinked Portal.

level4.name: Mage Armor
level4.fullTooltip: The first time an ally uses a Portal, they gain 30 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing their damage taken by 30%.

level4.name: Raven Familiar
level4.shortTooltip: Using a Portal grants a Raven Familiar
level4.fullTooltip: A Raven Familiar joins allies each time they use a Portal. The Raven will dive at the ally's next Basic Attack against a Hero within 5 seconds, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

level4.name: Dust of Appearance
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to greatly increase sight range for 5 seconds and reveal enemy Heroes in the area for 8 seconds. Does not cancel Raven Form.  Passive: Increase Medivh's sight range while in Raven Form by 25%.

level7.name: Mystic Assault
level7.fullTooltip: If Arcane Rift hits an enemy Hero, Medivh's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% more damage and heals for 40% of the damage dealt.

level7.name: Arcane Explosion
level7.shortTooltip: Force of Will deals area damage
level7.fullTooltip: When Force of Will expires, it deals 80 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, plus 50% of the damage it prevented, up to 315 (+4% per level) additional damage.

level7.name: Force of Magic
level7.shortTooltip: Force of Will can grant Spell Power
level7.fullTooltip: Preventing at least 268 (+4% per level) damage with a single cast of Force of Will grants 30% Spell Power for 15 seconds. Stacks up to 2 times.

level10.name: Poly Bomb
level10.shortTooltip: Polymorph a Hero that spreads to other Heroes
level10.fullTooltip: Polymorph an enemy Hero for 2 seconds, Silencing them and making them unable to attack. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

level10.name: Ley Line Seal
level10.shortTooltip: Unleash a wave that Time Stops enemy Heroes
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.

level13.name: Circle of Protection
level13.shortTooltip: Force of Will applies to allies near target
level13.fullTooltip: Force of Will also applies to allies near the target, but its cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.

level13.name: Enduring Will
level13.shortTooltip: Preventing damage reduces Force of Will cooldown
level13.fullTooltip: Preventing at least 268 (+4% per level) damage with Force of Will reduces its cooldown to 4 seconds.

level13.name: Reabsorption
level13.fullTooltip: Increase the amount of healing from Force Of Will to 70% of the damage it absorbed.

level16.name: Arcane Charge
level16.shortTooltip: Arcane Rift deals more damage after hitting a Hero
level16.fullTooltip: When Arcane Rift damages an enemy Hero, the next Arcane Rift deals 15% more damage.

level16.name: Temporal Flux
level16.shortTooltip: Arcane Rift reduces Heroic cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 1 second. Each enemy Hero hit by Arcane Rift reduces Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 3 seconds.

level16.name: Stable Portal
level16.shortTooltip: Increases Portal uptime
level16.fullTooltip: Decrease Portal cooldown by 25% and increase Portal duration by 50%.

level20.name: Glyph Of Poly Bomb
level20.shortTooltip: Poly Bomb spreads faster and farther
level20.fullTooltip: Poly Bomb explodes 1 second sooner and the spread radius is increased by 25%.

level20.name: Medivh Cheats!
level20.shortTooltip: Ley Line Seal can be redirected while active
level20.fullTooltip: Increase the duration of the Time Stop by 33% and gain the ability to redirect the wave once while it's active.

level20.name: Guardian of Tirisfal
level20.fullTooltip: Minions and Catapults hit by Arcane Rift are instantly killed.

level20.name: Arcane Brilliance
level20.shortTooltip: Grant Spell Power and Mana to allies
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to instantly restore 200 mana to all nearby allied Heroes and grant them 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

level20.name: Dust of Disappearance
level20.fullTooltip: Stealth an allied Hero for 20 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.  Stores up to 2 charges.

Mephisto.name: Mephisto
Mephisto.description: A sustained Assassin who thrives in battle against groups of enemies.

basic.name: Skull Missile
basic.shortTooltip: Damage enemies in a line after a short delay
basic.fullTooltip: Conjure a skull that travels in the target direction after 0.75 seconds, dealing 127 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit and Slowing Heroes hit by 25% for 2 seconds.

basic.name: Lightning Nova
basic.shortTooltip: Deal increasing damage to nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: A ring of lightning appears around Mephisto for 2.5 seconds. Enemies within the ring take 45 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds.  Each time a cast of Lightning Nova hits a Hero, its damage is increased by 3%, up to 30%.

basic.name: Shade of Mephisto
basic.shortTooltip: Teleport to a location and return after a delay
basic.fullTooltip: Teleport to a location, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and leaving behind a Shade of Mephisto at Mephisto's original location.   After 2.5 seconds, Mephisto is teleported back to the Shade's location.

heroic.name: Consume Souls
heroic.shortTooltip: Damage and Slow all enemy Heroes
heroic.fullTooltip: Channel for 2.5 seconds, revealing all enemy Heroes. After the Channel completes, all enemy Heroes take 357 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

heroic.name: Durance of Hate
heroic.shortTooltip: Unleash spirits that spread Roots
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, unleash a wave of evil spirits that Root the first enemy Hero hit for 2.5 seconds and deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to them over the same duration.  Durance of Hate spreads outwards from its initial target, Rooting and damaging additional nearby enemy Heroes.

trait.name: Lord Of Hatred
trait.shortTooltip: Hitting Heroes with Basic Abilities reduces Mephisto's cooldowns
trait.fullTooltip: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Abilities reduces Mephisto's Basic Ability cooldowns.  Skull Missile and Shade of Mephisto grant 1.5 seconds of cooldown reduction per Hero hit, and Lightning Nova grants 0.3 seconds per Hero hit.

level1.name: Unyielding Power
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Empower Skull Missile
