level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes with Skull Missile.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Skull Missile's damage by 100.  Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Skull Missile's cooldown is permanently reduced to 5 seconds.

level1.name: Furious Spark
level1.shortTooltip: Lightning Nova deals bonus damage
level1.fullTooltip: Every 5th hit from Lightning Nova against the same target deals 90 (+4% per level) bonus damage.

level1.name: Malicious Intent
level1.shortTooltip: Shade of Mephisto grants Spell Power
level1.fullTooltip: Shade of Mephisto grants 15% Spell Power while active and for 2.5 seconds after ending.

level1.name: Anger
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks activate Lord of Hatred
level1.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes also activate Lord of Hatred, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 1 second.

level4.name: Hateful Mending
level4.fullTooltip: Skull Missile heals Mephisto for 60% of the damage it deals to Heroes.

level4.name: Static Barrier
level4.fullTooltip: At the end of its duration, Lightning Nova grants Mephisto a Shield equal to 40% of the damage it dealt to Heroes. Lasts 5 seconds.

level4.name: Spite
level4.shortTooltip: Regen Globes activate Lord of Hatred
level4.fullTooltip: Increase Regeneration Globe healing duration by 100%. Every tick of Regeneration Globe healing activates Lord of Hatred, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

level7.name: Ghastly Armor
level7.fullTooltip: Shade of Mephisto grants 20 Armor while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends.

level7.name: Frost Storm
level7.fullTooltip: Enemies near Shade of Mephisto are Slowed by 50% for 2 seconds. Hitting enemies with Skull Missile while Shade of Mephisto is active increases its Slow to 50%.

level7.name: Trickery
level7.shortTooltip: Shade of Mephisto grants Move Speed
level7.fullTooltip: Shade of Mephisto grants 20% Movement Speed while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends. After Shade of Mephisto expires, all Slows and Roots are removed from Mephisto.

level10.name: Consume Souls
level10.shortTooltip: Damage and Slow all enemy Heroes
level10.fullTooltip: Channel for 2.5 seconds, revealing all enemy Heroes. After the Channel completes, all enemy Heroes take 357 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

level10.name: Durance of Hate
level10.shortTooltip: Unleash spirits that spread Roots
level10.fullTooltip: After 1 second, unleash a wave of evil spirits that Root the first enemy Hero hit for 2.5 seconds and deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to them over the same duration.  Durance of Hate spreads outwards from its initial target, Rooting and damaging additional nearby enemy Heroes.

level13.name: Abhorred Skull
level13.fullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Skull Missile grants 20% Spell Power for 6 seconds.

level13.name: Hysteria
level13.shortTooltip: Lord of Hatred reduces Heroic cooldown
level13.fullTooltip: Lord of Hatred also reduces the cooldown of Mephisto's Heroic Ability.

level13.name: Shard of Hate
level13.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks hit enemies near the primary target.

level16.name: Lightning Reaction
level16.shortTooltip: Skull Missile explodes when hitting Lightning Nova
level16.fullTooltip: Skull Missile explodes on contact with Lightning Nova, dealing 138 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

level16.name: Static Field
level16.shortTooltip: Lightning Nova can deal Percent Damage
level16.fullTooltip: When Lightning Nova's damage bonus reaches 30%, enemy Heroes within its radius take damage equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

level16.name: Animosity
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to extend Lightning Nova
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to extend the duration of Lightning Nova by 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks while Lightning Nova is active cause an immediate pulse of Lightning Nova damage.

level20.name: Consumed by Hatred
level20.fullTooltip: Consume Souls deals bonus damage equal to 10% of the target's missing Health. If Consume Souls initial cast kills a Hero it will cast 1 additional time.

level20.name: Unspeakable Horror
level20.fullTooltip: Durance of Hate Silences enemies for 3 seconds after its Root expires.

level20.name: Mimic
level20.shortTooltip: Shade of Mephisto can cast Lightning Nova
level20.fullTooltip: While both Shade of Mephisto and Lightning Nova are active, Lightning Nova also casts from the Shade's location.

level20.name: Shade Lord
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to swap with Shade of Mephisto
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to swap locations with Shade of Mephisto and refresh its duration.  Passive: Shade of Mephisto benefits from all of Mephisto's level 7 Talents.

Muradin.name: Muradin
Muradin.description: A sturdy Tank that can do well in a multitude of situations.

basic.name: Storm Bolt
basic.shortTooltip: Throw a hammer, stunning and damaging the first enemy hit
basic.fullTooltip: Throw a hammer, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds.  Quest: Hit 25 Heroes with Storm Bolt. Heroes who die within 2.5 seconds of being hit by Storm Bolt count as hitting 3 additional Heroes.  Reward: Storm Bolt pierces to hit an additional target, and Muradin's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Storm Bolt by 1 second.

basic.name: Thunder Clap
basic.shortTooltip: Slow and damage nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Blast nearby enemies for 96 (+4% per level) damage and slow them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. Heroes hit also have their Attack Speed reduced by 25% for the duration.

basic.name: Dwarf Toss
basic.shortTooltip: Leap to an area, dealing damage to nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Leap to target location, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies on landing. Upon leaping, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

heroic.name: Avatar
heroic.shortTooltip: Temporary Health boost
heroic.fullTooltip: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining 1053 (+4% per level) Health.

heroic.name: Haymaker
heroic.shortTooltip: Stun and knock an enemy away
heroic.fullTooltip: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking them aside.

trait.name: Second Wind
trait.shortTooltip: Restore Health when not taking damage
trait.fullTooltip: Muradin restores 55 (+4% per level) Health per second when he has not taken damage for 4 seconds. When below 40% Health, increased to 111 (+4% per level) Health per second.

level1.name: Block
level1.shortTooltip: Periodically gain Physical Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

level1.name: Perfect Storm
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Hitting Heroes empowers Storm Bolt
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Every time Storm Bolt hits a Hero, increase its damage by 5.

level1.name: Third Wind
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Second Wind's healing
level1.fullTooltip: Increases Health Restoration rate to 83 (+4% per level) per second, and raises Health threshold to 60% Health for improved 166 (+4% per level) per second Restoration.

level4.name: Sledgehammer
level4.shortTooltip: Increases Storm Bolt damage to non-Heroes
level4.fullTooltip: Deals 350% damage to non-Heroic enemies.

level4.name: Reverberation
level4.shortTooltip: Increases duration and Attack Speed reduction
level4.fullTooltip: Increases the Attack Speed slow from 25% to 50% and the duration from 2.5 seconds to 3.5 seconds.

level4.name: Thunder Burn
level4.shortTooltip: Thunder Clap can strike a second time
level4.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Thunder Clap triggers a second explosion 2 seconds later in the same location that deals 50% damage.

level7.name: Heavy Impact
level7.shortTooltip: Dwarf Toss briefly slows enemies hit
level7.fullTooltip: Enemies hit by Dwarf Toss are slowed by 80% for 0.75 seconds.

level7.name: Give 'em the Axe!
level7.fullTooltip: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases Muradin's Basic Attack damage by 50% for 3 seconds.

level7.name: Skullcracker
level7.shortTooltip: Successive Basic Attacks Stun, deal more damage
level7.fullTooltip: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same enemy deals 70% bonus damage and Stuns them for 0.25 seconds.

level10.name: Avatar
level10.shortTooltip: Temporary Health boost
level10.fullTooltip: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining 1053 (+4% per level) Health.

level10.name: Haymaker
level10.shortTooltip: Stun and knock an enemy away
level10.fullTooltip: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking them aside.

level13.name: Healing Static
level13.fullTooltip: Muradin heals for 5% of his Max Health for each Hero hit by Thunder Clap.

level13.name: Thunder Strike
level13.shortTooltip: Increases Thunder Clap damage to one enemy
level13.fullTooltip: Thunder Clap deals 300% damage if only one target is hit.

level13.name: Bronzebeard Rage
level13.fullTooltip: Deal 19 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against a Hero that is Rooted, Stunned or Slowed increase this damage by 100% for 3 seconds.

level16.name: Dwarf Launch
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Dwarf Toss range
level16.fullTooltip: Increase the range of Dwarf Toss by 40%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Dwarf Toss reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

level16.name: Imposing Presence
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to slow enemy Basic Attacks and Move Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

level16.name: Stoneform
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to heal over time
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to heal Muradin for 30% of his maximum Health over 10 seconds. Second Wind is disabled during this time.

level20.name: Unstoppable Force
level20.fullTooltip: While active, Avatar grants 20 Armor and causes Muradin's Basic Attacks to reduce the cooldowns of Thunder Clap and Dwarf Toss by 0.75 seconds.

level20.name: Grand Slam
level20.shortTooltip: Increases Haymaker damage and adds charge
level20.fullTooltip: Haymaker gains a 2nd charge and its damage is increased by 25%. If a Hero dies within 3 seconds of being hit by Haymaker, instantly gain 1 charge.

level20.name: Hardened Shield
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 75% less damage.

level20.name: Rewind
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

Murky.name: Murky
Murky.description: Not quite a full Hero, Murky can place an Egg to respawn quickly back into battle.

basic.name: Slime
basic.shortTooltip: Release Slime to damage and slow enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 86 (+4% per level) damage and apply Slime on nearby enemies for 6 seconds, slowing them by 20%.   Deal 210 (+4% per level) damage to enemies who are already Slimed.

basic.name: Pufferfish
basic.shortTooltip: Spit out a fish that explodes after a delay
basic.fullTooltip: Spit out a Pufferfish with 225 (+5.5% per level) health at the target point. After 3 seconds, the fish will blow up for 410 (+4% per level) damage. Deals 50% less damage to Structures.

basic.name: Safety Bubble
basic.shortTooltip: Becomes Invulnerable, but cannot attack or use abilities
basic.fullTooltip: Becomes Invulnerable for 2 seconds. While active, Murky cannot attack or use abilities.

heroic.name: March of the Murlocs
heroic.shortTooltip: Swarm enemies with Murlocs
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 (+4% per level) damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

heroic.name: Octo-Grab
heroic.shortTooltip: Stun and poke an enemy Hero
heroic.fullTooltip: Murky becomes Unstoppable and Stuns target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.

trait.name: Spawn Egg
trait.shortTooltip: Place an Egg, from which Murky will respawn
trait.fullTooltip: Place an Egg at target location, revealing the nearby area. Upon dying, Murky respawns at the Egg after 8 seconds. Murky only grants 25% of a real Hero's experience upon dying.  If Murky's Egg is killed, he is revealed to enemies for 15 seconds, and Spawn Egg is placed on cooldown.

level1.name: Fish Eye
level1.shortTooltip: Egg sees further, detects Stealth
level1.fullTooltip: Egg's Health is increased by 100%, its sight radius is increased by 300% and it can see Stealthed enemies.   Passive: Spawning from his Egg increases Murky's mount speed to 45% for 5 seconds.

level1.name: Egg Hunt
level1.shortTooltip: Place fake Eggs
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to place a fake Egg. If the fake Egg dies, it casts an untalented Slime. Maximum 3 fake Eggs.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky Stealth for 5 seconds.

level1.name: A Fishy Deal
level1.shortTooltip: Kill Minions with Pufferfish to bribe Mercs
level1.fullTooltip: Killing a Minion with Pufferfish grants a stack of Bribe. Use 8 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses.  Maximum of 32 stacks of Bribe.

level4.name: Slime Time
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Slime Heroes to empower Slime
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Slime enemy Heroes that are already Slimed.  Reward: After Sliming 15 Heroes, increase Slime's bonus damage by 125.  Reward: After Sliming 30 Heroes, increase Slime's slow amount to 30%.

level4.name: Tufferfish
level4.fullTooltip: Pufferfish gains 50 Spell Armor and deals 50% more damage to Slimed targets.

level4.name: Living the Dream
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Every 15 seconds Murky is alive, he gains 5% Spell Power, up to 15%. This bonus is reset upon his death.

level7.name: Black Lagoon
level7.fullTooltip: Increase Slime's radius by 30%.

level7.name: Slippery When Wet
level7.shortTooltip: Move faster during Safety Bubble, reduce cooldown
level7.fullTooltip: Gain 50% Movement Speed and move through units while in Safety Bubble. Additionally, Safety Bubble's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

level7.name: Time to Krill
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 7 (+4% per level) damage a second and slow the target by 7% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

level10.name: March of the Murlocs
level10.shortTooltip: Swarm enemies with Murlocs
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 (+4% per level) damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

level10.name: Octo-Grab
level10.shortTooltip: Stun and poke an enemy Hero
level10.fullTooltip: Murky becomes Unstoppable and Stuns target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.

level13.name: Rejuvenating Bubble
level13.fullTooltip: Safety Bubble restores 40% of Murky's maximum Health.

level13.name: Egg Shell
level13.fullTooltip: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Health. The shield lasts indefinitely.

level13.name: Fish Tank
level13.fullTooltip: Murky is healed for 25% of the damage he deals with Basic Attacks and Basic Abilities.

level16.name: Toxic Buildup
level16.shortTooltip: Successive Basic Attacks cast Slime
level16.fullTooltip: Every 3rd consecutive Basic Attack against an enemy Hero causes a free Slime to be cast upon them.

level16.name: Fish Oil
level16.shortTooltip: Casts Slime at Pufferfish location
level16.fullTooltip: The Pufferfish casts Slime at its location upon landing.

level16.name: Wrath of Cod
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Pufferfish damage on Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Heroes hit by Pufferfish take additional damage equal to 15% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds.

level20.name: Never-Ending Murlocs
level20.shortTooltip: March of the Murlocs can channel forever
level20.fullTooltip: March of the Murlocs can be channeled, sending little Murlocs indefinitely.

level20.name: ... And a Shark Too!
level20.fullTooltip: Increase the damage of Octo-Grab by 13700%.

level20.name: Big Tuna Kahuna
level20.fullTooltip: Murky's maximum Health and Egg respawn time are doubled.

level20.name: Making Inky
level20.fullTooltip: Reduces the Cooldown of Slime from 4 seconds to 2 seconds.

Nazeebo.name: Nazeebo
Nazeebo.description: A sustained damage Mage who gains power when killing enemy minions.

basic.name: Corpse Spiders
basic.shortTooltip: Throw a jar that summons Spiders to attack enemies hit
basic.fullTooltip: Hurl a jar of spiders that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage. If it hits at least one enemy, create 3 Corpse Spiders that attack for 38 (+4% per level) damage. Spiders last for 4 seconds.

basic.name: Zombie Wall
basic.shortTooltip: Summon a temporary ring of zombies that trap and attack
basic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, create a ring of Zombies surrounding the target area that deal 28 (+4% per level) damage and last for 3 seconds.

basic.name: Plague of Toads
basic.shortTooltip: Summon a wave of exploding toads
basic.fullTooltip: Create a wave of 3 Toads that explode on contact, dealing 119 (+4% per level) damage over 6 seconds. This effect stacks.  Stores up to 2 charges.

heroic.name: Gargantuan
heroic.shortTooltip: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area
heroic.fullTooltip: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 140 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

heroic.name: Ravenous Spirit
heroic.shortTooltip: Channel a damaging, movable spirit
heroic.fullTooltip: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 216 (+4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

trait.name: Voodoo Ritual
trait.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks and Abilities deal damage over time. Killed minions increase Health and Mana.
trait.fullTooltip: Nazeebo's Basic Attacks and Abilities poison Non-Heroic enemies, causing them to take 67 (+4% per level) additional damage over 6 seconds.   Quest: If a Minion dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, Nazeebo permanently gains 6 Health and 1 Mana.

basic.name: Gargantuan Stomp
basic.fullTooltip: Order the Gargantuan to stomp, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 30% for 2 seconds.

level1.name: Widowmakers
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Empower Corpse Spiders
level1.fullTooltip: Reward: After Corpse Spiders attack Heroes 100 times, their attack damage is increased by 30%.

level1.name: Pandemic
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Empower Plague of Toads
level1.fullTooltip: Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes with Plague of Toads, it spawns 2 additional toads.

level1.name: Thing of the Deep
level1.shortTooltip: Increase the range of Nazeebo's Abilities
level1.fullTooltip: Increases the range of Nazeebo's Basic Abilities by 20%.

level4.name: Hexed Crawlers
level4.shortTooltip: Corpse Spiders restore Health and Mana
level4.fullTooltip: Corpse Spiders restore 1% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana when they attack an enemy Hero.

level4.name: Big Voodoo
level4.fullTooltip: Increases the Health and Mana bonuses from Voodoo Ritual by 100%.

level4.name: Blood Ritual
level4.shortTooltip: Voodoo Ritual restores Health and Mana
level4.fullTooltip: If an enemy dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, restore 2% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana.

level7.name: Spirit of Arachyr
level7.shortTooltip: More Corpse Spiders against single enemy
level7.fullTooltip: If Corpse Spiders hits only one enemy, it creates 2 additional spiders.

level7.name: Dead Rush
level7.shortTooltip: Zombie Wall deals more damage and uproots
level7.fullTooltip: Zombie Wall deals 75% more damage. When it expires up to 5 remaining Zombies uproot and attack nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

level7.name: Toads of Hugeness
level7.shortTooltip: Toads become more powerful with each hop
level7.fullTooltip: Increase the damage and explosion radius of Plague of Toads by 25% after each hop, up to a maximum of 100%.

level10.name: Gargantuan
level10.shortTooltip: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area
level10.fullTooltip: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 140 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

level10.name: Ravenous Spirit
level10.shortTooltip: Channel a damaging, movable spirit
level10.fullTooltip: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 216 (+4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

level13.name: Guardian Toads
level13.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plague of Toads gives 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

level13.name: Superstition
level13.shortTooltip: Gain Spell Armor while not being Attacked
level13.fullTooltip: Gain 40 Spell Armor. Heroic Basic Attacks against Nazeebo remove this bonus for 3 seconds.

level13.name: Ice Block
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

level16.name: Spider Colony
level16.shortTooltip: Corpse Spiders reduce other Basic Ability cooldowns
level16.fullTooltip: Corpse Spider Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldowns of Zombie Wall and Plague of Toads by 0.25 seconds.

level16.name: Ring of Poison
level16.shortTooltip: Deals damage in center area
level16.fullTooltip: Zombie Wall lasts 1 second longer, and the center is filled with poison that deals a total of 319 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. This damage starts small and increases over the duration.

level16.name: Soul Harvest
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to increase Health and Spell Power
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to increase Nazeebo's Health and Spell Power by 7% for each nearby enemy, up to a maximum of 35%. Lasts 15 seconds.

level20.name: Humongoid
level20.shortTooltip: Reduce Gargantuan cooldown and mana cost
level20.fullTooltip: Reduce Gargantuan's cooldown by 40 seconds and its Mana cost by 50%.

level20.name: Annihilating Spirit
level20.shortTooltip: Increase range and speed of Ravenous Spirit
level20.fullTooltip: Increases the range of Ravenous Spirit by 50% and Movement Speed by 30%.

level20.name: Fury of the Storm
level20.fullTooltip: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

level20.name: Vile Infection
level20.fullTooltip: Quest: Reach 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual.  Reward: After reaching 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, it can also be applied to Heroes and its damage is increased from 67 (+4% per level) to 167 (+4% per level) over 6 seconds.

Nova.name: Nova
Nova.description: A burst damage Mage who can ambush enemies from Stealth.

basic.name: Snipe
basic.shortTooltip: Fire a shot and deal a large amount of damage to the first enemy hit
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 230 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.  Passive: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe permanently increases the damage of Snipe by 6%, stacking up to 30%. Gain an additional 25% damage bonus at maximum stacks. All stacks are lost if Snipe fails to hit an enemy.

basic.name: Pinning Shot
basic.shortTooltip: Slow and damage an enemy
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 100 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and Slow them by 40% for 2.25 seconds.

basic.name: Holo Decoy
basic.shortTooltip: Create a hologram decoy of Nova
basic.fullTooltip: Create a Decoy for 5 seconds with 100% of Nova's current Health that attacks enemies, dealing 10% of Nova's base damage. Whenever a Decoy takes damage, it deals that amount of damage to itself, effectively doubling the damage it takes.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

heroic.name: Triple Tap
heroic.shortTooltip: Fire at a target 3 times
heroic.fullTooltip: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 372 (+4% per level) damage each.

heroic.name: Precision Strike
heroic.shortTooltip: Area attack with unlimited range
heroic.fullTooltip: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 435 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

trait.name: Permanent Cloak
trait.shortTooltip: Stealth and gain Move Speed while not attacking or taking damage
trait.fullTooltip: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or Channeling ends Stealth. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.  Passive: Gain 15% Movement Speed while Stealthed.

activable.name: Ghost Protocol
activable.shortTooltip: Instantly Stealth and spawn a Holo Decoy at your location
activable.fullTooltip: Activate to instantly grant Stealth to Nova and spawn a Holo Decoy at her location. Nova is Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds when Stealthed by Ghost Protocol.

level1.name: Longshot
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Pinning Shot range
level1.fullTooltip: Increases the cast range of Pinning Shot by 30%. Pinning Shot also increases the range of Nova's next Basic Attack by 2.

level1.name: Covert Ops
level1.shortTooltip: Stealth enhances Pinning Shot slow and cost
level1.fullTooltip: After being Stealthed for 5 seconds, Pinning Shot's Slow is increased to 55% and costs no Mana. Bonus is lost after losing Stealth for 1 second.

level1.name: Advanced Cloaking
level1.shortTooltip: Stealth grants Move Speed, Mana regen
level1.fullTooltip: After being Stealthed for 2 seconds, gain an additional 10% Movement Speed. While Stealthed, regenerate 2 Mana per second.

level4.name: Rapid Projection
level4.shortTooltip: Reduces Holo Decoy cooldown and Mana cost
level4.fullTooltip: Reduces Holo Decoy's cooldown and Mana cost by 40%.

level4.name: Holo Stability
level4.fullTooltip: Increase the cast range and duration of Holo Decoy by 100%.

level4.name: Covert Mission
level4.shortTooltip: Kill Minions or Heroes to bribe a Mercenary
level4.fullTooltip: Enemy Minions killed near Nova grant a stack of Bribe. Hero Takedowns grant 10 stacks of Bribe. Use 25 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them.  Does not work on Bosses.  Maximum of 100 stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.

level7.name: Perfect Shot
level7.shortTooltip: Increase Snipe stacks, Hero hits reduce cooldown
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe reduces the cooldown by 4 seconds and grants an additional stack of Snipe.

level7.name: One in the Chamber
level7.shortTooltip: Using an Ability empowers next Basic Attack
level7.fullTooltip: After using an Ability, Nova's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 60% additional damage.

level7.name: Anti-Armor Shells
level7.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks hit harder, reduce Physical Armor
level7.fullTooltip: Nova's Basic Attacks deal 250% damage and decrease the Physical Armor of Heroic targets by 10 for 3 seconds, but her Attack Speed is proportionally slower.

level10.name: Triple Tap
level10.shortTooltip: Fire at a target 3 times
level10.fullTooltip: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 372 (+4% per level) damage each.

level10.name: Precision Strike
level10.shortTooltip: Area attack with unlimited range
level10.fullTooltip: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 435 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

level13.name: Psionic Efficiency
level13.shortTooltip: Increase Snipe range, hitting Heroes refunds Mana
level13.fullTooltip: Snipe's range is increased by 15%, and hitting a Hero with Snipe refunds its Mana cost.

level13.name: Double Tap
level13.shortTooltip: Pinning Shot gains a charge, cooldown increased
level13.fullTooltip: Pinning Shot now has 2 charges, but its cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.

level13.name: Ionic Force Field
level13.fullTooltip: Gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds after losing Stealth.

level16.name: Explosive Round
level16.shortTooltip: Snipe deals damage in an area
level16.fullTooltip: Snipe also deals 80% damage to enemies near the impact.

level16.name: Crippling Shot
level16.shortTooltip: Pinning Shot lowers Armor
level16.fullTooltip: Pinning Shot lowers a Hero's Armor by 20 for the duration of the Slow, causing them to take 20% increased damage.

level16.name: Lethal Decoy
level16.shortTooltip: Holo Decoy deals more damage
level16.fullTooltip: Increases the damage Holo Decoy deals to 30% of Nova's damage.

level20.name: Fast Reload
level20.shortTooltip: Triple Tap cooldown resets on Hero kills
level20.fullTooltip: Triple Tap's cooldown is reset if it kills an enemy Hero.

level20.name: Precision Barrage
level20.shortTooltip: Lower Precision Strike cooldown, gain charge
level20.fullTooltip: Precision Strike gains a 2nd charge and its coodown is reduced by 30 seconds.

level20.name: Apollo Suit
level20.fullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Permanent Cloak by 2 seconds.

level20.name: Rewind
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

Orphea.name: Orphea
Orphea.description: A ranged Assassin who dances around her enemies while using spells to empower her attacks.

basic.name: Shadow Waltz
basic.shortTooltip: Damage enemies in a line and dash after hitting a Hero
basic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, deal 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.   Hitting a Hero with Shadow Waltz sets its cooldown to 2 seconds, refunds 40 Mana, and causes Orphea to dash a short distance upon moving.

basic.name: Chomp
basic.shortTooltip: Damage enemies in front of Orphea
basic.fullTooltip: After 0.625 seconds, deal 285 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies in front of Orphea.

basic.name: Dread
basic.shortTooltip: Damage enemies in a line, erupting after a short delay
basic.fullTooltip: Release a wave of dread that deals 85 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit. Dread erupts 0.75 seconds after reaching the end of its path, dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies in the area by 25% for 2 seconds.

heroic.name: Eternal Feast
heroic.shortTooltip: Damage enemies in an area repeatedly
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1.5 seconds, deal 210 (+4% per level) damage in an area. Eternal Feast repeats every 1 second as long as it hits an enemy Hero.

heroic.name: Crushing Jaws
heroic.shortTooltip: Pull, damage, and Stun enemies in an area
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1.25 seconds, pulls enemies in an area towards the center, dealing 275 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

trait.name: Overflowing Chaos
trait.shortTooltip: Basic Abilities against enemy Heroes grant Chaos
trait.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability grants 1 Chaos. Chaos can stack up to 3 times.  While Orphea has Chaos, her Basic Attacks against Heroes consumes all Chaos, dealing 50% increased damage per stack, and healing for 100% of the damage dealt.

level1.name: En Pointe
level1.shortTooltip: Extra Shadow Waltz damage at its end
level1.fullTooltip: Shadow Waltz deals an increased 50% damage to enemies hit by its end.

level1.name: Growing Nightmare
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Dread eruption damage by hitting Heroes
level1.fullTooltip: Each Hero hit by the wave of Dread increases the damage of its eruption by 25%.

level1.name: Ancestral Strength
level1.shortTooltip: Abilities deal more damage to disabled enemies
level1.fullTooltip: Non-Heroic Abilities deal 25% more damage to Stunned, Rooted, Silenced or Slowed enemies and grant 1 additional Chaos when hitting Heroes.

level4.name: Allegrissimo
level4.shortTooltip: Extra Shadow Waltz cooldown reduction at its end
level4.fullTooltip: Hitting Heroes with the end of Shadow Waltz sets its cooldown to 1 second.

level4.name: Backbiter
level4.shortTooltip: Orphea dashes back after Chomp hits a Hero
level4.fullTooltip: If Chomp hits a Hero, Orphea immediately dashes a short distance backwards.

level4.name: Fright
level4.fullTooltip: Dread's Slow also applies to enemies in Dread's path, and stacks up to 50%.

level7.name: Insatiable
level7.shortTooltip: Hitting a Hero reduces Chomp's cooldown
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Chomp sets its cooldown to 2 seconds.

level7.name: Ravenous Hunger
level7.shortTooltip: Quest: Chomp kills increase damage, heals
level7.fullTooltip: Quest: Minions that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Chomp permanently increase its damage by 2 and heal Orphea for 60 (+4% per level).   Heroes that die increase its damage by 40 and heal Orphea for 25% of her maximum Health.

level7.name: Mind Devourer
level7.shortTooltip: Quest: Increase Dread damage, reduce cooldown
level7.fullTooltip: Quest: Hitting Heroes with Dread increases its damage by 5, up to 200.  Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, hitting an enemy Hero with Dread's eruption sets its cooldown to 6 seconds and refunds 50 Mana.

level10.name: Eternal Feast
level10.shortTooltip: Damage enemies in an area repeatedly
level10.fullTooltip: After 1.5 seconds, deal 210 (+4% per level) damage in an area. Eternal Feast repeats every 1 second as long as it hits an enemy Hero.

level10.name: Crushing Jaws
level10.shortTooltip: Pull, damage, and Stun enemies in an area
level10.fullTooltip: After 1.25 seconds, pulls enemies in an area towards the center, dealing 275 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

level13.name: Determination
level13.shortTooltip: Shadow Waltz grants Spell Armor after dashing
level13.fullTooltip: After dashing with Shadow Waltz, Orphea gains 50 Spell Armor, stacking up to 2 times. While Orphea has Determination, her Physical damage is increased by 15%.

level13.name: Abyssal Symbiosis
level13.shortTooltip: Chomp hitting Heroes grants more Chaos
level13.fullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Chomp instantly grants Orphea maximum Chaos.

level13.name: Invasive Miasma
level13.shortTooltip: Activate Overflowing Chaos to damage, heal
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to deal 150 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies after 2 seconds. For each Hero hit, heal for 182 (+4% per level) and gain 1 Chaos.

level16.name: Bond of Anguish
level16.shortTooltip: Shadow Waltz steals percent Health
level16.fullTooltip: Shadow Waltz deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 3% of their maximum Health, healing Orphea for 50% of damage dealt.

level16.name: Dead Magic
level16.shortTooltip: Chaos Basic Attacks ignore Armor, area damage
level16.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks that consume Chaos ignore Armor and deal 115 (+4% per level) Spell Damage to all enemies around the target.

level16.name: Lurking Terror
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to cast Chomp from Dread's eruption
level16.fullTooltip: After Dread erupts and for 2 seconds after, activate to cast Chomp from the eruption area.  Does not share a cooldown with Chomp.

level20.name: Monster Within
level20.shortTooltip: Eternal Feast grants Chaos, increases Attack Speed
level20.fullTooltip: Eternal Feast grants 1 Chaos each time it hits a Hero. While Eternal Feast is active, Orphea's Attack Speed is increased by 50%.

level20.name: Engulfing Oblivion
level20.shortTooltip: Crushing Jaws lowers Armor, reduces cooldown
level20.fullTooltip: Crushing Jaws reduces the Armor of Heroes hit by 25 for 2 seconds. Takedowns set its cooldown to 5 seconds.

level20.name: Eldritch Conduit
level20.fullTooltip: Each Chaos consumed increases Orphea's Spell Power by 3%, up to 30%. After reaching the maximum bonus, the Spell Power is further increased by an additional 30%. Lasts 10 seconds.

level20.name: Final Toccata
level20.shortTooltip: Shadow Waltz cooldown resets after dashing
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to instantly reset the cooldown of Shadow Waltz. For the next 6 seconds, dashing with Shadow Waltz resets its cooldown.

Probius.name: Probius
Probius.description: A high damage Summoner that must stay near Pylons to be effective.

basic.name: Disruption Pulse
basic.shortTooltip: Fire a missile in a line that damages enemies and detonates Warp Rifts
basic.fullTooltip: Fire a burst of energy forward, dealing 142 (+5% per level) damage to all enemies it passes through.  Hitting the center of a Warp Rift will cause it to explode, dealing additional damage.

basic.name: Warp Rift
basic.shortTooltip: Create a rift that slows enemies and can be detonated with Disruption Pulse
basic.fullTooltip: Open an unstable Warp Rift at a location that takes 1.25 seconds to arm, which then slows nearby enemies by 25% lasting 9 seconds.  Armed Warp Rifts explode when hit by Disruption Pulse, dealing 261 (+5% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Stores up to 2 charges.

basic.name: Photon Cannon
basic.shortTooltip: Create a cannon that attacks nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Warp in a Photon Cannon that deals 105 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 13 seconds.  Must be placed within a Pylon's Power Field.  Deactivates if it doesn't have a Pylon powering it.

heroic.name: Pylon Overcharge
heroic.shortTooltip: Weaponize Pylons
heroic.fullTooltip: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 96 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.

heroic.name: Null Gate
heroic.shortTooltip: Create a slowing barrier
heroic.fullTooltip: Vector Targeting Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 68 (+4% per level) damage per second and are slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.

trait.name: Warp In Pylon
trait.shortTooltip: Summon a Pylon that renergizes Probius and allows the construction of other buildings
trait.fullTooltip: Warp in a Pylon that generates a Power Field and grants vision of the surrounding area. Probius only regenerates mana while inside a Power Field.  Up to 2 Pylons can be active at a time.

mount.name: Worker Rush
mount.shortTooltip: Move faster passively.  Activate to move even faster.
mount.fullTooltip: Activate to gain an additional 60% Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Taking damage ends this effect early.  Worker Rush is always active while at the Altar.  Passive: Probius moves 10% faster by hovering over the ground.

level1.name: Echo Pulse
level1.shortTooltip: Disruption Pulse returns to Probius
level1.fullTooltip: Disruption Pulse now returns to Probius 1.25 seconds after reaching its target, dealing 75% damage on the return trip.

level1.name: Warp Resonance
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Detonate Warp Rift on Heroes
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes with Warp Rift explosions.  Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, increase the explosion damage by 100.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, Warp Rift gains 1 additional charge.

level1.name: Gather Minerals
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Collect Minerals to empower Photon Cannons
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Enemy Heroes and Minions drop Minerals when killed. Collect them to increase the Health of Photon Cannons by 8, up to 560.   Reward: After collecting 70 Minerals, Photon Cannons deal 35% more damage, can see over obstacles, and reveal nearby Cloaked units.

level4.name: Photon Barrier
level4.shortTooltip: Gain Spell Armor while Photon Cannon is Active
level4.fullTooltip: While a Photon Cannon is alive and powered, Probius gains 30 Spell Armor.

level4.name: Turbo Charged
level4.shortTooltip: Move faster and decrease Worker Rush's cooldown
level4.fullTooltip: Worker Rush grants an additional 10% passive Movement Speed while in a Power Field, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

level4.name: Shield Capacitor
level4.fullTooltip: Probius gains permanent Shields equal to 10% of his max Health. Shields regenerate quickly as long as he hasn't taken damage recently.

level7.name: Particle Accelerator
level7.shortTooltip: Increase damage for each target hit
level7.fullTooltip: Disruption Pulse deals 10% more damage for each enemy or Warp Rift hit, up to 50%.

level7.name: Rift Shock
level7.shortTooltip: Deal more damage to enemies caught in Warp Rift detonations
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Warp Rift explosion increases Probius's damage against them by 20% for 10 seconds.

level7.name: Tower Defense
level7.fullTooltip: When Photon Cannon damages an enemy Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds.

level10.name: Pylon Overcharge
level10.shortTooltip: Weaponize Pylons
level10.fullTooltip: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 96 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.

level10.name: Null Gate
level10.shortTooltip: Create a slowing barrier
level10.fullTooltip: Vector Targeting Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 68 (+4% per level) damage per second and are slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.

level13.name: Aggressive Matrix
level13.fullTooltip: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 35% increased Attack Damage.

level13.name: Power Overflowing
level13.shortTooltip: Power Fields give Spell Power, Mana
level13.fullTooltip: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 10% increased Spell Power and 2 Mana per second.

level13.name: Shield Battery
level13.fullTooltip: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 28 (+4% per level) Shields per second, up to 112 (+4% per level). Shields persist for 2 seconds after exiting a Pylon Power Field.

level16.name: Quantum Entanglement
level16.shortTooltip: Warp Rift's slow lingers
level16.fullTooltip: Enemies continue to be slowed for 3 seconds after their last contact with a Warp Rift.

level16.name: Gravity Well
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Warp Rift Slow amount in center
level16.fullTooltip: Enemies are slowed more the closer they are to the center of the Warp Rift, up to a maximum slow of 60%.

level16.name: Repulsor
level16.shortTooltip: Enemies are knocked away from Warp Rift detonations
level16.fullTooltip: Enemies hit by a Warp Rift explosion are knocked away from the center.

level16.name: Interference
level16.shortTooltip: Warp Rift explosions reduce enemy Spell Power
level16.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Warp Rift detonations have their Spell Power reduced by 35% for 5 seconds.

level20.name: Construct Additional Pylons
level20.shortTooltip: Increase max Pylon count and Pylon Overcharge damage
level20.fullTooltip: Probius can now have up to 3 active Pylons, and increase the damage of Pylon Overcharge by 25%.

level20.name: Gate Keeper
level20.shortTooltip: Indefinite duration while in Pylon Power
level20.fullTooltip: Null Gate lasts indefinitely if either end is within a Power Field.  Only one Null Gate may be active at a time.

level20.name: Shoot 'Em Up
level20.shortTooltip: Hitting a Warp Rift splits Disruption Pulse into several additional pulses
level20.fullTooltip: Hitting a Warp Rift with Disruption Pulse causes 4 additional pulses that deal 50% damage to be fired from the impact location in different directions.    Additional Pulses do not benefit from Echo Pulse or Particle Accelerator.

level20.name: Probius Loop
level20.shortTooltip: Create new Warp Rifts by hitting Heroes with explosions
level20.fullTooltip: Whenever a Rift explosion hits 1 or more enemy Heroes, create a new Warp Rift in the same location.

Ragnaros.name: Ragnaros
Ragnaros.description: A Bruiser that can nullify enemy pushes against his Forts and Keeps.

basic.name: Empower Sulfuras
basic.shortTooltip: Deal damage in an area and heal Ragnaros
basic.fullTooltip: Ragnaros's next Basic Attack is instant, dealing 191 (+4% per level) Ability damage in an area, and heals for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing doubled versus Heroes.  Molten Core: Molten Swing Stun and damage nearby enemies.

basic.name: Living Meteor
basic.shortTooltip: Summon a meteor to damage enemies in a line
basic.fullTooltip: Vector Targeting Summon a meteor at the target point that deals 68 (+4% per level) damage, then rolls in the target direction dealing 272 (+4% per level) damage per second for 1.75 seconds.  Molten Core: Meteor Shower Drop a line of meteor impacts.

basic.name: Blast Wave
basic.shortTooltip: Cause a delayed explosion around an ally
basic.fullTooltip: Ignite Ragnaros or an ally, granting 25% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds before exploding dealing 104 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Molten Core: Explosive Rune Cause a delayed explosion in a large area.

heroic.name: Sulfuras Smash
heroic.shortTooltip: Damage and Stun enemies in an area
heroic.fullTooltip: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 198 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

heroic.name: Lava Wave
heroic.shortTooltip: Send a wave of lava down a lane
heroic.fullTooltip: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

trait.name: Molten Core
trait.shortTooltip: Take over a destroyed or Allied fort to unleash Ragnaros's full power
trait.fullTooltip: Channel on an allied or destroyed Fort or Keep to replace it with Ragnaros's ultimate form, temporarily gaining new Abilities, having 3996 (+4% per level) Health that burns away over 18 seconds.  Ragnaros returns to his normal form upon losing all Health in Molten Core.

level1.name: Sulfuras Hungers
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Kill Minions with Empower Sulfuras to increase its damage
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Every time Empower Sulfuras kills a Minion, its damage is increased by 1, up to 30.  Reward: After killing 30 Minions, increase its damage by an additional 90.

level1.name: Shifting Meteor
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes to empower Living Meteor
level1.fullTooltip: Each time an enemy is hit by the same Living Meteor, they take 3% increased damage from it.  Quest: Hit 75 Heroes with Living Meteor.  Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes with Living Meteor, its duration is increased to 2.25 seconds, and it can be reactivated to change its direction once per use.

level1.name: Engulfing Flame
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Blast Wave damage, radius
level1.fullTooltip: Increase Blast Wave's damage by 75% and its radius by 15%.

level4.name: Fire Ward
level4.fullTooltip: When Living Meteor hits an enemy Hero, gain a charge of Spell Armor, reducing damage from the next enemy ability by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

level4.name: Slow Burn
level4.fullTooltip: Blast Wave slows enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds.

level4.name: Catching Fire
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Regen Globes increase Health Regen
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Ragnaros' Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 18.75.  Reward: After gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, activate Catching Fire to gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

level7.name: Hand of Ragnaros
level7.fullTooltip: If Empower Sulfuras hits at least 2 enemy Heroes, it restores 10 Mana and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

level7.name: Molten Power
level7.shortTooltip: After hitting Heroes, next Living Meteor deals increased damage
level7.fullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Living Meteor increases the damage of the next Living Meteor by 20%, up to a maximum of 100%.

level7.name: Blistering Attacks
level7.shortTooltip: Periodically empower Basic Attacks against Heroes
level7.fullTooltip: Every 10 seconds, Ragnaros's next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% bonus damage. Hitting enemies with Basic Abilities reduces this cooldown by 1 second.

level10.name: Sulfuras Smash
level10.shortTooltip: Damage and Stun enemies in an area
level10.fullTooltip: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 198 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

level10.name: Lava Wave
level10.shortTooltip: Send a wave of lava down a lane
level10.fullTooltip: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

level13.name: Cauterize Wounds
level13.fullTooltip: Empower Sulfuras heals for an additional 40% of damage dealt to Heroes over 2 seconds.

level13.name: Tempered Flame
level13.fullTooltip: When Blast Wave damages an enemy Hero, gain a Shield equal to 100% of the damage dealt for 3 seconds.

level13.name: Resilient Flame
level13.fullTooltip: When Ragnaros is Stunned, he gains 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 40%.   This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

level16.name: Giant Scorcher
level16.shortTooltip: Empower Sulfuras deals extra damage to Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Empower Sulfuras burns enemy Heroes for 9% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds. This additional damage does not heal Ragnaros.

level16.name: Meteor Bomb
level16.shortTooltip: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path
level16.fullTooltip: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path, dealing 220 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

level16.name: Blast Echo
level16.shortTooltip: A second Blast Wave is created after the first
level16.fullTooltip: After Blast Wave explodes, another Blast Wave is created on Ragnaros.

level20.name: Flames of Sulfuron
level20.shortTooltip: Sulfuras Smash slows enemies, stuns longer
level20.fullTooltip: Sulfuras Smash slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds, and enemies in the center are stunned for an additional 0.5 seconds.

level20.name: Lava Surge
level20.fullTooltip: Lava Wave gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

level20.name: Heroic Difficulty
level20.shortTooltip: Enhances Molten Core Health, cooldown, damage
level20.fullTooltip: Molten Core has 25% increased Health and Damage, and its cooldown is reduced by 50 seconds.

level20.name: Submerge
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to heal and enter Stasis
level20.fullTooltip: Ragnaros submerges below, entering Stasis and healing for 600 (+4% per level) Health over 3 seconds.

basic.name: Molten Swing
basic.shortTooltip: Stun and damage nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Swing Sulfuras in a wide arc, dealing 161 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning enemies for 1 second.  Damage increased by 25% versus Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

basic.name: Meteor Shower
basic.shortTooltip: Summon a line of meteors
basic.fullTooltip: Vector Targeting Summon 3 meteors at the target point that fall in the target direction. Each meteor deals 151 (+4% per level) damage and slows enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.  Damage increased by 25% versus Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

basic.name: Explosive Rune
basic.shortTooltip: Cause a delayed explosion in a large area
basic.fullTooltip: Create a rune that deals 285 (+4% per level) damage to non-Structure enemies after 1.5 seconds.  Damage increased by 25% versus Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

Raynor.name: Raynor
Raynor.description: A Physical Damage Assassin that can keep enemies away.

basic.name: Penetrating Round
basic.shortTooltip: Fire a shot damaging, knocking back, and Slowing enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 220 (+4% per level) damage, knock back, and Slow enemies in a line by 20% for 2 seconds. Enemies close to Raynor are knocked back further.

basic.name: Inspire
basic.shortTooltip: Reset and empower Basic Attacks
basic.fullTooltip: Raynor and all nearby allied Minions and Mercenaries gain 30% Attack Speed and 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.  Casting Inspire resets Raynor's Basic Attack cooldown.

basic.name: Adrenaline Rush
basic.shortTooltip: Activate to heal
basic.fullTooltip: Heal Raynor for 25% of his maximum Health over 1 second. Raynor's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of this by 0.5 seconds, doubled against Heroes.

heroic.name: Hyperion
heroic.shortTooltip: Call down a strafing Battlecruiser
heroic.fullTooltip: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run for 12 seconds, hitting up to 4 enemies for 66 (+4% per level) damage every second. Every 4 seconds, it can fire its Yamato Cannon at a Structure, dealing 794 (+4% per level) damage.

heroic.name: Raynor's Raider
heroic.shortTooltip: Summon a Banshee escort
heroic.fullTooltip: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals 84 (+4% per level) damage per second and regenerates 75 (+4% per level) Health per second if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee.  The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.

trait.name: Give 'Em Some Pepper
trait.shortTooltip: Periodically empower Basic Attacks
trait.fullTooltip: Every 4th Basic Attack splashes in a small area and deals 125% more damage to the main target.

level1.name: Veteran Marksman
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Empower Give 'Em Some Pepper
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Every time the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper is a Hero, permanently increase its damage bonus by 0.75%.

level1.name: Ace In The Hole
level1.shortTooltip: Deal more damage to disabled Heroes
level1.fullTooltip: Deal 15% more damage to Stunned or Slowed Heroes.

level1.name: Exterminator
level1.shortTooltip: Increased Attack damage to non-Heroes
level1.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal 50% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. This is increased to 100% while Inspire is active.

level4.name: Fight or Flight
level4.shortTooltip: Adrenaline Rush cooldown reduced, grants Armor
level4.fullTooltip: Reduce Adrenaline Rush's cooldown by 10 seconds. Casting Adrenaline Rush grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

level4.name: Sustaining Rounds
level4.fullTooltip: Give 'Em Some Pepper heals Raynor for 3% of his maximum Health, increased to 6% if the primary target is a Hero.

level4.name: Behemoth Armor
level4.fullTooltip: Gain 200 bonus maximum Health.    Quest: Every time Give 'Em Some Pepper's primary target is a Hero, gain an additional 5 maximum Health.

level7.name: Fuel The Rush
level7.fullTooltip: While Inspire is active, increase Adrenaline Rush's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks by 200%.

level7.name: Unstable Compound
level7.shortTooltip: Give 'Em Some Pepper area increased, Slows
level7.fullTooltip: Increase the area of Give 'Em Some Pepper by 15%, and enemies hit by it are Slowed by 10% for 2.5 seconds.

level7.name: Heavy Slugs
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to increase the distance of the next Penetrating Round by 30% and increase its Slow duration to 6 seconds.

level10.name: Hyperion
level10.shortTooltip: Call down a strafing Battlecruiser
level10.fullTooltip: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run for 12 seconds, hitting up to 4 enemies for 66 (+4% per level) damage every second. Every 4 seconds, it can fire its Yamato Cannon at a Structure, dealing 794 (+4% per level) damage.

level10.name: Raynor's Raider
level10.shortTooltip: Summon a Banshee escort
level10.fullTooltip: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals 84 (+4% per level) damage per second and regenerates 75 (+4% per level) Health per second if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee.  The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.

level13.name: Debilitating Rounds
level13.fullTooltip: Decrease the cooldown of Penetrating Round by 3 seconds. While Inspire is active, Penetrating Round's Slow is increased by 20%.

level13.name: Rallying Cry
level13.shortTooltip: Inspire lasts longer and affects allied Heroes
level13.fullTooltip: Increase the duration of Inspire by 1 second. Casting Inspire grants nearby allied Heroes 10% Movement and Attack Speed for its duration.

level13.name: Giddy-Up
level13.fullTooltip: Gain 8% Movement Speed while mounted and unmounted. Inspire grants 8% more Movement Speed.

level16.name: Paint Them Red
level16.shortTooltip: Penetrating Round deals more damage, heals
level16.fullTooltip: Increase the damage of Penetrating Round by 50% and heal for 90% of the damage it deals to Heroes.

level16.name: Give Me More!
level16.shortTooltip: Empower Adrenaline Rush and Inspire
level16.fullTooltip: Increase Adrenaline Rush healing by 50%. While Inspire is active, gain 1 Basic Attack range.

level16.name: Bounty Hunter
level16.shortTooltip: Empowers Give 'Em Some Pepper, grants Armor
level16.fullTooltip: If Give 'Em Some Pepper's target is a Hero, it deals an additional 3% of their maximum Health as damage and grants Raynor 5 Armor for 3 seconds.   Activate Give 'Em Some Pepper to apply it to Raynor's next Basic Attack.

level20.name: Indomitable Resolve
level20.fullTooltip: Give 'Em Some Pepper lowers the cooldown of Hyperion by 5 seconds if the primary target is a Hero. Inspire grants Raynor Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

level20.name: Dusk Wing
level20.fullTooltip: Increase the damage, Health, and leash range of Raynor's Raider by 100%. When it dies, both Inspire and Adrenaline Rush are activated for free.

level20.name: Weak Spot Acquired
level20.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes that are the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper have their Armor reduced by 25 for 2 seconds.

level20.name: Execute
level20.fullTooltip: Increase Attack Speed by 20%. Basic Attack damage is increased by 25% against targets below 50% Health.

Rehgar.name: Rehgar
Rehgar.description: A well-rounded Healer that pairs well with Melee allies.

basic.name: Chain Heal
basic.shortTooltip: Create a healing wave that jumps between allies
basic.fullTooltip: Heal an ally with a wave of healing for 260 (+4% per level) Health. The wave then bounces 2 times to nearby allies within 7 range, restoring 260 (+4% per level) Health to them.

basic.name: Lightning Shield
basic.shortTooltip: Imbue target ally with lightning, causing damage to nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Imbue an ally with lightning dealing 64 (+4% per level) damage a second to nearby enemies. Lasts 5 seconds.

basic.name: Earthbind Totem
basic.shortTooltip: Creates a totem that slows nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Create a totem that slows nearby enemies by 35%. The totem has 217 (+4% per level) Health and lasts for 8 seconds.

heroic.name: Ancestral Healing
heroic.shortTooltip: Significantly heal allied Hero
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1180 (+4% per level) Health.  Cannot be used on Rehgar.

heroic.name: Bloodlust
heroic.shortTooltip: Give allied Heroes Movement Speed, Attack Speed, and Life Steal
heroic.fullTooltip: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 8 seconds.

trait.name: Ghost Wolf
trait.shortTooltip: Transform into a Ghost Wolf
trait.fullTooltip: Instead of using a mount, Rehgar transforms into a Ghost Wolf with 20% increased Movement Speed. Basic Attacks in Ghost Wolf form cause him to lunge at his target and deal 75% bonus damage. Dealing damage, using Abilities, and channeling cancels Ghost Wolf form.

level1.name: Colossal Totem
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Earthbind Totem area and range
level1.fullTooltip: Increases the area and range of Earthbind Totem by 50%.

level1.name: Electric Charge
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Lightning Shield radius
level1.fullTooltip: Increases the radius of Lightning Shield by 25%.

level1.name: Wolf Run
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Ghost Wolf Move Speed
level1.fullTooltip: Increases the Movement Speed of Ghost Wolf from 20% to 30%.

level4.name: Spiritwalker's Grace
level4.fullTooltip: Reduces Chain Heal's Mana cost from 55 to 40.

level4.name: Feral Heart
level4.shortTooltip: Increases Health and Mana Regen in Ghost Wolf
level4.fullTooltip: Increases Health and Mana Regeneration by 75% while in Ghost Wolf form.

level4.name: Stormcaller
level4.fullTooltip: When Lightning Shield damages an enemy it restores 4 Mana, up to 100.

level4.name: Healing Totem
level4.shortTooltip: Activate to place a ward which heals in an area
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to place a Totem that heals allied Heroes in an area for 2% of their maximum Health every second for 10 seconds.

level7.name: Blood and Thunder
level7.shortTooltip: Ghost Wolf attacks reduce Basic Ability cooldowns
level7.fullTooltip: Ghost Wolf attacks reduce Basic Ability cooldowns by 2 seconds.

level7.name: Farsight
level7.shortTooltip: Activate to reveal target area and nearby enemies
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to reveal an area for 5 seconds. Enemies in the area are revealed for 3 seconds.

level7.name: Cleanse
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

level7.name: Totemic Projection
level7.fullTooltip: Increases Earthbind Totem's duration from 8 to 12 seconds, and it can be reactivated to move an existing totem to a new location once.

level10.name: Ancestral Healing
level10.shortTooltip: Significantly heal allied Hero
level10.fullTooltip: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1180 (+4% per level) Health.  Cannot be used on Rehgar.

level10.name: Bloodlust
level10.shortTooltip: Give allied Heroes Movement Speed, Attack Speed, and Life Steal
level10.fullTooltip: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 8 seconds.

level13.name: Earth Shield
level13.fullTooltip: Lightning Shield gives Heroes a Shield that absorbs damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.

level13.name: Tidal Waves
level13.fullTooltip: Reduces Chain Heal's cooldown by 0.75 seconds for each Hero healed.

level13.name: Earthliving Enchant
level13.shortTooltip: Empowers Chain Heal on low Health Heroes
level13.fullTooltip: When Chain Heal heals a Hero below 50% Health, they are healed an additional 225 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds.

level16.name: Earthgrasp Totem
level16.shortTooltip: Increases Earthbind Totem initial slow
level16.fullTooltip: When Earthbind Totem is first cast, it slows nearby enemies by 90% for 1 second.

level16.name: Hunger of the Wolf
level16.shortTooltip: Ghost Wolf attacks do extra damage and heal
level16.fullTooltip: Ghost Wolf attacks against Heroes deal an additional 5% of the target's maximum Health and heal Rehgar for 5% of his maximum Health.

level16.name: Rising Storm
level16.shortTooltip: Increases Lightning Shield damage with each hit
level16.fullTooltip: Every time Lighting Shield damages an enemy Hero, increase that Lightning Shield's damage by 15%. Stacks up to 15 times.

level20.name: Farseer's Blessing
level20.shortTooltip: Increases heal and heals in area
level20.fullTooltip: Increases healing amount by 75%. Allies near the target are healed for 75% of the amount of Health regained.

level20.name: Gladiator's War Shout
level20.fullTooltip: Increases Bloodlust's healing from 30% to 60% of Basic Attack damage done.

level20.name: Rewind
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

level20.name: Storm Shield
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to grant Shields to all nearby allies
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

Rexxar.name: Rexxar
Rexxar.description: A Bruiser that with his bear, Misha, expertly controls areas of the battleground.

basic.name: Spirit Swoop
basic.shortTooltip: Launch a hawk to damage enemies and slow them
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 141 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line, slowing them by 30% for 2 seconds.

basic.name: Misha, Charge!
basic.shortTooltip: Order Misha to charge, damaging and stunning enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Misha charges in a line, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies for 1.25 seconds.

basic.name: Mend Pet
basic.shortTooltip: Heal Misha over time
basic.fullTooltip: Heal Misha for 714 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds.

heroic.name: Unleash the Boars
heroic.shortTooltip: Send a pack of boars to hunt enemy Heroes
heroic.fullTooltip: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

heroic.name: Bestial Wrath
heroic.shortTooltip: Increases Misha's Basic Attacks
heroic.fullTooltip: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 150% for 12 seconds.

trait.name: Misha, Focus!
trait.shortTooltip: Command Misha to move or attack
trait.fullTooltip: Passive: Misha gains 15% move speed.   Command Misha to attack a specific enemy or move to a point and wait.  Targeting Rexxar commands Misha to retreat to his position, gaining 30% move speed until she reaches Rexxar.  Targeting Misha commands her to hold her current position.

level1.name: Easy Prey
level1.shortTooltip: Misha is more effective against Minions and Mercs
level1.fullTooltip: Increases Misha's damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 150%, and Misha gains 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing damage taken by 50%.

level1.name: Bird of Prey
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Spirit Swoop damage to Minions
level1.fullTooltip: Increases Spirit Swoop's damage by 150% to Minions.

level1.name: Flare
level1.shortTooltip: Gain vision of an area
level1.fullTooltip: Fire a flare at an area, revealing it for 20 seconds.

level4.name: Hungry Bear
level4.fullTooltip: Misha's Basic Attacks heal her for 4.5% of her maximum Health.

level4.name: Hunter-Gatherer
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Regen Globes grant Health Regen
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Rexxar's Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 25 per second.   Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Rexxar and Misha gain 10 Armor.

level4.name: Grizzled Fortitude
level4.fullTooltip: Every 6 seconds, Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges. Both Rexxar and Misha have their own charges.

level4.name: Animal Husbandry
level4.fullTooltip: Rexxar and Misha gain 2 Maximum Health every second Rexxar remains alive. These bonuses are lost on Rexxar's death.

level7.name: Aspect of the Beast
level7.shortTooltip: Misha's Basic Attacks lower Misha, Charge! cooldown
level7.fullTooltip: Misha's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Misha, Charge! by 1.25 seconds.

level7.name: Crippling Talons
level7.shortTooltip: Increases Spirit Swoop slow amount and duration
level7.fullTooltip: Increases Spirit Swoop's slow amount to 50% and its duration to 3.5 seconds.

level7.name: Taking Flight
level7.shortTooltip: Increases Spirit Swoop range, returns Mana
level7.fullTooltip: Increases Spirit Swoop's range by 20%. If Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, the Mana cost is refunded and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

level10.name: Bestial Wrath
level10.shortTooltip: Increases Misha's Basic Attacks
level10.fullTooltip: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 150% for 12 seconds.

level10.name: Unleash the Boars
level10.shortTooltip: Send a pack of boars to hunt enemy Heroes
level10.fullTooltip: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

level13.name: Wildfire Bear
level13.shortTooltip: Misha deals damage to nearby enemies
level13.fullTooltip: Misha deals 28 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

level13.name: Aspect of the Hawk
level13.fullTooltip: When Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, Rexxar gains 125% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Misha's Basic Attacks increase the duration of this buff by 0.75 seconds.

level13.name: Dire Beast
level13.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks increase damage of Misha, Charge!
level13.fullTooltip: Rexxar and Misha's Basic Attacks increase the damage of the next Misha, Charge! by 40%, stacking up to a 400% bonus.

level16.name: Thrill of the Hunt
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks increase Move Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Rexxar's Basic Attacks increase both his and Misha's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

level16.name: Primal Intimidation
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to slow enemy Attack and Move speed
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of Heroes and Summons near Rexxar and Misha for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack Rexxar or Misha have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

level16.name: Feign Death
level16.shortTooltip: Become Invulnerable and control Misha
level16.fullTooltip: Rexxar fakes his death, becoming Invulnerable and untargetable for 5 seconds. During this time you control Misha.

level20.name: Spirit Bond
level20.fullTooltip: Increases the duration of Bestial Wrath by 50% and Misha's Basic Attacks heal Rexxar for 50% of her damage dealt during Bestial Wrath.

level20.name: Kill Command
level20.shortTooltip: Unleash the Boars deals more damage and roots
level20.fullTooltip: Unleash the Boars deals 50% more damage and roots for 1.5 seconds.

level20.name: Frenzy of Kalimdor
level20.shortTooltip: Rexxar's Basic Attacks deal more damage, Misha's attacks slow
level20.fullTooltip: Rexxar's Basic Attacks deal 10% more damage, and Misha's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1.25 seconds.

level20.name: Hardened Skin
level20.shortTooltip: Rexxar and Misha gain massive Armor
level20.fullTooltip: Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.

Samuro.name: Samuro
Samuro.description: A stealthed Assassin that's great at capturing Mercenary camps and is difficult to kill.

basic.name: Mirror Image
basic.shortTooltip: Create Mirror Images to confuse and attack enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Teleport a short distance in the direction of the mouse cursor, creating 2 Mirror Images for 18 seconds with 100% of Samuro's current Health that Basic Attack enemies for 9 (+4% per level) damage. Whenever an Image takes damage, it deals that amount of damage to itself, effectively doubling the damage it takes.  Maximum 2 Mirror Images can be active at at time. Using Mirror Image removes most negative effects from Samuro.

basic.name: Critical Strike
basic.shortTooltip: Critically Strike for increased damage.
basic.fullTooltip: Samuro's next Basic Attack within 8 seconds will be a Critical Strike, dealing 50% increased damage. This also applies to Images, and does not break Wind Walk.  Passive: Samuro and his Images deal a Critical Strike on every 4th Basic Attack.

basic.name: Wind Walk
basic.shortTooltip: Become Stealthed and gain Movement Speed
basic.fullTooltip: Grant Samuro Stealth for up to 10 seconds or until he attacks, uses an Ability, or takes damage.  While Stealthed, Samuro's Movement Speed is increased by 25% and he can pass through other units. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.  Samuro is Unrevealable for the first 1 second of Wind Walk.

heroic.name: Bladestorm
heroic.shortTooltip: Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force
heroic.fullTooltip: Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force around Samuro for 4 seconds, making him Unstoppable and dealing 235 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

heroic.name: Illusion Master
heroic.shortTooltip: Mirror Images can be controlled
heroic.fullTooltip: Mirror Images can be controlled individually or as a group and their damage is increased by 100%.   Passive: Samuro's Basic Attack damage is increased by 10%, and Image Transmission's cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds.

trait.name: Image Transmission
trait.shortTooltip: Increase Movement Speed when attacking Heroes
trait.fullTooltip: Activate to switch places with a target Mirror Image, removing most negative effects from Samuro and the Mirror Image.  Advancing Strikes  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase Samuro's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

level1.name: Way of Illusion
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Image Critical Strikes empower Basic Attacks
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Every time a Mirror Image Critically Strikes a Hero, Samuro gains 0.5 Attack Damage, up to 20.  Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Samuro gains an additional 20 Attack Damage.

level1.name: Way of the Blade
level1.shortTooltip: Critical Strike happens more often
level1.fullTooltip: Critical Strike now happens for Samuro and his Mirror Images every 3rd Basic Attack.

level1.name: Way of the Wind
level1.shortTooltip: Wind Walk grants extra Move Speed
level1.fullTooltip: Gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds after entering or exiting Wind Walk.

level4.name: Mirage
level4.fullTooltip: Mirror Image grants Samuro and his Images 40 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell damage, reducing their damage by 40%.

level4.name: One With The Wind
level4.fullTooltip: While Samuro has Wind Walk and for 3 seconds after breaking it, both he and his Mirror Images gain 30 Armor, taking 30% reduced damage from all sources.

level4.name: Deflection
level4.fullTooltip: Advancing Strikes grants Samuro and his Mirror Images 30 Physical Armor.

level7.name: Burning Blade
level7.fullTooltip: Critical Strikes from Samuro and Mirror Images deal an additional 50% of their Basic Attack damage as Spell Damage to the target and nearby enemies.

level7.name: Phantom Pain
level7.fullTooltip: Samuro's Critical Strikes deal an additional 45% of his Basic Attack damage for each Mirror Image that is active.

level7.name: Crushing Blows
level7.shortTooltip: Critical Strike gains an additional charge
level7.fullTooltip: Critical Strike now has 2 charges. Samuro's Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Critical Strike by 1.75 seconds.

level10.name: Bladestorm
level10.shortTooltip: Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force
level10.fullTooltip: Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force around Samuro for 4 seconds, making him Unstoppable and dealing 235 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

level10.name: Illusion Master
level10.shortTooltip: Mirror Images can be controlled
level10.fullTooltip: Mirror Images can be controlled individually or as a group and their damage is increased by 100%.   Passive: Samuro's Basic Attack damage is increased by 10%, and Image Transmission's cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds.

level13.name: Mirrored Steel
level13.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Mirror Image cooldown
level13.fullTooltip: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Mirror Image by 1 second.

level13.name: Kawarimi
level13.fullTooltip: Wind Walk creates a Mirror Image at Samuro's location that will continue whatever he was doing.

level13.name: Shukuchi
level13.shortTooltip: Wind Walk teleports a short distance
level13.fullTooltip: Wind Walk teleports Samuro a short distance in the direction he's currently facing.

level16.name: Merciless Strikes
level16.shortTooltip: Critically Strike always happens on disabled targets
level16.fullTooltip: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemies are always Critical Strikes.

level16.name: Harsh Winds
level16.shortTooltip: Attacks from Wind Walk increase damage
level16.fullTooltip: Attacking a Hero during Wind Walk causes them to take 30% increased damage from Samuro for 3 seconds.

level16.name: Press the Attack
level16.shortTooltip: Advancing Strikes increases Attack Speed
level16.fullTooltip: While Advancing Strikes is active, Samuro and his Mirror Images gain 10% Attack Speed every time they Basic Attack, up to 40%.

level20.name: Dance Of Death
level20.fullTooltip: Mirror Images use Bladestorm when Samuro does, but for 25% damage.

level20.name: Three Blade Style
level20.shortTooltip: Images have increased Health and Duration
level20.fullTooltip: Samuro's Mirror Images no longer take additional damage, effecively increasing their health by 50% and their duration is increased to 36 seconds.

level20.name: Wind Strider
level20.fullTooltip: Wind Walk's cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds.

level20.name: Blademasters Pursuit
level20.shortTooltip: Increase Advancing Strikes Move Speed, duration
level20.fullTooltip: Advancing Strikes grants an additional 15% Movement Speed for Samuro and his Mirror Images, and its duration is increased by 2 seconds.

SgtHammer.name: Sgt. Hammer
SgtHammer.description: A long-range, Physical Damage dealer that needs protection from allies.

basic.name: Spider Mines
basic.shortTooltip: Create mines that slow and damage enemies on contact
basic.fullTooltip: Create 3 mines that arm after 1.25 seconds. Mines detonate when an enemy comes in range, dealing 96 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Slowing them by 25% for 1.5 seconds.  Siege Mode: Cast range increased by 100%.

basic.name: Concussive Blast
basic.shortTooltip: Knock back and damage enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 141 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in front of Sgt. Hammer and knock them back.  Siege Mode: Radius increased by 50%.

basic.name: Neosteel Plating
basic.shortTooltip: Gain temporary Armor
basic.fullTooltip: Gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds.  Siege Mode: Grants 100% more Armor.

heroic.name: Blunt Force Gun
heroic.shortTooltip: Fire a large bullet across the map
heroic.fullTooltip: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 (+3% per level) damage to non-Structure enemies in its path.

heroic.name: Napalm Strike
heroic.shortTooltip: Fire damaging napalm at enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

trait.name: Siege Mode
trait.shortTooltip: Become immobile to increase range and empower Basic Attacks
trait.fullTooltip: Activate to enter Siege Mode. While in Siege Mode, Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage, have 100% increased range, and deal 25% of their damage as splash damage around the target.

mount.name: Thrusters
mount.shortTooltip: Activate to gain a burst of Movement Speed
mount.fullTooltip: Increase Movement Speed by 60% for 4 seconds. Thrusters are always active while at the Altar. Activating Thrusters cancels Siege Mode.

level1.name: Ambush
level1.shortTooltip: Siege Mode grants Stealth, extra damage
level1.fullTooltip: Gain Stealth when entering Siege Mode or after not taking or dealing damage for 3 seconds while in Siege Mode. Basic Attacks while Stealthed deal 100% more damage.  Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

level1.name: Advanced Artillery
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Siege Mode splash damage, radius
level1.fullTooltip: Increase Siege Mode's splash damage to 50% of Basic Attack damage, and increase its splash radius by 25%.

level1.name: Maelstrom Rounds
level1.shortTooltip: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage dealt by 35% for 5 seconds. Hitting Structures with Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode reduces the cooldown of Maelstrom Rounds by 5 seconds.  Stores up to 3 charges.

level4.name: Barricade
level4.fullTooltip: Concussive Blast creates an impassable wall in front of Sgt. Hammer for 4 seconds.

level4.name: Siege Tactics
level4.fullTooltip: Using Neosteel Plating while in Siege Mode grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds, as long as she remains in Siege Mode.

level4.name: Regenerative Bio-Steel
level4.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks in Siege Mode heal
level4.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode heal for 10% of the damage dealt.

level7.name: Pulse Detonation Core
level7.fullTooltip: Spider Mines detonate 3 times over 3 seconds.

level7.name: Hover Siege Mode
level7.fullTooltip: Sgt. Hammer can move at 40% Movement Speed while in Siege Mode.

level7.name: Graduating Range
level7.shortTooltip: Gradually gain Basic Attack range in Siege Mode
