level7.fullTooltip: While in Siege Mode, Basic Attack range is increased by 1 every 3 seconds, up to 3.

level10.name: Blunt Force Gun
level10.shortTooltip: Fire a large bullet across the map
level10.fullTooltip: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 (+3% per level) damage to non-Structure enemies in its path.

level10.name: Napalm Strike
level10.shortTooltip: Fire damaging napalm at enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

level13.name: Tactical Mine Deployment
level13.fullTooltip: Moving while Thrusters is active leaves a trail of up to 5 Spider Mines. Additionally, increase the Slow of Spider Mines by 15%.

level13.name: Entrenched
level13.fullTooltip: While in Siege Mode, Concussive Blasts's damage and knockback distance are increased by 75%.

level13.name: Hyper-Cooling Engines
level13.shortTooltip: Siege Mode Attacks reduce Thrusters cooldown
level13.fullTooltip: While in Siege Mode, hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Thrusters by 5 seconds.

level16.name: Mechanical Know-how
level16.shortTooltip: Neosteel Plating grants a Shield
level16.fullTooltip: Neosteel Plating grants 5% maximum Health as a Shield for 2 seconds. If this Shield is destroyed, Basic Attack damage is increased by 50% for 5 seconds.

level16.name: Executioner
level16.shortTooltip: Attacking disabled Heroes increases damage
level16.fullTooltip: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

level16.name: Giant Killer
level16.shortTooltip: Empowers your Basic Attacks against Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

level20.name: Orbital BFG
level20.shortTooltip: BFG repeatedly travels through the map
level20.fullTooltip: Blunt Force Gun's missile orbits the planet every 5 seconds. Only the last missile fired orbits.

level20.name: Advanced Lava Strike
level20.fullTooltip: Napalm Strike's range is increased by 75% and its impact does 50% more damage.

level20.name: Shrapnel Mines
level20.fullTooltip: Upon detonating, Spider Mines reduce the armor of enemy Heroes hit by 10 for 4 seconds.

level20.name: Ultra Capacitors
level20.shortTooltip: Siege Mode Attacks grant Attack Speed
level20.fullTooltip: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode grants 5% Attack Speed for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

Sonya.name: Sonya
Sonya.description: A Bruiser that's great at capturing Mercenary camps and likes to dive into the enemy team.

basic.name: Ancient Spear
basic.shortTooltip: Throw a spear and pull self to the first enemy hit, stunning and dealing damage
basic.fullTooltip: Throw out a spear that pulls Sonya to the first enemy hit, dealing 173 (+4% per level) damage and briefly stunning them. If this hits an enemy, generate 40 Fury.

basic.name: Seismic Slam
basic.shortTooltip: Damage an enemy and splash damage behind them
basic.fullTooltip: Deals 176 (+4% per level) damage to the target enemy, and 44 (+4% per level) to enemies behind the target.

basic.name: Whirlwind
basic.shortTooltip: Damage nearby enemies and heal for a percentage of damage dealt
basic.fullTooltip: Deals 126 (+4% per level) damage a second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds, healing for 25% of damage dealt. Healing tripled versus Heroes.

heroic.name: Leap
heroic.shortTooltip: Jump to a location, deal damage, and stun enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Leap into the air, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

heroic.name: Wrath of the Berserker
heroic.shortTooltip: Increase damage and reduce disable duration
heroic.fullTooltip: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

trait.name: Fury
trait.shortTooltip: Generate Fury in combat. All Abilities grant Move Speed
trait.fullTooltip: Use Fury instead of Mana, which is gained by taking damage or dealing Basic Attack damage. Using a Basic or Heroic Ability grants 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

level1.name: Furious Blow
level1.shortTooltip: Empower Seismic Slam
level1.fullTooltip: Every 4th cast of Seismic Slam deals 50% more damage to the primary target and costs no Fury.

level1.name: War Paint
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks heal
level1.fullTooltip: Sonya's Basic Attacks heal for 30% of the damage dealt.

level1.name: Tough As Nails
level1.shortTooltip: Periodically gain Physical Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Every 16 seconds, gain 60 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 60%.  Stores up to 3 charges. Charges refresh 200% faster while Fury's Movement Speed bonus is active.

level4.name: Shattered Ground
level4.fullTooltip: Increase the length of Seismic Slam's splash by 66% and increase its splash damage to 100% of its base damage.

level4.name: Hurricane
level4.fullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Whirlwind by 2 seconds. Casting Whirlwind removes all Slows and Roots from Sonya.

level4.name: Shot Of Fury
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 50 Fury. Usable while Whirlwinding.  Passive: After casting Seismic Slam, your next Basic Attack deals 40% more damage.

level7.name: Poisoned Spear
level7.shortTooltip: Ancient Spear deals damage over time
level7.fullTooltip: Ancient Spear deals an additional 100% damage over 6 seconds.

level7.name: Life Funnel
level7.fullTooltip: Increases the healing of Whirlwind to 35% of damage dealt.

level7.name: Battle Rage
level7.shortTooltip: Increase damage to Mercenaries, activate to heal
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to instantly restore 10% of Sonya's maximum Health. Stores up to 2 charges. Usable while Whirlwinding.  Passive: Sonya deals 25% more damage to Mercenaries.

level10.name: Leap
level10.shortTooltip: Jump to a location, deal damage, and stun enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Leap into the air, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

level10.name: Wrath of the Berserker
level10.shortTooltip: Increase damage and reduce disable duration
level10.fullTooltip: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

level13.name: Mystical Spear
level13.shortTooltip: Ancient Spear always pulls, cooldown reduced
level13.fullTooltip: Ancient Spear always pulls Sonya to the target location even if it doesn't hit an enemy. When used this way, Ancient Spear's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

level13.name: Ruthless
level13.shortTooltip: Increase Whirlwind damage to low Health targets
level13.fullTooltip: Whirlwind deals an additional 50 (+4% per level) damage per second to Heroes below 33% Health. Does not generate additional healing.

level13.name: No Escape
level13.fullTooltip: Increases the Movement Speed bonus from using Basic and Heroic Abilities to 20%.

level16.name: Giant Slammer
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks and Seismic Slam deal bonus damage
level16.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks and Seismic Slam deal an additional 1.25% of Heroes' maximum Health as damage.

level16.name: Rampage
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Ancient Spear cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Increase Basic Attack damage by 25%. Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Ancient Spear by 0.5 seconds.

level16.name: Nerves of Steel
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to gain a Shield
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 25% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 3 seconds. Usable while Whirlwinding.

level20.name: Arreat Crater
level20.shortTooltip: Leap creates a crater and has reduced cooldown
level20.fullTooltip: Leap leaves behind an impassable crater for 5 seconds.  Reduces Leap's cooldown by 20 seconds.

level20.name: Striding Giant
level20.shortTooltip: Wrath of the Berserker can grant Unstoppable
level20.fullTooltip: Wrath of the Berserker increases maximum Health by 10% and grants Striding Giant, which can be activated to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds. 30 second cooldown.

level20.name: Composite Spear
level20.shortTooltip: Increase Ancient Spear range, grants Armor
level20.fullTooltip: Increases Ancient Spear's range by 50%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Ancient Spear grants 25 Armor for 4 seconds.

level20.name: Ignore Pain
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 60 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 60% less damage. Usable while Whirlwinding.

Stitches.name: Stitches
Stitches.description: A Tank who wants to isolate distant enemies away from their team.

basic.name: Hook
basic.shortTooltip: Pull the first target hit towards Stitches
basic.fullTooltip: Pull the first enemy hit towards Stitches and deal 91 (+4% per level) damage.

basic.name: Slam
basic.shortTooltip: Damage enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 104 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area.

basic.name: Devour
basic.shortTooltip: Damage an enemy and restore Health
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 319 (+4% per level) damage to non-Heroic units, or 114 (+4% per level) damage to Heroes. Restores 20% of Stitches' maximum Health.

heroic.name: Putrid Bile
heroic.shortTooltip: Emit a slowing bile puddle
heroic.fullTooltip: Emit bile that deals 37 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies within, slowing them by 35%. Stitches gains 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

heroic.name: Gorge
heroic.shortTooltip: Completely consume an enemy Hero
heroic.fullTooltip: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 (+4% per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.

trait.name: Vile Gas
trait.shortTooltip: When struck, damage nearby enemies over time
trait.fullTooltip: When damaged, Stitches emits a gas cloud that poisons nearby enemies for 68 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds.

activable.name: Helping Hand
activable.shortTooltip: Pull the first target hit towards Stitches
activable.fullTooltip: Pull the first ally or enemy hit towards Stitches. Enemies are temporarily stunned and take 91 (+4% per level) damage. When used to pull allies, the cooldown is reduced by 50%.

level1.name: Chew Your Food
level1.shortTooltip: Devour heals for more over time
level1.fullTooltip: Using Devour also heals Stitches for 10% of his max Health over 3 seconds.

level1.name: Dampen Magic
level1.shortTooltip: Periodically gain Spell Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Every 8 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

level1.name: Hungry for More
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Regen Globes increase Health
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Stitches's maximum Health by 30, up to 900.   Reward: Upon gathering 30 Globes, increase Movement Speed by 10%.

level1.name: Heavy Slam
level1.shortTooltip: Increased Slam damage
level1.fullTooltip: Slam damage increased by 40%.

level4.name: Amplified Healing
level4.fullTooltip: Increases regeneration effects and all healing received by 30%.

level4.name: Restorative Fumes
level4.fullTooltip: Whenever Vile Gas damages an enemy Hero, Stitches is healed for 27 (+4% per level) Health.

level4.name: Putrid Ground
level4.fullTooltip: Enemies hit by Slam are infected with Vile Gas.

level7.name: Savor the Flavor
level7.shortTooltip: Quest: Devouring Heroes gives permanent Health regen
level7.fullTooltip: Quest: Using Devour on an enemy Hero permanently increases Stitches's Health Regeneration by 2 per second.

level7.name: Last Bite
level7.fullTooltip: If an enemy dies within 3 seconds of being damaged by Devour, its cooldown is reduced by 12 seconds.

level7.name: Tenderizer
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks slow enemy Movement Speed by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

level7.name: Toxic Gas
level7.shortTooltip: Increases area and damage of Vile Gas
level7.fullTooltip: Increases Vile Gas' radius by 25% and its damage by 50%.

level10.name: Putrid Bile
level10.shortTooltip: Emit a slowing bile puddle
level10.fullTooltip: Emit bile that deals 37 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies within, slowing them by 35%. Stitches gains 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

level10.name: Gorge
level10.shortTooltip: Completely consume an enemy Hero
level10.fullTooltip: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 (+4% per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.

level13.name: Flea Bag
level13.fullTooltip: Whenever Stitches is stunned or rooted, his Basic Ability cooldowns are reduced by 6 seconds.

level13.name: Mega Smash
level13.fullTooltip: Range and arc of Slam increased by 25%.

level13.name: Indigestion
level13.fullTooltip: Using Devour also creates a Retchling that applies Vile Gas Poison when it attacks.

level16.name: Pulverize
level16.shortTooltip: Reduces Slam cooldown and adds slow
level16.fullTooltip: Decreases Slam's cooldown by 2 seconds and it also slows enemies by 75% for 1 second.

level16.name: Fishing Hook
level16.shortTooltip: Increased range
level16.fullTooltip: Hook has an additional 40% range.

level16.name: Shish Kabob
level16.shortTooltip: Hook pulls 2 targets
level16.fullTooltip: Hook can pull up to 2 targets.

level16.name: Stoneskin
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to gain a Shield
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds.

level20.name: Potent Bile
level20.shortTooltip: Putrid Bile lasts longer and slows more
level20.fullTooltip: Putrid Bile lasts 6 seconds longer and its slow amount is increased from 35% to 45%.

level20.name: Hungry Hungry Stitches
level20.fullTooltip: For 4 seconds after using Gorge, Stitches can teleport a short distance to additional targets and Gorge them.

level20.name: Hardened Shield
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 75% less damage.

level20.name: Cannibalize
level20.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes heal Stitches for 5% of his maximum Health.

Stukov.name: Stukov
Stukov.description: A Healer that brings high amounts of disruption from long range.

basic.name: Healing Pathogen
basic.shortTooltip: Infest allies with a spreading healing Virus
basic.fullTooltip: Infest an allied Hero with a Healing Pathogen that heals the target for 222 (+4% per level) Health over 4.5 seconds. Healing Pathogens can spread to a nearby allied Hero every 0.75 seconds.  Each cast of Healing Pathogen can only spread to each allied Hero 1 time.

basic.name: Weighted Pustule
basic.shortTooltip: Damage enemies and infest them with a Slowing Virus
basic.fullTooltip: Hurl a pustule that impacts all enemy Heroes in its path, dealing 20 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing by 5%, increasing to 50% over 3 seconds. Deals an additional 80 (+4% per level) damage upon expiring or being removed.

basic.name: Lurking Arm
basic.shortTooltip: Continually damage and Silence enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Channel at a target location, creating an area that deals 136 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies and Silences them. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes.  Does not cost Mana while Channeling, and lasts until canceled or interrupted.

heroic.name: Flailing Swipe
heroic.shortTooltip: Knock back enemies in front of Stukov
heroic.fullTooltip: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 48 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.

heroic.name: Massive Shove
heroic.shortTooltip: Shove an enemy until they collide with terrain
heroic.fullTooltip: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.

trait.name: Bio-Kill Switch
trait.shortTooltip: Detonate Viruses for immediate effects
trait.fullTooltip: Activate to detonate all of Stukov's Viruses. Each Healing Pathogen heals its target for 450 (+4% per level) Health, and each Weighted Pustule does 100 (+4% per level) damage and Slows its target by 70% for 2 seconds.  Can be cast while Channeling Lurking Arm.

level1.name: Spine Launcher
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks Slow, become ranged
level1.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks become ranged and Slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds, but deal 40% less damage.

level1.name: Fetid Touch
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Reduce Weighted Pustule cooldown, cost
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes with Weighted Pustule.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by 2.5 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by an additional 2.5 seconds and remove its Mana cost.

level1.name: Low Blow
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Lurking Arm damage to low Health targets
level1.fullTooltip: Lurking Arm deals 100% more damage to enemy Heroes below 30% Health.

level1.name: Poppin' Pustules
level1.shortTooltip: Weighted Pustule can detonate in an area
level1.fullTooltip: Detonating Weighted Pustule with Bio-Kill Switch within 1.5 seconds of its expiration increases its damage by 100% and applies its damage and Slow in an area.

level4.name: One Good Spread...
level4.shortTooltip: Reduce Healing Pathogen cooldown after spreading
level4.fullTooltip: After a Healing Pathogen infests 3 targets, restore 10 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Healing Pathogen by 2 seconds.

level4.name: Biotic Armor
level4.fullTooltip: Healing Pathogen grants 15 Physical Armor to targets while active on them. Detonating Bio-Kill Switch increases this bonus by 35 for 2.5 seconds.

level4.name: Vigorous Reuptake
level4.fullTooltip: Bio-Kill Switch heals for 30% more when detonating 3 or more Healing Pathogens.

level7.name: The Long Pitch
level7.shortTooltip: Increase Weighted Pustule range, reduce cooldowns
level7.fullTooltip: Increase the range of Weighted Pustule by 50%. Detonating 2 or more Weighted Pustules causes Stukov's Bio-Kill Switch and Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 3 seconds.

level7.name: Growing Infestation
level7.shortTooltip: Lurking Arm expands, has set duration
level7.fullTooltip: Lurking Arm's area expands by 50% over 2.5 seconds, but it cannot be Channeled for longer than 4 seconds.

level7.name: Targeted Excision
level7.shortTooltip: Detonate single Weighted Pustule to reduce cooldown
level7.fullTooltip: Detonating exactly 1 Weighted Pustule (but any number of Healing Pathogens) with Bio-Kill Switch reduces the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch to 5 seconds.

level10.name: Flailing Swipe
level10.shortTooltip: Knock back enemies in front of Stukov
level10.fullTooltip: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 48 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.

level10.name: Massive Shove
level10.shortTooltip: Shove an enemy until they collide with terrain
level10.fullTooltip: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.

level13.name: Reactive Ballistospores
level13.shortTooltip: Radiate Weighted Pustule at low Health
level13.fullTooltip: When taking damage below 50% Health, instantly spread a Weighted Pustule to all nearby enemy Heroes and reset the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch.  This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

level13.name: It Hungers
level13.shortTooltip: Lurking Arm cost can be refunded
level13.fullTooltip: Increase the range of Lurking Arm by 20%. If Lurking Arm damages enemy Heroes 12 times, its cooldown is reset and its Mana cost is refunded.

level13.name: Lingering Spines
level13.fullTooltip: Lurking Arm persists for 1.5 seconds after it is canceled.

level13.name: Virulent Reaction
level13.shortTooltip: Detonating Weighted Pustule in Lurking Arm Roots
level13.fullTooltip: Detonating a Weighted Pustule on an enemy who is inside of Lurking Arm Roots them for 2 seconds.

level16.name: Superstrain
level16.shortTooltip: Healing Pathogen heals when Stunned, Rooted
level16.fullTooltip: Whenever an ally with Healing Pathogen is Stunned or Rooted, they are instantly healed for 250 (+4% per level) Health.

level16.name: Universal Carrier
level16.shortTooltip: Healing Pathogen can spread continually
level16.fullTooltip: Healing Pathogen can continually spread through Stukov, but its healing is reduced by 50%.

level16.name: Pox Populi
level16.shortTooltip: Bio-Kill Switch no longer removes Healing Pathogen
level16.fullTooltip: Bio-Kill Switch no longer removes Healing Pathogen but instead sets its duration to 3 seconds.

level20.name: Controlled Chaos
level20.shortTooltip: Flailing Swipe only hits once, gains multiple charges
level20.fullTooltip: Flailing Swipe gains 2 additional charges, but each use only swings 1 time, at maximum range.  Additionally, its cooldown is decreased to 30 seconds, and its Mana cost is reduced from 100 to 50.

level20.name: Push Comes To Shove
level20.shortTooltip: Massive Shove Slows, can reduce cooldown
level20.fullTooltip: Massive Shove Slows its target by 50% for 4 seconds upon colliding with terrain. If Massive Shove pushes a target for more than 1.25 seconds, its cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.

level20.name: Top Off
level20.shortTooltip: Healing Pathogen stronger at high Health
level20.fullTooltip: Healing Pathogen's heal over time is increased by 30% while its target is above 60% Health.

level20.name: Bio-Explosion Switch
level20.fullTooltip: Bio-Kill Switch now also detonates Lurking Arm, applying a Weighted Pustule to enemy Heroes inside and Silencing them for 2 seconds.

Sylvanas.name: Sylvanas
Sylvanas.description: An Assassin who can shut down enemy Forts and Keeps.

basic.name: Withering Fire
basic.shortTooltip: Shoot an arrow at the closest enemy. Gains charges when enemies are killed
basic.fullTooltip: Shoot the closest enemy for 48 (+4% per level) damage, preferring Heroes.  Gain 1 charge on nearby enemy Minion or Mercenary deaths, and 3 charges on nearby enemy Hero deaths.  Stores up to 5 charges.

basic.name: Shadow Dagger
basic.shortTooltip: Damages an enemy over time and spreads
basic.fullTooltip: Deals 37 (+4% per level) damage and an additional 148 (+4% per level) damage over 2 seconds to target unit. The effect spreads to nearby targets.

basic.name: Haunting Wave
basic.shortTooltip: Deals damage and allows teleportation
basic.fullTooltip: Send forth a wave of banshees dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage to all targets. Reactivate to teleport to the banshees' location.

heroic.name: Wailing Arrow
heroic.shortTooltip: Fire arrow that damages and silences
heroic.fullTooltip: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 (+4% per level) damage and silence enemies in an area making them unable to use Abilities for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.

heroic.name: Mind Control
heroic.shortTooltip: Briefly control an enemy Hero
heroic.fullTooltip: After a 1 second cast, take control of an enemy Hero's movement, Silencing them and prevent them from doing anything else. Channel lasts 2.5 seconds.

trait.name: Black Arrows
trait.shortTooltip: Attacks and Abilities Stun Minions and Mercenaries, Attacks disable Structures
trait.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks and Abilities Stun Minions and Mercenaries for 1 second, and Basic Attacks disable Structures for 1 second.

level1.name: Overflowing Quiver
level1.shortTooltip: Shoot a free Withering Fire on Minion kills
level1.fullTooltip: When a nearby enemy Minion dies, a free Withering Fire is shot. This cannot hit Heroes.

level1.name: Dreadful Wake
level1.shortTooltip: Haunting Wave stuns Minions and Mercs longer
level1.fullTooltip: Haunting Wave's application of Black Arrow on Minions and Mercenaries increases the duration to 7 seconds. Haunting Wave restores 5 Mana per Minion or Mercenary hit.

level1.name: Mercenary Queen
level1.shortTooltip: Nearby Mercs are stronger
level1.fullTooltip: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near Sylvanas deal 60% more damage.

level4.name: Withering Barrage
level4.shortTooltip: Withering Fire gains an additional charge and fires faster
level4.fullTooltip: Increase Withering Fire charges by 1. Charges can be fired 33% faster.

level4.name: With the Wind
level4.fullTooltip: Increases Withering Fire's range by 25%.

level4.name: Lost Soul
level4.shortTooltip: Reduces Shadow Dagger cooldown on Heroes
level4.fullTooltip: Reduce Shadow Dagger's cooldown by 1 seconds each time it spreads to a Hero.

level7.name: Barbed Shot
level7.shortTooltip: Withering Fire deals triple damage to non-Heroic units.
level7.fullTooltip: Withering Fire deals 200% bonus damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

level7.name: Unstable Poison
level7.shortTooltip: Black Arrows explodes Minions on death
level7.fullTooltip: Minions that die under the effects of Black Arrows explode, dealing 116 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Does not damage Heroes or Structures.

level7.name: Possession
level7.fullTooltip: Force an enemy Minion to fight for Sylvanas's team.  Stores up to 3 charges.

level10.name: Wailing Arrow
level10.shortTooltip: Fire arrow that damages and silences
level10.fullTooltip: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 (+4% per level) damage and silence enemies in an area making them unable to use Abilities for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.

level10.name: Mind Control
level10.shortTooltip: Briefly control an enemy Hero
level10.fullTooltip: After a 1 second cast, take control of an enemy Hero's movement, Silencing them and prevent them from doing anything else. Channel lasts 2.5 seconds.

level13.name: Life Drain
level13.fullTooltip: Shadow Dagger heals Sylvanas for 37 (+4% per level) each time it spreads to an enemy.

level13.name: Windrunner
level13.shortTooltip: Haunting Wave recharges Withering Fire and is usable twice
level13.fullTooltip: Teleporting with Haunting Wave fully recharges Withering Fire. Haunting Wave can be cast a second time for free within 5 seconds after teleporting.

level13.name: Will of the Forsaken
level13.shortTooltip: Activate to gain Unstoppable and Move Speed
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

level13.name: Spell Shield
level13.fullTooltip: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

level16.name: Evasive Fire
level16.shortTooltip: Withering Fire grants Move Speed
level16.fullTooltip: When an enemy is hit with Withering Fire, gain 10% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, stacking up to 30%.

level16.name: Cold Embrace
level16.shortTooltip: Shadow Dagger lowers Armor
level16.fullTooltip: Shadow Dagger lowers the Armor of the initial enemy by 25 for 2 seconds, causing them to take 25% more damage.

level16.name: Overwhelming Affliction
level16.shortTooltip: Black Arrows slows Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Black Arrows now also applies to Heroes, slowing their Movement Speed by 6% for the duration. Stacks up to 5 times.

level16.name: Remorseless
level16.shortTooltip: Abilities increase Basic Attack damage
level16.fullTooltip: After using an Ability, Sylvanas's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

level20.name: Deafening Blast
level20.shortTooltip: Increases power of Wailing Arrow center
level20.fullTooltip: Enemies at the center of Wailing Arrow's explosion take 50% more damage and are silenced for twice as long.

level20.name: Dark Lady's Call
level20.shortTooltip: Increase Mind Controlled enemies Move Speed
level20.fullTooltip: Mind Controlled enemies gain 100% Movement Speed for the duration.

level20.name: Fury of the Storm
level20.fullTooltip: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

level20.name: Bolt of the Storm
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to teleport a short distance
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

Tassadar.name: Tassadar
Tassadar.description: A Support who can enable damage dealers who like to dive the enemy team.

basic.name: Plasma Shield
basic.shortTooltip: Shield ally temporarily
basic.fullTooltip: Grant an allied Hero, Minion, or Structure a Shield that absorbs 455 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. If the target is a Hero, they heal for 40% of their Basic Attack damage done while Shielded.

basic.name: Psionic Storm
basic.shortTooltip: Damage enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 82 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies in target area for 3 seconds. Damage increases by 12% for each consecutive instance of damage, up to 60%.

basic.name: Dimensional Shift
basic.shortTooltip: Become temporarily invulnerable and invisible
basic.fullTooltip: Tassadar becomes Invulnerable and Unrevealable for 2 seconds. While shifted, he has 25% increased Movement Speed.

heroic.name: Archon
heroic.shortTooltip: Become an Archon
heroic.fullTooltip: Tassadar transforms into an Archon and gains a Plasma Shield. His Basic Attacks deal 158 (+4% per level) damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 79 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 10 seconds.  Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.

heroic.name: Force Wall
heroic.shortTooltip: Create an unpathable wall
heroic.fullTooltip: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2 seconds.   Passive: Increases the slow amount of Distortion Beam to 30%.

trait.name: Oracle
trait.shortTooltip: Activate to greatly increase vision radius and detect enemy Heroes
trait.fullTooltip: Activate to greatly increase Tassadar's vision radius, allow him to see over obstacles, and detect stealthed units. Lasts for 5 seconds.  Distortion Beam  Tassadar's Basic Attack is a beam that slows enemy units by 20%.

level1.name: Psi-Infusion
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Psionic Storm returns Mana per target hit
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Gain 1 Mana for every non-Structure enemy hit by Psionic Storm.  Reward: After hitting 500 enemies, increase the size of Psionic Storm by 20%.  Reward: After hitting 1000 enemies, increase the damage of Psionic Storm by 20%

level1.name: Templar's Will
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Attacking Heroes empowers Distortion Beam
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Attacking enemy Heroes restores 8 mana per second.  Reward: After spending 30 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's damage is increased by 125%.  Reward: After spending 60 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's range is increased by an additional 1.

level1.name: Khaydarin Resonance
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Gather Regen Globes to empower Plasma Shield
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Regeneration Globes grant an additional 100% Mana.   Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 20%.  Reward: After collecting 30 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 40%.

level4.name: Khala's Celerity
level4.fullTooltip: Plasma Shield also grants 20% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

level4.name: Khala's Embrace
level4.fullTooltip: Increase the Life Steal of Plasma Shield to 75%.

level4.name: Khala's Light
level4.shortTooltip: Plasma Shield grants Armor on expiration
level4.fullTooltip: Plasma Shield grants Heroes 15 Armor for 3 seconds upon breaking or expiring, causing them to take 15% less damage.

level7.name: Psionic Projection
level7.shortTooltip: Increases the range of Plasma Shield, Psionic Storm
level7.fullTooltip: Increases the cast range of Plasma Shield and Psionic Storm by 40%.

level7.name: Resonation
level7.fullTooltip: Distortion Beam slows enemies affected by Psionic Storm by 50%.

level7.name: Mental Acuity
level7.shortTooltip: Quest: Takedowns reduce the Cooldown of Oracle
level7.fullTooltip: Quest: Each Takedown earned lowers the cooldown of Oracle by 3 seconds, to a maximum of 15 seconds.  Reward: Upon getting 5 Takedowns, the sight range of Oracle is increased by 50%.

level10.name: Archon
level10.shortTooltip: Become an Archon
level10.fullTooltip: Tassadar transforms into an Archon and gains a Plasma Shield. His Basic Attacks deal 158 (+4% per level) damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 79 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 10 seconds.  Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.

level10.name: Force Wall
level10.shortTooltip: Create an unpathable wall
level10.fullTooltip: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2 seconds.   Passive: Increases the slow amount of Distortion Beam to 30%.

level13.name: Deep Shift
level13.fullTooltip: Dimensional Shift's duration and Movement Speed bonuses are increased by 50%.

level13.name: Adun's Wisdom
level13.fullTooltip: While Oracle is active, Basic Abilities cooldown 50% faster.

level13.name: Nullification
level13.shortTooltip: Greatly lower an enemy Hero's damage
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to reduce the damage the target enemy Hero deals by 75% for 4 seconds.

level16.name: Phase Disruption
level16.shortTooltip: Psionic Storm lowers Physical Armor
level16.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes being hit by Psionic Storm have their Physical Armor reduced by 25, causing them to take 25% more damage from Basic Attacks.

level16.name: Psionic Echo
level16.shortTooltip: Psionic Storm may be cast a second time
level16.fullTooltip: A second Psionic Storm can be cast within 2 seconds of casting the first. Enemies can only be affected by one Psionic Storm at a time.

level16.name: Focused Beam
level16.shortTooltip: Oracle increases Basic Attack damage
level16.fullTooltip: While Oracle is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 1% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

level20.name: Twilight Archon
level20.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks while in Archon form increase its duration by 2 seconds.

level20.name: Force Barrier
level20.fullTooltip: Force Wall's Range is increased by 100% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

level20.name: Prismatic Link
level20.fullTooltip: Distortion Beam bounces to hit 2 additional targets for 40% damage.

level20.name: Shield Battery
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to grant Plasma Shields to all nearby allies
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes an untalented Plasma Shield.

TheButcher.name: The Butcher
TheButcher.description: An Assassin who starts slow, but deals extreme damage after collecting enough Meat.

basic.name: Hamstring
basic.shortTooltip: Deals damage in an area and slows enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 110 (+4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds.  The Butcher's next Basic Attack will strike immediately.

basic.name: Butcher's Brand
basic.shortTooltip: Brand an enemy, granting Life Steal against them
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 37 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and Brand them for 4 seconds. The Butcher's Basic Attacks against the Branded target heal him for 75% of the damage done.  Basic Attacks against Branded Heroes heal for double and extend the duration of the Brand by 0.5 seconds.

basic.name: Ruthless Onslaught
basic.shortTooltip: Charges at an enemy, stunning and dealing damage
basic.fullTooltip: Charge at an enemy, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed. If The Butcher reaches the target, they are stunned for 1 second and take 119 (+4% per level) damage.

heroic.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
heroic.shortTooltip: Chain an enemy Hero to a post
heroic.fullTooltip: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay. This deals 171 (+4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.

heroic.name: Furnace Blast
heroic.shortTooltip: Deal damage around The Butcher after a delay
heroic.fullTooltip: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing 500 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.  Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

trait.name: Fresh Meat
trait.shortTooltip: Gather strength by killing enemies and collecting their meat
trait.fullTooltip: Upon dying, nearby enemy Minions drop 1 Fresh Meat and enemy Heroes drop 20 Fresh Meat. Fresh Meat can be picked up to gain 0.5 Attack Damage per Meat. The Butcher loses 15 Fresh Meat upon dying.  Quest: Collect 200 Fresh Meat.  Reward: Gain an additional 125 Attack Damage and 25% increased Attack Speed. Heroes continue to drop 10 Fresh Meat, Minions no longer drop Fresh Meat, and Fresh Meat is no longer lost on death.

level1.name: Invigoration
level1.shortTooltip: Reduces Hamstring Mana cost, cooldown
level1.fullTooltip: If Hamstring hits a Hero, half of the Mana cost is refunded and the cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

level1.name: Block
level1.shortTooltip: Periodically gain Physical Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

level1.name: Chop Meat
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Hamstring damage to non-Heroes
level1.fullTooltip: Increases Hamstring damage by 100% to Minions and Mercenaries.

level4.name: Flail Axe
level4.fullTooltip: Increases the length of Hamstring by 40%.

level4.name: Unrelenting Pursuit
level4.shortTooltip: Reduces Ruthless Onslaught cooldown on impact
level4.fullTooltip: Reduces the cooldown of Ruthless Onslaught by 33% upon impact.

level4.name: Cheap Shot
level4.shortTooltip: Increase Hamstring damage to disabled targets
level4.fullTooltip: Hamstring does 100% more damage to targets affected by a Slow, Root, or Stun.

level7.name: Insatiable Blade
level7.shortTooltip: Increases Move Speed while enemies are branded
level7.fullTooltip: While facing a branded enemy, The Butcher's Movement Speed is increased by 25%.

level7.name: Victuals
level7.fullTooltip: Every time a nearby enemy minion dies, The Butcher heals 5% of his maximum health.

level7.name: Meat Shield
level7.fullTooltip: When Ruthless Onslaught impacts an enemy Hero, The Butcher gains 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 50%.

level10.name: Furnace Blast
level10.shortTooltip: Deal damage around The Butcher after a delay
level10.fullTooltip: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing 500 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.  Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

level10.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
level10.shortTooltip: Chain an enemy Hero to a post
level10.fullTooltip: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay. This deals 171 (+4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.

level13.name: Cleaver
level13.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal 35% of The Butcher's Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target.

level13.name: Savage Charge
level13.fullTooltip: Ruthless Onslaught deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

level13.name: Brutal Strike
level13.fullTooltip: After using Hamstring, The Butcher's next 3 Basic Attacks within 5 seconds deal an additional 15% damage.

level16.name: Crippling Slam
level16.shortTooltip: Hamstring slow no longer fades and lasts longer
level16.fullTooltip: Hamstring's slow no longer fades out, and the duration is increased by 30%.

level16.name: Enraged
level16.shortTooltip: Gain Attack Speed and Armor at low Health
level16.fullTooltip: While below 50% of his maximum Health, taking damage causes The Butcher to become Enraged for 10 seconds, gaining 40% Attack Speed and 15 Armor, reducing damage taken by 15%.  This effect has a 25 second cooldown.

level16.name: Blood Frenzy
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks grant Attack and Move Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant 5% increased Attack and Movement Speed for 3 seconds, up to 25%.

level20.name: Fires of Hell
level20.fullTooltip: Furnace Blast explodes a second time 3 seconds after the initial explosion.

level20.name: Slaughterhouse
level20.shortTooltip: Lamb to the Slaughter chains all enemy Heroes
level20.fullTooltip: Lamb to the Slaughter now chains all enemy Heroes in range.

level20.name: Nexus Blades
level20.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow
level20.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

level20.name: Bolt of the Storm
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to teleport a short distance
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

Thrall.name: Thrall
Thrall.description: A Bruiser who can hold his own in a lane of battle.

basic.name: Chain Lightning
basic.shortTooltip: Shock enemies with bouncing lightning
basic.fullTooltip: Shock an enemy with lightning, dealing 162 (+4% per level) damage. The lightning then bounces 3 times to nearby enemies, dealing 81 (+4% per level) damage to each enemy hit.

basic.name: Feral Spirit
basic.shortTooltip: Unleash a wolf spirit to burn enemies and Root Heroes
basic.fullTooltip: Unleash a Feral Spirit that deals 153 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in its path and Roots Heroes hit for 1 second. Each Hero hit increases the distance traveled by 25%.

basic.name: Windfury
basic.shortTooltip: Increases Attack and Movement Speed
basic.fullTooltip: Increase Thrall's Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds. His next 3 Basic Attacks occur 100% faster and generate stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

heroic.name: Sundering
heroic.shortTooltip: Damages, pushes, and Stuns enemies in a line
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 (+4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for 1 second.

heroic.name: Earthquake
heroic.shortTooltip: Slows enemies in a massive area
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.

trait.name: Frostwolf Resilience
trait.shortTooltip: Casting Abilities on enemies grants charges that restore health
trait.fullTooltip: Dealing damage with Abilities grants 1 stack of Frostwolf Resilience. At 5 stacks, Thrall is instantly healed for 223 (+4% per level) Health.

level1.name: Echo of the Elements
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Killing enemies grants Chain Lightning charge
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Kill Minions or Heroes within 1.5 seconds of hitting them with Chain Lightning.  Reward: After killing 10 enemies, reduce the Mana cost of Chain Lightning from 40 to 25.  Reward: After killing 20 enemies, gain a second charge of Chain Lightning.

level1.name: Crash Lightning
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Multiple Hero hits empower Chain Lightning
level1.fullTooltip: Repeatable Quest: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single use of Chain Lightning increases the damage of its bounces by 12, up to 360.  Reward: After hitting multiple Heroes 30 times, Chain Lightning prioritizes bouncing to Heroes.

level1.name: Rolling Thunder
level1.shortTooltip: Chain Lightning restores Health and Mana
level1.fullTooltip: For 10 seconds after hitting an enemy with Chain Lightning, Thrall's next Basic Attack against them restores 15 Mana and 2.5% of his maximum Health.  Passive: Increase the number of Chain Lightning bounces by 1.

level4.name: Feral Resilience
level4.shortTooltip: Feral Spirit grants Physical Armor, Frostwolf Resilience
level4.fullTooltip: Heroes damaged by Feral Spirit grant 3 stacks of Frostwolf Resilience and 2 stacks of Feral Resilience, granting 50 Physical Armor against the next incoming Hero Basic Attack.  Stacks are consumed on the next cast of Feral Spirit.

level4.name: Frostwolf Pack
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Reduce Feral Spirit cooldown, cost
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit 6 Heroes with Feral Spirit. Progress is lost on death and when Thrall fails to hit a Hero.  Reward: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Feral Spirit by 50%.

level4.name: Mana Tide
level4.shortTooltip: Frostwolf Resilience restores Mana, lowers cooldowns
level4.fullTooltip: Frostwolf Resilience restores 15 Mana and reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

level7.name: Maelstrom Weapon
level7.shortTooltip: Quest:  Windfury attacks increase Move Speed
level7.fullTooltip: Repeatable Quest: Basic Attacks against Heroes while Windfury's Movement Speed bonus is active increase Attack Damage by 1.  Reward: After gaining 20 Attack Damage, increase the Movement Speed bonus of Windfury to 40%.  Reward: After gaining 40 Attack Damage, Thrall permanently gains 15% increased Movement Speed.

level7.name: Ancestral Wrath
level7.shortTooltip: Activate to damage and steal Health from a Hero
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to consume 8 stacks of Ancestral Wrath, damaging a target enemy Hero for 15% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds, and healing Thrall for 150% of the damage dealt.  Gain 1 stack of Ancestral Wrath every time Frostwolf Resilience activates.

level7.name: Follow Through
level7.fullTooltip: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

level10.name: Sundering
level10.shortTooltip: Damages, pushes, and Stuns enemies in a line
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 (+4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for 1 second.

level10.name: Earthquake
level10.shortTooltip: Slows enemies in a massive area
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.

level13.name: Grace Of Air
level13.fullTooltip: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

level13.name: Frostwolf's Grace
level13.shortTooltip: Activate Frostwolf Resilience to instantly heal
level13.fullTooltip: Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to instantly heal for 150% of its normal amount.

level13.name: Spirit Shield
level13.fullTooltip: Every 45 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds. Frostwolf Resilience reduces this cooldown by 10 seconds.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

level16.name: Tempest Fury
level16.shortTooltip: Windfury's final strike hits 3 times
level16.fullTooltip: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.

level16.name: Thunderstorm
level16.shortTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes to make Chain Lightning Slow
level16.fullTooltip: Chain Lightning Slows targets by 8% for 2 seconds.  Quest: Targeting a Hero directly with Chain Lightning increases this Slow by 8%, up to an additional 40%.  Reward: While at a 40% bonus, Chain Lightning's damage is increased by 25%.  Bonuses are reset if Chain Lightning is used on the same Hero it was last used on, or if Thrall dies.

level16.name: Alpha Wolf
level16.shortTooltip: Feral Spirit has longer Root, empowers Attacks
level16.fullTooltip: For 3 seconds after a Hero is hit by Feral Spirit, Thrall's Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 3% of the target's maximum Health as damage.  Passive: Increase the duration of Feral Spirit's Root to 1.5 seconds.

level20.name: Worldbreaker
level20.fullTooltip: Lower the cooldown of Sundering by 20 seconds. After Sundering impacts, it leaves behind an impassable rift, blocking unit movement for 3 seconds.

level20.name: Earthen Shields
level20.fullTooltip: Allies within the Earthquake area gain a Shield equal to 15% of their maximum Health each pulse. This shield lasts 4 seconds.

level20.name: Nexus Blades
level20.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow
level20.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

level20.name: Wind Rush
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to teleport and gain Windfury
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to immediately teleport to a target location and gain Windfury.

Tracer.name: Tracer
Tracer.description: A mobile Assassin who picks off straggling enemies, finishing them off.

basic.name: Blink
basic.shortTooltip: Dash towards an area
basic.fullTooltip: Dash towards an area. Stores up to 3 charges.

basic.name: Melee
basic.shortTooltip: Attack a nearby enemy
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 220 (+4% per level) damage to a nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes. Gain 5% Pulse Bomb charge when using Melee against an enemy, and 10% against Heroes.

basic.name: Recall
basic.shortTooltip: Return to a recent location and remove negative effects
basic.fullTooltip: Tracer returns to the position she was at 3 seconds ago, refilling her ammo, and removing all negative status effects from herself.

heroic.name: Pulse Bomb
heroic.shortTooltip: Attach a bomb to enemies that deals heavy damage
heroic.fullTooltip: Fire a short range bomb that can attach to an enemy if it hits them. The bomb explodes after 2 seconds dealing 360 (+6% per level) damage to them and 180 (+6% per level) damage to other nearby enemies.  This Ability is slowly charged over time by dealing damage to enemies with Basic Attacks and Melee.

trait.name: Reload
trait.shortTooltip: Tracer can move while Basic Attacking; Basic Attacks cost ammo
trait.fullTooltip: Tracer can Basic Attack while moving, and after attacking 10 times she needs to reload over 0.75 seconds. Tracer can manually reload early by activating Reload.

level1.name: Pulse Strike
level1.shortTooltip: Increases Melee Pulse Bomb charge rate
level1.fullTooltip: Increases Melee's Pulse Bomb charge from 10% to 20% against Heroes.

level1.name: Slipstream
level1.shortTooltip: Recall rewinds more time
level1.fullTooltip: Increases the amount of time Recalled by 1 second.

level1.name: Tracer Rounds
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks reveal enemies
level1.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks reveal enemies for 4 seconds.

level4.name: Parting Gift
level4.fullTooltip: Recall leaves behind 3 bombs that deal 240 (+4% per level) damage each to different targets.

level4.name: Is That a Health Pack?!
level4.shortTooltip: Increases Regen Globe and Healing Fountain healing
level4.fullTooltip: Increases Regeneration Globe and Healing Fountain healing by 100%.

level4.name: Untouchable
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Takedowns increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 2%, up to 30%. These bonuses are lost on death.

level7.name: Jumper
level7.fullTooltip: Increases Blink's charges by 1, but also increases Blink's cooldown by 2 seconds.

level7.name: Bullet Time
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Blink by 0.15 seconds.

level7.name: Spatial Echo
level7.fullTooltip: Hero Takedowns grant 2 charges of Blink.

level10.name: Sticky Bomb
level10.shortTooltip: Increases Pulse Bomb area and adds slow
level10.fullTooltip: Increases Pulse Bomb's radius by 50% and enemies hit are slowed by 70% for 3 seconds.

level10.name: Quantum Spike
level10.shortTooltip: Increases Pulse Bomb single target damage
level10.fullTooltip: Pulse Bomb deals an additional 7% of the primary target's maximum Health.

level10.name: Pulse Rounds
level10.shortTooltip: Increases Pulse Bomb range and charge rate
level10.fullTooltip: Increases Pulse Bomb's range and charge rate from Basic Attacks against Heroes by 100%.

level13.name: Bullet Spray
level13.shortTooltip: Melee hits all enemies in range
level13.fullTooltip: Increases Melee's radius by 32%, and causes it to damage all enemies in range.

level13.name: Ricochet
level13.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks can bounce to a nearby enemy
level13.fullTooltip: Tracer's Basic Attacks have a 50% chance to hit another nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes.

level13.name: Leeching Rounds
level13.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes heal Tracer for 20% of their damage dealt.

level16.name: Sleight of Hand
level16.shortTooltip: Reload twice as fast
level16.fullTooltip: Reduces Reload time by 50%. This equals 20% more damage per second.

level16.name: Focus Fire
level16.shortTooltip: Unloading a magazine on an enemy does bonus damage
level16.fullTooltip: If an entire ammo magazine is unloaded on an enemy, the last bullet will deal 91 (+4% per level) bonus damage.  This is equal to 35% of the total magazine.

level16.name: Locked and Loaded
level16.shortTooltip: Time Reload perfectly to gain Basic Attack damage
level16.fullTooltip: Reactivate Reload within the last 50% of its cast time to increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 40% for that magazine.

level20.name: Get Stuffed!
level20.shortTooltip: Reduces Melee cooldown and knocks away
level20.fullTooltip: Reduces Melee's cooldown by 3 seconds. Hitting an enemy with Melee who is stuck with a Pulse Bomb causes the bomb to instantly explode and knocks the target away.

level20.name: Total Recall
level20.shortTooltip: Recall can restore Health, but has increased cooldown
level20.fullTooltip: Recall's cooldown is increased by 8 seconds, but it heals Tracer equal to the amount of Health she lost during that time.

level20.name: Composition B
level20.shortTooltip: Hitting Heroes with Pulse Bomb leaves a second
level20.fullTooltip: Successfully sticking a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero also drops another one at their feet that deals 50% damage and explodes slightly earlier.

Tychus.name: Tychus
Tychus.description: An Assassin who shreds High Health enemies.

basic.name: Overkill
basic.shortTooltip: Attack one target while moving, damaging nearby enemies as well
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 552 (+4% per level) damage to the target and 276 (+4% per level) damage to nearby targets over 4 seconds. Reactivate to select a new target.  Can move and use Abilities while Channeling.

basic.name: Frag Grenade
basic.shortTooltip: Throw a grenade, damaging and knocking back enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Lob a grenade that deals 256 (+4% per level) damage, knocking enemies away.

basic.name: Run and Gun
basic.shortTooltip: Dash a short distance
basic.fullTooltip: Dash a short distance.

heroic.name: Commandeer Odin
heroic.shortTooltip: Call down an Odin to pilot
heroic.fullTooltip: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

heroic.name: Drakken Laser Drill
heroic.shortTooltip: Call down a Laser to attack nearby enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

trait.name: Minigun
trait.shortTooltip: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage to Heroes
trait.fullTooltip: Activate to have Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.5% of their maximum Health. Lasts 3 seconds.

basic.name: Annihilate
basic.shortTooltip: Deals damage in a line
basic.fullTooltip: Fire the Odin's cannons in a straight line, dealing 196 (+4% per level) damage to everything in the path.

basic.name: Ragnarok Missiles
basic.shortTooltip: Launch a volley of missiles
basic.fullTooltip: Launches a volley of missiles at target area, dealing 132 (+4% per level) damage and slowing enemy Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

basic.name: Thrusters
basic.fullTooltip: Dash in target direction.

level1.name: Press the Advantage
level1.shortTooltip: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Basic Attack range
level1.fullTooltip: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1.5 for 3 seconds.

level1.name: Dash
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Regen Globes empower Run and Gun
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Movement Speed by 1% for each Regeneration Globe gathered, up to 25%. Lasts 2 seconds.   Reward: Once 25 Regeneration Globes have been gathered, the range of Run and Gun is increased by 50%.

level1.name: Combat Tactician
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Run and Gun cooldown
level1.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Run and Gun by 0.8 seconds.

level4.name: In the Rhythm
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Basic Attacks increase Minigun duration
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: While Minigun is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increase future Minigun durations by 0.03 seconds.

level4.name: The Bigger They Are...
level4.shortTooltip: Lowers cooldown and increases damage of Minigun
level4.fullTooltip: Lower the cooldown of Minigun by 2 seconds. Increase the damage bonus to 4% while enemy Heroes are above 35% Health, but Minigun no longer has any effect on targets below 35%.

level4.name: Master Assassin
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Hero Takedowns increase Tychus's Attack Speed by 1%, up to 15%.   Reward: After getting 15 Takedowns, Tychus's Attack Speed is increased by an additional 10%.

level7.name: Quarterback
level7.fullTooltip: Increases the range of Frag Grenade by 50%.

level7.name: Concussion Grenade
level7.shortTooltip: Increases Frag Grenade radius and knockback
level7.fullTooltip: Increases Frag Grenade's radius by 25% and the knockback distance by 100%.

level7.name: Relentless Soldier
level7.fullTooltip: Being Stunned or Rooted grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

level10.name: Commandeer Odin
level10.shortTooltip: Call down an Odin to pilot
level10.fullTooltip: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

level10.name: Drakken Laser Drill
level10.shortTooltip: Call down a Laser to attack nearby enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

level13.name: That's the Stuff!
level13.fullTooltip: Minigun heals Tychus for 100% of the bonus damage dealt after it expires.

level13.name: Neosteel Coating
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 75 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.

level13.name: Spray 'n' Pray
level13.fullTooltip: Increases Overkill's range by 25%.

level16.name: Titan Grenade
level16.shortTooltip: Increases Frag Grenade damage to Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Frag Grenade deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their maximum Health.

level16.name: Lead Rain
level16.shortTooltip: Overkill Slows targets
level16.fullTooltip: Overkill also Slows enemy Movement Speed by 30%.

level16.name: Armor Piercing Rounds
level16.shortTooltip: Increases Overkill damage to main target
level16.fullTooltip: Increases Overkill's damage to the primary target by 50%.

level20.name: Big Red Button
level20.shortTooltip: Increases Odin duration and fires Nukes
level20.fullTooltip: Odin lasts 50% longer and Ragnarok Missiles also launches a Nuclear Missile which lands 2.5 seconds later, dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage in its area.

level20.name: Focusing Diodes
level20.shortTooltip: Increase Laser Drill range and damage
level20.fullTooltip: Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by 50%.  Deals increasing damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to 100% extra damage.

level20.name: Sizzlin' Attacks
level20.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal more damage to Heroes
level20.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal bonus damage to Heroes equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Stacks with Minigun.

level20.name: Bob and Weave
level20.shortTooltip: Adds Run and Gun charges and reduces Mana cost
level20.fullTooltip: Run and Gun and Odin's Thrusters gain 2 additional charges and reduces Run and Gun's Mana cost from 50 to 25.

Tyrael.name: Tyrael
Tyrael.description: A Tank who pairs well with allies that like to dive into the enemy team.

basic.name: El'druin's Might
basic.shortTooltip: Slow and damage enemies in an area. Use ability again to teleport to the area
basic.fullTooltip: Throw El'druin to the target area, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. It can be reactivated within 5 seconds to teleport Tyrael to El'druin and Slow nearby enemies again.

basic.name: Righteousness
basic.shortTooltip: Gain a temporary Shield
basic.fullTooltip: Shields Tyrael for 336 (+4% per level) damage and nearby allied Heroes and Minions for 40% as much for 4 seconds.

basic.name: Smite
basic.shortTooltip: Damage an area and speed up nearby allies
basic.fullTooltip: Rake target area for 150 (+4% per level) damage. Allies moving through the targeted area gain 25% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

heroic.name: Judgment
heroic.shortTooltip: Charge and Stun an enemy Hero
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 75 (+4% per level) damage.

heroic.name: Sanctification
heroic.shortTooltip: Create zone of Invulnerable
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

trait.name: Archangel's Wrath
trait.shortTooltip: Upon dying, become invulnerable and explode
trait.fullTooltip: Upon dying, become Invulnerable and explode for 550 (+4% per level) damage after 3.5 seconds.

level1.name: Salvation
level1.shortTooltip: Empower Righteousness, heal if Shield destroyed
level1.fullTooltip: Increase the Shield amount Tyrael gains from Righteousness by 25% and heal Tyrael for 140 (+4% per level) Health if his Shield is destroyed. Does not increase the Shield amount gained by allies.

level1.name: Justice for All
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Righteousness Shield on allies
level1.fullTooltip: Increase the Shield applied to allies by Righteousness to 75% of the Shield gained by Tyrael.

level1.name: Ardent Restoration
level1.shortTooltip: Damaging Heroes heals over time
level1.fullTooltip: Dealing damage to a Hero heals Tyrael for 15 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds. Dealing damage resets this timer, and the heal amount stacks up to 10 times.

level4.name: Stalwart Angel
level4.shortTooltip: El'druin's Might grants Armor while active
level4.fullTooltip: Gain 25 Armor while El'druin's Might is active, and for 2 seconds after teleporting.

level4.name: Bound by Law
level4.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks increase El'druin's Might Slow duration
level4.fullTooltip: Increase El'druin's Might's Slow by 10%. Tyrael's Basic Attacks against enemies Slowed by El'druin's Might increase the Slow duration by 1 second, up to 4 seconds.

level4.name: Divine Vigor
level4.shortTooltip: Smite causes Basic Attacks to heal
level4.fullTooltip: If Smite hits an enemy, Tyrael's Basic Attacks within the next 4 seconds heal for 50% of the damage dealt.

level7.name: Reciprocate
level7.fullTooltip: When Tyrael's Shield from Righteousness expires or is destroyed, it deals 170 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

level7.name: Purge Evil
level7.fullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite increases Tyrael's Basic Attack damage by 45% for 4 seconds.

level7.name: Swift Retribution
level7.shortTooltip: Increase Smite Move Speed, grants Attack Speed
level7.fullTooltip: Smite grants 20% more Movement Speed and also grants 25% Attack Speed for 2 seconds.

level10.name: Judgment
level10.shortTooltip: Charge and Stun an enemy Hero
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 75 (+4% per level) damage.

level10.name: Sanctification
level10.shortTooltip: Create zone of Invulnerable
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

level13.name: Sword of Justice
level13.fullTooltip: Upon teleporting using El'druin's Might, El'druin swaps places with Tyrael, and El'druin's Might can be reactivated to teleport an additional time.

level13.name: Holy Ground
level13.shortTooltip: El'druin's Might teleport makes a blocking field
level13.fullTooltip: Create a ring for 3 seconds that blocks enemies from entering the area teleported to using El'druin's Might.

level13.name: Law and Order
level13.fullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite reduces the cooldown of Righteousness by 1 second. Each allied Hero Shielded by Righteousness increases the damage of the next Smite by 25%.

level16.name: Horadric Reforging
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce El'druin's Might cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Tyrael's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of El'druin's Might by 1.5 seconds.

level16.name: Burning Halo
level16.shortTooltip: El'druin and Tyrael damage nearby enemies
level16.fullTooltip: Both Tyrael and El'druin deal 18 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Teleporting increases this damage from Tyrael by 150% for 2 seconds.

level16.name: Smite the Wicked
level16.shortTooltip: El'druin's Might increases Smite cooldown rate
level16.fullTooltip: While El'druin's Might is active, and for 2 seconds after teleporting, Smite's cooldown recharges 125% faster.

level20.name: Angel of Justice
level20.shortTooltip: Judgment has increased range, reduced cooldown
level20.fullTooltip: Increases the cast range of Judgment by 50%, and reduces the cooldown by 40 seconds.

level20.name: Holy Arena
level20.fullTooltip: Increase the duration of Sanctification by 1 second and increase the damage of allies inside by 25%.

level20.name: Defense of the Angels
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 40 Armor for 5 seconds.  Each time Righteousness's Shield absorbs damage, Defense of the Angel's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

level20.name: Seal of El'druin
level20.fullTooltip: Using a Basic Ability grants 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

Tyrande.name: Tyrande
Tyrande.description: A Support who helps her allies lockdown and finish off enemies.

basic.name: Light of Elune
basic.shortTooltip: Heal an allied Hero
basic.fullTooltip: Heal an ally Hero for 255 (+4% per level). Light of Elune's cooldown is reduced by 1.5 seconds every time Tyrande damages an enemy.  Stores up to 2 charges. Cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.

basic.name: Sentinel
basic.shortTooltip: Fire a scouting Owl that reveals and damages enemy Heroes
basic.fullTooltip: Send an Owl across the battleground revealing its path, dealing 120 (+4% per level) damage to the first Hero hit, and revealing them for 5 seconds.

basic.name: Lunar Flare
basic.shortTooltip: Stun and damage enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: After 0.75 seconds, deal 150 (+4% per level) damage and Stun enemies in the target area for 0.75 seconds.

heroic.name: Shadowstalk
heroic.shortTooltip: Heal and Stealth all allies
heroic.fullTooltip: Grant all allied Heroes Stealth for 10 seconds and heal them for 380 (+4% per level) Health over 10 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

heroic.name: Starfall
heroic.shortTooltip: Damage and Slow enemies in an area
heroic.fullTooltip: Deal 88 (+4% per level) damage per second and Slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 6 seconds.

trait.name: Hunter's Mark
trait.shortTooltip: Lowers Armor and Reveals Marked target
trait.fullTooltip: Reveal a non-Structure enemy and reduce their Armor by 15 for 4 seconds.

level1.name: Moonlit Arrows
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Light of Elune cooldown reduction
level1.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks decrease the cooldown of Light of Elune by an additional 0.75 seconds.

level1.name: Celestial Attunement
level1.shortTooltip: Light of Elune removes Stuns, Silences, and Slows
level1.fullTooltip: Light of Elune removes Stuns, Silences, and Slows from its target.

level1.name: Kaldorei Resistance
level1.shortTooltip: Light of Elune grants Spell Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Light of Elune grants the target 10 Spell Armor for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 2 times.

level4.name: Ranger
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to make the next Sentinel pierce through all Heroes hit.  Passive: Sentinel's width is increased by 25% and deals up to 250% more damage based on distance traveled.

level4.name: Lunar Blaze
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Increase Lunar Flare range, damage
level4.fullTooltip: Increase Lunar Flare's range by 30%.  Quest: Hitting a Hero with Lunar Flare increases its damage by 5%, up to 100%.

level4.name: Trueshot Aura
level4.shortTooltip: Gain Attack Damage, reset Hunter's Mark
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to reset the cooldown of Hunter's Mark and grant 15% increased Basic Attack damage to other nearby allied Heroes for 5 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attack damage increased by 15%.

level7.name: Everlasting Light
level7.shortTooltip: Increase Light of Elune healing on multiple targets
level7.fullTooltip: If Light of Elune's second charge is cast on a different target from the first, it heals for 40% more.

level7.name: Mark of Mending
level7.fullTooltip: Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal her for 2% of her maximum Health. Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark heal the attacker for 2% of their maximum Health.

level7.name: Elune's Chosen
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to make Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal target allied Hero for 200% of the damage dealt. Lasts for 8 seconds.

level10.name: Shadowstalk
level10.shortTooltip: Heal and Stealth all allies
level10.fullTooltip: Grant all allied Heroes Stealth for 10 seconds and heal them for 380 (+4% per level) Health over 10 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

level10.name: Starfall
level10.shortTooltip: Damage and Slow enemies in an area
level10.fullTooltip: Deal 88 (+4% per level) damage per second and Slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 6 seconds.

level13.name: Quickening Blessing
level13.shortTooltip: Light of Elune increases Movement Speed
level13.fullTooltip: Gain 5% Movement Speed. Light of Elune increases the target's Movement Speed by 15% for 3 seconds.

level13.name: Harsh Moonlight
level13.shortTooltip: Sentinel Slows and reduces damage dealt
level13.fullTooltip: Sentinel Slows the first target hit by 40% and reduces their damage dealt by 40% for 4 seconds.

level13.name: Ranger's Mark
level13.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hunter's Mark by 1 second. Basic Attacks against marked targets increase the duration of Hunter's Mark by 0.5 seconds.

level16.name: Empower
level16.shortTooltip: Sentinel cooldown reduced, deals percent damage
level16.fullTooltip: Reduce Sentinel's cooldown by 3 seconds. The first Hero hit by Sentinel takes bonus damage equal to 7% of their maximum Health.

level16.name: Huntress' Fury
level16.shortTooltip: Hunter's Mark makes Basic Attacks splash
level16.fullTooltip: Increase the cast range and duration of Hunter's Mark by 25%. Tyrande's Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark splash to nearby enemies.

level16.name: Darnassian Archery
level16.shortTooltip: Consecutive Basic Attacks deal more damage
level16.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant a stacking 10% increased Attack Damage bonus for 6 seconds. This bonus is lost when Basic Attacking non-Heroes.

level20.name: Eyes of the Huntress
level20.fullTooltip: Shadowstalk reveals all enemy Heroes for 2 seconds and heals allies below 50% Health for 50% more.

level20.name: Celestial Wrath
level20.shortTooltip: Starfall applies Hunter's Mark to Heroes
level20.fullTooltip: Starfall applies Hunter's Mark to enemy Heroes while inside of its area of effect.

level20.name: Shooting Star
level20.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks periodically cast Lunar Flare
level20.fullTooltip: Increase Basic Attack range by 1. Every 8th Basic Attack casts a free Lunar Flare at a random enemy near Tyrande's position. This prefers Heroic targets.

level20.name: Iceblade Arrows
level20.shortTooltip: Gain Attack Speed, reduce enemy damage dealt
level20.fullTooltip: Increase Attack Speed by 20%. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce their damage dealt by 8% for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

Uther.name: Uther
Uther.description: A Healer that can negate high bursts of damage.

basic.name: Holy Light
basic.shortTooltip: Heal an allied Hero and Uther
basic.fullTooltip: Heal target allied Hero for 362 (+4% per level) Health. When used on a target other than Uther, also heal Uther for 181 (+4% per level) Health.

basic.name: Holy Radiance
basic.shortTooltip: Heal allies and damage enemies in a line
basic.fullTooltip: Heal all allied Heroes and Minions in a line for 177 (+4% per level) Health, dealing 177 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.

basic.name: Hammer of Justice
basic.shortTooltip: Stun and damage an enemy
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 109 (+4% per level) damage and Stun the target for 1 second.

heroic.name: Divine Shield
heroic.shortTooltip: Give ally Invulnerable and increased Move Speed
heroic.fullTooltip: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

heroic.name: Divine Storm
heroic.shortTooltip: Damage and stun nearby enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Deal 170 (+4% per level) damage and Stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

trait.name: Devotion, Eternal Vanguard
trait.shortTooltip: Uther's healing grants Armor, and when killed his spirit remains
trait.fullTooltip: Allied Heroes affected by Uther's Basic Abilities gain 15 Armor for 2 seconds.  This effect does not stack with itself.  Upon dying, Uther becomes an Invulnerable spirit for up to 8 seconds. While in spirit form, Uther can heal allies with Flash of Light.

basic.name: Flash of Light
basic.shortTooltip: Heal an Ally
basic.fullTooltip: Heal an ally for 230 (+4% per level) Health.

level1.name: Silver Touch
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Mitigate damage to improve Holy Light
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Reduce damage from Heroic sources with Devotion.  Reward: After reducing damage 40 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced from 90 to 70.  Reward: After reducing damage 80 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced to 50, and its range is increased by 50%.

level1.name: Wave of Light
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Holy Radiance increases Devotion duration
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Damage or heal Heroes 60 times with Holy Radiance.  Reward: Increase the duration of Devotion by 0.5 seconds.  Passive: Damaging or healing Heroes with Holy Radiance refunds 5 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 1 second.

level1.name: Hammer of the Lightbringer
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Reduce Hammer of Justice cooldown
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Basic Attack enemies 75 times.  Reward: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1.5 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 1.5% of Uther's maximum Mana.

level4.name: Holy Shock
level4.fullTooltip: Holy Light can be used on an enemy to do 50% of its healing amount as damage. When used this way, Uther receives its self-healing benefits, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, and it refunds 45 Mana.

level4.name: Pursuit of Justice
level4.shortTooltip: Hammer of Justice grants Move Speed
level4.fullTooltip: Hammer of Justice increases Uther's Movement Speed by 25% for 3 seconds.

level4.name: Holy Fire
level4.fullTooltip: Deal 13 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase this damage by 20% for 3 seconds. This can stack up to 3 times.

level7.name: Armor of Faith
level7.shortTooltip: Holy Light recharges faster while disabled
level7.fullTooltip: Being Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced causes Holy Light's cooldown to recharge 200% faster for 6 seconds.

level7.name: Guardian of Ancient Kings
level7.shortTooltip: Increase Devotion's Armor on disabled targets
level7.fullTooltip: Healing a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced increases the Armor bonus they receive from Devotion from 15 to 50.

level7.name: Hand of Protection
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on Uther. Basic Attacks reduce Hand of Protection's cooldown by 5 seconds.

level10.name: Divine Shield
level10.shortTooltip: Give ally Invulnerable and increased Move Speed
level10.fullTooltip: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

level10.name: Divine Storm
level10.shortTooltip: Damage and stun nearby enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Deal 170 (+4% per level) damage and Stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

level13.name: Blessed Champion
level13.shortTooltip: Holy Light makes Basic Attacks heal
level13.fullTooltip: For the next 5 seconds after using Holy Light, Uther's Basic Attacks heal him and nearby allied Heroes for 15% of the total amount healed by Holy Light.

level13.name: Well Met
level13.fullTooltip: When used against Heroes, Hammer of Justice reduces the target's Movement Speed and damage dealt by 25% for 3 seconds.

level13.name: Spell Shield
level13.fullTooltip: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

level16.name: Beacon of Light
level16.shortTooltip: Increase Holy Light self-healing
level16.fullTooltip: While below 50% Health, Uther receives 200% more self-healing when healing others with Holy Light.

level16.name: Tyr's Deliverance
level16.shortTooltip: Holy Radiance increases healing received
level16.fullTooltip: Allies healed by Holy Radiance receive 40% increased healing from all sources for 6 seconds.

level16.name: Benediction
level16.shortTooltip: Reduce Mana cost, cooldown of next ability
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to reduce the Mana cost of Uther's next Basic Ability by 50 and its cooldown by 10 seconds.

level20.name: Bulwark of Light
level20.shortTooltip: Increase Divine Shield duration, reduce cooldown
level20.fullTooltip: Divine Shield lasts 2 seconds longer and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

level20.name: Divine Hurricane
level20.shortTooltip: Increase Divine Storm radius, reduce cooldown
level20.fullTooltip: Divine Storm's radius is increased by 50% and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

level20.name: Redemption
level20.fullTooltip: After Eternal Vanguard ends, Uther revives at the spirit's location with 50% of his maximum Health.  This effect has a 180 second cooldown.

level20.name: Divine Protection
level20.fullTooltip: Applying Devotion to a Hero that is already affected by Devotion increases their Armor by an additional 15.

Valeera.name: Valeera
Valeera.description: A stealthed Assassin who specializes in shutting down her opponents.

basic.name: Sinister Strike
basic.shortTooltip: Dash forward, damaging enemies in a line
basic.fullTooltip: Dash forward, hitting all enemies in a line for 110 (+4% per level) damage. If Sinister Strike hits a Hero, Valeera stops dashing immediately and the cooldown is reduced to 1 second.  Awards 1 Combo Point.  Stealth: Ambush Heavily damage an enemy and reduce their Armor.

basic.name: Blade Flurry
basic.shortTooltip: Damage nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 130 (+4% per level) damage in an area around Valeera.   Awards 1 Combo Point per enemy Hero hit.  Stealth: Cheap Shot Stun, Blind, and damage an enemy.

basic.name: Eviscerate
basic.cooldownTooltip: Cooldown: 1 second Consumes all Combo Points
basic.shortTooltip: High damage finishing move
basic.fullTooltip: Eviscerate an enemy, dealing damage per Combo Point.   1 Point: 85 (+4% per level) 2 Points: 170 (+4% per level) 3 Points: 255 (+4% per level)  Stealth: Garrote Silence and damage an enemy over time.

heroic.name: Smoke Bomb
