heroic.shortTooltip: Create an obscuring cloud of smoke
heroic.fullTooltip: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

heroic.name: Cloak of Shadows
heroic.shortTooltip: Become Unstoppable, gain Spell Armor
heroic.fullTooltip: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

trait.name: Vanish
trait.shortTooltip: Stealth and gain new Abilities
trait.fullTooltip: Vanish from sight, becoming Stealthed, gaining 20% Movement Speed and access to new Abilities. For the first second, Valeera is Unrevealable and can pass through other units. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.  After being Stealthed for 3 seconds, Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote have 100% increased range, and cause Valeera to teleport to the target when used.

basic.name: Ambush
basic.shortTooltip: Damage an enemy and reduce their Armor
basic.fullTooltip: Ambush an enemy, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage and reducing their Armor by 10 for 5 seconds.  Awards 1 Combo Point.  Unstealth: Sinister Strike Dash forward, damaging enemies.

basic.name: Cheap Shot
basic.shortTooltip: Stun, Blind, and damage an enemy
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 30 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy, Stun them for 0.75 seconds, and Blind them for 2 seconds once Cheap Shot's Stun expires.  Awards 1 Combo Point.  Unstealth: Blade Flurry Deal damage in an area around Valeera.

basic.name: Garrote
basic.shortTooltip: Deal high damage over time to an enemy
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 20 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and an additional 140 (+4% per level) damage over 7 seconds, and Silence them for 2.5 seconds.  Awards 1 Combo Point.  Unstealth: Eviscerate High damage finishing move.

level1.name: Vigor
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Regen Globes increase max Energy
level1.fullTooltip: Valeera regenerates an additional 2.5 Energy per second.  Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes, increase Valeera's maximum Energy to 120.

level1.name: Subtlety
level1.shortTooltip: Stealth Abilities increase Energy regeneration
level1.fullTooltip: After teleporting with Ambush, Cheap Shot, or Garrote, regenerate 8 Energy per second for 5 seconds.

level1.name: Combat Readiness
level1.shortTooltip: Spending Combo Points grants Block
level1.fullTooltip: Each Combo Point spent grants 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.

level1.name: Crippling Poison
level1.shortTooltip: Spell Damage Slows enemies
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds Slow targets by 20% for 4 seconds.  Activating Crippling Poison does not break Stealth.

level4.name: Relentless Strikes
level4.fullTooltip: Reduces the Energy cost of Sinister Strike by 15.

level4.name: Hemorrhage
level4.fullTooltip: Valeera's Basic Attacks deal 30% additional damage to enemies affected by Garrote.

level4.name: Initiative
level4.shortTooltip: Stealth Abilities award more Combo Points
level4.fullTooltip: Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote award 2 Combo Points.

level4.name: Wound Poison
level4.shortTooltip: Spell Damage reduces enemy healing received
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds reduce enemy healing received by 50% for 4 seconds.  Activating Wound Poison does not break Stealth.

level7.name: Mutilate
level7.shortTooltip: Increases Sinister Strike damage but reduces range
level7.fullTooltip: Sinister Strike now hits with both blades, dealing 125% additional damage, but its range is reduced by 1.

level7.name: Fatal Finesse
level7.shortTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes with Blade Flurry
level7.fullTooltip: Quest: Each time Blade Flurry damages an enemy Hero, its damage increases by 4, up to 80.  Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes with Blade Flurry, permanently reduce its Energy cost by 20.

level7.name: Slice and Dice
level7.fullTooltip: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points grants 150% Attack Speed. Lasts 3 seconds or 3 Basic Attacks.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 2 Energy.

level10.name: Smoke Bomb
level10.shortTooltip: Create an obscuring cloud of smoke
level10.fullTooltip: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

level10.name: Cloak of Shadows
level10.shortTooltip: Become Unstoppable, gain Spell Armor
level10.fullTooltip: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

level13.name: Death From Above
level13.fullTooltip: Teleporting with Ambush reduces the cooldown of Vanish by 4 seconds.

level13.name: Blind
level13.fullTooltip: Increase the duration of Cheap Shot's Blind by 2.5 seconds.

level13.name: Strangle
level13.fullTooltip: Using Garrote on a Hero reduces their Spell Power by 40% for 6 seconds.

level16.name: Seal Fate
level16.shortTooltip: Empower Sinister Strike damage, Combo Points
level16.fullTooltip: Sinister Strike deals 50% additional damage and generates an additional Combo Point when used against Silenced, Rooted, or Stunned enemy Heroes.

level16.name: Assassinate
level16.shortTooltip: Ambush deals more damage to isolated Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: Ambush deals 50% additional damage and reduces the target's Armor by an additional 10 if no other enemy Heroes are within 4 range of the victim.

level16.name: Thistle Tea
level16.shortTooltip: Activate to instantly restore Energy
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to instantly restore 100 Energy.  Activating Thistle Tea does not break Stealth.

level20.name: Adrenaline Rush
level20.fullTooltip: While in the Smoke Bomb, Valeera regenerates an additional 40 Energy per second.

level20.name: Enveloping Shadows
level20.fullTooltip: Whenever Valeera uses Vanish, she also gains Cloak of Shadows.

level20.name: Rupture
level20.fullTooltip: Increase Garrote's damage over time by 100%. Valeera's Basic Attacks refresh the duration of Garrote.

level20.name: Elusiveness
level20.fullTooltip: Increases Valeera's Movement Speed while Vanished by an additional 20%.

Valla.name: Valla
Valla.description: A well-rounded Assassin that's mobile and can deal high sustained damage.

basic.name: Hungering Arrow
basic.shortTooltip: Fire an arrow which seeks out and strikes multiple targets
basic.fullTooltip: Fire an arrow that deals 140 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit, then seeks up to 2 additional enemies, prioritizing Heroes, dealing 80 (+4% per level) damage. Can hit an enemy multiple times.

basic.name: Multishot
basic.shortTooltip: Damage enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 172 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area.

basic.name: Vault
basic.shortTooltip: Dash to a location
basic.fullTooltip: Dash to the target area. Valla's next Basic Attack within 2 seconds deals 6% increased damage per stack of Hatred.

heroic.name: Strafe
heroic.shortTooltip: Unleashes a flurry of arrows at enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

heroic.name: Rain of Vengeance
heroic.shortTooltip: Area attack that stuns enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 (+4% per level) damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.

trait.name: Hatred
trait.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks grant bonus Attack Damage and Move Speed temporarily
trait.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks grant a stack of Hatred, up to 10. Each Hatred stack increases Basic Attack damage by 8% and Movement Speed by 1%. Lasts 6 seconds.

level1.name: Monster Hunter
level1.shortTooltip: Reduces Hungering Arrow Mana cost and increases non-Hero damage
level1.fullTooltip: Reduces the Mana cost of Hungering Arrow by 40 and increases the damage it deals to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 150%.

level1.name: Caltrops
level1.shortTooltip: Drop Caltrops while Vaulting  Quest: Maintain Hatred to empower Vault
level1.fullTooltip: Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting. Caltrops do 60 (+4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 25% for 1 second.  Quest: Spend 160 seconds at 10 stacks of Hatred.  Reward: Vault cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

level1.name: Hot Pursuit
level1.shortTooltip: Max Hatred increases Movement Speed and Mana Regen
level1.fullTooltip: When at 10 stacks of Hatred, the Movement Speed bonus increases to 20% total and Valla gains 4 Mana per second.

level4.name: Puncturing Arrow
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Hitting Heroes empowers Hungering Arrow
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow increases its damage by 5, up to a maximum of 100.  Reward: After gaining 100 bonus damage, gain an additional 75 bonus damage and Hungering Arrow also bounces 1 additional time.

level4.name: Punishment
level4.fullTooltip: Each stack of Hatred increases the damage of Multishot by 4%.

level4.name: Creed of the Hunter
level4.shortTooltip: Increases Attack Speed Quest: Attacking Heroes empowers Hatred
level4.fullTooltip: Increases Attack Speed by 10%.  Quest: Use 100 Basic Attacks against Heroes.  Reward: Hatred grants an additional 2% Basic Attack Damage per stack.

level7.name: Arsenal
level7.fullTooltip: Multishot also fires 3 grenades which deal 120 (+4% per level) damage. Each enemy Hero hit by a grenade reduces the cooldown of Multishot by 2 seconds.

level7.name: Death Dealer
level7.shortTooltip: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus
level7.fullTooltip: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus from 6% to 14% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.

level7.name: Repeating Arrow
level7.fullTooltip: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.

level10.name: Strafe
level10.shortTooltip: Unleashes a flurry of arrows at enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

level10.name: Rain of Vengeance
level10.shortTooltip: Area attack that stuns enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 (+4% per level) damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.

level13.name: Siphoning Arrow
level13.shortTooltip: Hungering Arrow returns damage as Health
level13.fullTooltip: Valla heals for 75% of the damage dealt to Heroes by Hungering Arrow.

level13.name: Tempered by Discipline
level13.shortTooltip: Max Hatred grants healing on Basic Attacks
level13.fullTooltip: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt.

level13.name: Gloom
level13.shortTooltip: Consume Hatred to gain Spell Armor
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to consume all Hatred, granting 3 Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Permanently gain 20 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 20%.

level16.name: Frost Shot
level16.shortTooltip: Multishot slows enemies and has increased range
level16.fullTooltip: Increases the range of Multishot by 20% and it also slows by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

level16.name: Seething Hatred
level16.shortTooltip: Hatred stacks faster and lasts longer
level16.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks now grant 2 stacks of Hatred and the time it takes before Hatred expires is increased by 2 seconds.

level16.name: Manticore
level16.shortTooltip: Consecutive Basic Attacks against Heroes are empowered
level16.fullTooltip: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same Heroic target deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage.

level20.name: Death Siphon
level20.fullTooltip: Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 34 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds. 25% of the damage dealt with Strafe is returned as Health.

level20.name: Storm of Vengeance
level20.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce the charge cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.

level20.name: Rancor
level20.fullTooltip: Each stack of Hatred also increases Attack Speed by 2%. While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain an additional 30% Attack Speed.

level20.name: Farflight Quiver
level20.fullTooltip: Increases Valla's Basic Attack range by 2.2.

Varian.name: Varian
Varian.description: A Multi-Class Hero that can Tank for his team or become a high damage Assassin.

basic.name: Lion's Fang
basic.shortTooltip: Damage and Slow enemies in a line and heal Varian
basic.fullTooltip: Create a shockwave that travels in a straight line, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 35% for 1.5 seconds. Each enemy hit heals Varian for 35 (+4% per level), increased to 140 (+4% per level) against Heroes.

basic.name: Parry
basic.shortTooltip: Block incoming Basic Attacks for a short duration
basic.fullTooltip: Parry all incoming Basic Attacks for 1.25 seconds, reducing their damage by 100%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

basic.name: Charge
basic.shortTooltip: Charge to an enemy and damage them
basic.fullTooltip: Charge to the target enemy, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing them by 75% for 1 second.

heroic.name: Taunt
heroic.shortTooltip: Gain HealthForce a Hero to attack Varian
heroic.fullTooltip: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.  Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by 30%.

heroic.name: Colossus Smash
heroic.shortTooltip: Gain Damage, Lose HealthSmash enemies and lower their Armor
heroic.fullTooltip: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage and lowering their Armor by 20 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% increased damage.  Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration reduced by 10%.

heroic.name: Twin Blades of Fury
heroic.shortTooltip: Gain Attack Speed, Lose DamageBasic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike cooldown
heroic.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.  Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.

trait.name: Heroic Strike
trait.shortTooltip: Deal bonus damage on next Basic Attack
trait.fullTooltip: Every 18 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack deals 125 (+4% per level) bonus Spell Damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

level1.name: Lion's Maw
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes to empower Lion's Fang
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Every time Lion's Fang hits a Hero, increase its damage by 4, up to 120.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, the Slow is increased to 50% and its duration is increased to 2 seconds.

level1.name: Overpower
level1.shortTooltip: Parrying a Hero's attack will refresh Heroic Strike
level1.fullTooltip: When Parry blocks a Hero's Basic Attack, Heroic Strike's cooldown is refreshed and the next one does 30% more damage.

level1.name: High King's Quest
level1.shortTooltip: Quest:  Complete Quests to gain Attack Damage
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit 50 Heroes with Basic Attacks. Quest: Participate in 5 Hero Takedowns. Quest: Gather 20 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: Completing a Quest grants 10 Base Attack Damage. Completing all 3 Quests grants an additional 45 Base Attack Damage.

level4.name: Taunt
level4.shortTooltip: Gain HealthForce a Hero to attack Varian
level4.fullTooltip: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.  Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by 30%.

level4.name: Colossus Smash
level4.shortTooltip: Gain Damage, Lose HealthSmash enemies and lower their Armor
level4.fullTooltip: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage and lowering their Armor by 20 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% increased damage.  Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration reduced by 10%.

level4.name: Twin Blades of Fury
level4.shortTooltip: Gain Attack Speed, Lose DamageBasic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike cooldown
level4.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.  Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.

level7.name: Lionheart
level7.fullTooltip: Increase Lion's Fang's healing from Heroes by 50%.

level7.name: Second Wind
level7.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks heal, more when low Health
level7.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks heal Varian for 1% of his maximum Health. While below 50% Health, they also heal him for 50% of the damage dealt.

level7.name: Victory Rush
level7.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks periodically grant a large heal
level7.fullTooltip: Every 30 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack will heal him for 350 (+4% per level) Health. When a nearby enemy Minion or Monster dies, the cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

level10.name: Shield Wall
level10.shortTooltip: Parry grants Protected
level10.fullTooltip: Parry grants Protected, preventing all incoming damage while active. Additionally, Parry's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds, but it loses 1 charge.

level10.name: Warbringer
level10.shortTooltip: Reduce Charge cooldown, can be used on allies
level10.fullTooltip: Reduce Charge's cooldown by 8 seconds and Mana cost from 45 to 22. Additionally, Charge can be cast on allied Heroes.

level13.name: Juggernaut
level13.fullTooltip: Charge deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 4% of their maximum Health.

level13.name: Mortal Strike
level13.fullTooltip: Heroes hit by Heroic Strike receive 40% reduced healing for 4 seconds.

level13.name: Shattering Throw
level13.shortTooltip: Deal massive damage to enemy Shields
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to throw a sword at a target Hero that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage, and up to 1400 (+4% per level) bonus damage to their Shields.  Passive: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal up to 200% bonus Physical Damage to Shields.

level16.name: Banner of Stormwind
level16.shortTooltip: Banner that grants Movement Speed
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to place a Banner that grants 25% increased Movement Speed to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

level16.name: Banner of Ironforge
level16.shortTooltip: Banner that grants Armor
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20 Armor to nearby allied Heroes, reducing damage taken by 20%. Lasts 12 seconds.

level16.name: Banner of Dalaran
level16.shortTooltip: Banner that grants Spell Power
level16.fullTooltip: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20% increased Spell Power to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

level20.name: Vigilance
level20.fullTooltip: Being hit by a Hero Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Taunt by 1 seconds.

level20.name: Master at Arms
level20.shortTooltip: Colossus Smash hits enemies near the target
level20.fullTooltip: Colossus Smash affects all enemies near the target, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

level20.name: Frenzy
level20.shortTooltip: Increase Twin Blades of Fury bonuses
level20.fullTooltip: Twin Blades of Fury increases Varian's Attack Speed by an additional 15%, and Basic Attacks increase his Movement Speed by an additional 10%.

level20.name: Glory to the Alliance
level20.fullTooltip: Banner now also increases health regeneration and all healing received for nearby allied Heroes by 50%, and the cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

level20.name: Demoralizing Shout
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to demoralize nearby enemy Heroes, reducing damage they deal by 40% for 5 seconds.

Whitemane.name: Whitemane
Whitemane.description: A versatile Healer who heals her allies by smiting her foes.

basic.name: Desperate Plea
basic.shortTooltip: Heal an allied Hero
basic.fullTooltip: Heal an allied Hero for 140 (+4% per level) and gain Desperation for 4 seconds.  Desperation increases Desperate Plea's Mana cost by 60, and stacks up to 3 times.  Current Mana Cost: 30

basic.name: Inquisition
basic.shortTooltip: Damage and Slow an enemy Hero
basic.fullTooltip: Channel on an enemy Hero for up to 3 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds and Slowing them by 30%.

basic.name: Searing Lash
basic.shortTooltip: Damage enemies in a line
basic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, smite enemies in a straight line for 78 (+4% per level) damage.  If the first strike hits an enemy Hero, a second strike will occur after a short delay.

heroic.name: Scarlet Aegis
heroic.shortTooltip: Heal and grant Armor to nearby allies
heroic.fullTooltip: Bolster the spirits of nearby allied Heroes, healing them for 250 (+4% per level) and granting them 40 Armor for 4 seconds.

heroic.name: Divine Reckoning
heroic.shortTooltip: Consecrate an area
heroic.fullTooltip: After 1 second, consecrate an area for 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies inside.

trait.name: Zeal
trait.shortTooltip: Heal marked allies for damage dealt
trait.fullTooltip: Whitemane's healing Abilities apply Zeal for 8 seconds.  Allies with Zeal are healed for 100% of the damage Whitemane deals to Heroes.

level1.name: Martyrdom
level1.shortTooltip: Increase consecutive Desperate Plea heals
level1.fullTooltip: Each stack of Desperation increases Desperate Plea's healing by 30%.

level1.name: Clemency
level1.shortTooltip: Heal allies with Inquisition
level1.fullTooltip: Activate to cast Inquisition on an allied Hero, healing them for up to 350 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds while Channeling.  Passive: Reduce Inquisition's cooldown by 4 seconds.

level1.name: Righteous Flame
level1.shortTooltip: Empower Searing Lash against disabled enemies
level1.fullTooltip: Searing Lash deals 75% more damage to enemies who are Stunned, Rooted, Silenced or Slowed.

level1.name: Pity the Frail
level1.shortTooltip: Zeal is stronger on low Health allies
level1.fullTooltip: Allies below 50% Health receive 25% more healing from Zeal.

level4.name: Unwavering Faith
level4.fullTooltip: Reduce Desperate Plea's Mana cost by 15.  Upon reaching 3 stacks of Desperation, gain a 250 (+4% per level) Shield for 5 seconds.

level4.name: High Inquisitor
level4.fullTooltip: Casting Inquisition instantly removes all stacks of Desperation and restores 75 Mana per stack removed.

level4.name: Indulgence
level4.fullTooltip: Searing Lash's first strike restores 20 Mana per Hero hit, and its second strike restores 40 Mana per Hero hit.

level7.name: Zealous Spirit
level7.fullTooltip: Upon reaching 2 stacks of Desperation, Whitemane gains Zeal.

level7.name: Fanatical Power
level7.shortTooltip: Activate to gain Spell Power, lose Armor
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 50% Spell Power and lose 25 Armor for 5 seconds.

level7.name: Intercession
level7.fullTooltip: Activate to make an ally Unstoppable for 1 second and gain 1 stack of Desperation.

level10.name: Scarlet Aegis
level10.shortTooltip: Heal and grant Armor to nearby allies
level10.fullTooltip: Bolster the spirits of nearby allied Heroes, healing them for 250 (+4% per level) and granting them 40 Armor for 4 seconds.

level10.name: Divine Reckoning
level10.shortTooltip: Consecrate an area
level10.fullTooltip: After 1 second, consecrate an area for 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies inside.

level13.name: Self-Righteous
level13.shortTooltip: Desperate Plea heals self and target
level13.fullTooltip: Casting Desperate Plea on an ally heals Whitemane for 125 (+4% per level). Does not grant Zeal.

level13.name: Harsh Discipline
level13.fullTooltip: Hitting a Hero with Searing Lash while they are being targeted by Inquisition Roots them for 1.5 seconds.

level13.name: Guiding Light
level13.fullTooltip: Whenever Zeal is applied to allies other than Whitemane, it grants them 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

level16.name: Radiance
level16.shortTooltip: Desperation heals allies with Zeal
level16.fullTooltip: Upon reaching 3 stacks of Desperation, all allies with Zeal are healed for 175 (+4% per level).

level16.name: Shared Punishment
level16.shortTooltip: Inquisition chains to a nearby enemy
level16.fullTooltip: Upon casting, Inquisition can chain to an additional enemy Hero near its target, dealing 35 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds.

level16.name: Lashing Out
level16.shortTooltip: Reduce Searing Lash cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Searing Lash's second strike deals 25% more damage and reduces Searing Lash's cooldown to 1 second if it hits a Hero.

level20.name: Scarlet Crusade
level20.fullTooltip: Scarlet Aegis heals for 50% more and makes affected allies Unstoppable for 1 second.

level20.name: Judgment Day
level20.fullTooltip: Divine Reckoning deals 30% more damage and pulls enemies to its center the first time it hits them.

level20.name: Subjugation
level20.fullTooltip: Inquisition reduces all damage the target deals by 75%.

level20.name: Purge the Wicked
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to blast an enemy Hero with holy fire, reducing their Armor by 25 and dealing 300 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds.

Xul.name: Xul
Xul.description: A Summoner who can push multiple lanes with ease.

basic.name: Spectral Scythe
basic.shortTooltip: Throw a scythe that damages enemies as it returns to Xul
basic.fullTooltip: Summon a scythe that travels to Xul after 1 second, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.

basic.name: Cursed Strikes
basic.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal damage in an area and reduce Attack Speed
basic.fullTooltip: Xul's Basic Attacks deal damage in a wide area and reduce the Attack Speed of Heroes and Summons by 40% for 2 seconds. Lasts 4 seconds once triggered.

basic.name: Bone Prison
basic.shortTooltip: Root an enemy in place
basic.fullTooltip: After a 2 second delay, deal 80 (+4% per level) damage and Root the target enemy Hero for 1.75 seconds.  All nearby Skeletal Warriors will fixate on the target for their duration.

heroic.name: Poison Nova
heroic.shortTooltip: Poison enemies in a large area
heroic.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 570 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

heroic.name: Skeletal Mages
heroic.shortTooltip: Summon Frost Mages to damage and Slow enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Vector Targeting Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 (+4% per level) damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

trait.name: Raise Skeleton
trait.shortTooltip: Spawn Skeletal Warriors from Minions
trait.fullTooltip: When a nearby enemy Minion dies, it becomes a Skeletal Warrior with 225 (+4% per level) Health that attacks for 21 (+4% per level) damage and last up to 15 seconds. Up to 4 Skeletal Warriors can be active at once.

activable.name: Bone Armor
activable.fullTooltip: Activate to gain a Shield equal to 25% of Xul's maximum Health for 3 seconds.

level1.name: Backlash
level1.shortTooltip: Bone Armor explodes for damage
level1.fullTooltip: When Bone Armor expires, nearby enemy Heroes take damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health.

level1.name: Shackler
level1.shortTooltip: Bone Armor Slows, can reduce cooldown
level1.fullTooltip: While Bone Armor is active, nearby enemies are Slowed by 35% for 1 second. Basic Attacks against Heroes that are Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor by 2 seconds.

level1.name: Shade
level1.shortTooltip: Bone Armor evades Basic Attacks
level1.fullTooltip: While Bone Armor is active, Xul evades all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by 20 seconds.

level4.name: Reaper's Toll
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Hit 20 Heroes with Spectral Scythe.  Reward: Reduce the cooldown of Spectral Scythe by 3 seconds.

level4.name: Grim Scythe
level4.fullTooltip: Each enemy hit by Cursed Strikes reduces its cooldown by 1 second, up to 12 seconds.

level4.name: Jailors
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Bone Prison spawns Skeletal Warriors
level4.fullTooltip: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors.  These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum.  Quest: Spawn 80 Skeletal Warriors.  Reward: While fixating on an enemy, Skeletal Warriors gain 40% Movement and Attack Speed.

level7.name: Harvest Vitality
level7.fullTooltip: Cursed Strikes heals for 70% of the damage dealt to Heroes.

level7.name: Weaken
level7.shortTooltip: Increase Cursed Strikes Attack Speed reduction
level7.fullTooltip: Increase the Attack Speed reduction of Cursed Strikes by 35% and the duration by 1 second.

level7.name: Trag'Oul's Essence
level7.shortTooltip: Skeletal Warrior attacks restore Health, Mana
level7.fullTooltip: Every time a Skeletal Warrior attacks an enemy, restore 0.5% of Xul's maximum Health and 0.2% of his maximum Mana.

level10.name: Poison Nova
level10.shortTooltip: Poison nearby enemies
level10.fullTooltip: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 570 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

level10.name: Skeletal Mages
level10.shortTooltip: Summon Frost Mages to damage and Slow enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Vector Targeting Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 (+4% per level) damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

level13.name: Echoes of Death
level13.fullTooltip: Spectral Scythe spawns 2 additional scythes next to the first after 1.5 seconds, dealing 60% damage.

level13.name: Rapid Harvest
level13.fullTooltip: Gain 5% Attack Speed for 3 seconds each time Cursed Strikes hits an enemy, up to 75%.

level13.name: Executioner
level13.fullTooltip: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

level16.name: Amplify Damage
level16.shortTooltip: Bone Prison lowers Armor
level16.fullTooltip: Enemies Rooted by Bone Prison lose 25 Armor for 1.75 seconds.

level16.name: Corpse Explosion
level16.shortTooltip: Skeletal Warriors explode on death
level16.fullTooltip: When Skeletal Warriors die they explode for 55 (+4% per level) damage in a small area. Deals 100% increased damage to non-Heroic enemies.

level16.name: Bone Spear
level16.shortTooltip: Damage enemies in a line
level16.fullTooltip: Deal 230 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.

level20.name: Andariel's Visage
level20.shortTooltip: Poison Nova heals, increase Skeleton damage
level20.fullTooltip: Poison Nova heals for 50% of the damage dealt.  Passive: Skeletal Warriors deal 50% increased damage.

level20.name: Cold Hand of Death
level20.shortTooltip: Increase Skeletal Mages Slow, Skeleton attacks Slow
level20.fullTooltip: Increase the Slow of Frost Mages by 20%.  Passive: Skeletal Warrior attacks Slow enemies by 30% for 2 seconds.

level20.name: Mortal Wound
level20.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Spectral Scythe receive 75% less healing for 4 seconds.

level20.name: Kalan's Edict
level20.shortTooltip: Skeletal Warrior attacks reduce Heroic cooldown
level20.fullTooltip: Skeletal Warrior attacks reduce the cooldown of Xul's Heroic Ability by 1%.

Yrel.name: Yrel
Yrel.description: A deliberate melee tank whose heavyweight abilities reward investment and careful timing.

basic.name: Vindication
basic.shortTooltip: Restore Health, damage enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Unleash holy energy around Yrel, dealing 42 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and healing her for 96 (+4% per level).  Charging up this Ability increases its damage up to 140 (+4% per level), and healing up to 320 (+4% per level).

basic.name: Righteous Hammer
basic.shortTooltip: Knockback and Stun enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Swing Yrel's hammer, dealing 38 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in front of her and knocking them away.  Charging up this Ability increases its knockback distance, and damage up to 125 (+4% per level). Enemies hit at maximum charge are Stunned for 0.75 seconds.

basic.name: Avenging Wrath
basic.shortTooltip: Leap to an area to damage, Slow enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Leap to a location, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area and Slowing them by 50% for 1 second.  Charging up this Ability increases its range.

heroic.name: Ardent Defender
heroic.shortTooltip: Convert damage taken to Health
heroic.fullTooltip: Surround Yrel in a barrier for 3 seconds, absorbing all damage taken and healing her for 50% of the damage received.

heroic.name: Sacred Ground
heroic.shortTooltip: Yrel gains Armor in an area
heroic.fullTooltip: Yrel sanctifies the ground around her, gaining 40 Armor until she leaves the area.

trait.name: Divine Purpose
trait.shortTooltip: Make next Basic Ability cast instantly
trait.fullTooltip: Activate to instantly charge Yrel's next Basic Ability at no mana cost.  Passive: Yrel's Basic Abilities charge up over 1.5 seconds, increasing in effectiveness, but reducing Yrel's Movement Speed by 25%.

level1.name: Light of Karabor
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Vindication radius, healing
level1.fullTooltip: Increase Vindication's radius by 15%. Vindication's healing is increased by 20% per enemy Hero hit.

level1.name: Dauntless
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Abilities grant Physical Armor
level1.fullTooltip: Casting a Basic Ability grants Yrel 35 Physical Armor for 2 seconds.

level1.name: Maraad's Insight
level1.shortTooltip: Attacking after Basic Abilities heals
level1.fullTooltip: After casting a Basic Ability, Yrel's next Basic Attack heals her for 128 (+4% per level).

level4.name: Aegis of Light
level4.fullTooltip: Upon landing, Avenging Wrath grants other nearby allied Heroes 25 Armor for 4 seconds.

level4.name: Gift of the Naaru
level4.fullTooltip: Divine Purpose heals the lowest Health nearby allied Hero other than Yrel for 275 (+4% per level).

level4.name: Hand of Freedom
level4.shortTooltip: Grants Move Speed, removes Slows, Roots
level4.fullTooltip: Grant an allied Hero 50% Movement Speed for 3 seconds and remove all Slows and Roots from them.  Cannot be used on Yrel.

level7.name: Righteous Momentum
level7.shortTooltip: Righteous Hammer can grant Move Speed
level7.fullTooltip: Yrel is no longer slowed while Channeling Righteous Hammer, and at maximum charge she gains 25% Movement Speed.

level7.name: Holy Avenger
level7.shortTooltip: Avenging Wrath cooldown reduced at max charge
level7.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Avenging Wrath at maximum charge reduces its cooldown to 1 second.

level7.name: Divine Steed
level7.fullTooltip: Mounting is instant and grants 60% Movement Speed that decays over 3 seconds.

level7.name: Samaara's Light
level7.fullTooltip: While above 50% Health, gain 15% Movement Speed.

level10.name: Ardent Defender
level10.shortTooltip: Convert damage taken to Health
level10.fullTooltip: Surround Yrel in a barrier for 3 seconds, absorbing all damage taken and healing her for 50% of the damage received.

level10.name: Sacred Ground
level10.shortTooltip: Yrel gains Armor in an area
level10.fullTooltip: Yrel sanctifies the ground around her, gaining 40 Armor until she leaves the area.

level13.name: Aldor Peacekeeper
level13.fullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Vindication at maximum charge deal 30% less damage for 3 seconds.

level13.name: Repentance
level13.fullTooltip: Increase Avenging Wrath's Slow by 25% and duration by 0.5 seconds.

level13.name: Velen's Chosen
level13.shortTooltip: Basic Abilities can grant Spell Power
level13.fullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability at maximum charge grants 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to 30%.

level16.name: Templar's Verdict
level16.shortTooltip: Righteous Hammer reduces Armor, deals percent damage
level16.fullTooltip: Righteous Hammer reduces the Armor of enemy Heroes hit by 20 for 4 seconds and deals bonus damage equal to 4% of their maximum Health.

level16.name: Divine Favor
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Abilities reduce Divine Purpose cooldown
level16.fullTooltip: Casting a Basic Ability reduces the cooldown of Divine Purpose by 1.5 seconds.

level16.name: Holy Wrath
level16.shortTooltip: Attacks splash after casting Basic Abilities
level16.fullTooltip: After casting a Basic Ability, Yrel's next Basic Attack splashes for 20% increased damage around the target.

level20.name: Word of Glory
level20.shortTooltip: Ardent Defender heals allies in an area
level20.fullTooltip: Ardent Defender heals nearby allied Heroes for 100% of the healing received by Yrel.

level20.name: Hallowed Ground
level20.fullTooltip: Casting Avenging Wrath while inside Sacred Ground moves Sacred Ground to Yrel's location upon landing.

level20.name: Bubble Hearth
level20.shortTooltip: Activate to become Invulnerable and Hearth
level20.fullTooltip: After 1 second, Yrel becomes Invulnerable and casts Hearthstone. Cannot be canceled.

level20.name: Seraphim
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

Zagara.name: Zagara
Zagara.description: A Summoner who provides lots of vision of the battleground.

basic.name: Baneling Barrage
basic.shortTooltip: Launch a Baneling that explodes on contact with an enemy
basic.fullTooltip: Launch 1 Baneling that deals 86 (+4% per level) damage to enemies it hits.  Stores up to 4 charges.

basic.name: Hunter Killer
basic.shortTooltip: Unleash a Hydralisk on an enemy
basic.fullTooltip: Summon a Hydralisk to attack a single target, dealing 65 (+5% per level) damage per second. Lasts 8 seconds.

basic.name: Infested Drop
basic.shortTooltip: Bombard an area with a Zerg Drop Pod that spawns Roachlings
basic.fullTooltip: Bombard target area with a Zerg Drop Pod for 140 (+4% per level) damage.   The pod spawns 2 Roachlings that deal 27 (+4% per level) damage per second and last for 8 seconds.

heroic.name: Devouring Maw
heroic.shortTooltip: Eats enemies in area
heroic.fullTooltip: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 88 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

heroic.name: Nydus Network
heroic.shortTooltip: Empowers Creep and can create Nydus Worms
heroic.fullTooltip: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second.  Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 4 Nydus Worms at a time.  Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther.  Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

trait.name: Creep Tumor
trait.shortTooltip: Generates Creep allowing Zagara and her minions to move faster
trait.fullTooltip: Lay a Creep Tumor that generates Creep. While on Creep, Zagara gains 20% additional attack range and both Zagara and her summons move 20% faster. Tumors last 240 seconds and reveal the surrounding area while active.  Stores up to 3 charges.

level1.name: Volatile Acid
level1.shortTooltip: Increase Baneling range and non-Hero damage
level1.fullTooltip: Banelings can travel 50% further before exploding and their damage to non-Heroes is increased by 50%.

level1.name: Corpse Feeders
level1.shortTooltip: Infested Drop cooldown is reduced and Roachlings take less damage
level1.fullTooltip: Reduces the cooldown of Infested Drop by 3 seconds and Roachlings take 50% less damage from non-Heroic sources.

level1.name: Infest
level1.shortTooltip: Increases nearby allied Ranged Minion's damage
level1.fullTooltip: Nearby Ranged Minions deal an additional 100% damage, plus an additional 1% per 1000 Siege damage Zagara has dealt. Can be toggled on or off.

level4.name: Envenomed Spines
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to have Zagara's next Basic Attack apply 230 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds.

level4.name: Medusa Blades
level4.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal 33% damage to three nearby targets.

level4.name: Serrated Spines
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase damage
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Each Basic Attack against a Hero increases Zagara's Attack Damage by 0.3.

level7.name: Baneling Massacre
level7.fullTooltip: Gain 2 additional charges of Banelings.

level7.name: Viscous Acid
level7.fullTooltip: Banelings slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

level7.name: Bile Drop
level7.shortTooltip: Quest: Infested Drop impacts increase damage
level7.fullTooltip: Quest: Passively increases the damage of Infested Drop by 50%. Each Hero hit by the impact damage of Infested Drop increases this bonus by 5%.  Reward: Upon reaching 150% bonus damage, increase the impact radius of Infested Drop by 20%.

level10.name: Devouring Maw
level10.shortTooltip: Eats enemies in area
level10.fullTooltip: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 88 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

level10.name: Nydus Network
level10.shortTooltip: Empowers Creep and can create Nydus Worms
level10.fullTooltip: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second.  Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 4 Nydus Worms at a time.  Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther.  Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

level13.name: Hydralisk Transfusion
level13.fullTooltip: Zagara is healed for 75% of the damage dealt by Hunter Killers' Basic Attacks to Heroes.

level13.name: Protective Coating
level13.fullTooltip: While on Creep, Zagara gains 20 Armor, taking 20% less damage.

level13.name: Spell Shield
level13.fullTooltip: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

level16.name: Brood Expansion
level16.shortTooltip: Reduces the cooldown of Hunter Killer
level16.fullTooltip: Reduces the cooldown of Hunter Killer by 7 seconds and its Mana cost by 30.

level16.name: Corrosive Saliva
level16.shortTooltip: Empowers Hunter Killers against Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: When used against Heroes, Hunter Killers deal additional damage equal to 2.5% of their maximum Health.

level16.name: Mutalisk
level16.shortTooltip: Hunter Killer summons a Mutalisk instead
level16.fullTooltip: Hunter Killer now spawns a Mutalisk. Mutalisks have a bounce attack and last for 30 seconds.

level20.name: Tyrant Maw
level20.shortTooltip: More damage and cooldown reduction from Takedowns
level20.fullTooltip: Devouring Maw deals 50% more damage. Takedowns reduce its cooldown by 25 seconds.

level20.name: Endless Creep
level20.shortTooltip: Increases Creep Tumor's cast range and duration
level20.fullTooltip: The cast range for Creep Tumor is increased by 2000%. Creep Tumors now last 600 seconds. While on Creep, Zagara gains an additional 10% Movement Speed.

level20.name: Fury of the Storm
level20.fullTooltip: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

Zarya.name: Zarya
Zarya.description: A Bruiser that can enable deadly allies and is good at preventing burst damage.

basic.name: Particle Grenade
basic.shortTooltip: Deals damage to enemies in a small area
basic.fullTooltip: Launch a particle grenade that deals 75 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the area. Deals 50% damage to Structures.  Stores up to 4 charges.

basic.name: Personal Barrier
basic.shortTooltip: Gain a Shield that absorbs damage
basic.fullTooltip: Gain a Shield that absorbs 560 (+4% per level) damage for 3 seconds.

basic.name: Shield Ally
basic.shortTooltip: Grant an ally a Shield that absorbs damage
basic.fullTooltip: Grants an allied Hero a Shield that absorbs 420 (+4% per level) damage for 3 seconds.

heroic.name: Graviton Surge
heroic.shortTooltip: Launch a gravity bomb that draws in enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.

heroic.name: Expulsion Zone
heroic.shortTooltip: Launch a bomb that continually pushes enemies
heroic.fullTooltip: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 124 (+4% per level) damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.

trait.name: Energy
trait.shortTooltip: Damage absorbed by Zarya's Shields increase her damage.
trait.fullTooltip: Each time Zarya's Personal Barrier or Shield Ally absorbs 9 (+4% per level) damage, her Energy is increased by 1. Each point of Energy increases Zarya's damage by 2%. After 0.5 seconds, Energy decays by 3 per second.

level1.name: Demolitions Expert
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Increases Particle Grenade radius and reduces cooldown
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: For every 5 enemy Heroes hit by Particle Grenade, its recharge rate lowers by 0.4375 seconds, up to 3.5 seconds.  Reward: Once Particle Grenade has hit 40 enemy Heroes, its radius is increased by 15%.

level1.name: Together We Are Strong
level1.shortTooltip: Allied damage dealt with Shield Ally contributes to Energy
level1.fullTooltip: Every 6 (+4% per level) damage done by allies while under Shield Ally contributes 1 Energy, up to 30 Energy per Shield.

level1.name: Feel the Heat
level1.shortTooltip: Basic Attack deals more damage to close enemies
level1.fullTooltip: Zarya's Basic Attack deals 50% additional damage to enemies in melee range.

level1.name: Maximum Charge
level1.shortTooltip: Regen Globes grant Energy Quest: Increases maximum Energy
level1.fullTooltip: Regen Globes now instantly grant 20 Energy.  Quest: Spend 150 seconds at or above 50 Energy.  Reward: Gain an additional 20 maximum Energy.

level4.name: I Am the Strongest
level4.fullTooltip: Personal Barrier absorbs an additional 140 (+4% per level) damage.

level4.name: Give Me Twenty
level4.shortTooltip: Quest: Increases Shield Ally absorb amount and reduces cooldown
level4.fullTooltip: Quest: Regeneration Globes increase Shield Ally absorb amount by 15, up to 300 permanently.   Reward: After collecting 20 Regen Globes, permanently reduce the cooldown of Shield Ally by 2 seconds.

level4.name: Speed Barrier
level4.shortTooltip: Shield Ally increases allied Hero Movement Speed
level4.fullTooltip: Shield Ally increases the allied Hero's Movement Speed by 50% for the duration.

level4.name: Defensive Shielding
level4.shortTooltip: Personal Barrier, Shield Ally grant Physical Armor
level4.fullTooltip: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier and Shield Ally grant 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 6 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

level7.name: Pinpoint Accuracy
level7.shortTooltip: Particle Grenade deals more damage in center area
level7.fullTooltip: Particle Grenade deals 30 (+4% per level) more damage to enemies hit by the center of the blast.

level7.name: Explosive Barrier
level7.fullTooltip: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier explodes, dealing 100 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

level7.name: To the Limit
level7.shortTooltip: Increases Basic Attack size at high Energy
level7.fullTooltip: While above 50 Energy, Zarya's Basic Attack size is increased by 35%.

level7.name: Hit Me
level7.shortTooltip: Shield damage absorbed contributes more Energy
level7.fullTooltip: Damage absorbed by Zarya's Shields contributes 15% more Energy.

level10.name: Graviton Surge
level10.shortTooltip: Launch a gravity bomb that draws in enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.

level10.name: Expulsion Zone
level10.shortTooltip: Launch a bomb that continually pushes enemies
level10.fullTooltip: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 124 (+4% per level) damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.

level13.name: Unstoppable Competitor
level13.fullTooltip: Personal Barrier makes Zarya Unstoppable for up to 2 seconds.

level13.name: Spell Barrier
level13.fullTooltip: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier grants Zarya 75 Spell Armor for 3 Seconds, reducing the damage taken from Abilities by 75%.

level13.name: Endurance Training
level13.fullTooltip: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya gains 20 Armor, reducing all damage taken by 20%.

level13.name: Pain is Temporary
level13.shortTooltip: Consume Energy to gain a Shield
level13.fullTooltip: Activate to consume all Energy and gain a Shield that absorbs 0.5% of Zarya's maximum Health per Energy consumed and lasts for 3 seconds. Zarya may only have one personal Shield active on herself at a time.

level16.name: Plasma Shock
level16.shortTooltip: Particle Grenade slows enemies near the center
level16.fullTooltip: Particle Grenade slows Movement Speed by 35% for 2 seconds to enemies near the center.

level16.name: Cleansing Shield
level16.shortTooltip: Shield Ally removes all disabling effects
level16.fullTooltip: Causes Shield Ally to remove all disabling effects and reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

level16.name: Gain Train
level16.shortTooltip: Shield Ally now affects a second ally
level16.fullTooltip: Shield Ally now grants an untalented Shield to a nearby ally upon impact.

level16.name: Born in Battle
level16.shortTooltip: Reduces cooldowns at high Energy
level16.fullTooltip: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya's cooldowns regenerate 25% faster.

level20.name: Gravity Kills
level20.shortTooltip: Graviton Surge has increased duration and deals damage
level20.fullTooltip: Increases Graviton Surge's duration by 1 second and causes it to deal 175 (+4% per level) damage over the duration.

level20.name: Clear Out
level20.shortTooltip: Increases Expulsion Zone radius and provides Energy
level20.fullTooltip: Increases Expulsion Zone's radius by 15% and Zarya's maximum Energy temporarily increases by 15 per enemy Hero hit for 10 seconds.

level20.name: Grenadier
level20.shortTooltip: Particle Grenade charges are returned at once
level20.fullTooltip: All Particle Grenade charges are returned at once.

level20.name: Unyielding Defender
level20.fullTooltip: Activate to reset the cooldown of Personal Barrier and Shield Ally.

Zeratul.name: Zeratul
Zeratul.description: A stealthed Assassin who can dart around his enemies.

basic.name: Cleave
basic.shortTooltip: Damage nearby enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Deal 212 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

basic.name: Singularity Spike
basic.shortTooltip: Slow and damage the first enemy hit
basic.fullTooltip: Flings a Singularity Spike that sticks to the first enemy hit. Deals 240 (+4% per level) damage after 1 second and Slows the enemy by 40% for 3 seconds.

basic.name: Blink
basic.shortTooltip: Teleport to a location. Ability does not break cloak
basic.fullTooltip: Teleport to the target location.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

heroic.name: Might Of The Nerazim
heroic.shortTooltip: Recast last Basic Ability
heroic.fullTooltip: Activate to cast an untalented version of Zeratul's most recently used Basic Ability, dealing 50% less damage.  Passive: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 30% more damage.

heroic.name: Void Prison
heroic.shortTooltip: Time Stop targets in an area
heroic.fullTooltip: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

trait.name: Permanent Cloak
trait.shortTooltip: Become Stealthed while not attacking, using Abilities, or taking damage
trait.fullTooltip: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or Channeling ends Stealth. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

activable.name: Vorpal Blade
activable.fullTooltip: Activate to teleport to Zeratul's last non-structure Basic Attack target within 3 seconds. The target is revealed during these 3 seconds.

level1.name: Greater Cleave
level1.shortTooltip: Increases radius of Cleave
level1.fullTooltip: Increases the radius of Cleave by 33%.

level1.name: Shadow Hunter
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Gather Regen Globes to empower Blink
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to lower the Mana cost of Blink by 3, up to 45.  Reward: Upon gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Blink by 1 second.

level1.name: Move Unseen
level1.shortTooltip: Gain Move Speed while Stealthed
level1.fullTooltip: Gain 30% Movement Speed while Stealthed.

level4.name: Rending Cleave
level4.shortTooltip: Cleave deals additional damage over time
level4.fullTooltip: Cleave deals an additional 40% damage over 3 seconds.

level4.name: Psionic Strength
level4.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks, Abilities increase damage dealt
level4.fullTooltip: Dealing damage to enemy Heroes increases all damage dealt by 6% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 30%.

level4.name: Darkness Descends
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to gain 40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Gain 20% Attack Speed.

level7.name: Wormhole
level7.fullTooltip: For 3 seconds, reactivate Blink to return to the point where it was cast from.

level7.name: Seeker in the Dark
level7.fullTooltip: Singularity Spike takes 50% longer to explode. It can be reactivated to teleport to the target, granting 30% increased Move Speed for 3 seconds.

level7.name: Warp Skirmisher
level7.fullTooltip: Vorpal Blade gains a 2nd charge. Teleporting to an enemy with Vorpal Blade causes Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal 40% more damage.

level10.name: Might Of The Nerazim
level10.shortTooltip: Recast last Basic Ability
level10.fullTooltip: Activate to cast an untalented version of Zeratul's most recently used Basic Ability, dealing 50% less damage.  Passive: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 30% more damage.

level10.name: Void Prison
level10.shortTooltip: Time Stop targets in an area
level10.fullTooltip: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

level13.name: Shroud of Adun
level13.shortTooltip: Gain a shield while under Permanent Cloak
level13.fullTooltip: Zeratul gains a Shield equal to 15% of his Maximum Health over 5 seconds while under Permanent Cloak.

level13.name: Mending Strikes
level13.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks heal for 35% of the damage dealt.

level13.name: Spell Shield
level13.fullTooltip: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

level16.name: Master Warp-Blade
level16.shortTooltip: Bonus damage every third Basic Attack
level16.fullTooltip: Every third consecutive Basic Attack against the same target deals 125% bonus damage.

level16.name: Void Slash
level16.shortTooltip: Cleave empowered against multiple Heroes
level16.fullTooltip: If Cleave hits more than one enemy Hero, it deals 50% increased damage and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

level16.name: Sentenced to Death
level16.shortTooltip: Deal bonus damage to marked targets
level16.fullTooltip: Deal 30% increased damage to enemies while they have a Singularity Spike attached to them.

level20.name: Twilight Falls
level20.shortTooltip: Might of the Nerazim resets cooldowns
level20.fullTooltip: Might of the Nerazim resets the cooldown of all Basic Abilities.

level20.name: Gift of the XelNaga
level20.shortTooltip: Allies unaffected by Void Prison, enemies slowed
level20.fullTooltip: Allies are no longer affected by Void Prison, and enemies are slowed by 50% for 3 seconds once Void Prison ends.

level20.name: Nexus Blades
level20.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow
level20.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

level20.name: Shadow Mending
level20.shortTooltip: Spell Damage dealt to Heroes heals
level20.fullTooltip: Heal for 75% of Spell Damage dealt to Heroes.

Zuljin.name: Zul'jin
Zuljin.description: A Physical Damage Assassin that gains power while losing Health.

basic.name: Grievous Throw
basic.shortTooltip: Throw an Axe, damaging and marking a target, increasing Zul'jin's Basic Attack damage.
basic.fullTooltip: Zul'jin throws an axe forward, dealing 125 (+4% per level) damage to the first 2 enemies hit and marking them for 6 seconds. Marked enemies take 50% bonus damage from Zul'jin's next 3 Basic Attacks against them.

basic.name: Twin Cleave
basic.shortTooltip: Throw swirling Axes that Slow enemies
basic.fullTooltip: Throw 2 axes in a large, circular arc, dealing 112 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing affected enemies by 15% per axe for 2 seconds.

basic.name: Regeneration
basic.shortTooltip: Zul'jin Channels to regenerate Health over time
basic.fullTooltip: Zul'jin channels to regenerate 30% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds. Moving while channeling or taking damage will interrupt this effect.

heroic.name: Taz'dingo!
heroic.shortTooltip: Become unkillable
heroic.fullTooltip: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

heroic.name: Guillotine
heroic.shortTooltip: Deal heavy area damage
heroic.fullTooltip: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

trait.name: Berserker
trait.shortTooltip: Increased Attack Speed as Health gets lower
trait.fullTooltip: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 25% but consume 2% maximum Health per attack.  Passive: Zul'jin attacks 1% faster for every 1% of maximum Health missing.  You Want Axe?  Quest: Every 5 Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increases Basic Attack damage by 1.  Reward: After attacking Heroes 75 times, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.  Reward: After attacking Heroes 150 times, Twin Cleave now revolves twice.

activable.name: Amani Rage
activable.shortTooltip: Activate to lose Health and restore it over time
activable.fullTooltip: Activate to cause Zul'jin to instantly lose 50% of his current Health and heal for that amount over 10 seconds.

level1.name: Boneslicer
level1.shortTooltip: Empower Grievous Throw
level1.fullTooltip: Grievous Throw now pierces through all enemies hit and restores 15 Mana per Hero hit. Additionally, Grievous Throw's mark is no longer removed by Basic Attacks.

level1.name: Recklessness
level1.shortTooltip: Low Health increases damage
level1.fullTooltip: While Zul'jin is below 75% Health, he gains 10% Spell Power. While he is below 50% Health, his Basic Attack damage is increased by 20%.

level1.name: Headhunter
level1.shortTooltip: Quest: Takedowns increase damage
level1.fullTooltip: Quest: Zul'jin's first Takedown against each enemy Hero permanently increases his damage dealt by 2%.  Reward: After getting Takedowns on every enemy Hero, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.

level4.name: Troll's Blood
level4.fullTooltip: Increase Regeneration's healing by 25%. If Regeneration fully finishes, restore 10% of Zul'jin's maximum Mana.

level4.name: Voodoo Shuffle
level4.shortTooltip: Activate to remove Roots and Slows
level4.fullTooltip: Activate to remove Roots and Slows.  Passive: Lower the cooldown and Mana cost of Regeneration by 40%.

level4.name: Amani Hide
level4.fullTooltip: Lower the cooldown of Amani Rage by 10 seconds and gain 10 Armor while regenerating Health from it.

level7.name: Vicious Assault
level7.shortTooltip: Increase Grievous Throw duration and damage
level7.fullTooltip: Increase the duration of Grievous Throw's mark by 3 seconds and its damage bonus by 35%.

level7.name: Arcanite Axes
level7.fullTooltip: Quest: Twin Cleave's damage is permanently increased by 0.75 every time it hits a Hero.

level7.name: Ferocity
level7.fullTooltip: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Berserker by 40%.

level10.name: Taz'dingo!
level10.shortTooltip: Become unkillable
level10.fullTooltip: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

level10.name: Guillotine
level10.shortTooltip: Deal heavy area damage
level10.fullTooltip: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

level13.name: Lacerate
level13.fullTooltip: Increase the Slow amount of each Twin Cleave axe by 10%.

level13.name: Eye of Zul'jin
level13.fullTooltip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant Zul'jin 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%.

level13.name: Ensnare
level13.shortTooltip: Throw a net that Roots enemies
level13.fullTooltip: Throw a net forward, Rooting the first enemy Hero hit for 1.5 seconds.

level16.name: No Mercy!
level16.shortTooltip: Basic Attacks ignore Armor
level16.fullTooltip: Zul'jin's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes marked with Grievous Throw ignore Armor.

level16.name: Wrong Place Wrong Time
level16.shortTooltip: Bonus Twin Cleave damage at apex
level16.fullTooltip: If an enemy is hit by both Twin Cleave axes at the same time, they take an additional 100 (+4% per level) damage and count as 5 Hero hits for You Want Axe?.

level16.name: Let the Killing Begin
level16.shortTooltip: Killing enemies increases Attack Speed
level16.fullTooltip: When Zul'jin kills an enemy, his Attack Speed is increased by 5%, up to 40%, for 12 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration.  Hero Takedowns instantly grant 40% Attack Speed.

level20.name: Amani Resilience
level20.fullTooltip: Increase Taz'dingo's duration by 1 second. Upon expiring, Zul'jin heals for 50% of the damage he dealt during Taz'dingo.

level20.name: Buzzsaw
level20.fullTooltip: After impact, Guillotine continues forward, dealing 75% damage to enemies hit. If a Hero is killed by Guillotine, Zul'jin is instantly healed to full.

level20.name: Forest Medicine
level20.fullTooltip: Regeneration is no longer Channeled, and cannot be interrupted.
